65815025-1656-4e8c-acad-7cbac68737da.question: What does 'endgültig nicht bestanden' mean in relation to German universities?
65815025-1656-4e8c-acad-7cbac68737da.answer: 'Endgültig nicht bestanden', i.e. 'finally/definitively failed', means that if you have finally failed a subject and have therefore failed your degree, you are exempted from doing the same/similar degree anywhere else in Germany.

28a9a420-52fd-41eb-910e-bdb5993e5eab.question: How would TUM decide whether the degrees are similar for an applicant who has 'endgültig nicht bestanden' a previous degree?
28a9a420-52fd-41eb-910e-bdb5993e5eab.answer: A check needs to be done by TUM's program heads comparing the previous degree to the MSc. AI in Society. This involves assessing the university and modules of the previous degree to see if they are 'fachverwandt' or similar enough. If the two degrees are not similar enough, the applicant can apply with no problems. If they are highly similar, the applicant would likely be declined by TUM.

f0d94756-82ba-46b3-89e0-586d4fde2dea.question: Can an applicant be considered for the AI in Society program at TUM despite being exmatriculated due to academic misconduct from a previous master's degree at a German university?
f0d94756-82ba-46b3-89e0-586d4fde2dea.answer: This depends on the similarity of the two programs. If the previous degree and the MSc. AI in Society are considered similar by TUM's program heads, the applicant will likely be declined. If the degrees are not considered similar enough, the applicant can apply with no problems.

40e67dc0-29b7-4006-92ca-9b5e06c171ff.question: What should be done if an applicant was unable to complete only one class due to external circumstances at a previous university?
40e67dc0-29b7-4006-92ca-9b5e06c171ff.answer: The applicant could propose to the admissions board for an oral interview or suggest meeting a higher standard in the assessment process to fully demonstrate both their knowledge and dedication to the program.

9a9a76ff-e394-4ff4-af3e-ce0343e1b9a8.question: What information is needed from the applicant to do a check of the similarity between previous degree and AI in society program at TUM?
9a9a76ff-e394-4ff4-af3e-ce0343e1b9a8.answer: The program heads at TUM would need to know more details about the applicant's previous degree, such as the university and the modules that are part of the curriculum. This information could also be sent via the website of the degree if it lists all relevant information.

6261d0d6-7453-40c4-8dd8-9483c956b304.question: Would my situation, i.e. failing a subject and therefore failing my degree, exempt me from doing the same/similar degree anywhere else in Germany?
6261d0d6-7453-40c4-8dd8-9483c956b304.answer: In Germany, if you have failed a subject and you therefore failed your degree, you are exempted from doing the same/similar degree anywhere else in Germany. If your previous degree and ours (MSc. AI in Society) are considered to be similar enough by our program heads, you would unfortunately be declined by TUM. Alternatively, if the two degrees are not considered similar, you can apply with no problems.

278877d5-bdaa-42dc-a5fb-34029ff1eb47.question: I failed a single class due to external circumstances. Is it possible to consider an exemption in this case? Could an interview with the admissions board be arranged, or could I meet a higher standard in the assessment process?
278877d5-bdaa-42dc-a5fb-34029ff1eb47.answer: In this situation, whether or not you can apply is a formal issue determined by the university and cannot be decided by an interview with the admission committee.

f8fe3c6a-ee29-40c3-9b03-b1e93ac7a119.question: Could you please advise whether my previous situation, where I was exmatriculated for allegedly committing academic misconduct, would impact my application to your program?
f8fe3c6a-ee29-40c3-9b03-b1e93ac7a119.answer: In Germany, if you have failed a subject and you therefore failed your degree, you are exempted from doing the same/similar degree anywhere else in Germany. If your previous degree and ours (MSc. AI in Society) are considered to be similar enough by our program heads, you would unfortunately be declined by TUM. Alternatively, if the two degrees are not considered similar, you can apply with no problems.

66ee6348-a5be-4ece-a5af-72a750092183.question: Regarding the practical project, would the Bachelor thesis be sufficient as I am writing about Industry 4.0 and its implementation?
66ee6348-a5be-4ece-a5af-72a750092183.answer: Yes, Bachelor’s theses are also counted as practical projects, as long as the contents are suitable. The thesis must meet the 18 ECTS requirement (if the thesis is the only project you’re submitting), and it must be finished at the time of application. If it does not show up on your transcript, it cannot be counted.

d058ab9e-a6bc-493e-8cb3-253b41fa228b.question: Is it necessary to submit an English proficiency certificate such as TOEFL or IELTS, or would my completed English and German courses be sufficient for this requirement?
d058ab9e-a6bc-493e-8cb3-253b41fa228b.answer: It is not necessary to submit English certificates, if instead you can prove your knowledge to us by “English as language of instruction” during your Bachelor’s studies, or if your thesis was written in English.

22e3e88d-d5f9-45f6-a843-dfc05377f447.question: Are there any other specific admission criteria I should be aware of or additional steps I might need to take?
22e3e88d-d5f9-45f6-a843-dfc05377f447.answer: All of the relevant admission criteria and procedures can be found on the program's website.

ec1b84ea-d40a-4bd1-9dd3-ef11911c2fd1.question: Who can help me with my application to a scholarship program?
ec1b84ea-d40a-4bd1-9dd3-ef11911c2fd1.answer: You are advised to reach out to the study program head, Prof. [REDACTED]. She should be able to support you if you describe your situation well as a prospective student of the program.

17d87484-e10a-47b3-bea5-d0ed39b8bd09.question: Does the Master’s program filter applicants based on the field of their Bachelor's degree or work experience?
17d87484-e10a-47b3-bea5-d0ed39b8bd09.answer: The program does not filter applicants based on the field of their Bachelor’s degree or work experience.

fbc25244-b472-4829-aff6-bf10972e0904.question: What is important for an applicant for the Master’s program?
fbc25244-b472-4829-aff6-bf10972e0904.answer: What is important is that you fulfill the application requirements.

d988540a-649a-47f9-9d52-f8f95eb99707.question: What are the requirements for the practical project component in the Master’s program?
d988540a-649a-47f9-9d52-f8f95eb99707.answer: Your work experience would be very relevant for fulfilling the practical project component.

7f65fd5c-06e0-497c-aa55-698675bce813.question: What academic requirement needs to be shown from the applicant’s previous study degree(s)?
7f65fd5c-06e0-497c-aa55-698675bce813.answer: Your previous study degree(s) need to show at least 5 credit points from a mathematical/statistical subject.

43ab2906-280c-4b75-ad2e-15f27f3446db.question: Where can one find the application requirements for the Master’s program?
43ab2906-280c-4b75-ad2e-15f27f3446db.answer: The application requirements can be found on the program website.

98bf2068-8cd9-424a-a37f-d239242ae3a0.question: What is the format of the aptitude test for the M.Sc (AI in Society) program?
98bf2068-8cd9-424a-a37f-d239242ae3a0.answer: The format of the aptitude test is a closed-book exam.

011579c5-b901-494c-8739-d1bfa9c97ce0.question: Can additional aids be used during the aptitude test for the M.Sc (AI in Society) program?
011579c5-b901-494c-8739-d1bfa9c97ce0.answer: No, additional aids are not allowed during the exam.

fd884048-6fc6-4d66-8a53-4f316c3719a9.question: What is the accurate application period for the master 'AI in Society' at TUM?
fd884048-6fc6-4d66-8a53-4f316c3719a9.answer: The correct application period is 01-01 until 31-05.

e8320828-afc8-488f-9abf-33320b4c6ebf.question: Is it possible to visit the TUM campus to get information about the 'AI in Society' program, and possibly talk to students/teachers/professors?
e8320828-afc8-488f-9abf-33320b4c6ebf.answer: The university campus is open at all times. However, speaking with professors or students would need some organizing.

82338e01-14d8-49ed-964a-b301c5c40569.question: Where are the courses for the 'AI in Society' program mainly conducted?
82338e01-14d8-49ed-964a-b301c5c40569.answer: The courses are dispersed across multiple buildings. Mainly they are in Richard-Wagner-Str. 1, Marsstr. 20-22, and Arcisstr. 21 (which is the main campus of TUM).

501f306c-1fec-4021-b9cc-2dbf452ad29f.question: What are the requirements to enrol in the AI in Society program at TUM?
501f306c-1fec-4021-b9cc-2dbf452ad29f.answer: The TUM website provides all relevant information regarding the application requirements for the AI in Society study program.

fdcab05b-646b-4081-89f5-f97e473abf19.question: What is the aptitude test for the AI in Society program at TUM?
fdcab05b-646b-4081-89f5-f97e473abf19.answer: The TUM website provides all relevant information regarding the aptitude test for the AI in Society study program.

c8e1c9bb-ec63-475b-b023-ee8031cbbab2.question: Where can I find information about certain modules in the AI in Society program at TUM?
c8e1c9bb-ec63-475b-b023-ee8031cbbab2.answer: The TUM website provides all relevant information regarding the AI in Society study program's module.

bf22268e-1f90-4c78-b12f-ff9d4a9b10ef.question: I have completed my Bachelor's in Mechanical Engineering, but I am interested in the Master's program in 'AI in Society'. The prerequisites mention other degrees. Am I eligible to apply with my degree?
bf22268e-1f90-4c78-b12f-ff9d4a9b10ef.answer: There are no rigid prerequisites when it comes to the specific field of your Bachelor's degree. In other words, you can apply with any Bachelor's degree. In the end, what matters is whether you fulfil the further admission requirements such as a practical project, entrance exam, etc.

d0a58762-5d94-43ed-8fb5-573bd620e046.question: Should I select the 140 credits based on the best grades earned or the relevance to the AI in Society program?
d0a58762-5d94-43ed-8fb5-573bd620e046.answer: Please select the best grades. The relevance to AI in Society does not matter here.

92cfed97-851d-4876-8ea9-79bd70748f02.question: I have already completed a Master's degree. May I list the credits I earned during my master's study?
92cfed97-851d-4876-8ea9-79bd70748f02.answer: No, please only list credits from your Bachelor’s degree. We cannot actually take a Master’s degree as basis for another Master’s degree application. It will always be the Bachelor’s degree that is relevant.

dbd16595-618d-4472-b60f-996fec69fbcb.question: Which courses were applied for credit recognition in the AI in Society program?
dbd16595-618d-4472-b60f-996fec69fbcb.answer: The courses “Foundations of AI and [REDACTED]”, “Introduction to Programming and [REDACTED]”, “Law, Governance and Regulation of AI”, and “Psychology of Learning and [REDACTED] of AI-based Systems” were applied for credit recognition.

55140c01-5b70-4f54-8d49-49a0464887ea.question: Which course had its credits recognized in the AI in Society program?
55140c01-5b70-4f54-8d49-49a0464887ea.answer: The course “Introduction to Programming and [REDACTED]” had its credits recognized with grade 1.0.

962f2b5b-cdfa-4f18-96ec-5ec361d4e2f6.question: Were all the applied courses recognized for credit in the AI in Society program?
962f2b5b-cdfa-4f18-96ec-5ec361d4e2f6.answer: No, only the course “Introduction to Programming and [REDACTED]” was granted recognition. The rest of the cases for recognition were declined.

228b63ee-2200-46e4-9515-cb05cd1fbb74.question: Has the credit recognition request for the AI in Society courses “Foundations of AI and [REDACTED]”, “Introduction to Programming and [REDACTED]” and “Introduction to [REDACTED]” been accepted?
228b63ee-2200-46e4-9515-cb05cd1fbb74.answer: The credit recognition request for these courses has been declined by the examination board.

b694ee54-82cd-4592-931b-bd21ce644cde.question: What was my credit recognition application status for the AI in Society courses “Foundations of AI” and “Introduction to Programming”?
b694ee54-82cd-4592-931b-bd21ce644cde.answer: Your application for credit recognition was declined by the examination board.

c463b117-9b3d-4905-986b-9ee1486855f7.question: Could you kindly provide the individual scores for my academic performance and the writing test from the first stage of the application process?
c463b117-9b3d-4905-986b-9ee1486855f7.answer: You had received 18 points based on your grades (academic performance) and 29 points in the written test. This led to 47 points in total.

884a89ed-f8b3-44e1-96d3-6818925f0b49.question: Based on my academic and language qualifications, am I eligible to apply for the Master of Science “AI in Society” at your university?
884a89ed-f8b3-44e1-96d3-6818925f0b49.answer: You can look up the minimum scores here: https://www.tum.de/en/studies/application/application-info-portal/admission-requirements/language-certificates For example, for IELTS, the minimum passing score is 6.5. Your alternative English test is not mentioned as an accepted test. However, English skills are also recognized if either a) English was the language of instruction at your home university, or b) your thesis is written in English. For more info, see the university website.

38861596-b864-41bb-9341-d14929e00fa7.question: Could you please provide details about the application procedure?
38861596-b864-41bb-9341-d14929e00fa7.answer: The entire application procedure can be found on the university website: https://www.sot.tum.de/sot/studium/ai-in-society/application/

8741a347-dd65-44ed-8131-fa1475d92b1a.question: What is the earliest date I can submit my application, and what are the deadlines for the upcoming intake?
8741a347-dd65-44ed-8131-fa1475d92b1a.answer: The application portal opens on January 1st and closes on May 31st.

ad9845d3-5775-4c18-bd50-246505c0c69d.question: Could you share information about the tuition fees or any other costs associated with the program?
ad9845d3-5775-4c18-bd50-246505c0c69d.answer: The tuition fees per semester for students outside of the EU currently amount to 4000 euros. More information about this can be found here: https://www.tum.de/en/studies/fees/tuition

d8275d0b-b71d-4488-8a2a-094f19ae29c4.question: Would being exmatriculated due to academic misconduct from a previous masters degree at a german university affect the application to the AI in Society program at TUM?
d8275d0b-b71d-4488-8a2a-094f19ae29c4.answer: The first step is to check whether your previous degree and the MSc. AI in Society are similar ('fachverwandt'). This check needs to be done by our program heads. If the two degrees are not similar enough, you are aligible to apply with no issue. If the two degrees are highly similar, you, unfortunately, would be declined by TUM. More details about your previous degree, i.e. the university, the modules included in the curriculum, are needed for this comparison.

3e21f80f-9ae3-42bc-954f-f5fc91743893.question: Could you please let me know when the applications for the next admission period for the MSc. AI in Society program at TUM will open and what the deadline is?
3e21f80f-9ae3-42bc-954f-f5fc91743893.answer: The next admissions period will range from January 1st to May 31st, 2025.

5c938121-ea64-417b-b814-5300e41e05e9.question: Could you provide more details on when and how the admission test for the MSc. AI in Society program at TUM will be conducted, and what it will consist of?
5c938121-ea64-417b-b814-5300e41e05e9.answer: The date for the next admissions test has not been set yet. However, last year it was at the end of June, with two more dates following in July and September. The contents of the test can be found on the program's website. Previous tests will not be handed out for practice.

98f86dad-ceb2-4f3f-b4cf-5a95b2711fa6.question: Do I need to explicitly apply for scholarships for international students at TUM and if so, could you guide me on where and how to apply for them?
98f86dad-ceb2-4f3f-b4cf-5a95b2711fa6.answer: For all questions regarding scholarships, reach out to TUM’s scholarship office at this link: https://www.tum.de/en/studies/fees-and-financial-aid/scholarships/tum-scholarships

030f1b30-2f1e-4292-86f3-c762a9b0d1a6.question: Should I take another English exam to obtain a more recent English certificate for my application to the MSc. AI in Society program at TUM?
030f1b30-2f1e-4292-86f3-c762a9b0d1a6.answer: A more recent English certificate would be better. However, there are other options to prove your English knowledge detailed on the program's application website, which you might qualify for.

ada299a8-973a-4304-9d3b-b8379c973d8f.question: I have 114 ECTS credits completed up until now, will it be enough to be over the required 140 in February for the MSc. AI in Society program at TUM?
ada299a8-973a-4304-9d3b-b8379c973d8f.answer: If, at the point of your application, your transcript of records shows at least 140 passed ECTS, this is enough. Applications are open until May 31st.

41692802-dfde-438e-8427-ea86a2f4a1fe.question: Will it be a problem if my thesis is a practical one (internship) on AI but only for 12 ECTS credits, not the demanded/recommended 18 in the application requirements webpage for the MSc. AI in Society program at TUM?
41692802-dfde-438e-8427-ea86a2f4a1fe.answer: If you cannot provide at least 18 ECTS worth of practical experience with your application, your application will unfortunately be declined. However, practical experience outside of the university context, for example in the form of work experience, can also be counted.

c3e8ac07-fde7-4181-aad3-bd640734a3b6.question: Could you share your opinion on whether my bachelor's thesis project, which involves implementing a GenAI app prototype, meets the criteria for admission into the MSc. AI in Society program at TUM?
c3e8ac07-fde7-4181-aad3-bd640734a3b6.answer: From the provided information, both your projects seem suitable for an application. Please list both of them in your application and describe them as best as possible. However, the decision in the end is not made by me, so I can’t give you a 100% guarantee.

84ce7f0c-c864-4258-8211-10a421c7c396.question: Is the focus of my bachelor's thesis project, aimed at automating the retrieval of information from various sources by evaluating data structuring methods specific to certain cases, appropriate for the MSc. AI in Society program's expectations?
84ce7f0c-c864-4258-8211-10a421c7c396.answer: The project you described seems to align with the program's expectations. However, the final decision regarding its suitability will be made by the relevant decision-making bodies, hence a 100% assurance cannot be provided.

5423db90-a605-44cb-840b-89a91d41ee5c.question: Could you provide more insight into the assessment of political and social sciences in the MSc. AI in Society program's aptitude test at TUM?
5423db90-a605-44cb-840b-89a91d41ee5c.answer: Detailed information about the contents of the test will not be disclosed beyond what can be found on the TUM's program website. However, you can be assured that extremely specific topics like business law won't be covered.

fbdc0e17-8f68-4101-9e41-2783cfab22ab.question: What is the structure and focus of the assessment and aptitude test procedure for the MSc. AI in Society program at TUM?
fbdc0e17-8f68-4101-9e41-2783cfab22ab.answer: All specifics about the test are not disclosed. What is known is that the test will be multiple choice and that the subjects will be of a general nature. Detailed guidance on the structure and focus of the assessment aren't provided.

bb761a6c-5f8e-4275-9412-2a3323d2efe1.question: Would the Bachelor thesis be counted as a practical project for the application to the MSc. AI in Society program?
bb761a6c-5f8e-4275-9412-2a3323d2efe1.answer: Yes, Bachelor’s theses are also counted as practical projects, as long as the contents are suitable. However, the thesis must meet the 18 ECTS requirement (if the thesis is the only project you’re submitting), and it needs to be finished at the time of application. If it does not show up on your transcript, it cannot be counted!

2459ffaa-f656-451f-8ffa-cd129066da4d.question: Is it necessary to submit an English proficiency certificate such as TOEFL or IELTS, for the application to the MSc. AI in Society program?
2459ffaa-f656-451f-8ffa-cd129066da4d.answer: It is not necessary to submit English certificates, if instead you can prove your knowledge through English as the language of instruction during your Bachelor’s studies, or if your thesis was written in English.

1bb94d9a-6c37-47c6-b833-a13b1c3ecc75.question: Are there any other specific admission criteria or additional steps for the application to the MSc. AI in Society program?
1bb94d9a-6c37-47c6-b833-a13b1c3ecc75.answer: All of the relevant admission criteria and procedures can be found on the website:

1e300826-0d46-4655-9b30-eda60dfda46a.question: Is it possible to receive a waiver on the 140 ECTS credit requirement for the MSc. AI in Society program at TUM given that the degree curriculum and academic courses are closely aligned with the focus areas of the program?
1e300826-0d46-4655-9b30-eda60dfda46a.answer: There can be no exception regarding the 140 ECTS credits – this is a hard requirement. By the time of your application at TUM, you need to earn at least 2 more credits such that they are officially visible on your transcript of records.

30f19ee1-e81a-4327-9895-1d6b2e4f5030.question: Can you expand on what qualifies as practical experience for the AI in Society program at TUM?
30f19ee1-e81a-4327-9895-1d6b2e4f5030.answer: Courses with heavy coursework can count as practical experience depending on their contents. Activities outside the university such as work experience are also recognized, given that applicants can provide proof, for example, in form of a work certificate stating the duration of the work period and the nature of the tasks completed.

eae545b4-45d6-4146-8e8d-3cd28793ab48.question: Does the scholarship applicant need to be nominated by a professor?
eae545b4-45d6-4146-8e8d-3cd28793ab48.answer: Yes, students applying for the scholarship need to be nominated by a professor.

8450c83e-d110-40d1-b0dc-ab4858f0e511.question: How do I go about registering for this Project Week? The link does not provide the option to do so.
8450c83e-d110-40d1-b0dc-ab4858f0e511.answer: For this, please contact Ms. Terzimehic directly.

a78a571c-98bc-40df-bee3-0c0ac276142b.question: Can I apply at the beginning of the application period next year even if some of my completed 140 ECTS modules are only graded as 'passed' or 'not passed'?
a78a571c-98bc-40df-bee3-0c0ac276142b.answer: No, it is not an issue for the application. It is only important that you have completed at least 140 ECTS. In the calculation of the average grade, only the actually graded modules are taken into account, and weighted accordingly.

0d1b761f-e84e-4abb-9769-b3766f12637d.question: What degree students are eligible to apply for the AI in Society course at TUM?
0d1b761f-e84e-4abb-9769-b3766f12637d.answer: There is no restriction regarding Bachelor’s degree programs – all students from all background are welcomed. It is only important that you fulfil the requirements listed on the website.

743c06c9-b7f9-4721-a55a-dc8aa5829146.question: What does the course content consist of for the nonparametric methods course?
743c06c9-b7f9-4721-a55a-dc8aa5829146.answer: The course blends three domains: a solid theoretical foundation, a careful treatment of the computational principles, and a comprehensive revision of key applications that are essential for causal inference. They use real-world examples from experimental or observational data, and there is also hands-on projects where coding skills can be applied.

09cdb8a7-6036-4eb3-801d-f0c85e2cfd36.question: How is the nonparametric methods course evaluated?
09cdb8a7-6036-4eb3-801d-f0c85e2cfd36.answer: The final grade is entirely based on an oral exam. Evaluation is based on applying basic mathematical tools on paper or whiteboard based on the material covered in class, analyzing a real-world problem using the tools covered in class, and interpreting the empirical results and having a rigorous discussion about it.

efa84635-5828-49b2-ab8b-0779fe967aa1.question: Is it necessary to have a single project module making up 18 ECTS for applying to the Master’s program “AI in Society” at TUM?
efa84635-5828-49b2-ab8b-0779fe967aa1.answer: It does not need to be one single 18 ECTS module, multiple project modules can also be summed up to make 18 ECTS.

2727be8a-4622-43c6-bc0f-f0eb81d55818.question: Can work or internship experience be considered as ECTS for the Master’s program “AI in Society” at TUM?
2727be8a-4622-43c6-bc0f-f0eb81d55818.answer: Yes, work or internship experience can be counted towards the ECTS requirement.

42a96f07-41e3-4118-8b3c-3be7461dc458.question: How does TUM handle applications for the Master’s program “AI in Society” which do not use the ECTS system?
42a96f07-41e3-4118-8b3c-3be7461dc458.answer: TUM recalculate the ECTS themselves. As an estimate, 1 ECTS corresponds to 30 hours of work.

c5de8d07-ef92-4b9a-bf05-5450cb69caeb.question: For the Master’s program “AI in Society” at TUM, can projects done during studies be submitted even if they do not formally correspond to ECTS?
c5de8d07-ef92-4b9a-bf05-5450cb69caeb.answer: Yes, you should list all the projects you have done during your studies. It is only important that TUM can see those modules as passed modules on your grade transcript.

f4a29ffc-cd8f-43d3-b459-5ded844fb3cd.question: What kind of proof is expected for work experience when it is submitted for the Master’s program “AI in Society” at TUM?
f4a29ffc-cd8f-43d3-b459-5ded844fb3cd.answer: If you choose to submit work experience as proof for practical project, TUM will need to see a work certificate from your employer.

4bf9e96c-76d7-4645-b2a5-fc3a23e58310.question: Can courses from a bachelor's degree be counted towards credit recognition for my Master’s?
4bf9e96c-76d7-4645-b2a5-fc3a23e58310.answer: No, there is a regulation that forbids recognizing such courses twice (i.e., for the Bachelor's and also for the Master’s).

91f394bd-fc73-4742-9e6d-377a8cdd50db.question: What is the process for submitting courses for credit recognition for the AI in Society program?
91f394bd-fc73-4742-9e6d-377a8cdd50db.answer: You should attach the relevant files for the courses completed, preferably with a PDF syllabus of each. If the course content was covered in more than one of your previous courses, you should apply for the recognition of all of them.

3ec684fc-e921-48aa-b51d-a11c22c62745.question: How are student representatives selected in the AI in Society program?
3ec684fc-e921-48aa-b51d-a11c22c62745.answer: Student representatives are selected through a poll where students can vote for their favorite candidates. After the voting deadline has passed, the 3 candidates with the most votes are selected.

0bf18ef4-c162-4e32-a2d4-dd50ca76f51a.question: What should students do if they are undecided on who to vote for in the student representatives selection?
0bf18ef4-c162-4e32-a2d4-dd50ca76f51a.answer: Students can refer to a document where every candidate introduces themselves to help make their choice.

5291bd5e-3db7-42de-9824-81484d9a2e74.question: Is the vote for selecting student representatives anonymous?
5291bd5e-3db7-42de-9824-81484d9a2e74.answer: Yes, the voting process is anonymous.

b11b4369-b9a9-4d4c-9f60-cf4006c27635.question: What is the potential issue with the voting process for the student representatives selection?
b11b4369-b9a9-4d4c-9f60-cf4006c27635.answer: The current system allows anyone to vote without restrictions which may lead to potential influence by non-eligible voters.

cfc1c0f6-97a3-4515-947a-f26f543f5827.question: What is the suggested method of addressing the potential issue with the voting process?
cfc1c0f6-97a3-4515-947a-f26f543f5827.answer: One suggestion is to implement an authorization system that ensures only eligible participants can vote while maintaining anonymity.

4ba37120-807c-4f98-8f69-0be2b5b9cfd8.question: What is the process for selecting student representatives in the Master's program 'AI in Society'?
4ba37120-807c-4f98-8f69-0be2b5b9cfd8.answer: Candidates will introduce themselves in a document created for the process. Voting will be completed with the deadline given, and the elected representatives will be informed after the poll results are available.

3d9be486-9000-41b2-a164-c90241986416.question: What is the role of the student representatives in the Master’s program for 'AI in Society'?
3d9be486-9000-41b2-a164-c90241986416.answer: The student representatives will hold regular meetings with the program heads to discuss current matters and explore initiatives that can further enhance the quality of the program. They will reach out to the program heads to schedule an initial meeting once elected.

696d2640-3aec-4e20-82d8-b4ffb9ca2ac8.question: Who are the intended participants for the student gathering?
696d2640-3aec-4e20-82d8-b4ffb9ca2ac8.answer: AIS master's degree students and their acquaintances, AIS faculties

cd8bad65-1e2b-4005-a354-2ecb4e12040e.question: What is the proposed time for the student gathering?

ca83a836-66c6-49f1-a4ff-ac0b03f0c008.question: What are the rules to be complied with for the student gathering?
ca83a836-66c6-49f1-a4ff-ac0b03f0c008.answer: Existing rules, including noise control and alcohol consumption, and the students will be responsible for cleaning up and waste management.

d8628269-686b-473f-826d-791b1483d327.question: Where is the student gathering supposed to take place?
d8628269-686b-473f-826d-791b1483d327.answer: One of HfP area, preferably the 1st floor big room

176b8fe3-db7c-4b9f-8de7-27558b343840.question: What is the purpose of the student gathering?
176b8fe3-db7c-4b9f-8de7-27558b343840.answer: The students are considering organizing a Thanksgiving potluck.

344f3a5c-3a79-4f1b-a2c8-e623aa29cfc8.question: Which are the criteria to comply for the project week?
344f3a5c-3a79-4f1b-a2c8-e623aa29cfc8.answer: Our program heads decide which project weeks are suitable. The participation in a project week is mandatory for the AI in Society curriculum. For information on which project weeks you can choose, please refer to the information on our website.

5d9dc3c8-81eb-4745-afd6-b01e289ab7ed.question: I am doing several extras courses that are not in our list of electives, what should I do to count those as electives?
5d9dc3c8-81eb-4745-afd6-b01e289ab7ed.answer: You can send me the courses you are taking, but in general, AIS students are intended to choose from the electives that we list. You are free to take up additional courses, but we can’t count them if they’re not part of our study degree.

3f96d674-80c7-4396-946c-57fadd846e7e.question: Could these following project weeks count for our Master (AI in Society) as well?
3f96d674-80c7-4396-946c-57fadd846e7e.answer: The first project week would comply with us, however, the second one would not.

d427e705-d150-4e66-bd52-f130344a9b70.question: Will we have classes during this week of the Project Week?
d427e705-d150-4e66-bd52-f130344a9b70.answer: Yes, there will still be lectures during the project weeks. However, the concept of the project weeks is that there will be no critical contents (as far as possible) during this week in the lectures.

ab8948f3-3b08-43f8-bf33-008868e52ce1.question: Is there a limit of project weeks I can participate in?
ab8948f3-3b08-43f8-bf33-008868e52ce1.answer: There is no limit of project weeks you can participate in, so if you really want to do multiple, you can. Keep in mind, however, that places are limited, and the participation in a project week needs you to dedicate (at least) a full week of your time during the semester.

5e4434fc-29e3-4502-ad4d-d181eab1fdd2.question: Is having at least 140 completed credits at the point of application sufficient for admission into the AI in Society program at TUM?
5e4434fc-29e3-4502-ad4d-d181eab1fdd2.answer: Having at least 140 completed credits is a requirement, but whether it's sufficient for admission also depends on other factors. Apart from the grade, there is also an aptitude test as part of the point calculation for admission.

48abd383-af19-4584-bda3-143809b60acf.question: In relation to the project worth at least 18 credit points requirement for the AI in Society program at TUM, can multiple projects which sum up to 18 credits be used instead of one single project?
48abd383-af19-4584-bda3-143809b60acf.answer: Yes, you can specify multiple projects which in sum make up 18 credits.

c5050c82-5651-430d-a6d6-3d65053c2601.question: Can a thesis be counted as a project module towards the 18 credit points requirement for the AI in Society program at TUM?
c5050c82-5651-430d-a6d6-3d65053c2601.answer: A thesis can be counted as a project module towards the 18 credit points requirement only if it will be completed at the point of your application, meaning the 15 ECTS should be officially part of your transcript at that point.

37b5d370-2407-45ad-bf93-e69e4dec0c25.question: Could these following project weeks count for our Master (AI in Society) as well?
37b5d370-2407-45ad-bf93-e69e4dec0c25.answer: The first project week would also comply with us, however the second one would not.

1c548a85-e604-4a95-9497-604cf7f37281.question: Will we have classes during this week of the Project Week?
1c548a85-e604-4a95-9497-604cf7f37281.answer: Yes, there will still be lectures. However, the concept of the project weeks is that there will be no critical contents (as far as possible) during this week in the lectures.

bbeed12b-efea-4947-ab98-e2b163145c94.question: When does the project week at TUM usually take place?
bbeed12b-efea-4947-ab98-e2b163145c94.answer: The project week at TUM (usually) takes place during a week in January.

2c8eca82-fac2-4eee-8b2f-01fccaa99447.question: What is the purpose of the project week in the AI in Society curriculum at TUM?
2c8eca82-fac2-4eee-8b2f-01fccaa99447.answer: In the AI in Society curriculum, the participation in a project week is mandatory, so you need to complete one in order to graduate.

752ff215-0854-4532-8754-afd721a51fcd.question: How many project weeks can a student participate in the AI in Society program at TUM?
752ff215-0854-4532-8754-afd721a51fcd.answer: There is no limit of project weeks you can participate in, so if you really want to do multiple, you can. However, places are limited, and the participation in a project week needs you to dedicate (at least) a full week of your time during the semester.

12a726ca-9090-4eba-aa27-300cf9a5ff99.question: Is officially booking a venue required to use one of the rooms for a potluck?
12a726ca-9090-4eba-aa27-300cf9a5ff99.answer: Yes, it is suggested to officially book a room for this purpose.

3842bb7c-dd26-4b40-b3e6-76191116b661.question: Who can help with booking a room for the potluck event?
3842bb7c-dd26-4b40-b3e6-76191116b661.answer: You can reach out to the student representatives of the department for assistance with this task.

1ee4fd54-8c60-4020-a137-bd52d9d88683.question: Do I meet the requirement of having 5 ECTS in mathematics/statistics passed if I successfully completed a 7.5 ECTS module on “Research and Methods”?
1ee4fd54-8c60-4020-a137-bd52d9d88683.answer: Your course “Research and Methods” would pass as sufficient, if you also provide us a description of what has been taught in the course, so we can see that there were indeed statistical methods taught.

b08dba9b-2b69-4735-825d-273c44b71786.question: Could you elaborate on what is meant with ’technical tools’ or ’similar’ in relation to the 18 ECTS practical project?
b08dba9b-2b69-4735-825d-273c44b71786.answer: How about you describe to me roughly what your project was about – I could then tell you if it sounds sufficient.

624d2332-747a-419b-bf2c-e65466e61e9d.question: Does it matter during which period of the application opening (between February and May 31st) I apply for the program? Will everyone receive their admission result at the same time, and will the aptitude test be held on different dates?
624d2332-747a-419b-bf2c-e65466e61e9d.answer: It technically does not matter when in this period you send your application. However, due to the big amount of applications, this year we had to split up the aptitude test into multiple dates. Please don’t take “first come, first serve” as a solid rule here, but I would recommend submitting your application rather sooner than later.

0bc960a1-5f8e-4b62-85bd-080da5c44134.question: What is recommended for preparation for the study program 'AI in Society'?
0bc960a1-5f8e-4b62-85bd-080da5c44134.answer: I would highly suggest to brush up on mathematical knowledge, especially statistics, linear algebra, and calculus. Essentially, these are topics to help you study machine learning and data science, which will already be taught from the first semester onwards.

c8a945b7-42ff-4932-a856-3ec32319fada.question: Will a project that might be a bit insufficient regarding the technical aspect qualify for consideration in the application?
c8a945b7-42ff-4932-a856-3ec32319fada.answer: I can, unfortunately, not tell you for sure right now, since it is up to our selection committee to decide in the end, but I still encourage you to apply and describe your projects as best as possible. I’d also suggest you submit all of the practical experience you have – you don’t have to choose only one of them.

6d6c1f3a-9f87-485b-87a7-c9c65bd03ae0.question: Have the documents for 'Social and [REDACTED]' ([REDACTED]) course and the 'Sociology' course been received?
6d6c1f3a-9f87-485b-87a7-c9c65bd03ae0.answer: The document for 'Social and [REDACTED]' ([REDACTED]) has been received, but the one for the 'Sociology' course has not.

09c139d6-025e-4450-9ac2-af8d21e99004.question: Will the 'Foundations of AI and [REDACTED]' lecture and 'Introduction to Programming' course be recognized?
09c139d6-025e-4450-9ac2-af8d21e99004.answer: 'Introduction to Programming' course will be recognized but 'Foundations of AI and [REDACTED]' will not be and needs to be attended and completed as usual.

5a0268bd-a4fd-447b-846e-d2a0cec4e31d.question: Are the modules 'Module of Social and [REDACTED] (Sociology)' and 'Module of Social and [REDACTED] ([REDACTED])' included in the module descriptions sent earlier?
5a0268bd-a4fd-447b-846e-d2a0cec4e31d.answer: No initial evidence of those modules could be found in the descriptions sent. Further examination later did locate the modules.

2e3031b9-7121-45bd-b77c-9a895800fa22.question: What is needed for the processing of the application for credit recognition?
2e3031b9-7121-45bd-b77c-9a895800fa22.answer: Module descriptions from the courses are needed to understand their contents and proceed with recognition.

64f51eb4-efa5-4fd8-a095-392c7a65c6ea.question: What confirmation is being awaited for calculating course workload?
64f51eb4-efa5-4fd8-a095-392c7a65c6ea.answer: The number of hours spent studying per week for the 'Foundations of AI and [REDACTED]' course, estimated at approximately 8 hours, is being verified with the university where the course was taken.

7f21c0e3-401d-4a10-9d4c-94a971e67be6.question: Could a face to face meeting be organized to discuss the application to the 'AI in Society' Master program?
7f21c0e3-401d-4a10-9d4c-94a971e67be6.answer: Of course, you can come in person. Available times are: tomorrow between 14-17, Wednesday between 11-12 or 14-17, or next Tuesday from 14-17.

20eb44b1-936e-4cf5-805b-9c8bc1f9e4ee.question: Where is the meeting location?
20eb44b1-936e-4cf5-805b-9c8bc1f9e4ee.answer: The meeting location is at Richard-Wagner-Str. 1 (rightmost entrance), 3rd floor, room B.359.

597a50c7-d7d6-4faa-8ba2-e235070d4659.question: What time is the meeting?
597a50c7-d7d6-4faa-8ba2-e235070d4659.answer: The meeting is scheduled for tomorrow at 15:00.

fdd373c5-4d56-4d33-9299-e7dc4e576ce3.question: What should be brought to the meeting?
fdd373c5-4d56-4d33-9299-e7dc4e576ce3.answer: You should bring any documents you have, like transcripts of your studies to the meeting.

b90ef1db-1780-43e5-8558-e8f7335f9d3e.question: Will a bachelor's degree with 180 ECTS from EPITA in France be sufficient for applying to the Master’s program?
b90ef1db-1780-43e5-8558-e8f7335f9d3e.answer: Technically, the degree will be sufficient for applying. However, EPITA is not found as an accredited institution in the given databases. Therefore, it's recommended to get a Confirmation of accreditation from the Ministry of Education along with the application.

2a73c231-86d2-4325-b6d8-7dc762ab81ab.question: What platform does TUM use for online exams?
2a73c231-86d2-4325-b6d8-7dc762ab81ab.answer: TUM uses moodle for online exams.

6f178774-5512-4e37-997c-12daeddc1212.question: How are online exams conducted on Moodle?
6f178774-5512-4e37-997c-12daeddc1212.answer: For conducting online tests on Moodle, firstly, go to the course and click on "Edit" at the top right. Then in the respective week, where you want to insert the test, click on "Add an Activity or Resource". From there, select "Test". Further designing of the type of test is needed post this.

01ac388a-0489-4eff-b63a-ebd44ad3e27a.question: Who could be contacted to understand more about exam integration on Moodle?
01ac388a-0489-4eff-b63a-ebd44ad3e27a.answer: To know more about the exam integration part, the appropriate contact person would be the relevant representative from TUM ProLehre.

449ed736-2c51-4909-afa8-77b98846b14d.question: TUM's platform for online examinations have an identity verification process?
449ed736-2c51-4909-afa8-77b98846b14d.answer: Yes, TUM's online examination platform Moodle has an integrated identity verification process using Proctorio.

4a4dd582-29f6-41ca-83b5-946bb9cb5bb4.question: Can a meeting be arranged to discuss admission requirements and course recognition for the 'AI in Society' Master program?
4a4dd582-29f6-41ca-83b5-946bb9cb5bb4.answer: Yes, a meeting can be arranged either in person or via zoom.

beae33f1-7612-4a2e-b9c5-c6b16be700a2.question: When is the meeting slot availability for discussion about 'AI in Society' Master program?
beae33f1-7612-4a2e-b9c5-c6b16be700a2.answer: The available meeting slots are Tuesday between 14-17, Wednesday between 11-12 or 14-17, or next Tuesday from 14-17. If none of these work, the meeting can be postponed.

28088ee0-67dd-49e7-bea5-3174b5cb2160.question: Where should the in-person meeting take place for a discussion about the 'AI in Society' Master program?
28088ee0-67dd-49e7-bea5-3174b5cb2160.answer: The in-person meeting will take place at the office located in Richard-Wagner-Str. 1 (rightmost entrance), 3rd floor. After getting off the elevator, turn right and find room B.359.

0e68e3df-99c4-447f-b0ec-6b69f973dc64.question: What should be brought along for the meeting?
0e68e3df-99c4-447f-b0ec-6b69f973dc64.answer: Documents like transcripts of studies should be brought along for the meeting.

5f4e3d49-6a75-462e-b8e3-dfea1a30e883.question: What software is recommended for conducting tests?
5f4e3d49-6a75-462e-b8e3-dfea1a30e883.answer: Moodle is normally used for conducting tests.

fb9bd8f0-5385-4669-8323-d093b88f9ba1.question: How to create a test on Moodle?
fb9bd8f0-5385-4669-8323-d093b88f9ba1.answer: In the course, first click on "Edit" top right. Then in the respective week where you want to insert the test, click on "Create Activity or Material". There you can then select "Test". Then you have to do a bit of fiddling and create the test as you want.

e77c3451-9a50-4c7b-8b1d-957ef3c27e89.question: Is there a link for the Moodle platform?
e77c3451-9a50-4c7b-8b1d-957ef3c27e89.answer: The Moodle platform can be accessed via this link: https://www.moodle.tum.de.

ce472664-6723-4a6b-806e-a1e5ab00fd1b.question: What information was missing from the student's registration?
ce472664-6723-4a6b-806e-a1e5ab00fd1b.answer: The student's registration was missing the student identification number.

53e03348-c14c-4f41-a3e1-8cd5f2ea63e6.question: Can I apply for the MSc. AI in Society for a summer semester?
53e03348-c14c-4f41-a3e1-8cd5f2ea63e6.answer: You can only apply for the MSc. AI in Society for a winter semester; the studies don’t start in a summer semester.

d9ae61af-44f5-4a18-8ac2-477d7740b719.question: When do applications open for the next winter semester?
d9ae61af-44f5-4a18-8ac2-477d7740b719.answer: The applications for the next winter semester (starting in October 2025) will open in January/February 2025.

faffce97-7790-41eb-9b72-ec718e62dbcf.question: Can I have my Bachelor's courses recognized?
faffce97-7790-41eb-9b72-ec718e62dbcf.answer: If the courses from your bachelor's program were counted towards your degree, they cannot be recognized again. However, additional courses that were not included in your degree, but were completed during the bachelor program, could potentially be recognized if they were not used in the evaluation during the master's application process.

f5eb1993-ce54-493d-b8d4-92084193a393.question: Is there a maximum number of courses/ECTS that can be recognized?
f5eb1993-ce54-493d-b8d4-92084193a393.answer: There is no maximum limit, however, if the sum of the recognized ECTS is higher than 21, the student must be upgraded.

b288bb9b-a1bc-4236-8d97-bb4878c543dc.question: As my previous Dutch university uses a different grading system, I am not sure about the grade conversion. If during the meeting with the departmental student academic advisor (is that you?) it turns out that the conversion is very disadvantageous for me, can I still withdraw my application?
b288bb9b-a1bc-4236-8d97-bb4878c543dc.answer: Yes, you can withdraw a recognition application if the grade conversion is unfavorable. However, you cannot submit a recognition application for a module for which you have already attempted the examination. Previous achievements can only be submitted for recognition once in total.

56994747-bc61-436f-b9f5-d3b76feb9481.question: If an application is approved and a course I have already passed is recognized and its grade is transferred, can I still take the equivalent course at TUM?
56994747-bc61-436f-b9f5-d3b76feb9481.answer: No, it is not possible to take the equivalent course in the same degree program at TUM.

599dd266-acf0-4112-848b-591c6fb6c5cf.question: Can I improve the grade of the already recognized achievement through the TUM course?
599dd266-acf0-4112-848b-591c6fb6c5cf.answer: No, you cannot improve the grade of an already recognized course by repeating the equivalent course at TUM.

d6132d79-f26d-45ee-b4fb-bb47eb5bef83.question: What is the minimum number of credits required for successful graduation?
d6132d79-f26d-45ee-b4fb-bb47eb5bef83.answer: The program requires 120 ECTS for graduation.

03edbde5-b0f4-4541-bc2a-d919beaf10d9.question: Can credits from two different project weeks be cumulative?
03edbde5-b0f4-4541-bc2a-d919beaf10d9.answer: Yes, the credits from e.g. two project weeks can also be counted cumulatively.

3ad869ae-98ad-42ab-bd59-8acee03ffdf8.question: What is a project week at TUM?
3ad869ae-98ad-42ab-bd59-8acee03ffdf8.answer: The project week at TUM usually takes place during a week in January. There, students work together in a team with a few supervisors on a practical project, which is described in the respective module description.

cd8d860f-9b80-40d6-8ede-5d013132a1a5.question: Is participation in a project week mandatory for the 'AI in Society' curriculum?
cd8d860f-9b80-40d6-8ede-5d013132a1a5.answer: Yes, the participation in a project week is mandatory for the 'AI in Society' curriculum, so you need to complete one in order to graduate.

d9f3047c-d223-4de7-a62f-df66a435e088.question: Can a student participate in multiple project weeks?
d9f3047c-d223-4de7-a62f-df66a435e088.answer: Yes, there is no limit of project weeks a student can participate in, but places are limited and participation requires dedicating at least a full week of your time during the semester.

c20c4253-0349-4d14-a7f6-116fd31b3701.question: What are the admission requirements for the AI Program at TUM for a psychology graduate?
c20c4253-0349-4d14-a7f6-116fd31b3701.answer: The AI program at TUM welcomes students from all kinds of backgrounds, including psychology. A technical understanding, such as statistics knowledge, is important but an engineering background isn't necessarily required. The requirements listed in the aptitude test refer to a high school graduate level and do not necessitate knowledge that could only be acquired by studying an engineering Bachelor's.

33f1d7b6-1fd8-44b6-a2b4-404260be241d.question: Is the AI program at TUM suitable for someone with a psychology background who is interested in social innovation within AI-driven applications?
33f1d7b6-1fd8-44b6-a2b4-404260be241d.answer: Yes, the AI program at TUM could be a good fit for someone with a psychology background, especially those with a technical understanding such as knowledge in statistics.

77acc8a3-8e50-4922-974b-2e44e1dfea8c.question: Is it possible to have a discussion about the admission requirements of the 'AI in Society' Master program?
77acc8a3-8e50-4922-974b-2e44e1dfea8c.answer: Of course we can discuss your questions. You have the option of meeting in person or via a Zoom meeting.

56ca0969-4edc-4a6e-a7bc-3be2b05b42a9.question: As part of the application to the Masters program 'AI in Society', would a 7.5 ECTS module on 'Research and Methods', which included focus on quantitative research methodology, meet the requirement of having 5 ECTS in mathematics/statistics?
56ca0969-4edc-4a6e-a7bc-3be2b05b42a9.answer: The course 'Research and Methods' would be sufficient, provided that a description is provided of what was taught in the course to show that statistical methods were indeed taught.

7f5dca99-d8d5-490e-bc49-aa83aa981d57.question: What constitutes sufficient practical project experience for the Masters program 'AI in Society', specifically regarding the use of 'technical tools' or 'similar'?
7f5dca99-d8d5-490e-bc49-aa83aa981d57.answer: Practical project submitted should involve a practical aspect such as investigating or working on a societal problem with technical tools like programming, statistical analysis, etc. The selection committee is responsible for determining the suitability of the project. However, from the email, it seems the suggested BA thesis might be seen as somewhat insufficient regarding the technical aspect.

714e21da-1c12-4400-93f1-79240bec6ef5.question: Does it matter when during the application period (between February and May 31st) the application for the program 'AI in Society' is submitted? Will everyone receive admission results at the same time?
714e21da-1c12-4400-93f1-79240bec6ef5.answer: Technically, it does not matter when during this period the application is sent. However, due to a large number of applications, the aptitude test had to be split up into multiple dates in the given year. It's advised to submit your application rather sooner than later.

54e0b1d1-0662-478c-8d4a-bf7fb61495c6.question: What is recommended as preparation for the study program 'AI in Society'?
54e0b1d1-0662-478c-8d4a-bf7fb61495c6.answer: Brushing up on mathematical knowledge, especially statistics, linear algebra, and calculus is highly recommended as they help in studying machine learning and data science, which is taught from the first semester onwards.

93b84b69-8801-49e8-a9ed-97aeae4f0917.question: Can an application to 'AI in Society' Masters program include multiple practical experiences?
93b84b69-8801-49e8-a9ed-97aeae4f0917.answer: Yes, it's suggested to submit all of the practical experience you have – you don’t have to choose only one of them.

6de1cc42-e79d-4356-b059-82b5c00de757.question: What documents are missing in this application?
6de1cc42-e79d-4356-b059-82b5c00de757.answer: Module descriptions from the applicant's courses are missing and needed to understand the content of said courses.

6ea7ba35-3e13-4958-949d-c0e381cf6421.question: Which subjects are being applied for credit recognition?
6ea7ba35-3e13-4958-949d-c0e381cf6421.answer: The subjects being applied for credit recognition are: 'Foundations of AI and [REDACTED]','Psychology of Learning and [REDACTED] of AI-based System', and 'Governance, law and regulation of AI'.

8cf735af-4bb1-43f0-9911-9c13a0ff0324.question: What additional documents are needed for the student's application for recognition of credits?
8cf735af-4bb1-43f0-9911-9c13a0ff0324.answer: Module descriptions from the student's courses are needed for the application for recognition of credits.

85d178b8-d04d-4f4c-a47d-3870aec61710.question: How are the hours studied per week calculated for the subjects being recognized for credits?
85d178b8-d04d-4f4c-a47d-3870aec61710.answer: The student calculated them as approximately 8 hours per week. However, the exact hours are being confirmed with the university where the courses were taken.

b64ec32a-f26c-460d-b55d-f5d6cdabb23a.question: What are the subjects that the student is applying for credit recognition?
b64ec32a-f26c-460d-b55d-f5d6cdabb23a.answer: The student is applying for recognition of credits for the following subjects: 'Foundations of AI and [REDACTED]' course, 'Psychology of Learning and [REDACTED] of AI-based System', and 'Governance, law and regulation of AI'.

b69c1f8a-bc75-4901-a3de-443b54e7c54b.question: What additional documents are needed to understand the content of the courses?
b69c1f8a-bc75-4901-a3de-443b54e7c54b.answer: Module descriptions from your courses are needed.

06b54f4b-d47e-4ca0-bb7a-508a73e68f21.question: What courses are being applied for recognition of credits?
06b54f4b-d47e-4ca0-bb7a-508a73e68f21.answer: The courses being applied for recognition of credits are: Foundations of AI and [REDACTED], Psychology of Learning and [REDACTED] of AI-based System, and Governance, law and regulation of AI.

a501be65-4169-4c67-9b3d-ddb2e00848b1.question: How are the studied hours per week calculated for the mentioned courses?
a501be65-4169-4c67-9b3d-ddb2e00848b1.answer: The applicant has calculated the studied hours per week as approx. 8 hours by their own. However, they are waiting for their university's confirmation on this.

9881c8e5-2913-4b67-816f-a98f6bdbeb8c.question: Why can't another student see the registration button?

eff73f25-41e5-46df-880b-1fb5a9acfbbc.question: What should a student do if they can't see the registration button?
eff73f25-41e5-46df-880b-1fb5a9acfbbc.answer: They should send an email like the rest.

a478c172-8e35-4475-8f50-36a30bedb305.question: What action was taken when a student informed they were unable to see the registration button after the deadline?

d57a42fb-c694-4982-902f-2774be45b9a4.question: What did a student need after enrolling successfully but finding the registration expired in the system?
d57a42fb-c694-4982-902f-2774be45b9a4.answer: The student needed help to be manually added into the course.

7acdae18-7737-465f-bc4f-76ef62365a48.question: What could be the reason a student can't see the registration button?
7acdae18-7737-465f-bc4f-76ef62365a48.answer: One possible issue might be that the registration period has passed.

f2440993-4ad3-41cc-898e-4bd50036c7a6.question: What should a student do if they successfully enrolled but the system shows that registration expired?
f2440993-4ad3-41cc-898e-4bd50036c7a6.answer: In this case, they might need help to be manually added into the course.

e43700e7-1986-4a9e-a7c0-24eab681f1f0.question: What is the solution if a student cannot register due to the registration period expiring?
e43700e7-1986-4a9e-a7c0-24eab681f1f0.answer: The registration period can be extended allowing the student to register.

cc776d47-7155-40b4-8ecc-7733addcc67c.question: How can I apply for recognition of previously completed courses for the AI in Society program at TUM?
cc776d47-7155-40b4-8ecc-7733addcc67c.answer: To apply for recognition of credits, you need to fill out the form provided on the SOT TUM website and collect the documents listed on TUM's main site. These should then be sent to the designated email address. If you have modules you need to recognize as soon as possible (i.e. modules from the first semester curriculum), your documents must be sent by October 25th.

7d7c8db8-4ee2-4f6d-a87c-d5a506043d12.question: What is the goal of the new project week introduced for students of AI in Society?
7d7c8db8-4ee2-4f6d-a87c-d5a506043d12.answer: The goal is to develop an AI-based chatbot for study counseling, with the AI in Society program serving as the first use case. The chatbot should provide accurate answers to frequently asked questions from students and prospective applicants using curated information.

03909a1a-dba8-4280-900d-f04e42592014.question: What will students do during this new project week for AI in Society?
03909a1a-dba8-4280-900d-f04e42592014.answer: During this project, students will work with cutting-edge technologies to design a user-friendly solution, learn and apply key AI concepts in a hands-on, practical setting and help position the AI in Society program at the forefront of responsible AI-powered study counseling.

8a43f2e4-f588-44f2-a201-222e05474977.question: Who is the target audience for the new project week for AI in Society?
8a43f2e4-f588-44f2-a201-222e05474977.answer: The course is suitable for students who are passionate about programming and enthusiastic about exploring natural language processing and chatbot development.

531e2321-4fbb-4d88-9f76-aacde64f6e93.question: Where can students register for the new AI-based chatbot development course?
531e2321-4fbb-4d88-9f76-aacde64f6e93.answer: Students can register for the course at https://campus.tum.de/tumonline/ee/ui/ca2/app/desktop/#/slc.tm.cp/student/courses/[NUMBER_REDACTED_AUTOMATICALLY]

3f066682-6d00-4a6a-b9a4-06e9774e162e.question: Can I credits from my Bachelor's course be recognized?
3f066682-6d00-4a6a-b9a4-06e9774e162e.answer: If you have previously completed a module which is very similar to the contents of one of the AI in Society modules, you might want to apply for recognition of this course.

e29ab036-c520-4a20-bb5a-857f981f682b.question: Can I still defer my study admission after already accepting the study place and becoming matriculated?
e29ab036-c520-4a20-bb5a-857f981f682b.answer: Yes, you can defer your study admission by writing to the matriculation office and stating that you would like to reject the study place again ('Rücktritt vom Studienplatz'). The deadline for this is November 15th and you do not need to provide a reason. Your admission will still remain valid for an indefinite period, so you can choose to resume your studies in one or two years.

7e5e2472-f6ec-4291-ae70-fbd0dbb463d0.question: Do I need to provide a reason when I choose to defer my study admission?
7e5e2472-f6ec-4291-ae70-fbd0dbb463d0.answer: No, you will not need to provide a reason when you choose to defer your study admission.

450722f8-a1bd-4b5b-bba1-27836c67c1f1.question: Will my admission still be valid if I choose to defer my study admission?
450722f8-a1bd-4b5b-bba1-27836c67c1f1.answer: Yes, your admission will still remain valid for an indefinite period if you choose to defer your study admission.

86d5d4aa-3b3b-4bdd-9265-eeb86b10b86d.question: When is the deadline to defer study admission after accepting the study place?
86d5d4aa-3b3b-4bdd-9265-eeb86b10b86d.answer: The deadline to defer study admission after accepting the study place is November 15th.

77f311fa-6f5d-4213-bd8c-28b22d3e2252.question: Can I resume my studies in the future if I defer my study admission now?
77f311fa-6f5d-4213-bd8c-28b22d3e2252.answer: Yes, you can choose to resume your studies in one or two years if you defer your study admission now and your admission will still remain valid.

cd4bb382-6357-484e-ad57-9a26bb9b6db7.question: What is the goal of the newly introduced project week for the AI in Society program at TUM?
cd4bb382-6357-484e-ad57-9a26bb9b6db7.answer: The goal is to develop an AI-based chatbot for study counseling, with our AI in Society program serving as the first use case. The chatbot should provide accurate answers to frequently asked questions from students and prospective applicants using curated information.

36fbff93-bbe3-439e-a71b-c7eab878becd.question: What opportunities will the participants of the project week have during the AI-based chatbot development?
36fbff93-bbe3-439e-a71b-c7eab878becd.answer: Participants will be able to work with cutting-edge technologies in AI and NLP to design a user-friendly solution, apply key AI concepts in a practical setting, and help position the AI in Society program at the forefront of responsible AI-powered study counseling.

b3c35b4d-7086-4807-967b-0f4a863f2c35.question: Who is the intended audience for the AI-based chatbot development project week?
b3c35b4d-7086-4807-967b-0f4a863f2c35.answer: The project week is suitable for students who are passionate about programming and enthusiastic about exploring natural language processing and chatbot development.

2cf199d6-dc73-4eff-9939-c61913418047.question: How can one register for the AI-based chatbot development project week?
2cf199d6-dc73-4eff-9939-c61913418047.answer: You can register for the course at https://campus.tum.de/tumonline/ee/ui/ca2/app/desktop/#/slc.tm.cp/student/courses/[NUMBER_REDACTED_AUTOMATICALLY]

27620247-c51f-40bd-9918-40617b93b80b.question: How many SWS am I currently in minus?
27620247-c51f-40bd-9918-40617b93b80b.answer: You should not actually be in the negative, as 0 SWS are currently entered in SAP. This reduction was granted by the dean because of study coordination tasks. This has been confirmed to be 0 until 01.2.2025, then it is 2.5 SWS.

52347105-ab68-41d0-9d72-469d021c4429.question: Specifically regarding the semester I started at TUM: my contract started on 1.7.2023, so the teaching obligation for this semester should be calculated proportionally to the lecture days that were left in this summer semester. Normally, I have a 2.5 SWS teaching obligation per semester, but for the summer semester 2023 it should be less, right?
52347105-ab68-41d0-9d72-469d021c4429.answer: The 0 SWS that are currently listed apply in general and covers the period from 1.7.23 to 31.1.25.

a4341936-ef36-48a4-9cd3-0f3ad5add2bb.question: Are 0 SWS currently generally entered for me, adding up all previous semesters? Or does this only concern the program coordination office (50% of my contract)?
a4341936-ef36-48a4-9cd3-0f3ad5add2bb.answer: The 0 SWS that are currently reported applies universally and is effective from 1.7.23 till 31.1.25. Also, this scenario was factoring in your program coordination tasks into account.

a8f16bbe-6608-48b5-aa6e-1425c24837b6.question: Can I take a course from my other Masters’ degree and let it count for a module in AI in Society?
a8f16bbe-6608-48b5-aa6e-1425c24837b6.answer: Yes, you can. The module needs to be checked by the professor of the respective module in AI in Society according to its contents.

b1d7bec6-ad91-496e-930a-fcaa7b72bcba.question: What is the process for potentially recognizing a module from a different study program for the AI in Society program?
b1d7bec6-ad91-496e-930a-fcaa7b72bcba.answer: You should take the modules from the other study program, write the exam, then reach out about course recognition. If you want to know beforehand whether the course will be recognized or not, you can write to the professor of the module in AI in Society and ask them.

be704267-7095-4499-a226-95671a5ae596.question: What is the new project about?
be704267-7095-4499-a226-95671a5ae596.answer: The new project involves developing an AI-based chatbot for study counselling, with the AI in Society program as the first use case. The goal is to create a chatbot that provides accurate answers to frequently asked questions from students and prospective applicants using curated information.

eb89b10b-82c2-4639-b0b8-9f99a6d45207.question: What will students do during the project?
eb89b10b-82c2-4639-b0b8-9f99a6d45207.answer: During the project, students will work with cutting-edge technologies in Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Natural Language Processing (NLP) to design a user-friendly solution, apply essential AI concepts in a hands-on, practical setting, and help position the AI in Society program at the forefront of responsible AI-powered study counselling.

890cdf0b-64d2-45a1-8360-dbe6ccdecd07.question: Who can participate in the project?
890cdf0b-64d2-45a1-8360-dbe6ccdecd07.answer: The project is suitable for students who are passionate about programming and are enthusiastic about exploring natural language processing and chatbot development.

339868d2-6002-4ae6-93c6-aa70ed491033.question: How can students register for the course?
339868d2-6002-4ae6-93c6-aa70ed491033.answer: Students can register for the course at https://campus.tum.de/tumonline/ee/ui/ca2/app/desktop/#/slc.tm.cp/student/courses/[NUMBER_REDACTED_AUTOMATICALLY]

d86ec803-4d1c-45dd-854d-d4175d4b8035.question: Who should be contacted for any questions?
d86ec803-4d1c-45dd-854d-d4175d4b8035.answer: For any questions, please reach out to [REDACTED], who is responsible for this project.

dd3ada4b-4422-4fe4-a67a-9d413fd4b04b.question: What is the complaint with the transcript of records submitted for enrollment at TUM?
dd3ada4b-4422-4fe4-a67a-9d413fd4b04b.answer: The complaint is that the transcript of records are not sufficient as there is no overall grade given. The school is also under the assumption that the transcript is not the latest document from the university the student graduated from.

02a733bc-93e3-4483-9f12-8a5b7194484d.question: What documents from the student were received at TUM?
02a733bc-93e3-4483-9f12-8a5b7194484d.answer: The university received a transcript document issued from the student's university in September 2024. The university also received an official proof of the student's grades qualified for graduation. The student also sent a certificate from Zentralstelle für ausländisches Bildungswesen authenticating the student's educational background.

d3ff50cb-3b7e-4208-9050-6eaaf89c1ba1.question: What is the process of enrollment at TUM?
d3ff50cb-3b7e-4208-9050-6eaaf89c1ba1.answer: To enroll at TUM, a signed application for enrollment form, together with the other required hardcopy documents listed in the student's TUMonline account should be sent. A notarized copies and the signed application for enrollment form is also required via postal delivery. There is also a process to send a digital health insurance notification before enrollment. All steps towards enrollment (postal delivery and processing) take time.

25a1c587-db16-408d-9aed-176f4608eb95.question: What is the deadline for the payment of tuition fees for the summer and winter semester at TUM?
25a1c587-db16-408d-9aed-176f4608eb95.answer: The payment deadline for the tuition fees for first-time enrollment for the summer semester is March 15, and for the winter semester, it is September 15.

8ae6f1ba-dcf3-4dec-adcd-bf68831673de.question: What is the deadline for the payment of semester fees at TUM?
8ae6f1ba-dcf3-4dec-adcd-bf68831673de.answer: You have time until the 15.11.2024 to pay the semester fees.

7ff2d9fd-5818-4809-ab5b-3ca104ae5a6f.question: Can I attend courses while my matriculation is pending and I am not officially enrolled?
7ff2d9fd-5818-4809-ab5b-3ca104ae5a6f.answer: While you are not matriculated, you can of course still attend your courses as normal. Please just make sure to connect with your classmates, so they can help you obtain the lecture materials while you do not have access to them online (due to not being enrolled officially).

58a437db-a58b-4200-88c4-cb86069f98ed.question: What is the deadline for paying semester fees for international students at TUM?
58a437db-a58b-4200-88c4-cb86069f98ed.answer: The payment deadline for the tuition fees for first-time enrollment for the summer semester is March 15, for the winter semester September 15. You have time until the 15.11.2024 to pay the semester fees.

40c935c6-23ee-47d4-86de-543d7ebbb9e2.question: What steps need to be taken to officially enrol at TUM?
40c935c6-23ee-47d4-86de-543d7ebbb9e2.answer: To enroll at TUM, please send in a signed application for enrollment form, together with the other required hardcopy documents listed in your TUMonline account. You will need to officially accept our offer of admission in TUMonline, transfer the semester fee by the deadline, and submit any missing documents, including the signed enrollment application, to the Admissions and Enrollment Office within the designated timeframe. Your documents must be stamped received by TUM by the deadline.

06148432-45ec-46ae-80b0-de08c78e8c65.question: What happens if a student cannot enroll in time for the semester they are admitted for at TUM?
06148432-45ec-46ae-80b0-de08c78e8c65.answer: The student needs to apply again in the next open application period.

2b44f839-6873-40c9-97c5-e25358c556a6.question: What is the deadline for payment of tuition fees for first-time enrollment for the winter semester at TUM?
2b44f839-6873-40c9-97c5-e25358c556a6.answer: The payment deadline for the tuition fees for first-time enrollment for the winter semester is September 15.

8b401cc4-199e-42ba-a246-b3fa276c2962.question: What discrepancy did the student find regarding the payment deadline of student semester fees and tuition for international students at TUM?
8b401cc4-199e-42ba-a246-b3fa276c2962.answer: The student found that the enrollment instruction mentioned September 15 as the payment deadline while the actual invoice stated the deadline as November 15.

e08831fa-8e2d-467a-aa72-bb64343726c5.question: What are the steps towards enrollment at TUM?
e08831fa-8e2d-467a-aa72-bb64343726c5.answer: To enroll at TUM, students must send in a signed application for enrollment form, together with the other required hardcopy documents listed in their TUMonline account as well as provide a digital health insurance notification. If they are unable to enroll in time for the semester they are admitted for, they need to apply again in the next open application period.

f21ed5c4-f183-4f63-b976-61c2458422cb.question: Is it possible to participate in online classes until arriving to Munich in person?
f21ed5c4-f183-4f63-b976-61c2458422cb.answer: It is not a problem if you arrive in person to Munich in December and participate online until then.

edb3aa9d-d096-45b2-a1a4-68e9cb6ae8dc.question: What should be stated in the letter of extension for the visa application?
edb3aa9d-d096-45b2-a1a4-68e9cb6ae8dc.answer: The letter should state that you will be allowed to attend/join late for classes physically and till then you can participate in online classes.

0c42e319-0b55-4500-9882-c744b02ae110.question: Can a letter be issued stating that German knowledge is not required for the program?
0c42e319-0b55-4500-9882-c744b02ae110.answer: We can issue a letter stating that German knowledge is not required for our program.

38e1db55-d059-487a-95ed-d7b1c647f4b2.question: Can I start attending classes in person from the first week of December while participating in online sessions until then?
38e1db55-d059-487a-95ed-d7b1c647f4b2.answer: It is not a problem if you arrive in person to Munich in December and participate online until then.

bccb70e1-57ac-4cc5-8a64-ebb03fa3f972.question: Do I need a letter confirming the exemption from the German language requirement for my program for my visa application?
bccb70e1-57ac-4cc5-8a64-ebb03fa3f972.answer: We can issue a letter stating that German knowledge is not required for our program.

d8df89eb-8b39-443f-94b4-a909a7ce72f6.question: Is it possible to attend/join late for classes physically and till then participate in online classes?
d8df89eb-8b39-443f-94b4-a909a7ce72f6.answer: It is not a problem if you arrive in person in Munich in December and participate online until then.

60bb6c3e-f874-4d2f-92c2-426f8254f975.question: Is it possible to get a letter stating that German knowledge is not required for the program?
60bb6c3e-f874-4d2f-92c2-426f8254f975.answer: We can issue a letter stating that German knowledge is not required for our program.

18bd8f17-05fb-48a3-a140-633bb71bc56b.question: Given the estimated 30-day processing period for the visa, would it be acceptable for me to begin attending classes in person from the first week of December while participating in online sessions via Moodle until then?
18bd8f17-05fb-48a3-a140-633bb71bc56b.answer: It is not a problem if you arrive in person in Munich in December and participate online until then.

be5f959b-f7ad-41f2-a26b-527f44dc16e0.question: Is it possible to get a letter confirming the exemption from the German language requirement for my program?
be5f959b-f7ad-41f2-a26b-527f44dc16e0.answer: We can issue a letter stating that German knowledge is not required for our program.

b09734cf-1a35-4fdb-bd7a-444edeec20dc.question: What can a student do if they are waiting for their bachelor's degree certificate and cannot be enrolled in the AI in Society course?
b09734cf-1a35-4fdb-bd7a-444edeec20dc.answer: The student can forward the confirmation email of their graduation to the Office of Application and Matriculation. They can then directly acknowledge the degree.

98a55fdf-e2c0-428d-92fd-b6db6f34bcda.question: What should a student do after receiving confirmation of completed studies at the TUM School of Management?
98a55fdf-e2c0-428d-92fd-b6db6f34bcda.answer: Students should review their transcript of records, especially the assignments of their achievements, as well as the title of their thesis and, if applicable, the project study. After confirming these details, students should respond to the confirmation email for the preparation of certificates.

3dbb5e12-b640-40aa-a1fd-9cab58c3d415.question: What happens if a student doesn't reply to the graduation confirmation email within two weeks?
3dbb5e12-b640-40aa-a1fd-9cab58c3d415.answer: If the student does not reply to the graduation confirmation email within two weeks, their current transcript data will be forwarded for final preparation and completion.

c5fc4113-bf4b-4847-8cbb-64b20b553d0f.question: What should a student who has completed their Bachelor's degree but hasn't received their graduation confirmation do?
c5fc4113-bf4b-4847-8cbb-64b20b553d0f.answer: The student can request assistance in obtaining the official graduation certificate or guidance on how to find it through TUMonline.

3b436301-ccb4-407d-86ba-d4ebee961a4c.question: What will be displayed in a student's TUMonline transcript of records upon completion of their studies?
3b436301-ccb4-407d-86ba-d4ebee961a4c.answer: A student's study status and transcript of records in TUMonline will only be listed as completed when the final documents have been created and the studies have been closed in the system by the respective TUM department.

fd1d44de-ba33-45c0-8e0a-cb27de090e72.question: What can I do as an internal TUM student to register for AI in Society courses while my enrollment is pending due to not having received my bachelor's certificate?
fd1d44de-ba33-45c0-8e0a-cb27de090e72.answer: You should forward the email congratulating you about finishing your Bachelor’s degree (which should be received from TUM or your study coordinator) to the concerned office. This can act as a proof of completed studies and you do not have to wait for your official certificates. After this, you should be matriculated quickly, allowing you to register for the AI in Society courses.

14952fb5-12af-4813-b260-4335d2c017ea.question: Is attendance mandatory in the courses provided in the AI in Society program?
14952fb5-12af-4813-b260-4335d2c017ea.answer: There is no mandatory attendance in the Foundations of AI & [REDACTED] course. It is assumed to be the same for other courses, but it's recommended to check with the respective lecturers for a definite answer.

89f877ce-0f06-4b34-9c22-8c8379e68f60.question: From when and where can I enroll for courses in the program?
89f877ce-0f06-4b34-9c22-8c8379e68f60.answer: You can enroll in the courses on the TUMonline platform, starting from October 1st, as soon as you're matriculated.

c2953086-1796-4512-9651-c6de0af1fe58.question: Is it possible to attend courses from a higher semester in earlier semesters?
c2953086-1796-4512-9651-c6de0af1fe58.answer: Yes, it's possible to attend courses from a higher semester in earlier semesters.

1e5ba4ac-3f1f-4f1f-8632-9cfbf9339e26.question: Where can I get more specific information and conditions for a semester abroad?
1e5ba4ac-3f1f-4f1f-8632-9cfbf9339e26.answer: You can find the information on the International Center's page at: https://www.international.tum.de/global/auslandsaufenthalte/. It's the central contact point for such inquiries. In case of specific questions, you can contact the office staff.

c665b0f7-c89c-41dc-b2f0-64fad35fbb44.question: When will the detailed schedules of the courses be available as none are currently visible on TUMonline?
c665b0f7-c89c-41dc-b2f0-64fad35fbb44.answer: The schedules are still under planning and will be available on the website before the start of the semester.

10d03f83-b6a6-47ca-a4d3-30095fc88a4d.question: At TUM Online, do we have classes on the 16.10 for Foundations of AI and [REDACTED]?
10d03f83-b6a6-47ca-a4d3-30095fc88a4d.answer: No, the first tutorial for Foundations of AI and [REDACTED] that was originally scheduled for 16.10 will not take place since there will be nothing to discuss yet. The first regular tutorial will be on 23.10.

43abc06c-7f4d-43fe-8906-615cfaac457e.question: Can I start attending classes in person from the first week of December and participate online until then?
43abc06c-7f4d-43fe-8906-615cfaac457e.answer: It is not a problem if you arrive in person to Munich in December and participate online until then. In fact, several people have a similar situation, so this is ok.

c22e7cb1-12a6-41f9-8cfc-e41e4b80516b.question: Can you issue a letter confirming the exemption from the German language requirement for my program?
c22e7cb1-12a6-41f9-8cfc-e41e4b80516b.answer: We can issue a letter stating that German knowledge is not required for our program.

f05a0286-e552-4fc4-aa48-17e40aba9cb1.question: Can you send me more information about the Master's Program AI in Society from TUM?
f05a0286-e552-4fc4-aa48-17e40aba9cb1.answer: All relevant information about the Master's Program AI in Society can be found on the program's website: https://www.sot.tum.de/sot/studium/ai-in-society/. By clicking on 'Studies' on the left-hand side, you will find more information on the curriculum and courses.

b823d762-f036-42e5-9da3-607986800d4f.question: What kind of courses can I expect in the AI in Society program's curriculum?
b823d762-f036-42e5-9da3-607986800d4f.answer: All relevant information about the curriculum and courses of the AI in Society program can be found under the 'Studies' section on the program's website: https://www.sot.tum.de/sot/studium/ai-in-society/

bcc8ebc0-8656-4fbe-b0c4-2e80a99a29a7.question: When will the two missing lectures for this semester be available online?
bcc8ebc0-8656-4fbe-b0c4-2e80a99a29a7.answer: The 2 missing lectures will be available online any day before October 14th.

b0a55552-02b0-46e1-9570-2a5052c6ca6e.question: When will the schedule of courses be available for registration?
