b0a55552-02b0-46e1-9570-2a5052c6ca6e.answer: The first semester schedule is available to view on the AI in Society program's website.

05373cd9-bbbd-4519-a9b6-8cf0118a95c1.question: Is there an AIS Whatsapp group for incoming students?
05373cd9-bbbd-4519-a9b6-8cf0118a95c1.answer: Yes, there is an AIS Whatsapp group for incoming students.

2596b180-56e0-41e5-8ce7-d459b27e8901.question: Is there going to be another AIS Whatsapp group opened?
2596b180-56e0-41e5-8ce7-d459b27e8901.answer: Yes, another AIS Whatsapp group is planned to be opened.

1e360363-c06e-46d1-b8cb-85505ca9aac5.question: Will the new AIS Whatsapp group be advertised at the welcome event?
1e360363-c06e-46d1-b8cb-85505ca9aac5.answer: Yes, the new AIS Whatsapp group is set to be advertised at the welcome event on Friday.

18c65c2d-1057-4d2e-8a48-c8f893a51456.question: Will the new AIS Whatsapp group be shared via email with all students?
18c65c2d-1057-4d2e-8a48-c8f893a51456.answer: Yes, an invitation link for the new AIS Whatsapp group will be shared via email with all students.

f634df48-1583-4d30-b0fe-7cd367b4df3c.question: Is it possible for a student whose matriculation is still pending to participate in the scheduled events (and potentially AIS courses)?
f634df48-1583-4d30-b0fe-7cd367b4df3c.answer: Yes, a student can still participate in the scheduled events while their matriculation is still pending.

9db8e990-6746-4575-a0ec-7a7209819a26.question: Why didn't a particular student receive the invitation email for an event?
9db8e990-6746-4575-a0ec-7a7209819a26.answer: The student might have not received the invitation email as they had not accepted their place of study at that time.

b2fee8dd-cd19-40cb-9c9d-9143338cf05a.question: If my matriculation is still pending, would it be possible for me to participate in the university event and potentially AIS courses without official enrollment?
b2fee8dd-cd19-40cb-9c9d-9143338cf05a.answer: Yes, you can still participate in the event despite your matriculation being pending.

905148d0-19c7-4fa9-bd7b-c5673cf297c5.question: Do I need to have a Bachelor’s in a STEM subject in order to apply for the Master of Science in AI in Society at TUM with a non-ICT undergraduate degree?
905148d0-19c7-4fa9-bd7b-c5673cf297c5.answer: No, you do not need to have a Bachelor’s in a STEM subject in order to apply – all backgrounds are welcome. Application requirements can be found on the program's website.

3436b95f-16a0-40f8-8de6-f07ffc97f55b.question: What are the prerequisites and any additional requirements for applicants with a non-ICT undergraduate degree for the Master of Science in AI in Society at TUM?
3436b95f-16a0-40f8-8de6-f07ffc97f55b.answer: The website https://www.sot.tum.de/sot/studium/ai-in-society/application/ contains all the required information regarding prerequisites and additional requirements for applicants with a non-ICT undergraduate degree.

41dffd5c-02a5-414a-853b-b2719082194a.question: Do I meet the requirement of having 5 ECTS in mathematics/statistics passed if I completed a 7.5 ECTS module on “Research and Methods”, focusing on quantitative research methodology?
41dffd5c-02a5-414a-853b-b2719082194a.answer: Your course “Research and Methods” would pass as sufficient, if you also provide us a description of what has been taught in the course, so we can see that there were indeed statistical methods taught.

cd5c6c5c-4bbd-4944-99e6-ef9c12ac9a31.question: Does it matter during which period of the application opening (between February and May 31st) I apply for the program?
cd5c6c5c-4bbd-4944-99e6-ef9c12ac9a31.answer: It technically does not matter when in this period you send your application. However, due to the big amount of applications, this year we had to split up the aptitude test into multiple dates. Please don’t take “first come, first serve” as a solid rule here, but I would recommend submitting your application rather sooner than later.

812b3c77-f857-4991-a2ec-6d051b8a3d22.question: In the 'edit preference' section for the course 'Introduction to Programming', should I choose according to my previous programming knowledge?
812b3c77-f857-4991-a2ec-6d051b8a3d22.answer: No, the 'edit preference' section indicates your preference regarding groups, for example if there were 3 different groups, you could indicate which group you would most like to visit (preference 1), or least (preference 3). Here there is just one group, so you can just choose preference 1. It has nothing to do with your previous programming knowledge.

4c741e66-8802-4abb-8e9f-ba389e9a61c7.question: Are we gonna have both options of doing it before the semester or during the semester? Or will we have the option of just during the semester?
4c741e66-8802-4abb-8e9f-ba389e9a61c7.answer: We shifted the plan to doing the course during the semester only.

357bb7b4-9e3b-4a99-a356-bcc35809ebc8.question: What changes have been made to the schedule of the 'Introduction to Programming' course?
357bb7b4-9e3b-4a99-a356-bcc35809ebc8.answer: The course 'Introduction to Programming & [REDACTED]' was originally scheduled as a block course taking place from October 7th - 11th. However, due to issues for some students, the course has been shifted to take place during the semester, on Tuesdays from 09:00 - 16:00, from October 15 to November 12. Students will be able to attend this course in person, as well as online.

cc1806c0-7bc8-4c3a-9397-b409312996b7.question: Where can I find the academic calendar for the MSc AI in Society program?
cc1806c0-7bc8-4c3a-9397-b409312996b7.answer: You can find the academic calendar on our website: https://www.sot.tum.de/sot/studium/ai-in-society/. The lecture periods you can find here, under “semester structure -> Winter semester 2024/25”: https://www.tum.de/en/studies/application/application-info-portal/dates-periods-and-deadlines

6ce446cb-2721-4999-b360-3804d5be0fa7.question: I would like to request the syllabus for the MSc AI in Society program, including details on the learning plan, competency standards, core competencies, main topics/materials, learning activities, competency achievement indicators for assessment, time allocation, and learning resources. How do I get it?
6ce446cb-2721-4999-b360-3804d5be0fa7.answer: For this, I can send you the relevant part of our study program documentation. Please find the relevant information in the document.

69866199-76a0-45a5-959f-c2b75af80dee.question: I have not yet secured accommodation, which is required for my visa. I have contacted several student dormitories, but they are either full, have closed their applications, or haven't responded to my messages. Could you assist me with this?
69866199-76a0-45a5-959f-c2b75af80dee.answer: If you cannot find a place in a dormitory, you can look for shared flats for example on wg-gesucht.de

e486705c-598f-4d26-9ef4-86e25a68d170.question: The name on all my documents is different from the name on my passport. The embassy has requested that I renew my passport to match the name on my birth certificate. Could I update my name in TUMOnline and my Letter of Admission to reflect the new name?
e486705c-598f-4d26-9ef4-86e25a68d170.answer: For this matter, you need to contact TUM’s student information service desk: https://www.tum.de/en/studies/support-and-advice/support-during-studies/student-information

36706de2-848a-4f09-b597-7abb185ab4b3.question: Is it possible to defer my admission and how do I go about it?
36706de2-848a-4f09-b597-7abb185ab4b3.answer: If you want to defer your admission to next year, you can do so. In this case, you now need to decline the offer online. Then, next year you apply again with all documents, however, you will be automatically admitted by the matriculation office since you already had received an offer. So, you won’t go through the selection process again next year.

39ca816b-d274-4f77-9038-85ea694ee485.question: Where can I find the academic calendar for the MSc AI in Society program?
39ca816b-d274-4f77-9038-85ea694ee485.answer: You can find the academic calendar on the website: https://www.sot.tum.de/sot/studium/ai-in-society/. The lecture periods can be found under 'semester structure -> Winter semester 2024/25' here: https://www.tum.de/en/studies/application/application-info-portal/dates-periods-and-deadlines

73a86e37-23b5-4b5f-9ddf-8bac24a3dda5.question: Is it possible to defer the offer for the AI in Society program due to visa issues and apply again next year?
73a86e37-23b5-4b5f-9ddf-8bac24a3dda5.answer: If you want to defer your admission to next year, you can do so. In this case, you now need to decline the offer online. Then, next year you apply again with all documents, however, you will be automatically admitted by the matriculation office since you already had received an offer. So, you won’t go through the selection process again next year.

5b00aa73-4daf-42b8-ba25-defecc97e7d9.question: What is the process required to change the name on a student's documents and Letter of Admission?
5b00aa73-4daf-42b8-ba25-defecc97e7d9.answer: For this matter, you need to contact TUM’s student information service desk: https://www.tum.de/en/studies/support-and-advice/support-during-studies/student-information

c01572b6-dfa3-467b-962c-3e8aab3da28b.question: What documents are required for enrollment to the AI in Society program?
c01572b6-dfa3-467b-962c-3e8aab3da28b.answer: For the documents you need to send, please look here under 'documents required for enrollment': https://www.tum.de/en/studies/degree-programs/detail/ai-in-society

e3aa65e9-97d3-4a58-a890-44d64087b0aa.question: How can a student secure a study place for the following academic year if they had to decline the current offer?
e3aa65e9-97d3-4a58-a890-44d64087b0aa.answer: If a student had to decline the current offer but intends to reapply in the following academic year, a letter can be issued stating that a) a study place in the Masters AI in Society program at TUM was offered, b) that the offer was declined by the student for now but they plan to start their studies in the following winter semester, and c) that they are hereby offered a study place in the respective academic year. However, the student will need to apply again during the next application period and upload all documents to us again. Admission will be issued right away as the system can identify that a study place had been offered to the student in the previous year. The student does not need to go through the selection process again.

6fbb0a7f-2fbe-40ef-8701-d60511df489f.question: If an applicant is accepted but needs to upload a new valid ID, do I have to book this as a requirement?
6fbb0a7f-2fbe-40ef-8701-d60511df489f.answer: You can proceed with normal booking. Applicants will have to submit their current ID at enrollment.

a3ea4aac-0620-436a-9091-8f581f26a3de.question: Can I check the 'all requirements booked' box even if the applicant needs to upload a new ID?
a3ea4aac-0620-436a-9091-8f581f26a3de.answer: Ignore the red flag and go ahead to check the 'all requirements booked' box.

66b412da-ccf4-4be8-9ceb-e35f53e560c3.question: When was the applicant's interview conducted for TUM?
66b412da-ccf4-4be8-9ceb-e35f53e560c3.answer: The specific interview date is not mentioned in the email.

b8f390b6-8d37-42c7-8095-b724d50e2125.question: Has the applicant successfully cleared the interview round for TUM?
b8f390b6-8d37-42c7-8095-b724d50e2125.answer: Yes, the applicant has successfully cleared the interview round.

8a69b3b4-9e16-493e-bdc7-d30a5f4e2b0d.question: Who informed the applicant that they have been selected for TUM?
8a69b3b4-9e16-493e-bdc7-d30a5f4e2b0d.answer: The applicant has been informed by an unspecified person ('[REDACTED]') that they have been selected.

825af3bd-d588-4955-8a76-5ca44cf0f15a.question: When was the applicant's acceptance letter for TUM issued?
825af3bd-d588-4955-8a76-5ca44cf0f15a.answer: The applicant's acceptance letter was issued the day before the communication was sent.

cef71d8f-9a45-4032-8aec-dc7ae6da1e7a.question: Has the applicant received the acceptance letter for TUM?
cef71d8f-9a45-4032-8aec-dc7ae6da1e7a.answer: Yes, the applicant should have received an automatic email from TUM containing their acceptance letter.

90f6fce1-5c67-45b9-82c1-5e1a2922f77a.question: What can be done if I am unable to start studying from 1st October due to pending visa process?
90f6fce1-5c67-45b9-82c1-5e1a2922f77a.answer: Lectures are offered in a hybrid format, i.e. they are streamed online in parallel. Therefore, you can follow them from your home country if you're unable to arrive by 1st October. Arriving 1-2 months later will not be a problem.

44c3f543-9462-4fe0-a438-6547088fead6.question: What is the format of the interview for the M.Sc. AI in Society at TUM?
44c3f543-9462-4fe0-a438-6547088fead6.answer: The interview will be held online. Two members of the selection committee will discuss your motivation for choosing this degree program. They will also explore your willingness to engage in interdisciplinary learning and work, your professional interests, any previous specializations, and your professional background.

62d8e0f0-3440-419f-9972-dac21acf4afd.question: Do applicants need to prepare any documents for the M.Sc. AI in Society at TUM interview?
62d8e0f0-3440-419f-9972-dac21acf4afd.answer: There is no need to prepare any documents for the interview.

1a3c66c6-b219-4f7b-a628-6db16413bd21.question: When will the interviews for the M.Sc. AI in Society at TUM take place?
1a3c66c6-b219-4f7b-a628-6db16413bd21.answer: The interviews are scheduled to take place on September 16th.

240e8ffb-ce1a-4d06-9e3d-0dd81110468f.question: What time frames are available for the M.Sc. AI in Society at TUM interview?
240e8ffb-ce1a-4d06-9e3d-0dd81110468f.answer: Timeslots are offered from 09:30 – 11:00 and 13:00 – 17:00 CEST (Germany time). The interview spans a time of 30 minutes.

3109e91f-7c86-4d2f-aad4-01cdcace91cb.question: What is the purpose of the aptitude interview for the M.Sc. AI in Society at TUM?
3109e91f-7c86-4d2f-aad4-01cdcace91cb.answer: The aptitude interview is designed to assess how well an applicant's motivation, interdisciplinary learning and working interests, previous specializations, professional interests and background align with the goals of the program and career aspirations.

a49df384-af5e-4085-9c22-96aed4bb76fe.question: What is the process for the second stage of the aptitude assessment for the M.Sc. AI in Society at TUM?
a49df384-af5e-4085-9c22-96aed4bb76fe.answer: The second stage of the aptitude assessment takes the form of an interview, during which two members of the selection committee will discuss the applicant's motivation for choosing the degree program, their willingness to engage in interdisciplinary learning and work, professional interests, any previous specializations, and professional background to assess how well these align with the program goals and the applicant's career aspirations. The focus is on understanding the applicant's motivation for the study program, not testing their knowledge on specific subjects.

e767eb10-3267-4f3d-8610-087b62b0b972.question: When and how long are the interviews for the M.Sc. AI in Society at TUM?
e767eb10-3267-4f3d-8610-087b62b0b972.answer: The interviews will take place on September 16th, with offered timeslots from 09:30 – 11:00 and 13:00 – 17:00 CEST (Germany time). Each interview spans a time of 30 minutes.

a4b2cc46-4bdb-4163-9acc-9b77f8498364.question: Which times are the earliest that can be taken for the interview?
a4b2cc46-4bdb-4163-9acc-9b77f8498364.answer: The earliest timeslot that can be offered for the interview is 14:30 – 15:00.

5af8d4ec-4c89-408f-a1b3-aa6b545232d0.question: What to do if the provided interview times do not fit the applicant's schedule?
5af8d4ec-4c89-408f-a1b3-aa6b545232d0.answer: If the provided times are difficult for the applicant, they should let the committee member know so that they can try to find another day.

6da0adeb-1b82-4f6a-b04a-5b27da5adab3.question: When is the selection of the interview timeslot due?
6da0adeb-1b82-4f6a-b04a-5b27da5adab3.answer: The selection of the interview timeslot is due by September 12th, 23:59.

1c1def23-8eae-4784-9e77-d31e2bea507e.question: Do you accept the French equivalent of bachelors degree (3 years) in electronics, electric energy and automation, for the Ai program at TUM?
1c1def23-8eae-4784-9e77-d31e2bea507e.answer: Yes, TUM does not filter by specific bachelor’s backgrounds, as long as you fulfil the requirements presented on their website. The bachelor's degree should span at least 6 semesters and fulfil at least 140 ECTS credits.

12b75c07-8790-4bb3-9a62-83f4e3cb72fc.question: Do you offer a working student program in parallel to the Ai program at TUM (AKA 'co-op' or 'apprenticeship'), or any of your engineering master’s programs?
12b75c07-8790-4bb3-9a62-83f4e3cb72fc.answer: TUM does not specifically offer working student programs. Normally, students in Germany apply for working student jobs on their own, independently from the study program.

8ea43182-9a3b-45fd-9596-2e6b5c3287b0.question: Can independent or other project work completed for other parties be submitted for the AI in Society - MSc course admission?
8ea43182-9a3b-45fd-9596-2e6b5c3287b0.answer: The practical project does not exclusively need to be from your bachelor’s studies. In fact, we also count work experience or internships, for example. It is important that there is some sort of proof of your project, i.e. that we can see that you did not just invent it. For example, a statement from your employer, or a certificate of participation in any external projects.

a811a833-b1e5-474b-a1f8-8e7a2e045213.question: What is the List of best credits and where can I find it during the application?
a811a833-b1e5-474b-a1f8-8e7a2e045213.answer: The list of best credits is a form you will find as soon as you start the application. It will be available inside the portal. You don’t need to download it externally anywhere.

649426f0-3445-4ec5-9e06-72ea842541fe.question: Is the department planning any online orientation?
649426f0-3445-4ec5-9e06-72ea842541fe.answer: Yes, an introductory event for all incoming AI in Society students is being planned. The event will be held in October, at some point before the start of the semester, where professors will introduce themselves and provide information about the program.

5ebb3341-1303-4fa0-9ea2-2303fd0f806a.question: What is the structure and focus of the aptitude interview for the M.Sc. AI in Society at TUM?
5ebb3341-1303-4fa0-9ea2-2303fd0f806a.answer: During the aptitude interview, two members of the selection committee will discuss your motivation for choosing this degree program. They will also explore your willingness to engage in interdisciplinary learning and work, your professional interests, any previous specializations, and your professional background to assess how well these align with the goals of the program and your career aspirations. The focus is on understanding your motivation for the study program, not testing your knowledge on specific subjects.

e9abc6b8-aa39-4452-976f-c08d5661d219.question: When will the interviews for the M.Sc. AI in Society at TUM take place and how long do they last?
e9abc6b8-aa39-4452-976f-c08d5661d219.answer: The interviews will take place on September 16th. Available times are from 09:30 – 11:00 and 13:00 – 17:00 CEST (Germany time). The interview spans a time of 30 minutes.

c212e971-8110-4412-b61f-1b302b83c566.question: When and how will the final decision on the application for the M.Sc. AI in Society at TUM be communicated?
c212e971-8110-4412-b61f-1b302b83c566.answer: The final decision will be communicated right at the end of the interview. If an applicant is accepted, the admission can be issued on the same day.

53ada4bc-78a6-4471-a8b1-c017f0998236.question: Can an applicant choose a 30-minute timeslot for the aptitude interview for the M.Sc. AI in Society at TUM?
53ada4bc-78a6-4471-a8b1-c017f0998236.answer: Yes, applicants are asked to provide their preferred timeslot (30 minutes within the stated times) by a stated deadline.

53410239-57d5-4ca8-a80e-8b4099ccde1b.question: Was the interview for the M.Sc. AI in Society at TUM scheduled for 10:00 – 10:30AM or 13:30 – 14:00 on the same day?

e38bd616-3353-42b0-97a2-cd98845044d8.question: Is the interview on site or online?
e38bd616-3353-42b0-97a2-cd98845044d8.answer: The interview will be held online.

3144316e-cc20-4456-9b28-f69d61079594.question: Shall I bring written information such as CV?
3144316e-cc20-4456-9b28-f69d61079594.answer: There is no need to prepare any documents for the interview.

637b96fd-8825-40b2-bfe4-81c586706dd5.question: What will be discussed during the aptitude interview for the M.Sc. AI in Society at TUM?
637b96fd-8825-40b2-bfe4-81c586706dd5.answer: During the aptitude interview, two members of the selection committee will discuss your motivation for choosing this degree program. They will also explore your willingness to engage in interdisciplinary learning and work, your professional interests, any previous specializations, and your professional background to assess how well these align with the goals of the program and your career aspirations. They will focus on understanding your motivation for the study program, not testing your knowledge on specific subjects.

93c6825b-3469-4959-9c02-0dfae0323ec9.question: When and how long will the interviews for the M.Sc. AI in Society at TUM take place?
93c6825b-3469-4959-9c02-0dfae0323ec9.answer: The interviews will take place on September 16th. The interview spans a time of 30 minutes. Timeslots are offered from 09:30 – 11:00 and 13:00 – 17:00 CEST (Germany time).

179dc05f-0ef7-422d-b26f-1ad8aa53dc16.question: By when should I let you know my preferred timeslot for the interview?
179dc05f-0ef7-422d-b26f-1ad8aa53dc16.answer: You should let me know your preferred timeslot (30 minutes within the above times) by September 12th, 23:59.

b14af1df-799e-42c1-ad16-c3e5993e6a7d.question: Where can I find the academic calendar for the MSc AI in Society program?
b14af1df-799e-42c1-ad16-c3e5993e6a7d.answer: You can find the academic calendar on our website: https://www.sot.tum.de/sot/studium/ai-in-society/. The lecture periods you can find here, under “semester structure -> Winter semester 2024/25”: https://www.tum.de/en/studies/application/application-info-portal/dates-periods-and-deadlines.

f1e16b52-474e-4942-86ba-5b27f205370d.question: Can you provide the syllabus for the MSc AI in Society program, including details on the learning plan, competency standards, core competencies, main topics/materials, learning activities, competency achievement indicators for assessment, time allocation, and learning resources?
f1e16b52-474e-4942-86ba-5b27f205370d.answer: You can find the relevant part of our study program documentation attached to this email (3 files).

ef52d2ec-3108-4135-93ff-09d172a21f13.question: I have not yet secured accommodation, which is required for my visa. I have contacted several student dormitories, but they are either full, have closed their applications, or haven't responded to my messages. Could you assist me with this?
ef52d2ec-3108-4135-93ff-09d172a21f13.answer: If you cannot find a place in a dormitory, you can look for shared flats for example on wg-gesucht.de.

1e3019f5-6b44-4c87-be55-6736e4d86bcc.question: The name on all my documents is different from the name on my passport. The embassy has requested that I renew my passport to match the name on my birth certificate. Could I update my name in TUMOnline and my Letter of Admission?
1e3019f5-6b44-4c87-be55-6736e4d86bcc.answer: For this matter, you need to contact TUM’s student information service desk: https://www.tum.de/en/studies/support-and-advice/support-during-studies/student-information.

1065eec5-5888-4ee6-8a0e-9b91d4c3c192.question: Is it possible to defer my admission to the MSc AI in Society program at TUM and how can I do that?
1065eec5-5888-4ee6-8a0e-9b91d4c3c192.answer: Yes, you can defer your admission. In this case, you need to decline the offer online for the semester you applied for. The next year you apply again with all documents, you will be automatically admitted by the matriculation office since you had already received an offer from them. You won’t go through the selection process again next year.

8180b282-ae43-41dc-9af3-1b1e2ee76b8f.question: When and where can I enroll for courses?
8180b282-ae43-41dc-9af3-1b1e2ee76b8f.answer: You can enroll on the TUMonline platform from the 1st of October. In general, as soon as you are registered as a student.

d6fc4941-d62b-4818-957b-b97e0d7507e4.question: Is it possible to attend classes from a higher semester in earlier semesters?

75091a93-483e-4150-b538-00e84ad921fb.question: Where can I get detailed information and conditions for a semester abroad?
75091a93-483e-4150-b538-00e84ad921fb.answer: In general, I can only refer you to the following link: https://www.international.tum.de/global/auslandsaufenthalte/. But I think you have already found this yourself. In any case, this is the central point of contact - if you have specific questions, you are welcome to contact the employees of Global & [REDACTED].

e5580794-a6d3-4a3f-8073-104903a31560.question: Could you please provide information regarding the exact course times (and possibly facilities)?
e5580794-a6d3-4a3f-8073-104903a31560.answer: We are still working on the room planning for the events, the process is somewhat lengthy. That's why there is no fixed slot in the weekly plan for one or the other event yet, so I haven't been able to publish a precise plan on our website yet. This will be in place well before the start of the semester.

2fbdddbd-db26-4853-98aa-97bd7e4793b7.question: Why can't I find any of these modules in the LV portal and only two courses from higher semesters are displayed using the study plan filter?
2fbdddbd-db26-4853-98aa-97bd7e4793b7.answer: Since there are still a good 2 months until the start of the semester, not all lecture plans are completed yet, so you can't find them on TUMonline yet. We will soon post a timetable for the first semester on our website, where you will be able to see all important information. I ask for a little patience here.

5e848da0-3e10-4033-b4b6-a04ef7f25b5f.question: Is the interview on site or online?
5e848da0-3e10-4033-b4b6-a04ef7f25b5f.answer: The interview will be held online.

d71d6445-b70a-456e-9ffc-36405fc4234e.question: Shall I bring written information such as CV or is that not necessary for the interview?
d71d6445-b70a-456e-9ffc-36405fc4234e.answer: There is no need to prepare any documents for the interview.

fa10fd3d-eb70-48fd-a92f-c0b87c5fafd2.question: During the aptitude interview, what areas will the selection committee explore?
fa10fd3d-eb70-48fd-a92f-c0b87c5fafd2.answer: Two members of the selection committee will discuss your motivation for choosing this degree program. They will also explore your willingness to engage in interdisciplinary learning and work, your professional interests, any previous specializations, and your professional background to assess how well these align with the goals of the program and your career aspirations.

bde80d1d-0a44-43b9-b840-8fab0727ab7e.question: When will the interviews take place and how long will they last?
bde80d1d-0a44-43b9-b840-8fab0727ab7e.answer: The interviews will take place on September 16th. The interview spans a time of 30 minutes.

79c149a0-26d4-4603-86c0-0c4919bad674.question: By when should I inform about my preferred interview timeslot?
79c149a0-26d4-4603-86c0-0c4919bad674.answer: Please let me know your preferred timeslot (30 minutes within the above times) by September 12th, 23:59.

6f483cb5-473e-4d57-8811-d61671c1317e.question: When will the aptitude interview for the M.Sc. AI in Society program at TUM take place?
6f483cb5-473e-4d57-8811-d61671c1317e.answer: The interview will take place on September 16th, with timeslots available from 09:30 – 11:00 and 13:00 – 17:00 CEST (Germany time).

84571f0c-47a9-4e2c-9a68-1f64b3dec7d3.question: What will be discussed during the aptitude interview for the M.Sc. AI in Society program at TUM?
84571f0c-47a9-4e2c-9a68-1f64b3dec7d3.answer: Two members of the selection committee will discuss the applicant's motivation for choosing the degree program, their willingness to engage in interdisciplinary learning and work, their professional interests, any previous specializations, and their professional background to assess how well these align with the program goals and their career aspirations. They will focus on understanding the applicant's motivation for the program, not testing their knowledge on specific subjects.

232e9f91-d588-409b-be5a-6d204a2145de.question: When will I know the final decision after the aptitude interview for the M.Sc. AI in Society program?
232e9f91-d588-409b-be5a-6d204a2145de.answer: The final decision will be given right at the end of the interview. If admitted, the admission confirmation can be issued on the same day.

7283332a-7395-4dbe-9990-04a6fd6f16f4.question: How long does the aptitude interview for the M.Sc. AI in Society program at TUM last?
7283332a-7395-4dbe-9990-04a6fd6f16f4.answer: The interview spans a time of 30 minutes.

07d98628-9fd3-4b33-bd82-4b1c15072806.question: What is the next stage of the aptitude assessment for the M.Sc. AI in Society at TUM?
07d98628-9fd3-4b33-bd82-4b1c15072806.answer: The next stage of the aptitude assessment is an interview.

600eb08f-ea7a-4a90-a4c2-bdb08cab164d.question: What will be discussed during the aptitude interview for M.Sc. AI in Society at TUM?
600eb08f-ea7a-4a90-a4c2-bdb08cab164d.answer: During the aptitude interview, two members of the selection committee will discuss your motivation for choosing this degree program, your willingness to engage in interdisciplinary learning and work, your professional interests, any previous specializations, and your professional background to assess how well these align with the goals of the program and your career aspirations. The focus will be on understanding your motivation, not testing your knowledge on specific subjects.

1cf215c2-a759-4b1d-a1c7-f3c56e93e107.question: When will the interviews for the M.Sc. AI in Society aptitude assessment at TUM take place?
1cf215c2-a759-4b1d-a1c7-f3c56e93e107.answer: The interviews will take place on September 16th, with timeslots available from 09:30 – 11:00 and 13:00 – 17:00 CEST (Germany time). The interview will last 30 minutes.

870412de-06d3-4195-a8dd-408cd994fa34.question: What is the preferred timeslot for interviews?
870412de-06d3-4195-a8dd-408cd994fa34.answer: Applicants are asked to inform their preferred timeslot (30 minutes within the given timings) by September 12th, 23:59.

c79647db-73a3-47c9-8318-e82d636ba019.question: When will the final decision be revealed after the M.Sc. AI in Society aptitude interview at TUM?
c79647db-73a3-47c9-8318-e82d636ba019.answer: The final decision will be revealed right at the end of the interview. If approved, the admission can be issued on the same day.

6ff099fd-7d19-4f73-b1e4-19c0b5cd7884.question: When is the second stage of the aptitude assessment for the M.Sc. AI in Society at TUM?
6ff099fd-7d19-4f73-b1e4-19c0b5cd7884.answer: The second stage of the aptitude assessment, an interview, will take place on September 16th.

5c3e4dca-4201-4a17-84f6-7325ec5d6eb6.question: What is the format of the second stage of the aptitude assessment for the M.Sc. AI in Society at TUM?
5c3e4dca-4201-4a17-84f6-7325ec5d6eb6.answer: The second stage is an aptitude interview where two members of the selection committee discuss the applicant's motivation for choosing the program, willingness to engage in interdisciplinary learning and work, professional interests, previous specializations and professional background.

ddc7b3da-629a-49e3-87a4-1bba788516ca.question: What is the purpose of the interview in the application process for the M.Sc. AI in Society at TUM?
ddc7b3da-629a-49e3-87a4-1bba788516ca.answer: The interview aims to assess how well an applicant's professional interests, previous specializations and professional background align with the program's goals and the applicant's career aspirations. The focus is on understanding the applicant's motivation for the study program, not testing their knowledge on specific subjects.

6a8dd898-56a4-4adb-a2ff-da5e37c88950.question: What are the available timeslots for the interview in the application process for the M.Sc. AI in Society at TUM?
6a8dd898-56a4-4adb-a2ff-da5e37c88950.answer: The available timeslots for the interview are from 09:30 – 11:00 and 13:00 – 17:00 CEST (Germany time) on September 16th. The interview spans a time of 30 minutes.

59928414-70d5-4e4b-92e1-afbee24a075e.question: When is the deadline to choose a timeslot for the interview in the application process for the M.Sc. AI in Society at TUM?
59928414-70d5-4e4b-92e1-afbee24a075e.answer: The deadline to choose a timeslot for the interview is by September 12th, 23:59.

b052d6f0-3886-4182-ac72-1daef91e5337.question: What happens if the points scored in the test and from degree grades do not pass the thresholds?
b052d6f0-3886-4182-ac72-1daef91e5337.answer: Unfortunately, your candidacy has led to a rejection.

e66d1d36-8eb1-4624-ac36-f96a20973fd5.question: When will the applicant receive a formal admission decision?
e66d1d36-8eb1-4624-ac36-f96a20973fd5.answer: The results are calculated and entered in the system at a specific time, and then intimated to the applicant via email.

0d339422-e02c-4a1b-a61e-4b9ebad6dea3.question: Could TUM provide an official document confirming the duration and tuition fee of the 'AI in Society' program?
0d339422-e02c-4a1b-a61e-4b9ebad6dea3.answer: A signed statement about the duration of the study program can be provided by the registrar's office. However, for the statement about tuition fees, the student should refer to TUM’s fees and scholarships office.

d4a4288f-a2bd-4582-8634-60b5ebd196c8.question: What is the second stage of the aptitude assessment for the M.Sc. AI in Society at TUM?
d4a4288f-a2bd-4582-8634-60b5ebd196c8.answer: The second stage of the aptitude assessment for the M.Sc. AI in Society at TUM is an interview, where two members of the selection committee will discuss your motivation for choosing this degree program, your willingness to engage in interdisciplinary learning and work, your professional interests, any previous specializations, and your professional background.

587e7b60-c690-489b-a76f-a8866c75f608.question: What will be the focus of the interview for M.Sc. AI in Society at TUM?
587e7b60-c690-489b-a76f-a8866c75f608.answer: The focus of the interview will be on understanding your motivation for the study program, not testing your knowledge on specific subjects.

1727fba0-4fd8-4460-a4af-9ff413050324.question: When will the interviews for the second stage of the aptitude assessment take place?
1727fba0-4fd8-4460-a4af-9ff413050324.answer: The interviews for the second stage of the aptitude assessment will take place on September 16th, with timeslots available between 09:30 – 11:00 and 13:00 – 17:00 CEST (Germany time).

0b6b69bd-1a95-4f88-90fa-bb56c0c80d5d.question: How long will the interview span for the M.Sc. AI in society at TUM?
0b6b69bd-1a95-4f88-90fa-bb56c0c80d5d.answer: The interview for the M.Sc. AI in society at TUM will span a time of 30 minutes.

abad3f02-271e-4c26-9389-c94994d26069.question: What is the deadline to confirm your preferred time slot for the interview?
abad3f02-271e-4c26-9389-c94994d26069.answer: The deadline to confirm your preferred time slot for the interview is by September 12th, 23:59.

eed82cab-d51d-49f3-adc9-cf33a943e545.question: What is the second stage of the aptitude assessment for the M.Sc. AI in Society at TUM?
eed82cab-d51d-49f3-adc9-cf33a943e545.answer: The second stage of the aptitude assessment for the M.Sc. AI in Society at TUM is an interview with members of the selection committee.

6a6558b9-d57b-4df9-a954-2813b1bffe36.question: What will the selection committee discuss during the aptitude interview?
6a6558b9-d57b-4df9-a954-2813b1bffe36.answer: During the aptitude interview, two members of the selection committee will discuss your motivation for choosing this degree program, your willingness to engage in interdisciplinary learning and work, your professional interests, any previous specializations, and your professional background to assess how well these factors align with the goals of the program and your career aspirations.

df87c673-ad74-47bf-a29c-de2085122c50.question: When will the aptitude interviews for the M.Sc. AI in Society at TUM take place?
df87c673-ad74-47bf-a29c-de2085122c50.answer: The aptitude interviews will take place on September 16th, with timeslots available from 09:30 – 11:00 and 13:00 – 17:00 CEST (Germany time).

6440d906-c00e-4ba7-a7ba-b0a69a593624.question: How long is each aptitude interview for the M.Sc. AI in Society at TUM?
6440d906-c00e-4ba7-a7ba-b0a69a593624.answer: Each aptitude interview for the M.Sc. AI in Society at TUM spans a time of 30 minutes.

600f11a2-7b75-4e35-8fe0-e6b8e7ad0550.question: By when should the preferred timeslot for the aptitude interview be communicated?
600f11a2-7b75-4e35-8fe0-e6b8e7ad0550.answer: The preferred timeslot for the aptitude interview should be communicated by September 12th, 23:59.

53eee96b-bf12-4817-830d-8ba6b6a1bea9.question: Can applicant's result be shared informally via email before it gets updated in the official system?
53eee96b-bf12-4817-830d-8ba6b6a1bea9.answer: Yes, the result can be shared informally via email before it gets updated in the official system.

99ae74a7-dc46-4212-94e4-fbf054c9f37b.question: What factors determine if an applicant is rejected from the program?
99ae74a7-dc46-4212-94e4-fbf054c9f37b.answer: An applicant is rejected when the points scored in the entrance test and from the degree grades do not meet the thresholds set by the program.

7a441d0b-06e6-4666-9292-6fe32bfb92cc.question: Can the process be adjusted or exceptions made if an applicant shows high motivation or urgency?
7a441d0b-06e6-4666-9292-6fe32bfb92cc.answer: No, the decision process remains consistent and follows the guidelines to ensure fairness for all applicants, irrespective of their motivation or urgency.

be5ec727-30f8-438f-8947-8ef5417af42a.question: How much time is required for visa arrangements after receiving the admission decision?
be5ec727-30f8-438f-8947-8ef5417af42a.answer: The applicant suggests he will need around 3-4 days to make all the arrangements for his visa interview after receiving the admission decision.

e8c56946-81b1-4426-8d10-99f369c65528.question: Where can I find the academic calendar for the MSc AI in Society program?
e8c56946-81b1-4426-8d10-99f369c65528.answer: You can find the academic calendar on our website: https://www.sot.tum.de/sot/studium/ai-in-society/. The lecture periods you can find here, under “semester structure -> Winter semester 2024/25”: https://www.tum.de/en/studies/application/application-info-portal/dates-periods-and-deadlines

71e8921e-85ba-4464-9c50-b441d67d4852.question: I would like to request the syllabus for the MSc AI in Society program, including details on the learning plan, competency standards, core competencies, main topics/materials, learning activities, competency achievement indicators for assessment, time allocation, and learning resources.
71e8921e-85ba-4464-9c50-b441d67d4852.answer: The relevant part of our study program documentation has been sent to you. Please find the relevant information in the document.

fcd768ba-5d63-461f-a865-1b1546bf44dd.question: I have not yet secured accommodation, which is required for my visa. I have contacted several student dormitories, but they are either full, have closed their applications, or haven't responded to my messages. Could you assist me with this?
fcd768ba-5d63-461f-a865-1b1546bf44dd.answer: If you cannot find a place in a dormitory, you can look for shared flats for example on wg-gesucht.de

e287003c-042d-4020-b518-d5a1de03307e.question: The name on all my documents ([REDACTED]) is different from the name on my passport ([REDACTED]). The embassy has requested that I renew my passport to match the name on my birth certificate. Could I update my name in TUMOnline and my Letter of Admission to reflect '[REDACTED]'? (I attach the document for the proof)
e287003c-042d-4020-b518-d5a1de03307e.answer: For this matter, you need to contact TUM’s student information service desk: https://www.tum.de/en/studies/support-and-advice/support-during-studies/student-information

860965a2-aa71-4b9f-a4fb-428e1637705d.question: Is it possible to Defer my admission? How to do that?
860965a2-aa71-4b9f-a4fb-428e1637705d.answer: If you want to defer your admission to next year, you can do so. In this case, you now need to decline the offer online. Then, next year you apply again with all documents, however, you will be automatically admitted by the matriculation office since you already had received an offer. So, you won’t go through the selection process again next year.

02efd86a-58eb-4670-aaa9-e30448e22fe2.question: Who is responsible for issuing a confirmation of the standard period of study for a student?
02efd86a-58eb-4670-aaa9-e30448e22fe2.answer: The officials at TUM are capable of issuing such a confirmation.

19fdb024-bf9c-46ca-bccb-0d33c2c6bb41.question: What is the standard period of study for the AI in Society program at TUM?
19fdb024-bf9c-46ca-bccb-0d33c2c6bb41.answer: The standard period of study for the AI in Society program at TUM is 4 semesters.

63b60743-2cb6-4be2-baa0-bc37104e6a40.question: Who should a student contact concerning the tuition fee?
63b60743-2cb6-4be2-baa0-bc37104e6a40.answer: For information concerning the tuition fee, the student should reach out to TUM Beitragsmanagement.

6fa81961-2820-418f-bade-da6860635292.question: How much is the tuition fee per semester for the AI in Society program at TUM?
6fa81961-2820-418f-bade-da6860635292.answer: The tuition fee for each semester of the AI in Society program at TUM is €4,085.

a80ac56d-3c4b-45ca-b18c-a57fb81aad84.question: When is the AI in Society aptitude test?
a80ac56d-3c4b-45ca-b18c-a57fb81aad84.answer: The AI in Society aptitude test is on September 3rd, from 11:00-12:30 CEST.

557d4961-7a75-4e73-85d9-23cdea9646f4.question: What is the format of the AI in Society aptitude test?
557d4961-7a75-4e73-85d9-23cdea9646f4.answer: The test consists of 35 multiple-choice questions to be completed in 90 minutes and will be held over TUM's internal moodle platform. The topics covered include Politics, Economics and Law, Statistics and Mathematics, and Engineering.

7216ae1c-1393-4981-a994-8a08426a9bfe.question: What are the two variants of taking the AI in Society aptitude test?
7216ae1c-1393-4981-a994-8a08426a9bfe.answer: You can choose between an on-campus and an off-campus (online) variant. The off-campus variant will require you to pay a fee of 25$ for the proctoring software, Proctorio and a working webcam and microphone. The on-campus variant will not require any fee, but will require you to bring your laptop. If unable to bring a laptop, let them know in advance to arrange one for you.

d818f8f2-5de7-4d74-acca-8d18cba983d7.question: Can I apply for the AI in Society program at TUM with an expired passport?
d818f8f2-5de7-4d74-acca-8d18cba983d7.answer: Yes, under certain circumstances that prohibit renewal, you are allowed to apply with an expired passport, and it can be updated later.

8b5bbeb3-8f85-4cea-9e82-4e61c1560fb7.question: When and how will the AI in Society aptitude test at TUM take place?
8b5bbeb3-8f85-4cea-9e82-4e61c1560fb7.answer: The AI in Society aptitude test is scheduled to take place on September 3rd, from 11:00-12:30 CEST. The test consists of 35 multiple-choice questions over 90 minutes, taken via TUM's internal moodle platform. The test covers Politics, Economics, Law, Statistics, Mathematics, and Engineering topics.

f3c09c96-6fd4-4720-bff1-8814c0e88806.question: What materials are permitted during the AI in Society aptitude test?
f3c09c96-6fd4-4720-bff1-8814c0e88806.answer: During the aptitude test, you will be allowed to use a calculator, as well as a piece of paper and pen.

e5033962-9154-41b0-8c83-d4872a84a1d3.question: What options are available for taking the AI in Society aptitude test at TUM?
e5033962-9154-41b0-8c83-d4872a84a1d3.answer: You can choose to take the test either on-campus (in person) or off-campus (online). The off-campus variant requires you to pay a $25 fee for the Proctorio proctoring software and have a working webcam and microphone. The on-campus variant doesn't require any fee, as you'll be monitored in person, but you'll need to bring your laptop to take the test.

eb011493-03c3-406c-b054-0fc99cbca991.question: Can I know the schedule for the lectures (hour/day) for the upcoming winter semester?
eb011493-03c3-406c-b054-0fc99cbca991.answer: The dates and times for the lectures are currently being finalized and are still subject to change. As soon as a final version is available, it can be found on the website.

a6c30008-6735-4d51-9262-9c20c44398d5.question: When is the third aptitude test planned for?
a6c30008-6735-4d51-9262-9c20c44398d5.answer: The third aptitude test is planned for September 3rd.

8fc5a989-9039-49fe-9d86-ae5914fa5510.question: Will there be options to take the aptitude test?
8fc5a989-9039-49fe-9d86-ae5914fa5510.answer: Yes, there will be an online option as well as an in-person option for taking the test.

2c2d17a8-6c36-4622-bac4-7a5c32bc1015.question: Why has the test link for the exam on September 2nd or 3rd not been received?
2c2d17a8-6c36-4622-bac4-7a5c32bc1015.answer: The test is being set up and an email with all relevant information will be sent in time.

ec2e4149-3c26-49ea-b1fe-5b6cab9befa5.question: What is the status regarding the application documents?
ec2e4149-3c26-49ea-b1fe-5b6cab9befa5.answer: All documents for the application are marked as okay.

47e15fe6-e68c-434e-b24b-37881d508caa.question: What happens if some documents are still not marked as “OK”?
47e15fe6-e68c-434e-b24b-37881d508caa.answer: If some documents are not marked as “OK”, there needs to be a conversation with the matriculation office, followed by information on further steps.

a2ff1aa4-2686-4771-8b05-b54699e9c8ff.question: Could you please confirm on which campus all my subjects will be held?
a2ff1aa4-2686-4771-8b05-b54699e9c8ff.answer: The majority of the subjects will be held in the city center. Specifically, you will have your lectures in Richard-Wagner-Str.1, Marsstr. 20-22, and Arcisstr. 21.

3b765c56-4437-43ee-8819-4204908932e5.question: Could you provide details on the evaluation system for each subject? Will there be a combination of assignments, projects, and a final exam? What percentage of the final grade will be based on the final exam?
3b765c56-4437-43ee-8819-4204908932e5.answer: The lecture type modules usually end with a final exam making up the entire grade. Some lectures also have an accompanying exercise with assignments, which can give bonus points to the final exam. In the seminar type modules, the examination can consist of a presentation, a small group project, or similar. This depends on the final decision of the lecturer.

fce6bf1e-4018-49c4-bd65-de0b33b9cbb5.question: Does the master’s program include internships to gain practical work experience in Germany? When would these internships typically take place?
fce6bf1e-4018-49c4-bd65-de0b33b9cbb5.answer: The program does not include internships in a fixed manner, i.e. they are not explicitly integrated into the study program and are not mandatory. However, you can complete an internship during your studies, which is highly recommended. Many students also work part-time in companies as so called 'Werkstudent'.

305b16fe-fe16-4dec-b389-fdd180cff214.question: Will it be possible to attend classes online during a specific period without negatively affecting my performance?
305b16fe-fe16-4dec-b389-fdd180cff214.answer: Yes, this will not be a problem. You will be able to follow the content online, as the lectures will be streamed in parallel.

32090af2-6e28-4642-bb1b-f24b47e0b9c6.question: How relevant is proficiency in German for succeeding in the Master’s program and securing job opportunities related to the field? Does TUM offer German language courses as an extracurricular option included in the Master's program fees?
32090af2-6e28-4642-bb1b-f24b47e0b9c6.answer: German language is not required for our Master's program, as all modules are taught in English. But, some knowledge of German will make life here easier for you. TUM’s language center offers language courses: https://www.sprachenzentrum.tum.de/en/sz/homepage/

1eeb9e99-fb19-4084-b529-cb42917363c0.question: Where will the main classes for the AI in Society program be held?
1eeb9e99-fb19-4084-b529-cb42917363c0.answer: The main classes will be held in different campuses in the city center, specifically at Marsstr. 20-22, Richard-Wagner-Str. 1, and Arcisstr. 21.

1bfc2ab8-41a2-43c0-aef1-beb91c0cafd3.question: When do the lectures for the AI in Society program officially start?
1bfc2ab8-41a2-43c0-aef1-beb91c0cafd3.answer: The lectures officially start on October 14th.

bf5545dd-3876-4013-ac12-42c3c8ca4081.question: Where can I find the academic calendar for the MSc AI in Society program?
bf5545dd-3876-4013-ac12-42c3c8ca4081.answer: You can find the academic calendar on the website: https://www.sot.tum.de/sot/studium/ai-in-society/. The lecture periods you can find here, under “semester structure -> Winter semester 2024/25”: https://www.tum.de/en/studies/application/application-info-portal/dates-periods-and-deadlines

7d361849-98e2-4465-9f2a-fe1ceb63e3c7.question: How can I request the syllabus for the MSc AI in Society program?
7d361849-98e2-4465-9f2a-fe1ceb63e3c7.answer: You can get the relevant part of the study program documentation for the MSc AI in Society program, which contains the syllabus, by reaching out through the email communication.

22e97629-b1b0-451a-8f6a-2e8303a5d367.question: What should I do if I have not yet secured accommodation for my visa?
22e97629-b1b0-451a-8f6a-2e8303a5d367.answer: If you cannot find a place in a dormitory, you can look for shared flats for example on wg-gesucht.de.

b28d88ac-0a89-490e-a7ae-5343d26e941d.question: How can I update my name in TUMOnline and my Letter of Admission?
b28d88ac-0a89-490e-a7ae-5343d26e941d.answer: For this matter, you need to contact TUM’s student information service desk: https://www.tum.de/en/studies/support-and-advice/support-during-studies/student-information

c8300377-10b6-40ad-b10c-94554f77bdb3.question: Is it possible to defer my admission to the MSc AI in Society program? How do I do that?
c8300377-10b6-40ad-b10c-94554f77bdb3.answer: If you want to defer your admission to next year, you can do so. In this case, you now need to decline the offer online. Then, next year you apply again with all documents, however, you will be automatically admitted by the matriculation office since you already had received an offer. So, you won’t go through the selection process again next year.

c8fc6ed5-db33-4062-86de-a185b657fad8.question: If I complete the first year of my AI Master's program at Utrecht University in the Netherlands and then wish to transfer to the AI Master's program at TUM, would I need to provide a VPD (preliminary documentation review) certification?
c8fc6ed5-db33-4062-86de-a185b657fad8.answer: When you started studying at Utrecht, if you had submitted a VPD there, then you can submit the same one to TUM. If not, please refer to the information stated here: https://www.tum.de/en/studies/application/application-info-portal/uni-assist “Who has to apply via uni-assist? -> All applicants for a master's degree who did not obtain their qualification for postgraduate studies (usually a bachelor's degree) in a country within the EU/EEA“.

7b6782b4-eedc-4c35-b56e-03bf3418fe06.question: If an applicant fails the suitability assessment, can they reapply for the assessment in the same semester?
7b6782b4-eedc-4c35-b56e-03bf3418fe06.answer: An applicant who fails the suitability assessment can register for the process once again, but it is meant for registering in the next winter semester, not for retaking the assessment in the same semester.

f40709b8-a707-432b-a1e4-7e4448eed394.question: Can an applicant be reconsidered for admission after being rejected by the selection committee?
f40709b8-a707-432b-a1e4-7e4448eed394.answer: No, the selection committee cannot re-evaluate individuals again after they've gone through the interview process and have been rejected. The decision is final and there is, unfortunately, no provision for a new interview when the decision has already been made.

1a027f17-7477-4a84-b5a2-c878834140a9.question: Did the interview panel reject an applicant because the applicant already had a master’s degree?
1a027f17-7477-4a84-b5a2-c878834140a9.answer: The applicant mentioned that during the interview, they were informed that preference was given to those who didn't already have a master's degree. However, this claim lacks direct confirmation or denial from the interview panel in the email exchange.

c6ac2b95-6eec-4981-95d3-d35f70a69540.question: If an applicant does not agree with the scores assigned during the interview, can they request a detailed breakdown of their scores?
c6ac2b95-6eec-4981-95d3-d35f70a69540.answer: While we see an example of an applicant requesting for the same, there is no definitive answer in the email exchange on whether such a detailed breakdown would be provided.

f6131610-3e29-4fd8-91dc-e3edb4d139bc.question: Can the faculty reconsider the application after the rejection?
f6131610-3e29-4fd8-91dc-e3edb4d139bc.answer: Unfortunately, the faculty cannot make exceptions and re-evaluate people again after they have already gone through the interview and were rejected by our selection committee members.

3db1e234-bdb3-408b-9897-bd08f88e68bd.question: Is there possibility to retake the aptitude test after failing it once?
3db1e234-bdb3-408b-9897-bd08f88e68bd.answer: The wording in the aptitude assessment PDF that states those who did not pass the aptitude assessment can repeat the test likely means applicants can re-apply in the next semester, not that they can immediately retake the test.

13de858b-81e1-4ad7-8772-2284c1ce4d8b.question: Do I need to provide a VPD (preliminary review documentation) certification as part of my application process for transferring to the AI Master's program at LMU?
13de858b-81e1-4ad7-8772-2284c1ce4d8b.answer: Since you are transferring to the LMU, and not TUM, you should contact them instead.

8fe0ac7b-ad95-4a53-b79e-93b1c3e6d6b0.question: Would it be possible for the university to assist by writing to the German consulate or embassy on a student's behalf who is facing difficulties securing a visa appointment?
8fe0ac7b-ad95-4a53-b79e-93b1c3e6d6b0.answer: Unfortunately, the university cannot contact the embassy in this matter.

eba4c0e3-21af-4573-97cb-f50d013f003c.question: What steps should be taken if a student in the MSc AI in Society program receives his/her visa later than expected?
eba4c0e3-21af-4573-97cb-f50d013f003c.answer: If the student will be in Munich physically a bit later, it should be no problem since the university will be offering the first semester lectures online. This way, the student will not miss any content.

81255e80-ce1b-47b7-92e4-5911c62ebbbd.question: Where are most of the lectures for the AI in Society course held?
81255e80-ce1b-47b7-92e4-5911c62ebbbd.answer: Most of the lectures are held in the city center, specifically at the following locations: Richard-Wagner-Str. 1, Marsstr. [REDACTED], Arcisstr. 21 (Main building). There is one module each in the second and third semesters that usually takes place in Garching, but this is the exception. You can expect most classes to be held in the city centre.

0206339f-1a7d-4749-b0df-5fa4e06beb43.question: Will all the lectures for the AI in Society course be held at the Garching campus?
0206339f-1a7d-4749-b0df-5fa4e06beb43.answer: No, most of the lectures are held in the city center. There is a module each in the second and third semesters that usually takes place in Garching, but this is the exception.

6d4d2635-a571-4fda-89c1-6914f2d1a17d.question: What is the reason for the applicant's rejection from the program?
6d4d2635-a571-4fda-89c1-6914f2d1a17d.answer: The rejection was based on assessment scores from the interview, which were significantly low. The applicant was informed during the interview that preference is given to those who don't already have a master's degree.

88107f60-082d-41ea-8542-d3bd4441c157.question: Can the applicant request a reevaluation or retake the aptitude test?
88107f60-082d-41ea-8542-d3bd4441c157.answer: No, exceptions can't be made to reevaluate applicants or allow them to retake the test after they've been interviewed and rejected by the selection committee.

bf0aaf69-b8ab-499b-b6ff-3f2643440f14.question: Can the decision of rejection be changed if the applicant has received a scholarship acceptance?
bf0aaf69-b8ab-499b-b6ff-3f2643440f14.answer: No, the decision of the committee cannot be changed even if the applicant has received a scholarship acceptance.

1d6191d8-4788-415d-8b75-7a46653de9b0.question: Why did the applicant believe their score was inaccurately assessed?
1d6191d8-4788-415d-8b75-7a46653de9b0.answer: The applicant felt that based on the four parts of the aptitude assessment, the score was unusually low and did not reflect their qualifications, particularly considering they were granted the relAI scholarship.

1059c6e3-bb8e-434e-8eae-144f47a36677.question: Is the practical project from my current Master's program eligible to be taken into account for the AI in Society program?
1059c6e3-bb8e-434e-8eae-144f47a36677.answer: Yes, the practical project from your current Master’s degree will be acknowledged.

d28e3442-520b-45cb-bf72-41b8ce2b64cc.question: As a student pursuing a second Master's program, will I have to pay the tuition fee?
d28e3442-520b-45cb-bf72-41b8ce2b64cc.answer: Information on tuition fees can be found in the TUM student information: https://www.tum.de/en/studies/support-and-advice/support-during-studies/student-information

2b06b908-12e7-44e0-bae9-5ba848a727ab.question: Are there any introductory and orientation events for new 'AI in Society' students before the courses start?
2b06b908-12e7-44e0-bae9-5ba848a727ab.answer: Yes, a welcome event is planned for all new AI in Society students at the beginning of October, before the lectures start.

ac976372-09b5-4612-b15a-e00d1e5874c2.question: Can I attend my course online if I do not receive my visa by October 30th?
ac976372-09b5-4612-b15a-e00d1e5874c2.answer: Yes, it will be no problem if you attend the courses online until end of October.

4b1e2d5d-edc1-4d0c-9239-ce90379462fb.question: Is it possible to defer my start date to the next summer semester?
4b1e2d5d-edc1-4d0c-9239-ce90379462fb.answer: You cannot officially start in a summer semester. You could only defer it to next winter semester.

caac5667-4751-4ac7-8d5c-dd719468f4b9.question: Can I participate in courses online while I am not yet in Munich?
caac5667-4751-4ac7-8d5c-dd719468f4b9.answer: Yes, you can participate in the courses online. They will all be streamed in parallel for people who could not make it here physically in time.

97ac62da-dbb6-4597-a8b6-420d43b9eba3.question: Is it possible to officially start studies in a summer semester at TUM?
97ac62da-dbb6-4597-a8b6-420d43b9eba3.answer: No, you cannot officially start your studies in a summer semester with us, only in winter.

8b2f4eb1-3050-4a9b-9768-d7373ef8b2fa.question: Can the TUM's scholarship office reimburse for the winter semester, even if one officially applies for the waiver for summer semester?
8b2f4eb1-3050-4a9b-9768-d7373ef8b2fa.answer: It's suggested to reach out to TUM's scholarship office again - maybe they can reimburse you for this winter semester as well, even if you officially apply for the waiver for summer semester.

d0d51a05-6d81-4e77-b68a-fda772552e23.question: Can I find student side jobs in conjunction with studying at TUM?
d0d51a05-6d81-4e77-b68a-fda772552e23.answer: Yes, you could look for a student side job (many students work in parallel to studying). Specifically, these kinds of positions are called 'Werkstudent', you can look online for such positions.

fbe5f32e-924f-44fb-ab9c-c1b1b6844368.question: Do digitally verifiable documents require additional notarization for enrollment?
fbe5f32e-924f-44fb-ab9c-c1b1b6844368.answer: A digitally verifiable document does not require additional notarization.

060f8d01-300b-43b6-9d25-a52496661dd0.question: How should the required enrollment documents be submitted?
060f8d01-300b-43b6-9d25-a52496661dd0.answer: The required documents should be submitted along with the signed application for enrollment by mail.

900510ac-13cd-4f2a-b84b-f049e13a5a18.question: Can a new document be uploaded later in case of admission?
900510ac-13cd-4f2a-b84b-f049e13a5a18.answer: Yes, you can upload your new document later in case of admission. You don’t need to do it now.

05c5205f-3578-4ad4-a40b-b148462e8888.question: What if the application portal won't allow me to update my passport document?
05c5205f-3578-4ad4-a40b-b148462e8888.answer: Upload the correct document if you have it. If all documents are okay, you will be invited to another test at the beginning of September.

50ab42d8-b46a-48ea-a4b9-1a83476f3509.question: What should I do if I have an issue with the passport upload on the application portal?
50ab42d8-b46a-48ea-a4b9-1a83476f3509.answer: You should contact the admissions office to see if there is another way for you to upload your document.

b99fd596-9fa6-4879-932d-11335b5477a7.question: Can the AI in Society program provide a letter verifying English language proficiency for a visa procedure?
b99fd596-9fa6-4879-932d-11335b5477a7.answer: They most probably mean that you need to get it from the department you actually received your degree from. We cannot issue you a verification of English language proficiency, as you have not studied with us.

0d893b77-14a3-4e11-baf6-58f2797e64b9.question: Is English proficiency verified during the admission process for the AI in Society program?
0d893b77-14a3-4e11-baf6-58f2797e64b9.answer: Yes, English proficiency is verified during the admission process for the AI in Society program.

02f6544f-f137-4f8d-a297-276043d324f3.question: Can a document verifying English proficiency be issued on TUM letterhead?
02f6544f-f137-4f8d-a297-276043d324f3.answer: No, the department cannot issue a document verifying English proficiency on TUM letterhead.

7ca351c2-c2b3-4696-9d51-e408ba7f56ca.question: What is the proficiency requirement for the Master's program?
7ca351c2-c2b3-4696-9d51-e408ba7f56ca.answer: The proficiency requirement for the Master's program is 6.5 bands (B2 CEFR).

ffd8ce08-9afb-46d7-83c0-742a9281f89e.question: What should the verification letter for English proficiency include?
ffd8ce08-9afb-46d7-83c0-742a9281f89e.answer: The verification letter should include confirmation that the applicant has enough English skills to enroll for the master program.

5ea54184-b8d5-4334-93c2-cb35358b1558.question: Can the M.Sc AI in Society department issue a verification of English language proficiency?
5ea54184-b8d5-4334-93c2-cb35358b1558.answer: No, they can't issue a verification since the student has not studied with them.

7f45e5ec-cfeb-4e11-9b16-cab9fe8aa041.question: Where should the letter verifying English language proficiency come from?
7f45e5ec-cfeb-4e11-9b16-cab9fe8aa041.answer: The letter should come from the department the student actually received their degree from.

01f424d0-8ced-4179-920f-18e10bb3c080.question: What does the student need for a visa application in India when the IELTS score is 1 year old?
01f424d0-8ced-4179-920f-18e10bb3c080.answer: According to the student, a letter from the university verifying English language proficiency is required for the visa application.

f5bcc65e-8454-4e46-8589-939232742bb0.question: Can the applicant upload his passport again?
f5bcc65e-8454-4e46-8589-939232742bb0.answer: Yes, the applicant should upload the correct document if they have it.

ede73ad4-c830-4206-ada2-b46a3f4da70d.question: Is the Masters program 'AI in Society' also taught in the Summer semester 2025, or does it always start only in the Winter semester?
ede73ad4-c830-4206-ada2-b46a3f4da70d.answer: The Masters program 'AI in Society' is generally only available at the start of the Winter semester. The next possible start would then be in October 2025.

f27be3a1-79ff-4165-9a42-73b6cf7c4eea.question: Could you please confirm whether the classes for the first semester will be conducted online or in person?
f27be3a1-79ff-4165-9a42-73b6cf7c4eea.answer: The classes of the first semester will be conducted both in-person and stream in parallel online.

42024e6b-fa55-4980-8504-2b8725dfba15.question: Could you advise me on the appropriate time to arrive in Munich? Is there a recommended date for students to be present before the semester begins?
42024e6b-fa55-4980-8504-2b8725dfba15.answer: There is no exact recommended time you should be arriving in Munich physically. However, it is highly recommended to take care of accommodation as soon as possible.

cc9e5e7a-6587-426e-931a-9fbe85df77cf.question: When are the classes scheduled to start, and is there a specific timetable available that I can review?
cc9e5e7a-6587-426e-931a-9fbe85df77cf.answer: Classes at TUM will officially start on October 14th. For a specific timetable for the first semester, it should be checked back soon on the university website.

12beb7d0-6e3a-4a9f-b702-6a87985c6fc4.question: Can the M.Sc AI in Society department validate my English language proficiency as an applicant?
12beb7d0-6e3a-4a9f-b702-6a87985c6fc4.answer: No actually, the letter should be like the M.Sc AI in Society department had looked at my application and confirmed that I have enough english skills to enroll for the master's program.

f9bfbe06-f0cd-4cd0-8039-4986947b780a.question: Can the department where I got accepted provide a confirmation of my English proficiency?
f9bfbe06-f0cd-4cd0-8039-4986947b780a.answer: They most probably mean that you need to get it from the department you actually received your degree from. We cannot issue you a verification of English language proficiency, as you have not studied with us.

0ff42043-fe9c-4672-a488-fb4af9d7e146.question: Can you provide a confirmation of my English proficiency for my visa application? My IELTS score is 1 year old and I have more than 15 ECTS credits worth of bachelor's thesis and papers written entirely in English.
0ff42043-fe9c-4672-a488-fb4af9d7e146.answer: The department said you have to get the confirmation from the department you actually received your degree from.

a629f7c2-808d-4251-b946-4efbad312a2f.question: Where can I get a verification of English language proficiency for visa application purposes?
a629f7c2-808d-4251-b946-4efbad312a2f.answer: You need to get it from the department you actually received your degree from.

ef71f783-08b3-4a04-9d8e-9481ace6417e.question: Can the department issue a verification of English language proficiency?
ef71f783-08b3-4a04-9d8e-9481ace6417e.answer: No, the department cannot issue a verification of English language proficiency, as you have not studied with them.

34e26e2a-d888-4972-bca2-63f5673c3461.question: Is there any chance that the committee reconsider a rejected application if the candidate receives a scholarship?
34e26e2a-d888-4972-bca2-63f5673c3461.answer: No, the decision made by the selection committee cannot be revised even after receiving a scholarship.

c83fb9a0-6151-448e-a905-ade437fdea00.question: Can a candidate request a new interview after being rejected?
c83fb9a0-6151-448e-a905-ade437fdea00.answer: No, a new interview cannot be offered when the decision has already been made.

0dbf0ec8-b18f-4f72-926b-80dff63a513d.question: What happens if a candidate is rejected after the interview?
0dbf0ec8-b18f-4f72-926b-80dff63a513d.answer: If a candidate is rejected after the interview by the selection committee, the decision is final and cannot be changed.

7b3693f4-66b5-47ba-a747-d130f8ee6cd7.question: Can an applicant rescind their application withdrawal for the Master’s program in 'AI in Society' at TUM?
7b3693f4-66b5-47ba-a747-d130f8ee6cd7.answer: Depending on circumstances, an applicant can rescind their application withdrawal. The final decision lies with the aptitude committee.

0b265e52-5c51-40fa-b9a0-4ba88d2de5fd.question: Is it possible to be invited to participate in the last aptitude test for the Master’s program in 'AI in Society' at TUM?
0b265e52-5c51-40fa-b9a0-4ba88d2de5fd.answer: Yes, if circumstances allow and the applicant guarantees participation, they can be included in the list for the last aptitude test.

1ff366bb-523f-4d46-b192-db7c5f9db33c.question: What is the aptitude test for the Master’s program in 'AI in Society' at TUM?
1ff366bb-523f-4d46-b192-db7c5f9db33c.answer: It is a 90-minute online or in-person test primarily conducted in English that assesses potential students' knowledge on Politics, Economics and Law, Statistics and Mathematics, Engineering, and other undisclosed areas.

16273946-2c0a-49bc-a215-9a9e6145d142.question: Can the aptitude test for the Master’s program in 'AI in Society' at TUM be done in person?
16273946-2c0a-49bc-a215-9a9e6145d142.answer: Yes, candidates have the option to take the test in person at the TUM, Munich city center.

41848f2d-8d99-4cd4-b322-06e8a187d8b5.question: What is the fee for the online monitoring software during the aptitude test for the Master’s program in 'AI in Society' at TUM?
41848f2d-8d99-4cd4-b322-06e8a187d8b5.answer: Participation using the proctoring program will demand a fee of $25.

521bd2d7-d7a9-4a84-b5d9-5207b8997c4b.question: Do I need to submit the APS certificate for enrollment if I finished my secondary school in a Russian school located in Vietnam?
521bd2d7-d7a9-4a84-b5d9-5207b8997c4b.answer: APS will be removed from your required documents once the degree certificates from the UK are received.

930a5bb6-1ad1-4de0-bad8-3d78d1cda690.question: Who should I contact regarding issues with my study fees at TUM?
930a5bb6-1ad1-4de0-bad8-3d78d1cda690.answer: Please reach out to the office for fees and scholarships at [REDACTED]@zv.tum.de.

b98b3fa8-170b-4875-b953-155f564cd04c.question: Could you please advise if it would be possible to defer my start date to the next summer semester?
b98b3fa8-170b-4875-b953-155f564cd04c.answer: Unfortunately, you cannot officially start in a summer semester. You could only defer it to next winter semester (if you have not yet accepted the offer online). However, you can participate in the courses online for the time being.

25d9be0c-4956-433a-a251-d881230cacf1.question: Can I participate in the courses online if I am not physically present during the winter semester?
25d9be0c-4956-433a-a251-d881230cacf1.answer: Yes, you can participate in the courses online while you are not in Munich. The courses will be streamed in parallel for those who could not make it physically.

201fe80b-b738-4827-b97e-6eb47aa29748.question: Where can Ukrainian students who have fled Ukraine due to the war apply for a waiver for the 'AI in Society' Master's Program?
201fe80b-b738-4827-b97e-6eb47aa29748.answer: Please reach out to the contact given at the bottom of the page at this link: https://www.tum.de/en/studies/fees-and-financial-aid/scholarships/tum-scholarships/scholarship/urgent-fonds-students-ukraine-war, as they manage this.

1af82435-db55-4d2d-863e-3190772e7dfa.question: Where will the classes for the AI in Society program at TUM be held?
1af82435-db55-4d2d-863e-3190772e7dfa.answer: The lectures for AI in Society program will mainly be held in the center of the city. The buildings will be: Richard-Wagner-Str. 1, Marsstr. 20-22, and Arcisstr. 21.

df1b16e0-81e5-4c08-8e65-ef1d81e74416.question: Will students need to attend lectures on different campuses for the AI in Society program at TUM?
df1b16e0-81e5-4c08-8e65-ef1d81e74416.answer: Yes, students will need to attend classes in different buildings located at Richard-Wagner-Str. 1, Marsstr. 20-22, and Arcisstr. 21.

55fcb884-d0f8-4c29-8a28-2f9d9b9e6298.question: Are there any specific networking options, groups, or events organised for students of the AI in Society program at TUM?
55fcb884-d0f8-4c29-8a28-2f9d9b9e6298.answer: Currently, there are no specific networking events for the AI in Society program. However, students will have plenty opportunities to connect with their classmates since they all have the same study plan and visit the same courses.

a9178368-1249-4f6d-9934-87fab74fb118.question: Is it possible to send me the curriculum for the AI in Society program, or the link where I can find it?
a9178368-1249-4f6d-9934-87fab74fb118.answer: We are currently still in planning, since the semester starts only in around 2 months. Not everything is finished yet. We will upload a plan for the first semester on our website soon – please check back.

04104126-5984-4b67-9634-c58fb4ab8982.question: When will the exact schedules of each lecture and other mandatory events of the “AI in Society” program be available?
04104126-5984-4b67-9634-c58fb4ab8982.answer: The exact schedules aren't available yet as there are still 2 months until the start of the semester and not all lecture plans are complete. The university will put a schedule for the first semester on the website as soon as it's finalized.

37210422-a3aa-4e53-a6c9-0bed020d2439.question: Why are not all of the modules for the “AI in Society” program's first semester appearing on the LV-Portal or through the study plan filter?
37210422-a3aa-4e53-a6c9-0bed020d2439.answer: The lecture planning is not yet complete. Therefore, they are currently not available on TUMonline.

de010ec8-7f2d-4d0f-9f9c-a42d775c9fde.question: I don't seem to have received a link to the test, can you send me a link?
de010ec8-7f2d-4d0f-9f9c-a42d775c9fde.answer: Please upload the correct document if you have it. We are offering another test right at the beginning of September, to which we will of course invite you, should all documents be okay.

986a1932-2417-4c0f-b248-5986b5a4f4bd.question: I reviewed my application on the portal and saw an issue with the passport upload. I have a new passport and can upload it to you if needed. Can we resolve this issue?
986a1932-2417-4c0f-b248-5986b5a4f4bd.answer: Please upload the correct document if you have it. Then, we will invite you to the next test at the beginning of September if all documents are okay.

41035a4d-7b7f-4a0d-9bbc-3c6bd55996aa.question: Can I start the AI in Society program in the summer semester and catch up with the winter semester content individually?
41035a4d-7b7f-4a0d-9bbc-3c6bd55996aa.answer: No, you can officially only enroll in the program in a winter semester. Admission for the summer semester is not provided.

ef58dfbb-1895-4488-9be2-ba8a620bac6b.question: If I can't start in the summer semester, can my acceptance be postponed for a year to the winter semester 2024/2025?
ef58dfbb-1895-4488-9be2-ba8a620bac6b.answer: Yes, your acceptance will still be valid next year. However, you will need to reapply and upload all your documents again (especially a current CV), but as you have already been admitted, you will be directly admitted. You do not have to go through the aptitude test again.

7526c9d3-09e2-4d14-ad6d-6cada4d25bea.question: If my acceptance is postponed to the winter semester 2024/2025, can I still participate in lectures/practical work from January and maybe also contribute my experiences (possibly as a 'guest') and then officially start in WS 2024/2025?
7526c9d3-09e2-4d14-ad6d-6cada4d25bea.answer: You would need to be properly registered to attend lectures and gain ECTS for it so it wouldn't be possible.

58e62788-62c9-4a45-bc38-7f1bda99a8e7.question: How should I respond to the current invitation for the winter semester '24? Should I formally decline it online and then reapply next year as you described, or should I just leave it open?
58e62788-62c9-4a45-bc38-7f1bda99a8e7.answer: You can just decline the admission online without reason.

6868e1ff-db0e-4bf1-841b-4ea49342fa6b.question: Is there a possibility to get detailed information about the lecture plan and possible elective modules for the 'AI in Society' WS 24/25?
6868e1ff-db0e-4bf1-841b-4ea49342fa6b.answer: A timetable for the first semester will be posted on the website soon, where you will be able to view the module descriptions.

8c5f1ea1-6008-423d-9da1-a93f3c9d9dff.question: Can I arrange a consulting meeting for further guidance on the 'AI in Society' program?
8c5f1ea1-6008-423d-9da1-a93f3c9d9dff.answer: Due to the advisor's unavailability during the whole month of August, they are unable to provide a consulting meeting. They suggest sending specific questions and concerns via email for them to provide help as soon as possible. If required, they may also consult with more experienced colleagues about similar student situations.

17360ca1-41aa-4237-9b14-43988d58a7a5.question: Can the third aptitude test for the MSc AI in Society program at TUM be moved to August?
17360ca1-41aa-4237-9b14-43988d58a7a5.answer: The test cannot be moved to August as most of the staff will be on vacation. The test is planned for the 2nd or 3rd of September.

4bc549fb-89b6-447e-bc13-d2dc41115a26.question: When will the third aptitude test for the MSc AI in Society program at TUM be conducted?
4bc549fb-89b6-447e-bc13-d2dc41115a26.answer: The third aptitude test will be conducted on the 2nd or 3rd of September.

e8ef0b39-7089-43bf-b13d-f44c30b58b41.question: How soon will the documents for my application to the MSc AI in Society program at TUM be assessed?
e8ef0b39-7089-43bf-b13d-f44c30b58b41.answer: The documents won't be assessed immediately. It is implied that some time is needed to process them.

56d6895f-4d5c-4712-8c27-ee6fe40dd6b3.question: Can I still take the test for the MSc AI in Society program at TUM if my documents are not marked as 'OK'?
56d6895f-4d5c-4712-8c27-ee6fe40dd6b3.answer: You cannot take the test if your documents are not marked as 'OK'. If your documents end up being sufficient, you will be invited to the third test date.

f8b193a9-b175-4b39-9583-45f3235c18d5.question: Can a successful application for the AI in Society program be deferred for a year from WS 2024/2025 to WS 2025/2026?
f8b193a9-b175-4b39-9583-45f3235c18d5.answer: Yes, the admission will still be valid. However, the candidate must reapply through TUMonline within the application period for Winter Semester 25/26, and re-upload all documents. It's crucial that the resume is current. The admission committee will admit him due to his admission last year, if everything formally matches. He does not need to go through the aptitude test again.

500a38dc-793e-4c06-b182-0c6ff782dba3.question: If the AI in Society program admission is deferred, can the candidate still attend lectures and participate in practical work from January, possibly as a guest, and then officially start in WS 2024/2025?
500a38dc-793e-4c06-b182-0c6ff782dba3.answer: Yes, the candidate can enroll for Winter Semester 24/25 and try to pass modules, and fully study in Summer Semester 2025. However, he may lose a semester if he cannot acquire ECTS in Winter Semester 24/25 - compared to his peers - with respect to the progress control starting from the 3rd semester.
