Attending the program before officially enrolling for Summer Semester is not possible as there is no application for Summer Semester 2025.

c4529912-5718-418e-a2cd-cb5db13f56c8.question: Is it possible to officially start the program in the summer semester and catch up the winter semester's curriculum individually?
c4529912-5718-418e-a2cd-cb5db13f56c8.answer: No, you can only officially start the program during a winter semester. Enrollment in the summer semester is not planned.

305b505c-8eb1-46ce-bc8a-c70c2679fca9.question: If starting in the summer semester is not possible, can the admission be postponed to the WS 2024/2025?
305b505c-8eb1-46ce-bc8a-c70c2679fca9.answer: Yes, your admission remains valid for the next year. However, you will need to apply again and re-upload all documents (especially an up-to-date CV). With the already granted admission, you will be directly admitted. You do not have to go through the aptitude test again.

20b6fdaf-5d47-445c-a8cf-a2d49d3e6143.question: If my admission to the program can be postponed, can I still attend lectures/practical work etc. and possibly contribute my experience in the meantime (possibly as a 'guest') - and then officially start in WS 2024/2025?
20b6fdaf-5d47-445c-a8cf-a2d49d3e6143.answer: You need to be officially enrolled to attend events and receive ECTS credits for it. This would not be possible otherwise.

e66be356-2104-4881-87b6-5f7d60819ff6.question: Is there already a module manual for the AI in Society program?
e66be356-2104-4881-87b6-5f7d60819ff6.answer: They are currently working on the module descriptions and they'll soon be available on the website.

7bb38ca7-a39e-48a1-86ae-96a76fbc1004.question: Can the enrolled letter be forwarded to the enrollment office?
7bb38ca7-a39e-48a1-86ae-96a76fbc1004.answer: The possibility of forwarding the enrolled letter to the enrollment office was suggested but the final decision or action was not clarified in the email.

013ee7ac-10ab-4c58-8cbf-a2ae3d3eff25.question: What was mailed in the registered letter?
013ee7ac-10ab-4c58-8cbf-a2ae3d3eff25.answer: The registered letter received contains required documents for enrollment.

5715f60e-a840-4a59-a858-1c8319c26214.question: Where should enrollment documents be sent?
5715f60e-a840-4a59-a858-1c8319c26214.answer: Enrollment documents should be sent to the enrollment office, not the individual.

33e716d6-0354-49c8-b404-8b42764928d4.question: To whom should documents for matriculation be sent?
33e716d6-0354-49c8-b404-8b42764928d4.answer: Documents for matriculation need to be sent to the Office of Matriculation, not me.

81e99555-f0f2-4f16-ab11-c21fb8a5be03.question: Can we redirect the registered mail you sent to the appropriate place?
81e99555-f0f2-4f16-ab11-c21fb8a5be03.answer: We have the ability to redirect the registered mail accordingly.

8bb416b5-8060-4f2d-937f-28f3fb06c020.question: When will the third aptitude test for the MSc in AI in Society be conducted?
8bb416b5-8060-4f2d-937f-28f3fb06c020.answer: The third aptitude test for the MSc in AI in Society is planned for September. Unfortunately, the exact date is not yet known.

0257afb4-e04b-460d-9a7a-0093656f439b.question: What is the status of my application for the MSc in AI in Society?
0257afb4-e04b-460d-9a7a-0093656f439b.answer: Your application is all set now and you'll be invited to the third aptitude test.

3a48c0c5-993f-4aee-8cd7-08969ce08b00.question: Is there an official date or extension by which students need to be present for the winter semester at TUM?
3a48c0c5-993f-4aee-8cd7-08969ce08b00.answer: There is no specific date or extension when students need to be physically present at TUM for the winter semester.

9dac21c2-0215-415c-89be-c7e66617f240.question: Will the courses of the first semester at TUM be available online?
9dac21c2-0215-415c-89be-c7e66617f240.answer: The courses of the first semester will be streamed online, so students can participate even if they are not yet in Munich.

a49e81db-30e4-4cb4-971d-719c1d43ee02.question: In the week before the semester starts at TUM, will there be a block course on programming? Will it be streamed online?
a49e81db-30e4-4cb4-971d-719c1d43ee02.answer: In the week before the semester starts, there will be a one-week block course on programming. However, it is not yet confirmed if it will be streamed online.

269dd385-488c-496d-8dc2-8f5dd7e647ac.question: Is it possible to join the Zoom call for the AI in Society application earlier than the scheduled time?
269dd385-488c-496d-8dc2-8f5dd7e647ac.answer: Yes, due to a change in time plans, the applicant is requested to join the Zoom call earlier.

700e2445-cff8-41c5-bd7f-334a2dabbb70.question: What is the original time for the AI in Society Zoom call on July 26th?
700e2445-cff8-41c5-bd7f-334a2dabbb70.answer: The original time for the Zoom call is from 10:00 – 10:30 AM CEST.

6067ba6d-2e5b-48b5-8598-babd2a917c60.question: When and how is the AI in [REDACTED] going to be conducted?
6067ba6d-2e5b-48b5-8598-babd2a917c60.answer: The AI in [REDACTED] will be conducted on July 26th, from 10:00 – 10:30 AM CEST via a Zoom link.

92d9b139-e14b-4c90-a4a6-4a7c2deec5ae.question: Can I change my selected interview time slot from 26th July to 29th or 30th July?
92d9b139-e14b-4c90-a4a6-4a7c2deec5ae.answer: Yes, you can change your slot yourself. However, there is only one last slot left on the 30th.

a2408368-1e22-49dd-94b4-1b65c7a7e513.question: How can I change my selected interview time slot?
a2408368-1e22-49dd-94b4-1b65c7a7e513.answer: You can change your slot yourself. An email from kulibri was sent to your provided email address with instructions.

2371a35b-e8cb-4fc3-8a3f-217ca7e7cacc.question: Can applicants move forward with their applications if their documents were formally incomplete in the system?
2371a35b-e8cb-4fc3-8a3f-217ca7e7cacc.answer: Yes, applicants can move forward after uploading the correct documents into the system.

dd1c63cf-042b-4875-91b5-ba5767b04301.question: What happen if application documents were incomplete during the aptitude test period in the AI in Society program?
dd1c63cf-042b-4875-91b5-ba5767b04301.answer: If the documents are incomplete, applicants will not receive an invitation to the aptitude test.

99fb53a7-005c-449a-a13a-bd8f3a62e3e5.question: When is the third aptitude test planned for the AI in Society program at TUM?
99fb53a7-005c-449a-a13a-bd8f3a62e3e5.answer: The third aptitude test is currently planned for September.

1f2485bd-259e-44a2-900f-7aacdccef1ca.question: What can cause an applicant to not receive an invitation to the aptitude test for the AI in Society program?
1f2485bd-259e-44a2-900f-7aacdccef1ca.answer: Not receiving an invitation to the aptitude test might be due to the applicant's documents being incorrectly completed, as in the case of a wrong passport document.

03ec939f-5949-4070-9519-9944647af2ce.question: What was my specific score on the aptitude exam for applicant number 2-02301197?
03ec939f-5949-4070-9519-9944647af2ce.answer: You have reached 22 points in the aptitude test.

35d2835d-fdf5-48c8-b6f6-968c546d5b1f.question: Did I get 3 points from my subjects and credits?
35d2835d-fdf5-48c8-b6f6-968c546d5b1f.answer: Yes, this adds up to a total of 25 points.

adb7add0-0ee8-4eaf-a82e-d0d6322f4d20.question: Was a score of 25 points on the aptitude exam enough to pass to the interview stage?
adb7add0-0ee8-4eaf-a82e-d0d6322f4d20.answer: No, 25 points was not enough to pass to the interview stage.

3d47797a-f2d5-421d-bfc9-50c5edfacbd8.question: Is the Master's program 'AI in Society' eligible for Bafög scholarship?
3d47797a-f2d5-421d-bfc9-50c5edfacbd8.answer: The university is expected to register this automatically. However, this process may not have been completed yet.

da429327-da04-4581-9ffa-a949a0684212.question: How can I check my result from the aptitude exam?
da429327-da04-4581-9ffa-a949a0684212.answer: You can inquire about the result via email from the relevant university coordinator or the person in charge.

39d6d262-1a03-4e69-b54d-3ddaafaf8425.question: What was my exact result on the aptitude exam held on Tuesday?
39d6d262-1a03-4e69-b54d-3ddaafaf8425.answer: You reached 22 points in the aptitude test.

871b3dc1-1939-43d7-b199-cee3c0e5e4cc.question: Can I reject my current offer at TUM and apply again the next year with a guaranteed seat?
871b3dc1-1939-43d7-b199-cee3c0e5e4cc.answer: Yes, you can reject the offer now and instead accept the study place next year. TUM will still have it in the system that you had passed all requirements and will be admitted.

4958ac60-2240-4a9c-a5cb-5180e4e37d64.question: Can I submit digital versions of my transcripts and degrees for enrollment at TUM?
4958ac60-2240-4a9c-a5cb-5180e4e37d64.answer: For all questions regarding the enrollment process, please refer to TUM’s student information service desk: https://www.tum.de/en/studies/support-and-advice/support-during-studies/student-information

e5670130-a32f-4b7a-a5f0-eb1ab35c45eb.question: Could you please confirm if the booked meeting for the AI in Society selection process is at 11:30 AM Munich time to avoid any misunderstanding?
e5670130-a32f-4b7a-a5f0-eb1ab35c45eb.answer: Yes, the slot you selected is 11:30 – 12:00 AM Munich time.

2edeebda-8140-4ee1-8ab7-40580d3df905.question: Could you let me know my final score for Level 1 of the AI in Society selection process?
2edeebda-8140-4ee1-8ab7-40580d3df905.answer: You received 12 points for your previous grades, and 31 points in the test. In total, you landed at 43 points.

2c6beeab-4bed-4078-8a11-f7b8f57328c3.question: What is the second stage of the aptitude assessment for the M.Sc. AI in Society at TUM?
2c6beeab-4bed-4078-8a11-f7b8f57328c3.answer: The second stage of the aptitude assessment for the M.Sc. AI in Society at TUM is an interview. During this interview, two members of the selection committee will discuss the applicant's motivation for choosing the degree program, willingness to engage in interdisciplinary learning and work, professional interests, previous specializations, and professional background to assess their alignment with the program's goals and career aspirations.

705a8913-4aaa-4c1c-b406-63b74d93e224.question: What is the focus of the aptitude interview for the M.Sc. AI in Society at TUM?
705a8913-4aaa-4c1c-b406-63b74d93e224.answer: The interview focuses on understanding the applicant's motivation for the study program, rather than testing their knowledge on specific subjects.

93de4b25-6721-49a9-b335-53c5211c9828.question: When and how will the aptitude interviews for the M.Sc. AI in Society program at TUM be conducted?
93de4b25-6721-49a9-b335-53c5211c9828.answer: The interviews will take place from July 22nd to July 30th and will be conducted online over Zoom.

37368866-e9f3-4232-87dc-9159ca2e92dc.question: How can applicants select a timeslot for the aptitude interview for the M.Sc. AI in Society at TUM?
37368866-e9f3-4232-87dc-9159ca2e92dc.answer: Applicants can select a timeslot by accessing the provided link, entering their email address and full name, and then choosing the timeslot that works best for them. Only one timeslot should be selected, observed by 'first come, first serve' principle. The chosen timeslot can be considered confirmed and there will be no additional confirmation email.

7cad0890-8b21-4626-886a-020d2537cef2.question: What should applicants do if they need to change their interview timeslot selection?
7cad0890-8b21-4626-886a-020d2537cef2.answer: Applicants can change their selection themselves, but they should let the committee know if they had to change their slot, especially last minute.

70e00ace-19ec-4a60-a79f-c998798ec630.question: What is discussed during the aptitude interview for the M.Sc. AI in Society at TUM?
70e00ace-19ec-4a60-a79f-c998798ec630.answer: During the aptitude interview, two members of the selection committee will discuss your motivation for choosing the degree program, your willingness to engage in interdisciplinary learning and work, your professional interests, any previous specializations, and your professional background to assess how well these align with the goals of the program and your career aspirations. The focus is on understanding the student's motivation for the study program, not testing their knowledge on specific subjects.

490f783f-cac4-4145-b2a6-dbe2151976c5.question: When will the aptitude interviews for the M.Sc. AI in Society at TUM take place?
490f783f-cac4-4145-b2a6-dbe2151976c5.answer: The aptitude interviews will take place from July 22nd to July 30th.

6815c4e6-5299-4f2c-ad3b-f11363ac7a5c.question: How is the time slot for the aptitude interview chosen?
6815c4e6-5299-4f2c-ad3b-f11363ac7a5c.answer: The time slots for the aptitude interview can be chosen through a link provided. You will need to enter your email address and your full name, and choose one timeslot that works best for you. Each timeslot can only be selected by one person, and is distributed using the principle of 'first come, first serve'. You can change your selection later, but you should let the team know if you change your slot, especially at the last minute.

606f4f62-5e62-48b1-8a96-6c0a35f71cec.question: Will there be any additional email confirming your chosen timeslot for the aptitude interview?
606f4f62-5e62-48b1-8a96-6c0a35f71cec.answer: No, as soon as you have selected a timeslot, you can consider it confirmed. There will be no additional email confirming your timeslot. You will receive your personal Zoom link at least 12 hours in advance of your interview.

208f6eec-62d6-4efb-87fb-eff6cb2aa58e.question: What to do before the aptitude interview for the M.Sc. AI in Society at TUM?
208f6eec-62d6-4efb-87fb-eff6cb2aa58e.answer: Before the conversation, you should ensure everything works from your end, including your camera, microphone, and internet connection.

8214ddc6-85be-4b94-9a66-07d87a86cf0b.question: Can you tell me whether I can still apply for any scholarship program to finance my studies?
8214ddc6-85be-4b94-9a66-07d87a86cf0b.answer: For questions regarding scholarships, please contact TUM’s scholarship office directly: https://www.tum.de/en/studies/fees-and-financial-aid/scholarships

45ae91df-34e7-4a60-a81c-0e9e1a9ad9a2.question: What is the score that decides between admission, interview, and rejection for the MSc. AI in Society program at TUM?
45ae91df-34e7-4a60-a81c-0e9e1a9ad9a2.answer: The score that decides between admission, interview, and rejection is the one that is entered in the system. It is comprised of the scores you receive from your previous grades and the score you got in the aptitude test.

5e0a65d7-6bae-4af6-8dfe-2cf7659fbd7c.question: Is there any possibility to get more detailed information about my application and to review my aptitude test for the MSc. AI in Society program at TUM?
5e0a65d7-6bae-4af6-8dfe-2cf7659fbd7c.answer: A detailed review of how many points you scored on which question cannot be provided, to avoid leaking the test questions.

ce7dc1cc-54db-465f-8c9b-ff1489555976.question: If an applicant encounters an auto logging off error while taking the aptitude test, are answers provided after logging back in taken into account of the test score for the MSc. AI in Society program at TUM?
ce7dc1cc-54db-465f-8c9b-ff1489555976.answer: The submitted answers get saved regardless of you getting logged out in the middle of the test.

548a2026-80b9-40be-8eb7-fb86589ceec0.question: Where in TUM will the courses take place, or are they held at multiple locations?
548a2026-80b9-40be-8eb7-fb86589ceec0.answer: Courses are somewhat distributed over the city center. Most will take place in the following buildings: Richard-Wagner-Str. 1, Marsstr. 20-22, Arcisstr. 21 (possibly).

970b0ee1-6cd8-448e-80bb-d9a5ae855469.question: Does the AI in Society program at TUM have any data on actual graduate outcomes such as hiring firms, average/median starting salary, and the countries graduates are hired in?
970b0ee1-6cd8-448e-80bb-d9a5ae855469.answer: Since the coming semester is the very first semester the program is being offered, there is no data on graduate outcomes yet.

f17c954e-ff48-46a2-9171-a726dcca25c2.question: What are the usual office hours of the “AI in Society” master?
f17c954e-ff48-46a2-9171-a726dcca25c2.answer: The representative doesn't have specific office hours, but they welcome visits given prior notification.

3a5e8497-cfde-47df-8c6c-9ded05367fff.question: Where can AI in Society courses be visited?
3a5e8497-cfde-47df-8c6c-9ded05367fff.answer: Courses will be taught in buildings designated as R[MANUALLY REDACTED] and possibly at the main campus at Arcisstr. 21.

772b04c8-201c-4446-9a9a-4b4c43b7999b.question: What are the nearest libraries that the TUM offers for their students and the program 'AI in Society'?
772b04c8-201c-4446-9a9a-4b4c43b7999b.answer: The University library has different topic branches. More information can be accessed at https://www.ub.tum.de/en/accessibility.

227bade7-53b3-44b0-8b2a-5e08c7bd78c1.question: If I would like to drop my immatriculation documents personally, where and how should this happen?
227bade7-53b3-44b0-8b2a-5e08c7bd78c1.answer: You can drop off your documents in person at the student center service desk located at [MANUALLY REDACTED].

e092259c-f426-40d7-9fc7-b688d12432fc.question: Where are the AI in Society lectures taking place? Is the campus for the master program located at Richard-Wagner-Str. 1, 80333 München?
e092259c-f426-40d7-9fc7-b688d12432fc.answer: The lectures are planned to take place in the city center, either at Richard-Wagner-Str. 1, Marsstr. 20-22, or Arcisstr. 21. Some courses may be offered in Garching, but the majority will happen in the city center.

4525636c-bc1a-4ed4-a8e5-cdb49b062d3b.question: What is required to access the off-campus (online) variant of the aptitude test?
4525636c-bc1a-4ed4-a8e5-cdb49b062d3b.answer: The off-campus (online) variant will require you to pay a fee of 25$ for the proctoring software Proctorio. This will require a working webcam and microphone.

4b03d73e-3463-45c2-a3d6-1026ee509cca.question: What are the requirements if I choose the on-campus variant of the aptitude test?
4b03d73e-3463-45c2-a3d6-1026ee509cca.answer: The on-campus variant will not require any fee, as you will be monitored by staff in person. It will take place in Marsstr. 20-22, 80335 Munich, room 605, 6th floor. You will need to bring your laptop to take the test.

8cd21e30-15d1-446f-a941-1254e4e0c2ff.question: What happens if the candidate can't make foreign currency transactions with their cards to pay the proctoring software Proctorio fee?
8cd21e30-15d1-446f-a941-1254e4e0c2ff.answer: The coordinator suggests trying with an internationally valid credit card as local bank cards may not work. If all payment methods fail, the candidate is advised to seek assistance in the zoom support room right before the exam or to reach out to the coordinator for another solution.

d50fa0ae-0cca-49d9-ab5f-70c70c648171.question: What are the consideration for candidates who can't make the foreign currency transaction for the proctoring software?
d50fa0ae-0cca-49d9-ab5f-70c70c648171.answer: The candidate is invited to a third test date and asked to seek a way to bypass the payment problem. If the problem persists, the candidate should reach out to the coordinator for another solution.

a7a471fe-5b38-401d-9786-e50a53f0cb23.question: What are details of the aptitude test for the AI in Society program at TUM?
a7a471fe-5b38-401d-9786-e50a53f0cb23.answer: The aptitude test will take place on July 16th, 10:45-12:15 CEST, consist of 35 multiple choice questions spanned over 90 minutes, and will be held over TUM's internal moodle platform. You will be allowed to use a calculator, as well as a piece of paper and pen to help you.

eb8a116e-38b5-4a5b-9e10-3c645ad7cdee.question: Why have I not received a link to the AI in Society program aptitude test?
eb8a116e-38b5-4a5b-9e10-3c645ad7cdee.answer: Your application has been marked as insufficient regarding one of your documents, which is why you have not been invited.

2fc66f16-356f-4410-93d2-3ef62914ac1a.question: Can I still participate in the aptitude test for the AI in Society program after my application was initially marked as insufficient?
2fc66f16-356f-4410-93d2-3ef62914ac1a.answer: Yes, you can still participate. You are being invited to the third test date that is currently being planned.

7ee24caf-5e11-4c88-b54f-ccb41afe56af.question: Can I apply with an expired passport because of some circumstances that prohibited me from renewing it?
7ee24caf-5e11-4c88-b54f-ccb41afe56af.answer: Yes, you were allowed to apply with an expired passport as per ticket [TUM#2024043010010666] and the admission committee informed you that your application is all good.

5c4e11c8-16f8-4f8c-b366-f5b8c29b1a21.question: Why have I not received a link to the AI in Society program aptitude test?
5c4e11c8-16f8-4f8c-b366-f5b8c29b1a21.answer: Your application has been marked as insufficient regarding one of your documents, which is why you have not been invited. Check the comment regarding your application.

40deea00-13dd-4d0d-b543-8ca42d3691a9.question: Why can't I access the AI in Society aptitude test using Egyptian cards?
40deea00-13dd-4d0d-b543-8ca42d3691a9.answer: Foreign currency transactions with Egyptian cards might not be possible. This issue could also arise with local bank cards.

7576e3d7-8e00-4a0f-b722-c8f30904c668.question: What should I do if I can't make payment for the aptitude test?
7576e3d7-8e00-4a0f-b722-c8f30904c668.answer: Try using an internationally valid credit card. If all payment methods fail, join the zoom support room right before the test and a solution will be provided.

fec796e4-ac2f-424c-a44d-3cefd3d494be.question: What is the format of the aptitude test for the AI in Society course?
fec796e4-ac2f-424c-a44d-3cefd3d494be.answer: The test will consist of 35 multiple choice questions spanned over 90 minutes and take place on TUM's internal Moodle platform. You can use a calculator, as well as a paper and pen.

a24b9f6e-d959-46c5-8164-152f447de9e3.question: What are the options for taking the aptitude test?
a24b9f6e-d959-46c5-8164-152f447de9e3.answer: You can choose between an on-campus and an off-campus (online) variant. The off-campus version requires a $25 fee for the Proctorio software, requiring a working webcam and microphone. The on-campus variant doesn't require a fee, since you will be monitored in person.

4221bc18-c268-4ca6-941d-d004f24389eb.question: What do I need to take the on-campus aptitude test?
4221bc18-c268-4ca6-941d-d004f24389eb.answer: You will need to bring your laptop to take the test. It won't be written on paper. If you can't bring a laptop, the staff needs to be informed in advance to provide one for you.

08050deb-b14d-474e-9348-d2f065819f36.question: If I use a blank paper on my desk and do not look at the camera constantly during the aptitude test, will that be counted as an attempt to cheat?
08050deb-b14d-474e-9348-d2f065819f36.answer: You looking at your desk at your paper will not be counted as cheating.

652125bd-d22c-4539-a828-4d3e8fd66765.question: If there are some technical issues during the test, is there a contact person or an email which I can use for help?
652125bd-d22c-4539-a828-4d3e8fd66765.answer: If there are any technical problems, there is a zoom call hotline as well as a phone number given on the moodle exam page.

9766d506-a4d3-4f2d-96a1-863e43ac04ba.question: What are the options for taking the aptitude test for the AI in Society programme?
9766d506-a4d3-4f2d-96a1-863e43ac04ba.answer: There are two options. The first is the on-campus variant which will not require any fee, as you will be monitored by staff in person. The second option is the off-campus (online) variant which will require you to pay a fee of $25 for the proctoring software Proctorio.

25d6ea11-1e59-4945-b889-18262536b371.question: What do I need for the off-campus test option?
25d6ea11-1e59-4945-b889-18262536b371.answer: The off-campus test requires a fee of $25 for the proctoring software Proctorio. This will require a working webcam and microphone.

f39e1637-a8f4-402d-966e-8af8c0201a2d.question: What are the test modalities for the AI in Society aptitude test?
f39e1637-a8f4-402d-966e-8af8c0201a2d.answer: The test will take place on July 16th, consist of 35 multiple choice questions spanned over 90 minutes, and will be held over TUM's internal moodle platform. You will be allowed to use a calculator, as well as a piece of paper and pen to help you.

1ec6745d-85af-4e11-9b86-73239820f65e.question: What do I need if I choose to take the on-campus test?
1ec6745d-85af-4e11-9b86-73239820f65e.answer: For the on-campus test, you will need to bring your laptop. If this is not possible, you should let the test administrators know in advance and they will provide you with a laptop. The test will not be written on paper.

72bc0278-98d0-41ef-b3b1-1bbbe69ec273.question: Can I be added to participate in the moodle exam that is scheduled for tomorrow?
72bc0278-98d0-41ef-b3b1-1bbbe69ec273.answer: Efforts will be made to add you to the moodle exam for the scheduled test. If there are any issues, you will be invited to a third test.

116d6623-e154-44e7-bdc5-415ec643a566.question: When is the third aptitude test scheduled?
116d6623-e154-44e7-bdc5-415ec643a566.answer: The third test is planned for September.

f74e6537-3621-4cfe-8412-4de2c02bf3ee.question: Why have I not received additional information pertaining to the aptitude test for the Master's program in AI in Society?
f74e6537-3621-4cfe-8412-4de2c02bf3ee.answer: There seems to have been a technical mistake.

cae9c814-ef1d-4ff5-b92a-81327bc11529.question: What will happen if there is a technical mistake that prevents me from taking the aptitude test as scheduled for the Master's program in AI in Society?
cae9c814-ef1d-4ff5-b92a-81327bc11529.answer: The team will try their best to add you to the moodle exam today and send you the link to participate tomorrow. Should anything go wrong, there will be a third test date, as well, to which they will invite you.

428620fd-5120-434b-a2a2-eabcddcb2254.question: What should I do if I haven't received the link for the Aptitude test and payment link?
428620fd-5120-434b-a2a2-eabcddcb2254.answer: If you haven't received the link for the Aptitude test and payment link, contact the Coordination team for TUM Master AI in Society. They will check and resolve the issue, and if necessary, invite you to a later test date.

1f465ac5-32fb-4b06-8f9b-70157f2458b0.question: Is there a plan if I miss the Aptitude test due to technical mistakes?
1f465ac5-32fb-4b06-8f9b-70157f2458b0.answer: Yes, if due to any technical mistake you miss the test, there will be a third test date to which you will be invited.

6a809c82-78fa-4931-a84c-8b8279ee7d9d.question: Am I allowed to have something written before hand on our piece of paper for the exam?
6a809c82-78fa-4931-a84c-8b8279ee7d9d.answer: No, you are not allowed to have information written already. You are only allowed a calculator and a blank piece of paper.

54dbee1b-ef27-4566-94c4-90164c46af4d.question: Why haven't I received the test link for the test on July 16th for the AI in Society program?
54dbee1b-ef27-4566-94c4-90164c46af4d.answer: The application status indicates some documents are not marked as 'OK'. The issue will be addressed with the matriculation office and instructions on what you need to do next will be provided.

04a70ea1-3a6c-4bcd-9fb3-ae23d8ac8427.question: Could I still be invited for the test even though it's very last-minute?
04a70ea1-3a6c-4bcd-9fb3-ae23d8ac8427.answer: Given the short notice and time required to assess the documents, it is not possible to invite you to the test tomorrow. However, a third test date will be arranged, to which you may be invited if all your documents are found to be sufficient.

ea703241-6b9a-471a-bee3-1c2be15c13da.question: Why did I receive an invitation to the aptitude test, even though my documents haven't been checked yet?
ea703241-6b9a-471a-bee3-1c2be15c13da.answer: The delay might be because you were recently waiting for your VPD. If that was the case, it explains why your documents hadn't been checked yet.

6224c834-e8c9-4462-80f7-e0e971c69e61.question: Can I take the aptitude test tomorrow, even though my projects have not reached 18 ECTS?
6224c834-e8c9-4462-80f7-e0e971c69e61.answer: You cannot appear for the test tomorrow: your projects do not reach 18 ECTS. The problem needs to be assessed by our aptitude committee to make a final decision.

3bb3dc77-a144-47d9-aab4-09f50be1782b.question: What should I do if my documents pass, especially now that I have missed the second aptitude test?
3bb3dc77-a144-47d9-aab4-09f50be1782b.answer: I will gladly invite you to our third aptitude test date, provided your documentation passes.

5fba6b3e-23cd-46f1-8030-255181eb1633.question: When is the aptitude test for the TUM Master AI in Society program?
5fba6b3e-23cd-46f1-8030-255181eb1633.answer: The aptitude test will take place on July 16th 2024, from 10:45-12:15 CEST.

1de94ac8-8cae-424b-b338-44d5336e53ea.question: What will the aptitude test for the TUM Master AI in Society program consist of?
1de94ac8-8cae-424b-b338-44d5336e53ea.answer: The test will consist of 35 multiple choice questions spanned over 90 minutes, and will be held over TUM's internal Moodle platform.

f6b6879e-f662-42f7-af6b-98f50dfd8574.question: What materials are allowed during the aptitude test for the TUM Master AI in Society program?
f6b6879e-f662-42f7-af6b-98f50dfd8574.answer: You will be allowed to use a calculator, as well as a piece of paper and pen to help you during the test.

2c95123a-8688-420a-a2a9-3197caac7e94.question: What are the modalities for taking the aptitude test for the TUM Master AI in Society program?
2c95123a-8688-420a-a2a9-3197caac7e94.answer: You will need to choose between an on-campus and an off-campus (online) variant. The off-campus variant will require a fee of $25 for the proctoring software and a working webcam and microphone. The on-campus variant is free, will be supervised by in-person staff, and will take place at Marsstr. 20-22, 80335 Munich, room 605, 6th floor.

ac257bb3-7fb4-4214-8109-64cf5aee58ef.question: What should I do if I cannot bring my laptop for the on-campus variant of the aptitude test?
ac257bb3-7fb4-4214-8109-64cf5aee58ef.answer: If you are not able to bring a laptop for the test, you should inform the test organization team in advance. In this case, they will provide you with a laptop.

19e84648-69e5-4c79-b177-a2fbde98a191.question: Why haven't I received the detailed guidance link regarding the test scheduled for July 16th for the Master’s program in AI in Society?
19e84648-69e5-4c79-b177-a2fbde98a191.answer: Your application was still marked as incomplete in the system, hence you were not initially invited to the test. However, you should receive a link to the test soon for you to participate.

73c08b8d-b1c1-47ce-bac6-c554d4dbade8.question: When can I expect to receive the link for the test for the Master’s program in AI in Society?
73c08b8d-b1c1-47ce-bac6-c554d4dbade8.answer: You should receive the link to the test today.

6a7a5c53-e574-4152-bedc-d0c3fdb1f4db.question: Is the issue regarding the place of birth not being indicated in the passport related to the aptitude assessment in the application?
6a7a5c53-e574-4152-bedc-d0c3fdb1f4db.answer: No, the document indicating place of birth in the passport is not related to the aptitude assessment and can be submitted after the admission is confirmed.

73da6a71-d35b-49a9-9581-d60f1fd15ac6.question: What should someone do if they have not received their formal offer for the AI in Society master's program, despite being told that they have secured an offer?
73da6a71-d35b-49a9-9581-d60f1fd15ac6.answer: The individual should reach out to the relevant contact person to clarify this issue.

016db1da-4ca0-4cf2-8a6e-c9aca509b141.question: Why might someone receive an invitation for an aptitude test after being informed during an interview of their acceptance to the AI in Society master's program?
016db1da-4ca0-4cf2-8a6e-c9aca509b141.answer: It could be an accidental oversight as it happened in this case.

7425c5dc-3dc0-4730-9db9-4aeb7f67ef03.question: What are the conditions for admission into the Master’s program in AI in Society for the winter semester 2024/25 at TUM?
7425c5dc-3dc0-4730-9db9-4aeb7f67ef03.answer: For this program, the admission is conditioned on the successful completion of an aptitude assessment.

167b6e37-60f5-4864-822f-eba92f12f226.question: What are the details of the aptitude test for the Master’s program in AI in Society for the winter semester 2024/25 at TUM?
167b6e37-60f5-4864-822f-eba92f12f226.answer: The test for the winter semester 2024/25 will be primarily held online. It will be conducted in the English language and span 90 minutes. Applicants will be asked to answer multiple-choice questions. During the test, applicants are allowed to use a calculator. If the applicant does not want to take the online test, they have the option to take the test in person at TUM, Munich city center.

fc6f4cc4-641e-4e20-a4f4-b5be331112b0.question: What are the requirements to take the online aptitude test for the Master's program in AI in Society at TUM?
fc6f4cc4-641e-4e20-a4f4-b5be331112b0.answer: To take the online test, you will be monitored via an automated proctoring software. Participation using the proctoring program will demand a fee of 25$.

689d1341-075b-4627-9c68-a50797da6297.question: When will the link to the aptitude test for the AI in Society program at TUM be sent?
689d1341-075b-4627-9c68-a50797da6297.answer: The link to the test will be sent a few days in advance.

f4c7a659-b129-4ea3-bff6-bb6824aad058.question: When can the invitation link for the AI in Society program aptitude test be expected?
f4c7a659-b129-4ea3-bff6-bb6824aad058.answer: The link to the test will be sent a few days in advance of the test date.

ceb60fa2-de40-4a3e-9f1f-ba797c602fd6.question: What is the format of the aptitude test for the AI in Society program?
ceb60fa2-de40-4a3e-9f1f-ba797c602fd6.answer: The test will be conducted in English language and span 90 minutes. It involves answering multiple-choice questions where only one out of multiple responses is correct, covering topics such as Politics, Economics and Law, Statistics and Mathematics, and Engineering. During the test, use of a calculator is allowed.

6083c0e8-7b28-4308-92da-5810296a460c.question: What are the options for taking the aptitude test for the AI in Society program?
6083c0e8-7b28-4308-92da-5810296a460c.answer: The test can be taken online via a proctoring program for a fee of $25, or in person at TUM in Munich city center.

80076a92-b5b7-4312-b7a6-8801948f9eff.question: Why hasn't the invitation link for the AI in Society program aptitude test been received?
80076a92-b5b7-4312-b7a6-8801948f9eff.answer: There seems to be an issue with your submitted documents, which is why you have not received an invitation. Please check the TUM application portal for further information.

c1f133ea-d3f0-482c-adff-caf75344111d.question: What is the date and time of the aptitude test?
c1f133ea-d3f0-482c-adff-caf75344111d.answer: The aptitude test will take place on July 16th, 2024, from 10:45-12:15 CEST.

d35223c0-50e6-4567-b3e7-c70860d28c1c.question: What is the format of the aptitude test?
d35223c0-50e6-4567-b3e7-c70860d28c1c.answer: The test will consist of 35 multiple choice questions and will be taken over a span of 90 minutes. The test will be held over TUM's internal moodle platform and you will be allowed to use a calculator, as well as a piece of paper and pen.

0cc18acf-09b6-4220-a30c-a0172a47d783.question: What are the options for taking the aptitude test?
0cc18acf-09b6-4220-a30c-a0172a47d783.answer: The aptitude test can be taken on-campus or off-campus (online). The off-campus (online) variant will require you to pay a fee of 25$ for the proctoring software. This will require a working webcam and microphone. The on-campus variant will not require any fee, as you will be monitored by staff in person. It will take place in Marsstr. 20-22, 80335 Munich, room 605, 6th floor.

514399c1-c293-4909-9d3b-14a362190e2f.question: What should I do if I am unable to bring a laptop for the on-campus aptitude test?
514399c1-c293-4909-9d3b-14a362190e2f.answer: If you are unable to bring a laptop for the test, you should let the test organizers know in advance. They will provide you with a laptop in this case.

42ed8764-5896-4215-b14b-ee0c2bd157ba.question: Is there a resource for topics?
42ed8764-5896-4215-b14b-ee0c2bd157ba.answer: The topics for the aptitude test can be checked on the program's website: https://www.sot.tum.de/sot/studium/ai-in-society/application/

7bbbd570-29b2-4c47-87a9-74062849fbbc.question: Due to a time difference mix-up, would it be possible for us to reschedule for a different time today?
7bbbd570-29b2-4c47-87a9-74062849fbbc.answer: In that case, we will offer you a second interview date at the end of July. Please await further information regarding timeslots.

f0a3d2ea-d483-45d2-9b76-ba393ef53ffd.question: Have the links for the AI in Society aptitude test been sent out?
f0a3d2ea-d483-45d2-9b76-ba393ef53ffd.answer: No, the links for the AI in Society aptitude test have not been sent out yet. They will be sent before the test.

3b242e40-18c0-4fed-840c-bf68cbda7630.question: How will I receive the login link and fee payment options for the AI in Society aptitude test?
3b242e40-18c0-4fed-840c-bf68cbda7630.answer: You will receive the login link and fee payment options via email in time before the test.

5b356ef7-7c6b-47d3-987e-0957fb10ae52.question: What is the format of the AI in Society aptitude test?
5b356ef7-7c6b-47d3-987e-0957fb10ae52.answer: The AI in Society aptitude test consists of multiple-choice questions covering topics such as Politics, Economics and Law, Statistics and Mathematics, and Engineering. It will be held online primarily, but you may also choose to take it in person. If taking it online, you will be monitored via an automated proctoring software.

1310d1d5-ae8c-4dca-9d24-716ac9842a57.question: If I choose to take the AI in Society aptitude test online, what will be required?
1310d1d5-ae8c-4dca-9d24-716ac9842a57.answer: If you take the AI in Society aptitude test online, you will need to use an automated proctoring software and pay a fee of $25.

ed2edd0d-5851-4635-a910-6fc79f0d49fe.question: What is not allowed during the AI in Society aptitude test?
ed2edd0d-5851-4635-a910-6fc79f0d49fe.answer: The email does not specify what is not allowed during the AI in Society aptitude test.

c7a79dda-f56d-4b3f-8851-b1451c45973f.question: What is the status of my application for M.Sc AI?
c7a79dda-f56d-4b3f-8851-b1451c45973f.answer: Your application documents are still marked as incomplete as your VPD has still not been processed yet. For detailed information, please refer to the comments inserted in your TUM application portal regarding missing/incomplete documents.

56f34563-6563-42a9-af6b-af6af6d207a2.question: Why haven't I received an invitation for the interview and aptitude test?
56f34563-6563-42a9-af6b-af6af6d207a2.answer: Your application is still incomplete with some documents missing, particularly your VPD, so you cannot be invited to the test at this time.

ce54bff5-d5e0-4bf5-933f-aec488d115b3.question: Is my interview for the application scheduled for July 16th 2024?
ce54bff5-d5e0-4bf5-933f-aec488d115b3.answer: An definitive date for your interview can't be confirmed at this time as your VPD is still being processed. However, for applicants where the VPD is still pending, there will be another test date in September.

2485ff6e-56c3-4aa5-bbd7-00852bae4818.question: Why are some applicants not receiving invitations to the aptitude test?
2485ff6e-56c3-4aa5-bbd7-00852bae4818.answer: Due to the large number of applications received, not all applications were checked in time for the initial aptitude test date. These applicants are therefore scheduled for a second test date, provided all their documents suffice.

4c0f849c-a459-424f-9772-a7225c771cc8.question: When will the applicants who haven't received an invitation to the aptitude test be scheduled?
4c0f849c-a459-424f-9772-a7225c771cc8.answer: Applicants who haven't yet received an invitation due to pending document checks will be scheduled for a second test date on July 16th or later in September if their VPD is still being processed.

fc34786a-23a2-48c9-8f4c-4d8b71b64739.question: Can I get information about potential financial assistance options available through TUM or the AIS master program for international students facing financial hardship?
fc34786a-23a2-48c9-8f4c-4d8b71b64739.answer: For these questions, you should refer to TUM’s scholarship office (https://www.tum.de/en/studies/fees-and-financial-aid/scholarships). They should have a good idea of all funding possibilities.

00b00204-f245-4396-ae97-8db007746beb.question: As an international student, is it possible that the semester fees could be mentioned in the acceptance letter?
00b00204-f245-4396-ae97-8db007746beb.answer: For this question, you are referred to the center of fees and scholarships at https://www.tum.de/en/studies/fees. They should be able to assist you with this matter.

cc395627-8a0f-4175-a4ee-e1956dabf1d0.question: How many questions are in the AI in Society aptitude test application process?

14e6f2c4-0f83-4d0b-9119-b9f99d71fc4b.question: What does 'Level 2' refer to in the AI in Society application process?
14e6f2c4-0f83-4d0b-9119-b9f99d71fc4b.answer: The score for level 2 refers to the score you receive in the interview. The interview, however, is an optional step and not everyone will need to go through one.

8d7976d8-c61e-434a-8396-ee6cf651d49c.question: What does the Level 1 score consist of the AI in Society application?
8d7976d8-c61e-434a-8396-ee6cf651d49c.answer: This score is made up of points we calculate based on your grades, as well as the points you receive in the aptitude test.

40ed9c3b-b14d-45ce-a2c9-72e2b2be07c9.question: Could you confirm that I am enrolling as a German national and thus will not be charged for tuition?
40ed9c3b-b14d-45ce-a2c9-72e2b2be07c9.answer: You will not be charged a tuition fee due to your dual citizenship. However, for an official confirmation, you should refer to the center of fees and scholarships.

c8eedb49-d66f-494b-8efd-be24cac242b0.question: Why hasn't the application status on the platform been updated yet?
c8eedb49-d66f-494b-8efd-be24cac242b0.answer: There is a shortage in administration staff leading to a slowdown in the admission process and hence the status on the platform has not been updated yet.

9ee09bdf-876c-421b-8ef1-ff66940d00df.question: What is the score for level 1 of the admission step made up of?
9ee09bdf-876c-421b-8ef1-ff66940d00df.answer: The score for level 1 is made up of points calculated based on your grades, as well as the points you receive in the aptitude test.

2fded583-4068-4002-abdf-e952f1f33e69.question: Why is the score for Level 1 not visible on the platform?
2fded583-4068-4002-abdf-e952f1f33e69.answer: The score for Level 1 isn't visible on the platform because it's a sum of points calculated from your grades and the points you receive in the aptitude test, which hasn't been conducted or graded yet.

b75df1f5-c265-4191-9406-ba44af3fa6dc.question: What are the topics that will be covered in the aptitude test?
b75df1f5-c265-4191-9406-ba44af3fa6dc.answer: The aptitude test will cover topics including Politics, Economics and Law, Statistics and Mathematics, and Engineering.

63994f7c-e0dc-4bc4-bcde-3e60401b1d42.question: Who sets the standards for the monitoring form of entrance exams at TUM?
63994f7c-e0dc-4bc4-bcde-3e60401b1d42.answer: The monitoring form of the test has been aligned according to TUM ProLehre standards.

91a412d4-16b3-4a01-9e0e-5083b1181daf.question: Is the proctoring of entrance exams a standard procedure at TUM?
91a412d4-16b3-4a01-9e0e-5083b1181daf.answer: Regarding the proctoring of entrance exams, this is a standard procedure.

f3a8ac6a-61cf-4a21-9f10-70bf9e79c24b.question: What causes problems with the test dates at TUM?
f3a8ac6a-61cf-4a21-9f10-70bf9e79c24b.answer: Problems with the test date occurred due to capacity shortcuts in the administration.

db7e5308-9037-4e22-a8f9-d81c13a942b9.question: Can the test be taken either online or in person?
db7e5308-9037-4e22-a8f9-d81c13a942b9.answer: Yes, students can take the test either online or in person.

6c3f7607-e118-4b35-a8f2-54a6dfc924b6.question: Are there fees associated with the use of the proctoring program for the online test?
6c3f7607-e118-4b35-a8f2-54a6dfc924b6.answer: Participation using the proctoring program will demand a fee of 25$.

20f86ba0-5cfb-4dd9-976b-e8a6d1a74aea.question: Could you please clarify the expected format and approximate timing for when the Zoom meeting link for my interview will be sent?
20f86ba0-5cfb-4dd9-976b-e8a6d1a74aea.answer: Your interview is taking place on July 10th, 09:30 – 10:00. You will receive a link at some point during the day today.

fed98918-e018-4f63-8609-c47890c97f2a.question: When scheduling the interview, to avoid any errors, could you please confirm whether I should follow the Asia/Shanghai time zone mentioned in the Antwort section when arranging the interview time?
fed98918-e018-4f63-8609-c47890c97f2a.answer: The website automatically converts the times to your timezone. So, what you are seeing is just according to your timezone, not CEST.

8ac4c8ab-f22c-4fee-8eb1-fc6256bb8a2f.question: When is the aptitude test for the Master’s program in AI in Society for the winter semester 2024/25?
8ac4c8ab-f22c-4fee-8eb1-fc6256bb8a2f.answer: The aptitude test for the study program is scheduled for July 16th, from 10:45 to 12:15 CEST.

85f56164-b2de-49c2-ac64-6d66817a67f4.question: What is the format of the aptitude test for the AI in Society program?
85f56164-b2de-49c2-ac64-6d66817a67f4.answer: The test will be conducted in English language and span 90 minutes. It will consist of multiple-choice questions where out of multiple different answers, only one is correct. The topics will cover Politics, Economics and Law, Statistics and Mathematics, and Engineering.

9e57ccb9-f1dd-45d1-83a6-90db96ba602f.question: What is the procedure for candidates who choose to take the AI in society online test?
9e57ccb9-f1dd-45d1-83a6-90db96ba602f.answer: Candidates will be provided with a link to the test a few days in advance. They will be monitored using an automated proctoring software if they choose to write the test online. Participation using the proctoring program will require a fee of 25$. If a candidate doesn't agree to the automated monitoring procedure, the only other option is to take the test in-person.

c4738f9c-c677-4db4-9f0c-d38376528f5e.question: Can a calculator be used during the aptitude test for the AI in Society program?
c4738f9c-c677-4db4-9f0c-d38376528f5e.answer: Yes, during the test, candidates are allowed to use a calculator.

88bc4404-abe8-4cf1-ad5b-14cadfafb28b.question: Where can more information be found about the application process of the AI in Society program at TUM?
88bc4404-abe8-4cf1-ad5b-14cadfafb28b.answer: For further information, refer to the website: https://www.sot.tum.de/sot/studium/ai-in-society/application/

ac54691b-50e4-4f50-9fa9-be2fee49d479.question: If starting in the summer semester is not possible, can the admission offer be deferred to the Winter term of 2024/2025?
ac54691b-50e4-4f50-9fa9-be2fee49d479.answer: Offer deferral can be done, but the specific steps required for deferral are not mentioned in the email.

32d3788c-265b-4857-97f8-4a30fa9fd4e3.question: What happens if you didn't receive an invitation for the aptitude test on June 26th for the M.Sc. AI in Society at TUM?
32d3788c-265b-4857-97f8-4a30fa9fd4e3.answer: If you didn't receive an invitation for the aptitude test on June 26th, there will be a second date for the test on July 16th. The remaining applicants will be checked and then invited to the second test, if all their documents suffice.

019305a2-7e6c-408d-9080-b25e6aa010ca.question: What should applicants of the M.Sc. AI in Society at TUM who haven't heard back from the university do?
019305a2-7e6c-408d-9080-b25e6aa010ca.answer: Applicants who have not yet heard back from the university and were not declined either should await further feedback regarding their application in the coming weeks. They do not need to worry about the exam that is being held on June 26th.

de125403-7c47-48f4-8706-aa64c8b4602b.question: What happens if the system status of the application review is still in progress but you have received confirmation that the documents have been checked?
de125403-7c47-48f4-8706-aa64c8b4602b.answer: If the system status is showing as in progress, but you have confirmation that the documents have been checked, you will be invited to take the test. The system status has just not been updated yet.

3b338b10-7e2b-4d2f-bbe8-293649764a70.question: What time slot was chosen for the interview? Was it 12.00-12.30 am or 9-9.30 am CEST?
3b338b10-7e2b-4d2f-bbe8-293649764a70.answer: The time slot chosen for the interview is 09:00 – 09:30 CEST.

71507a26-7c71-4486-8681-3e2238891b9f.question: Does the website adjust the interview times to the user’s timezone?
71507a26-7c71-4486-8681-3e2238891b9f.answer: Yes, the website seems to adjust the interview times according to the user's timezone.

5ba99d82-7efa-446c-b65a-6b8bf6f00372.question: By when does the applicant test invitations need to be sent out for the second group?
5ba99d82-7efa-446c-b65a-6b8bf6f00372.answer: The test invitations for the second group need to be sent out by 9th of July.

9f3f56f5-4e7f-47a5-82e9-07aca1ef1e85.question: How many total test invitations will be sent out for the second group?
9f3f56f5-4e7f-47a5-82e9-07aca1ef1e85.answer: Total of 71 test invitations will be sent out for the second group.

d3bd3744-5d86-42f9-ae81-07f521718572.question: How many people have been examined in the second group?
d3bd3744-5d86-42f9-ae81-07f521718572.answer: 64 people have been examined in the second group.

e19314d5-2784-48d0-af78-04a32b500115.question: How many people from the second group are recommended for rejection?
e19314d5-2784-48d0-af78-04a32b500115.answer: 13 people from the second group are recommended for rejection due to various reasons such as lack of technical aspect, lack of interdisciplinarity, or irrelevant projects.

839b94a4-db94-41f3-a4d8-00a22fc0c014.question: When is the test for the second group scheduled?
839b94a4-db94-41f3-a4d8-00a22fc0c014.answer: The test for the second group is scheduled for 16th of July.

1bf35bfa-41b3-4847-8b1f-df84d9618775.question: When is the deadline to accept the admission offer and enroll in AI in Society master program at TUM?
1bf35bfa-41b3-4847-8b1f-df84d9618775.answer: You can accept the study place until September 30th.

61fb2a37-31bb-40c7-bd7c-38e2636b3b3c.question: Where are the AI in Society lectures taking place?
61fb2a37-31bb-40c7-bd7c-38e2636b3b3c.answer: The lectures are planned to be organized in the city center. This means, either Richard-Wagner-Str. 1, Marsstr. 20-22, or Arcisstr. 21. Some courses from other departments (like computer science) might be offered in Garching. However, the majority will take place in the city center.

609ab68d-9c93-49e3-9e05-be5bcaffc7a0.question: What is the intake rate for 'AI in Society' for the academic year 2024/25?
609ab68d-9c93-49e3-9e05-be5bcaffc7a0.answer: The amount of students who will start their studies with AI in Society is relatively hard to tell at the moment, as the selection progress is still ongoing.

5915168a-ceb2-430a-9088-2fb451e0104f.question: What is the procedure if an applicant does not receive a response in time for the aptitude test date for the TUM Master AI in Society program?
5915168a-ceb2-430a-9088-2fb451e0104f.answer: If the applicant was not declined either, they should await further communication regarding their application in the coming weeks. The admissions team will finish checking the remaining applicants and invite them to a second test, if their documents suffice.

b11ae22f-6c04-453f-8aca-10c9ebd76c67.question: What happens if I pass the formal requirements for the TUM Master AI in Society program?
b11ae22f-6c04-453f-8aca-10c9ebd76c67.answer: If you pass the formal requirements, you will receive an invitation email to the aptitude test in advance to the test.

c0bf668f-0e7c-45be-a9c2-861d43114fe4.question: What is the status of my application for the TUM Master AI in Society program?
c0bf668f-0e7c-45be-a9c2-861d43114fe4.answer: Your application is being reviewed in the coming days. Once the review is completed, and if you pass the formal requirements, you will receive an invitation to the aptitude test.

c028f63a-ff62-4d03-b117-ee275f1469a5.question: Can late submissions of application documents be accepted for the AI in Society Programme?
c028f63a-ff62-4d03-b117-ee275f1469a5.answer: No, late submissions for application documents are not accepted.

8bdf9de8-2f0c-43a1-8f05-bba0af938e61.question: Can application documents for the AI in Society programme be sent over email?
8bdf9de8-2f0c-43a1-8f05-bba0af938e61.answer: No, documents cannot be sent over email. They must be uploaded to the application portal in due time.

7d3ea6fe-ab79-4319-8e9e-b65fa8c852a5.question: What happens if an application document is not submitted on time?
7d3ea6fe-ab79-4319-8e9e-b65fa8c852a5.answer: The application will not be considered. However, you can apply again for the next year.

c9b089fc-9b5e-46ea-b1c2-f2d1611d4009.question: Can documents be sent via email for the M.Sc. AI in Society application at TUM?
c9b089fc-9b5e-46ea-b1c2-f2d1611d4009.answer: Documents for the application cannot be accepted via email, they needed to be uploaded in time to the application portal.

85cf284b-95ef-4262-8463-012b86bd2b0d.question: What happens if an applicant did not hear back from TUM for the AI in Society program before the first test date?
85cf284b-95ef-4262-8463-012b86bd2b0d.answer: An applicant who did not receive feedback nor was declined, can expect further feedback in the upcoming weeks. If the documents suffice, they will be invited to the second test.

95e01ac5-08fc-48a4-8756-9266f63c3b28.question: When is the second aptitude test date for the M.Sc. AI in Society program at TUM?
95e01ac5-08fc-48a4-8756-9266f63c3b28.answer: The second aptitude test date is on July 16th, from 10:45 - 12:15 CEST.

87612146-d8ec-4d35-ab7f-bc439dc99d74.question: What if I received an invitation for the first test date of the AI in Society program at TUM?
87612146-d8ec-4d35-ab7f-bc439dc99d74.answer: If you received an invitation for the first test date, the test is still being held as scheduled, you can ignore the email regarding the second test date.

8cb3f392-217f-4ff3-87ea-97020dfcceba.question: Is my slot for the meeting at 1800 today visible?
8cb3f392-217f-4ff3-87ea-97020dfcceba.answer: Yes, now it is visible, thank you.

841998aa-f5b6-4307-807d-7d7b443c3245.question: I have a slot for 1200 today but have not received a link to participate yet. What should I do?
841998aa-f5b6-4307-807d-7d7b443c3245.answer: You are not registered for any slot. Someone else is currently scheduled for 12:00. You may have indicated your time but did not hit the 'save' button. Please use the following link to reserve one of the remaining available slots: https://app.kulibri.com/pr/GY6mLGdlpEg0/1BWn1BWnmarZw9zE

1efe0852-fb87-4315-9fbb-298815e3bb79.question: I have a slot for 1200 today but have not received a link to participate. What should I do?
1efe0852-fb87-4315-9fbb-298815e3bb79.answer: It appears you are not registered for any slot. There is another person scheduled for 12:00. You might have entered your information without clicking save, which is a red button. Use the provided link to choose from the remaining available slots: https://app.kulibri.com/pr/GY6mLGdlpEg0/1BWn1BWnmarZw9zE

5c1f0250-189d-4604-9c59-b7f4f3ec6131.question: What is the second stage of the aptitude assessment for the M.Sc. AI in Society at TUM?
5c1f0250-189d-4604-9c59-b7f4f3ec6131.answer: The second stage of the aptitude assessment for the M.Sc. AI in Society at TUM is an interview conducted by two members of the selection committee. During the aptitude interview, they will discuss the candidate's motivation for choosing this degree program, willingness to engage in interdisciplinary learning and work, professional interests, any previous specializations, and professional background to assess how well these align with the goals of the program and the candidate's career aspirations.

5c5d0a6a-ae43-42ed-849e-4c9ac0748e24.question: What is the main focus of the M.Sc. AI in Society aptitude interview at TUM?
5c5d0a6a-ae43-42ed-849e-4c9ac0748e24.answer: The focus of the aptitude interview for the M.Sc. AI in Society program at TUM is to understand the candidate's motivation for the study program, not to test the candidate's knowledge on specific subjects.

a2db3f12-e84f-4712-92a9-ea893e4ac740.question: When will the M.Sc. AI in Society aptitude interviews at TUM take place?
a2db3f12-e84f-4712-92a9-ea893e4ac740.answer: The M.Sc. AI in Society aptitude interviews at TUM will take place from July 3rd to July 10th.

f64cac9b-024a-4659-9c70-abbb717c9241.question: How are the timeslots for the M.Sc. AI in Society aptitude interview at TUM selected?
f64cac9b-024a-4659-9c70-abbb717c9241.answer: Candidates for the M.Sc. AI in Society aptitude interview at TUM can select a timeslot that works best for them via a provided link. Candidates must enter their email address and full name. They should try not to select multiple timeslots as they are limited. Timeslots are selected on a “first come, first serve” basis. If a candidate needs to change their slot, they can do so themselves but should inform the TUM team.

cb1d7d06-ff5f-4deb-bd69-132fd6caf1b7.question: How will the M.Sc. AI in Society aptitude interview at TUM be conducted?
cb1d7d06-ff5f-4deb-bd69-132fd6caf1b7.answer: The M.Sc. AI in Society aptitude interview at TUM will be conducted online over Zoom.

1c6caf48-97ce-4765-b88c-ce6e341c279e.question: Do I have any date to expect the result of the acceptance to the Master AI in Society?
1c6caf48-97ce-4765-b88c-ce6e341c279e.answer: The result of the acceptance to the Master AI in Society will not be known before July 15th due to the aptitude test taking place on July 16th.

2f987714-0048-4d70-b23e-298cb58018d1.question: Is it possible to get an answer for the acceptance to the Master AI in Society program at TUM before the 15th of July?
2f987714-0048-4d70-b23e-298cb58018d1.answer: It is not possible to get an answer for the acceptance before the 15th of July as you will still need to take the aptitude test on July 16th.

647d2427-2963-4cec-a59a-ead7c78101e1.question: Is the interview scheduling time for the AI in Society program based on CEST or my own timezone?
647d2427-2963-4cec-a59a-ead7c78101e1.answer: The interview scheduling time is automatically converted to your own timezone.

5f24cc81-08e5-4625-8b40-41973424108f.question: What is the format of the second stage of the aptitude assessment for the M.Sc. AI in Society at TUM?
5f24cc81-08e5-4625-8b40-41973424108f.answer: The second stage of the aptitude assessment is an interview conducted online over Zoom. Two members of the selection committee will discuss your motivation for choosing this degree program, your willingness for interdisciplinary learning and work, your professional interests, any previous specializations and your professional background to assess how well they align with the goals of the program and your career aspirations.

86dd9a78-cc25-4a2e-91d8-7b69b2b1c4e6.question: How can I choose a timeslot for the second interview for the AI in Society program?
86dd9a78-cc25-4a2e-91d8-7b69b2b1c4e6.answer: You can select a timeslot by using the provided link. You will need to enter your email address and full name, and then choose one timeslot that suits you best. The timeslots are distributed on a 'first come, first serve' basis. After selecting, you need to submit your answer.

f59fe098-aebe-4e76-bf7a-f6f5d13b54bf.question: Can I change my selection of the interview timeslot after I have made the choice?
f59fe098-aebe-4e76-bf7a-f6f5d13b54bf.answer: Yes, you can change your selection of the interview timeslot later on your own. However, you should notify the committee if you had to make a change, especially if it was made last minute.

a7ca4eed-df1c-49e0-b3c1-67d881729fe3.question: Will I receive a confirmation email after selecting the interview timeslot for the AI in Society program at TUM?
a7ca4eed-df1c-49e0-b3c1-67d881729fe3.answer: No, you will not receive a confirmation email after selecting the timeslot. As soon as you have selected a time slot, you can consider it as confirmed. However, you will receive your personal Zoom link at least 12 hours in advance to your interview.

7a5e4329-efe6-4707-b382-c10a217879b4.question: Is it theoretically possible to reverse a rejection in the system?
7a5e4329-efe6-4707-b382-c10a217879b4.answer: Yes, it is possible. You would need to either send us an email or call us as soon as possible. Within one hour of posting the rejection, we can withdraw it without an email being sent to the applicant. If the rejection is somewhat longer, it is also no problem.

bf2f2f1d-333c-4d76-b563-7a99dca05ee6.question: Why does the interview time need to be rescheduled?
bf2f2f1d-333c-4d76-b563-7a99dca05ee6.answer: The interview time needs to be rescheduled because one of the interviewers has a time conflict and won’t be able to make it.

72421c48-9b70-4614-b6e1-863756596320.question: What should be done if there are problems in choosing a different interview timeslot?
72421c48-9b70-4614-b6e1-863756596320.answer: If there are any problems in choosing a different interview timeslot, you should inform the sender of the email.

4f5abc35-2453-4e43-9bdf-372d89e44692.question: What time zone are the meetings?
4f5abc35-2453-4e43-9bdf-372d89e44692.answer: The meetings are in the CEST timezone.

0227e22c-47de-492f-81cf-db1e61efa3b8.question: When choosing slots, it says Asia/ Karachi, does this mean that the timings have been converted to our timezones or it's just additional information?
0227e22c-47de-492f-81cf-db1e61efa3b8.answer: The time you selected is in the CEST timezone for your interview.

7dc949c4-a7a7-493f-bf70-859f9c6e906f.question: How to select a timeslot for the interview?
7dc949c4-a7a7-493f-bf70-859f9c6e906f.answer: You will need to go to the provided link, enter your email address as well as your full name. Choose one timeslot that works best for you. Each timeslot can only be selected by one person, therefore the distribution of slots works by the principle “first come, first serve”. After selecting, submit your answer.

10d6e5c5-a876-437a-894a-2cab97bbbbe5.question: Can the selected timeslot be changed later?
10d6e5c5-a876-437a-894a-2cab97bbbbe5.answer: You will be able to change your selection yourself, but you should let the interviewer know in case you had to change your slot, especially last minute.

0284cbf1-7209-44d3-9ddd-779b5fccadff.question: Will there be an email confirming the selected timeslot for the interview?
0284cbf1-7209-44d3-9ddd-779b5fccadff.answer: As soon as you have selected a time slot, you can think of it as confirmed – there will be no additional email confirming your timeslot. You will receive your personal Zoom link at least 12 hours in advance to your interview.

638f50e1-6689-4cfe-a0b2-05d7c2a1d02a.question: What is the next step in the application process for the M.Sc. AI in Society at TUM after the initial aptitude test?
638f50e1-6689-4cfe-a0b2-05d7c2a1d02a.answer: The next step in the application process is an interview with two members of the selection committee.

e573f27f-3985-4f2f-8f8b-d8a4a989744b.question: What topics will be covered during the interview for the M.Sc. AI in Society at TUM?
e573f27f-3985-4f2f-8f8b-d8a4a989744b.answer: During the interview, your motivation for choosing this degree program, your willingness to engage in interdisciplinary learning and work, your professional interests, any previous specializations, and your professional background will be discussed to assess how well these align with the goals of the program and your career aspirations.

a156ead3-cdf7-43e7-aef3-f61ee3c51162.question: How can an applicant choose their interview timeslot for the M.Sc. AI in Society at TUM?
a156ead3-cdf7-43e7-aef3-f61ee3c51162.answer: Applicants can choose their interview timeslot by clicking on the provided link, entering their email address and full name, and selecting one timeslot that works best for them.

d91e7c6a-35c5-4abb-9d57-72bf9e59583f.question: What should an applicant do if they need to change their chosen interview timeslot for the M.Sc. AI in Society at TUM?
d91e7c6a-35c5-4abb-9d57-72bf9e59583f.answer: Applicants can change their timeslot themselves if necessary, but should let the program administration know, especially if the change is made last minute.

7fbbb720-90c1-4a74-831a-bfc7e0ed1164.question: Will there be a separate confirmation email after an interview timeslot is chosen for the M.Sc. AI in Society at TUM?
7fbbb720-90c1-4a74-831a-bfc7e0ed1164.answer: There will be no additional email confirming your timeslot after it is selected. The Zoom link for the scheduled interview will be sent at least 12 hours in advance.

af2d5443-2fa3-4784-94c5-1b1e29d7c776.question: What is the aim of the aptitude interview for the M.Sc. AI in Society program at TUM?
af2d5443-2fa3-4784-94c5-1b1e29d7c776.answer: During the aptitude interview, two members of the selection committee will discuss your motivation for choosing the AI in Society degree program. They will also explore your willingness to engage in interdisciplinary learning and work, your professional interests, any previous specializations, and your professional background to assess how well these align with the goals of the program and your career aspirations.

fd90b0f4-b39d-4e34-889e-a042608be336.question: What will be the main focus during the aptitude interview?
fd90b0f4-b39d-4e34-889e-a042608be336.answer: The main focus will be on understanding your motivation for the study program, not testing your knowledge on specific subjects.

fc8dcd78-478e-4925-a16a-a0efc6339287.question: When and where will the aptitude interviews take place?
fc8dcd78-478e-4925-a16a-a0efc6339287.answer: The interviews will take place from July 3rd to July 10th and will be conducted online over Zoom.

f7f4ddb7-cef0-4075-9364-9bddcf407b2a.question: How can a timeslot for the aptitude interview be selected?
f7f4ddb7-cef0-4075-9364-9bddcf407b2a.answer: To select a timeslot, applicants need to enter their email address and full name on the provided link. They should choose one timeslot that works best for them. Each timeslot can only be selected by one person, and distribution of slots works by the principle “first come, first serve”. After selection, the answer needs to be submitted. If changes are needed later on, it's possible to do it individually but the committee needs to be informed.

fa59ffde-9d29-4584-8658-29180a8a19b8.question: Will there be an additional email confirming my selected timeslot?
fa59ffde-9d29-4584-8658-29180a8a19b8.answer: There will be no additional email confirming your selected timeslot. You will receive your personal Zoom link at least 12 hours in advance of your interview.

e9f2c777-e78f-4f5f-995e-d1700a4a5c04.question: What is the second stage in the aptitude assessment for the M.Sc. AI in Society at TUM?
e9f2c777-e78f-4f5f-995e-d1700a4a5c04.answer: The second stage of the aptitude assessment is an interview. During this interview, two members of the selection committee will discuss the participant's motivation for choosing this degree program. They will also explore the participant's willingness to engage in interdisciplinary learning and work, professional interests, any previous specializations, and professional background to assess how well these align with the goals of the program and career aspirations.

61c42005-469b-4cfc-81bd-8669e776b45a.question: What is the primary focus of the aptitude interview for the M.Sc. AI in Society at TUM?
61c42005-469b-4cfc-81bd-8669e776b45a.answer: The primary focus of the aptitude interview is understanding the applicant's motivation for the study program, not testing their knowledge on specific subjects.

2055b02e-411e-415a-a56e-67ca5ba74d0f.question: What are the logistics of the aptitude interview for the M.Sc. AI in Society at TUM?
2055b02e-411e-415a-a56e-67ca5ba74d0f.answer: The interviews will take place from July 3rd to July 10th and will be conducted online over Zoom. For the interview, applicants need to select a timeslot by entering their email address and full name and choosing the time that works best for them. These slots are distributed based on the principle “first come, first served”. No additional email confirming their timeslot will be sent. The personal Zoom link will be provided at least 12 hours in advance before the interview.

a0672111-645c-41b1-87d7-71dd886f8788.question: What should applicants do if they want to change their selected interview timeslot for the M.Sc. AI in Society at TUM?
a0672111-645c-41b1-87d7-71dd886f8788.answer: If applicants wish to change their selection, they can do so themselves. However, they should let the interviewers know, especially if the change is made last minute.

083ce2a7-c66e-4aef-9684-20a53d4da082.question: Who should applicants contact if they have any questions about the procedure for the M.Sc. AI in Society at TUM interview process?
083ce2a7-c66e-4aef-9684-20a53d4da082.answer: If applicants have any questions about the procedure, they should reach out to [REDACTED]@sot.tum.de.

beb4b16d-0087-4ee5-93b1-d3a2b82758fa.question: How is an applicant assessed during the aptitude interview for the M.Sc. AI in Society at TUM?
beb4b16d-0087-4ee5-93b1-d3a2b82758fa.answer: During the aptitude interview, two members of the selection committee will discuss the applicant's motivation for choosing this degree program. They will also explore the applicant's willingness to engage in interdisciplinary learning and work, their professional interests, previous specializations, and professional background to assess how well these align with the goals of the program and their career aspirations. The focus is on understanding the applicant's motivation for the study program, not testing their knowledge on specific subjects.

05d3dfd0-e188-45c6-b803-f9567d4de547.question: When and where will the aptitude interviews take place for the M.Sc. AI in Society at TUM?
05d3dfd0-e188-45c6-b803-f9567d4de547.answer: The interviews will take place from July 3rd to July 10th and will be conducted online over Zoom.

75ae580c-e065-46f5-b321-08d907541376.question: How should applicants select an interview timeslot for the aptitude test?
75ae580c-e065-46f5-b321-08d907541376.answer: Applicants should enter the provided link, enter their email address and full name, and then choose one timeslot that works best for them. They are advised to refrain from selecting multiple timeslots, as they are limited. Each timeslot can only be selected by one person, thus the distribution of slots works by the principle 'first come, first serve'. After selection, the timeslot is considered as confirmed.

1f1247e5-c643-4416-b3a5-880001f476cb.question: What should applicants do if they need to change their selected interview timeslot?
1f1247e5-c643-4416-b3a5-880001f476cb.answer: If applicants want to change their selection later, they can do so themselves. However, they should let the organization know if they had to change their slot, especially if it's a last minute change.

1fb8b477-0ee0-4d33-b3db-2db7d9d976c3.question: How will applicants receive the Zoom link for the aptitude interview?
1fb8b477-0ee0-4d33-b3db-2db7d9d976c3.answer: Applicants will receive their personal Zoom link at least 12 hours in advance to their interview.

8ddf23c3-ed56-41fa-a743-ee68f857e9ae.question: How many questions will there be in the exam?
8ddf23c3-ed56-41fa-a743-ee68f857e9ae.answer: There will be 35 questions in the exam.

1a4c8f0b-95a8-40a4-880e-41eea80d137f.question: Will students be allowed to have a sheet of paper and a pen during the exam?
1a4c8f0b-95a8-40a4-880e-41eea80d137f.answer: Yes, students will be allowed to use a paper and pen during the exam.

27c9f14e-d6b7-4670-b9ed-f97f9e7c78c5.question: What should I do if I have difficulties processing my aptitude test fee for the AI in Society program at TUM?
27c9f14e-d6b7-4670-b9ed-f97f9e7c78c5.answer: For completing the payment, you need to go through the off campus DEMO exam. In there, you will find instructions on downloading proctorio and payment.

352c5ce7-2343-44d2-b435-fcc3eb8a6e74.question: What happens if I can't process the payment for the aptitude test?
352c5ce7-2343-44d2-b435-fcc3eb8a6e74.answer: You will be moved to the second exam date on July 16th and will receive an additional invitation email.

e469bcf5-503a-4747-b6ab-079125750f87.question: What if I haven't received an invitation to the aptitude test?
e469bcf5-503a-4747-b6ab-079125750f87.answer: If you haven't heard back regarding your application or been declined, there will be a second test date on July 16th. TUM will finish checking the remaining applicants and invite those eligible to the second test.

98055dd0-09fa-460d-bd12-3b5325e98e24.question: What will happen if an applicant cannot attend the aptitude test for the M.Sc. AI in Society program at TUM due to health issues?
98055dd0-09fa-460d-bd12-3b5325e98e24.answer: The applicant will be moved to the second test date.

69fb9f81-aa00-42af-94e8-545dbd4b74c3.question: When is the second test date for the aptitude test for the M.Sc. AI in Society program at TUM?
69fb9f81-aa00-42af-94e8-545dbd4b74c3.answer: The second test date is on July 16th.

1ae6ad9c-69bd-44c6-94be-b4c9888e4aba.question: What are the plans for applicants who have not yet received an invitation to the aptitude test for the M.Sc. AI in Society program at TUM?
1ae6ad9c-69bd-44c6-94be-b4c9888e4aba.answer: There will be a second test date on July 16th. The remaining applicants will receive feedback and invitations to the second test if their documents suffice.

52fc0188-7f19-49a2-9f02-29520ec604af.question: What is the cause of the confusion and delays about the invitations to the aptitude test?
52fc0188-7f19-49a2-9f02-29520ec604af.answer: The delays and confusion are due to the large number of applications received, which could not all be checked in time for the initial test date.

ddfc53bf-de89-4d9c-a2fc-13c413240527.question: What should I do if I am having difficulty processing my aptitude test fee for the M.Sc. AI in Society at TUM?
ddfc53bf-de89-4d9c-a2fc-13c413240527.answer: You need to go through the off campus DEMO exam. In there, you will find instructions on downloading proctorio and payment.

1c9db4e2-13cd-4d1a-927d-adcd9b6b3925.question: What is the plan for applicants of the M.Sc. AI in Society program at TUM who have not yet received an invitation to the aptitude test?
1c9db4e2-13cd-4d1a-927d-adcd9b6b3925.answer: There will be a second test date on July 16th. If you haven't received feedback yet, await further communication in the coming weeks. If all your documents suffice, you will be invited to the second test.

e65a4b98-d7d8-4b05-a603-8fa7b6a789e4.question: What should applicants who have already received an invitation to the M.Sc. AI in Society aptitude test at TUM do?
e65a4b98-d7d8-4b05-a603-8fa7b6a789e4.answer: If you already received an invitation to the test, you should ignore the email about the second test date. For you, the test is still being held on the original date.

d40a49c6-cc45-4570-8c5a-d7c652352e67.question: Can an applicant take the aptitude test on the second test date due to certain circumstances?
d40a49c6-cc45-4570-8c5a-d7c652352e67.answer: Yes, in certain cases, an applicant could be moved to the second test date, and will receive an invitation email again for the same.

6625bc9a-7a17-401b-9b1e-b67614f886c4.question: Can you tell me how many questions will there be in the exam?

3e3bea75-75da-4fca-905a-a91278ca02ef.question: What should be done if the exam option is not available on the moodle page?
3e3bea75-75da-4fca-905a-a91278ca02ef.answer: You need to log in with the login sent to you by moodle for this test. If you can’t find the credentials, the administrator can send them to you again.

bd2fd292-e9f0-438b-bd17-d95edc511a08.question: How do I know if I have been enrolled in the moodle exam?
bd2fd292-e9f0-438b-bd17-d95edc511a08.answer: The administrator can check the enrolment status.

d02cd975-3d10-4d1a-b2f1-8fea3c849cda.question: What should I do if I still can't access the exam on my moodle page even after being confirmed as enrolled?
d02cd975-3d10-4d1a-b2f1-8fea3c849cda.answer: Try logging in using different sign-in options provided on the moodle page.

13d64d06-76ad-4209-a790-0768e8cd768b.question: Who should be contacted in the event of persistent problems accessing the moodle exam?
13d64d06-76ad-4209-a790-0768e8cd768b.answer: In case of persistent issues, it's advisable to contact the course administrator or coordinator for further instructions.

488aa8a3-e571-43b0-955d-36f31f99279e.question: What should the applicants do who have not yet received an invitation for the aptitude test for the AI in Society program?
488aa8a3-e571-43b0-955d-36f31f99279e.answer: Applicants who have not yet heard back about their applications and were not declined either, should wait for further feedback regarding their application in the coming weeks. There will be a second test date on July 16th, from 10:45 - 12:15 CEST for these applicants, once all documents are checked and found sufficient.

e276fa9f-2ed8-4ec1-aa7a-fbdab49b1382.question: What is happening for the applicants who have already received an invitation to the aptitude test for the AI in Society program?
e276fa9f-2ed8-4ec1-aa7a-fbdab49b1382.answer: For the applicants who already received an invitation, the test is still being held on the scheduled date.

6eae8725-3a85-4567-94e6-d6cdb99c77f8.question: Is the aptitude test for the M.Sc. AI in Society program at TUM still being held on June 26th originally? If not, what is the new date?
6eae8725-3a85-4567-94e6-d6cdb99c77f8.answer: The initial aptitude test is still scheduled for June 26th. However, due to a large volume of applications, there will be a second test date on July 16th, from 10:45 - 12:15 CEST.

f9a35883-b450-4849-9731-6605a9c3a56f.question: What happens if an applicant has not received an invitation to the aptitude test?
f9a35883-b450-4849-9731-6605a9c3a56f.answer: Applicants who have not received an invitation to the aptitude test, or a decline from the admissions office, should expect further feedback on their applications in the coming weeks. They will be invited to the second test on July 16th, if all their documents suffice.

c48eb924-1855-44f3-b0b8-e82a8bd88140.question: Can the test date be rescheduled for an applicant who has logistical issues?
c48eb924-1855-44f3-b0b8-e82a8bd88140.answer: Yes. If an applicant has logistical issues they can request to be considered for the rescheduled test date. In this particular case, the email respondent confirmed the rescheduling to July 16th for an applicant.
