811bb66b-c263-4862-ac73-e2803bb107f5.question: Is it possible to reschedule the aptitude test for the AI in Society Master’s program at TUM?
811bb66b-c263-4862-ac73-e2803bb107f5.answer: It is possible to reschedule the aptitude test. The next slot is on 16th July.

9e0be9c7-3253-44e6-b1f3-10ce662bc4f4.question: When is the aptitude test for the Master’s program in AI in Society for the winter semester 2024/25 scheduled?
9e0be9c7-3253-44e6-b1f3-10ce662bc4f4.answer: The aptitude test for the program is scheduled for June 26th, from 11:00 to 12:30 (GMT+2 or CEST).

c0d21e64-8928-41d9-a06c-e5accc430581.question: What will be the format of the aptitude test for the Master’s program in AI in Society for the winter semester 2024/25?
c0d21e64-8928-41d9-a06c-e5accc430581.answer: The test will be conducted online and will span 90 minutes. It will consist of multiple-choice questions. The topics will span Politics and [REDACTED], Economics and Law, Statistics and Mathematics, Engineering and [REDACTED]. A calculator is allowed during the test.

79e04dea-7fa7-4ba4-90f4-ce0fb72d2ded.question: What measures are taken during the online test for the Master’s program in AI in Society for the winter semester 2024/25 to prevent cheating?
79e04dea-7fa7-4ba4-90f4-ce0fb72d2ded.answer: During the online test, applicants will be monitored via an automated proctoring software. Participation using the proctoring program will demand a fee of 25$.

e865ac63-769c-4975-abbc-c8763170338b.question: What is the procedure if I do not agree to partake in the online test with the automated monitoring procedure for the Master’s program in AI in Society for the winter semester 2024/25?
e865ac63-769c-4975-abbc-c8763170338b.answer: If you don't agree to partake in the test with the automated monitoring procedure, you need to reach out to the contact person by June 21st, 23:59 PM.

66b1b6f6-c853-4dd0-87d8-a944f2706c07.question: Why can't I access the exam option on my moodle page?
66b1b6f6-c853-4dd0-87d8-a944f2706c07.answer: You seem to have been logging in with your normal TUM credentials. You need to log in with the login sent to you by moodle for this test.

2b2dcca3-1f0c-496d-8293-ad0d030ea73e.question: How should I log in to the moodle to access the exam?
2b2dcca3-1f0c-496d-8293-ad0d030ea73e.answer: You should log in with the login sent to you by moodle for this test, your username should be something like: ais24-153.

1f524be0-ca7b-4c6f-807e-bea20d404bc6.question: What if I can't find the moodle credentials?
1f524be0-ca7b-4c6f-807e-bea20d404bc6.answer: If you can’t find the credentials, the support team can send them to you again.

83dc7626-f5a5-43b0-918a-8746f60aec4d.question: How to choose the option for off-site or on-site exam?
83dc7626-f5a5-43b0-918a-8746f60aec4d.answer: Choose the option about off-site or on-site on the moodle exam page.

ac5c6cb3-3dad-49d9-8dc7-e08ec2762127.question: Where to select the exam option?
ac5c6cb3-3dad-49d9-8dc7-e08ec2762127.answer: On the moodle exam page, look for 'Select your exam option here'.

6b4af09e-9e5f-407a-93c7-0fefb4ff2c0d.question: What is the method to select off-site or on-site exam options at TUM?
6b4af09e-9e5f-407a-93c7-0fefb4ff2c0d.answer: The option about off-site or on-site should be selected on the moodle exam page, not via an email. Look for the option 'Select your exam option here'.

cc990342-b6d7-4499-b141-a46d18c9c401.question: What can I do if I cannot access my Moodle account at TUM and still need to select my exam option?
cc990342-b6d7-4499-b141-a46d18c9c401.answer: If you are not able to access your Moodle account at TUM, it is advised to reach out to the moodle@tum support team. If they are not responding, try reaching out to other related contacts at TUM.

c35e8f93-6eff-455e-b5ce-f020bd307317.question: If someone can't access their Moodle account and is in touch with support, can they reset their password?
c35e8f93-6eff-455e-b5ce-f020bd307317.answer: If the user is active again on Moodle before support gets back, there will be no need to reset the password. However, if the user is still unable to access the account, support can reset the password anytime.

edf379be-9f91-4da2-a2e9-309be1b6b874.question: Why did my application to the M.Sc. AI in Society at TUM get rejected even though all my transcripts are from TUM?
edf379be-9f91-4da2-a2e9-309be1b6b874.answer: The application was rejected as the specific form provided by the program for application related fields marked as “not OK” was not filled and uploaded. Instead, transcripts were uploaded.

eae9aa65-4b7d-4119-8539-2dbe62ee1865.question: What caused the confusion regarding the invitation to the aptitude test?
eae9aa65-4b7d-4119-8539-2dbe62ee1865.answer: The confusion was due to the large number of applications received which couldn't be checked in time for the test date. Therefore, some applicants did not receive any feedback.

3b91029f-56a5-4d09-8474-7be73de93713.question: What is the plan for applicants who haven't received any feedback regarding their M.Sc. AI in Society application or the aptitude test invitation?
3b91029f-56a5-4d09-8474-7be73de93713.answer: The plan is to have a second test date on July 16th. The remaining applicants' documents will be checked and if they suffice, these applicants will be invited to the second test.

d6af3f64-78e7-488c-8470-6251b21ea888.question: Will the exams for the M.Sc. AI in Society at TUM be digital or in person?
d6af3f64-78e7-488c-8470-6251b21ea888.answer: There will be both an online and an offline (on campus) version of the test.

0aafeda9-5747-41db-abae-1956d3e9e8ca.question: What is required for the online version of the exam for the M.Sc. AI in Society program at TUM?
0aafeda9-5747-41db-abae-1956d3e9e8ca.answer: The online exam requires the use of an automated proctoring software (Proctorio) to monitor cheating. This software also charges a fee of $25.

3a923353-9895-463a-94bb-19990e251f35.question: What happens to applicants who have not yet heard back from TUM about the M.Sc. AI in Society program?
3a923353-9895-463a-94bb-19990e251f35.answer: There will be a second test date for the applicants who haven't received any feedback yet. The university will finish checking the remaining applications and invite those whose documents suffice to the second test.

8ae08f35-e336-4d6c-b109-edd291536e87.question: When is the second test date for the M.Sc. AI in Society program at TUM?
8ae08f35-e336-4d6c-b109-edd291536e87.answer: The second test date is on July 16th, from 10:45 - 12:15 CEST.

af3dd94c-306d-40f0-a741-31b2dec2fbce.question: Where should I select the option about off-site or on-site for the exam?
af3dd94c-306d-40f0-a741-31b2dec2fbce.answer: You should choose the option about off-site or on-site on the moodle exam page, not via an email. Look for 'Select your exam option here.'

0e51dc1d-1650-43d1-9c6b-b1765f7e1678.question: Where should students select their exam option between off-site or on-site?
0e51dc1d-1650-43d1-9c6b-b1765f7e1678.answer: Students should select their exam option on the Moodle exam page, under 'Select your exam option here'.

0e7ab8d2-f541-4566-8092-5aee6f417984.question: I have selected for the TUM AI in Society - aptitude test tomorrow, the on side selection. Since I am on campus, do I need to bring my own laptop for the test and also need to download Proctorio?
0e7ab8d2-f541-4566-8092-5aee6f417984.answer: The test will be in paper form (with the same questions as online). You do not need to bring a laptop or download/pay for Proctorio.

af499310-43b9-4c5b-b293-e2cb34e96b14.question: What happens to those applicants for the Master's in AI in Society who have not yet received an invitation to the test?
af499310-43b9-4c5b-b293-e2cb34e96b14.answer: They plan to invite these people to a second date for the test after their documents have been checked. No one will be disadvantaged.

c5718a2b-a3e5-4a35-afb0-f1653f7a6639.question: Is the test for the TUM Master AI in Society program conducted online?
c5718a2b-a3e5-4a35-afb0-f1653f7a6639.answer: The test can be conducted online and there is also an in-person version available for those located in Munich.

5ec7584f-4092-4cad-83cd-ab3c34b0d1e3.question: What options are provided for students unable to attend the upcoming aptitude test for the Master's program 'AI in Society'?
5ec7584f-4092-4cad-83cd-ab3c34b0d1e3.answer: The authorities suggest taking the test on their secondary date, which is on 16th July from 10:45 to 12:15.

9d983008-8d99-43dc-afcb-599ee742cd9f.question: What materials are allowed to be used during the aptitude test for the Master's program 'AI in Society'?
9d983008-8d99-43dc-afcb-599ee742cd9f.answer: During the test, students are permitted to use a calculator, a blank piece of paper, and a pen. They are also reminded to bring their ID card.

354e5634-42b4-4fe7-bd75-9798d5f3465d.question: What are the modes of attempting the aptitude test for the Master's program 'AI in Society'?
354e5634-42b4-4fe7-bd75-9798d5f3465d.answer: The test can be attempted either on-site in Munich or off-site online. If the student is present in Munich, they can choose to attend the test at the specified room instead of taking it online.

0ecc8e52-f181-40ab-8b26-38679b3f340a.question: Why it does not show up on my moodle page even after being enrolled in the moodle exam?
0ecc8e52-f181-40ab-8b26-38679b3f340a.answer: The system should work and you should be able to see two login options when you follow the exam link. It's recommended to try the one you have not used up until now.

8a5693df-7f20-4447-a119-5cd727124310.question: What is the link to access the moodle exam?
8a5693df-7f20-4447-a119-5cd727124310.answer: The link to access the moodle exam is https://exam.moodle.tum.de.

ed2d621c-06e1-4611-a79d-fa7b50ff00ad.question: Where should I select my exam option?
ed2d621c-06e1-4611-a79d-fa7b50ff00ad.answer: You should select your exam option on the moodle exam page under 'Select your exam option here', not via an email.

e75a9f1d-3233-436e-a9de-f85a906d8284.question: Why can't I see an option for an exam on my moodle page for the TUM Master AI in Society?
e75a9f1d-3233-436e-a9de-f85a906d8284.answer: You should have been enrolled in the moodle exam. Make sure you are accessing it through the correct link: https://exam.moodle.tum.de

8f2d7445-d74d-4f64-9d20-6506bb35f4e2.question: How do I select the option for off-site or on-site for the TUM Master AI in Society exam?
8f2d7445-d74d-4f64-9d20-6506bb35f4e2.answer: The exam mode can be selected on the moodle exam page, under the section 'Select your exam option here'.

0428c10c-60f0-4d6a-97cd-f3c9af8d0b15.question: Is it possible to request another appointment for the aptitude test due to an exam conflict?
0428c10c-60f0-4d6a-97cd-f3c9af8d0b15.answer: Yes, a second test date can be offered in case of an inability to attend the initial exam.

55894922-2c3c-42c6-9a2d-cf9ec20e9343.question: Will there be a new email for the login data for the new test date?
55894922-2c3c-42c6-9a2d-cf9ec20e9343.answer: Yes, another email will be sent with the necessary information.

5467eb46-65dd-4dc4-8b27-2fae853bf47d.question: What should be done if an invitation is received for the exam date that was initially conflicting?
5467eb46-65dd-4dc4-8b27-2fae853bf47d.answer: Just ignore the invitation to the initial exam date.

ae78aa27-9eea-445c-a13a-47caffaf5271.question: May I be offered the opportunity to join in the aptitude test for the MSc AI in Society program at TUM?
ae78aa27-9eea-445c-a13a-47caffaf5271.answer: Due to the large number of applications and the need to fully check every applicant's documents, you may be considered for a second test date that is being set up on July 16th from 10:45 – 12:15 CEST. If you are admitted to the test, you will receive an invitation to the test in July.

7621b392-a8b1-4057-a594-8dcf1a8656d3.question: Would it be possible for me to change from OFF campus to ON Campus testing?
7621b392-a8b1-4057-a594-8dcf1a8656d3.answer: The user has been informed that their group selection has been removed and they can now select the correct group.

3139d4a1-d3fa-4149-91d0-b85130ccaf10.question: Can I request another appointment for the aptitude test as I have my last exam for my bachelor program on the same day?
3139d4a1-d3fa-4149-91d0-b85130ccaf10.answer: In case you are not able to make it to this exam date, I can offer you to take the exam on the second test date, July 16th, from 10:45 – 12:15 CEST.

494f519c-1070-405b-bcf1-e1d53f981cf4.question: What are the options available for taking the aptitude test for the Master's program 'AI in Society'?
494f519c-1070-405b-bcf1-e1d53f981cf4.answer: You have two options: on-site and off-site. If you are present in Munich and would like to take the exam on-site instead of online, please come to the room specified for the test at the given time. For both options, you will be allowed to use a calculator, a blank piece of paper and a pen and you should not forget to bring your ID card.

70d2b9a8-f6ca-401a-87b1-346e08dabbdc.question: What tips can you give for the aptitude test for the AI in Society master's program?
70d2b9a8-f6ca-401a-87b1-346e08dabbdc.answer: You can get a rough idea about the questions from the demo exam on the Moodle site. There is also a section on the website titled 'Details about the test'.

fab5a812-91f4-423c-b0c9-60d1925bc61e.question: What is the location of the on-site exam for the AI in Society master's program?
fab5a812-91f4-423c-b0c9-60d1925bc61e.answer: The on-site location for the exam can be found on the Moodle site.

e1a8e537-1788-4152-b6bb-099c61db55ca.question: What is the duration and mode of the aptitude test for the Master's program in AI in Society?
e1a8e537-1788-4152-b6bb-099c61db55ca.answer: The test will be conducted online, will be 90 minutes long, and will consist of multiple-choice questions. The test has automated proctoring which requires a fee of $25.

95625bf9-1425-46a7-9e4e-6f6302607f3a.question: What are the topics covered in the aptitude test-for the Master's program in AI in Society?
95625bf9-1425-46a7-9e4e-6f6302607f3a.answer: The test will cover the topics of Politics and [REDACTED], Economics and Law, Statistics and Mathematics, and Engineering and [REDACTED].

d13f7ce2-fd50-4031-bc8e-9a6a65691e71.question: Are candidates allowed to use calculators during the aptitude test for the Master's program in AI in Society?
d13f7ce2-fd50-4031-bc8e-9a6a65691e71.answer: Yes, candidates are allowed to use a calculator during the test.

32164851-a8bf-4a7b-adb2-b94b1b24f7e4.question: If I have completed the on-site demo exam, do I still need to complete the online demo exam for the TUM entrance aptitude test for AI in Society?
32164851-a8bf-4a7b-adb2-b94b1b24f7e4.answer: No, you do not need to do anything else, besides showing up for the exam.

65ce4e54-ed50-4c54-8b83-ca01fb91f6b7.question: Where can I find more specific topics for the TUM entrance aptitude test for AI in Society?
65ce4e54-ed50-4c54-8b83-ca01fb91f6b7.answer: You can find some more specific topics on the website under “details about the test”: https://www.sot.tum.de/sot/studium/ai-in-society/application/

08840f5a-4adc-4040-a30d-f4d3c9306c8f.question: Are there any test questions available for the TUM entrance aptitude test for AI in Society?
08840f5a-4adc-4040-a30d-f4d3c9306c8f.answer: If you received a link for the moodle exam, you will also find a few test questions to get an idea of the final test.

26131243-6d8a-44e5-bb6e-ae16c7105be8.question: Does every applicant for the TUM Master AI in Society need to take the aptitude test?
26131243-6d8a-44e5-bb6e-ae16c7105be8.answer: Yes, to pass the selection procedure, every applicant needs to take the aptitude test.

0ad749f8-d32b-41be-bb78-242bd47d11cd.question: Is it possible to take the aptitude test for the selection procedure in-person?
0ad749f8-d32b-41be-bb78-242bd47d11cd.answer: Yes, one alternative is to take the test in-person at TUM, free of charge.

28c37764-1904-4d2a-b25c-99b633acba28.question: What happens if an applicant is unable to make the payment for the aptitude test for the TUM Master AI in Society?
28c37764-1904-4d2a-b25c-99b633acba28.answer: If an applicant is unable to take the online test due to financial circumstances, the only other alternative is to take the test in-person at TUM, free of charge.

572fa0c5-061b-450d-99aa-9917ca5fc912.question: What happens if a candidate receives an invitation to take the aptitude test but was actually declined by the system for the TUM Master AI in Society?
572fa0c5-061b-450d-99aa-9917ca5fc912.answer: If a candidate was declined by the system, they were not admitted to take the aptitude test, despite any misleading invitation email they may have received.

d61bfeba-5c7a-41c3-b864-f9f397727332.question: Is it possible to take the aptitude test in-person, free of charge, instead of online due to financial constraints?
d61bfeba-5c7a-41c3-b864-f9f397727332.answer: There is an option to take the aptitude test in-person at TUM, free of charge. This requires you to be physically present on the test date.

d5b08e19-47c2-44ea-9008-2fd97ef29059.question: What can happen when there's a mix-up, and an applicant not admitted by the system receives an invitation email to take the aptitude test?
d5b08e19-47c2-44ea-9008-2fd97ef29059.answer: If an applicant was not actually admitted by the system, he/she unfortunately cannot participate in the exam even if an invitation email was erroneously received.

ef03b820-7459-44d8-bef7-89f81a3bdbbf.question: Can I participate in the online aptitude test for the master's program 'AI in Society' using a VPN?
ef03b820-7459-44d8-bef7-89f81a3bdbbf.answer: The Proctorio software required for the online aptitude test is reportedly not working with a VPN.

8c1d3945-e50b-4b62-b025-b52c7bb35560.question: If I have not received an invitation for the test, does it mean that I will not have the test on the first scheduled date?
8c1d3945-e50b-4b62-b025-b52c7bb35560.answer: If you didn’t get an invitation to the test until now, then no. Please await an invitation for the second test date.

91eef90c-2381-4fd8-ba91-a7806673fc59.question: Should I expect the test confirmation at any time today if I have applied to the Master 3 months ago but still didn't get the confirmation for the test?
91eef90c-2381-4fd8-ba91-a7806673fc59.answer: Due to the large number of applications, there are still applicants which we didn’t fully check yet. Your application is unfortunately not fully checked yet. For these cases, we are planning a second test date on which you will be invited, should your documents pass.

a6a68d55-6d75-4a3d-9fa8-90a077e03313.question: I have applied to the Master 3 months ago, but I still didn't get the confirmation for the test tomorrow. Should I expect it at any time today?
a6a68d55-6d75-4a3d-9fa8-90a077e03313.answer: Due to the large number of applications, there are still applicants which we didn’t fully check yet. Your application is unfortunately not fully checked yet (they also weren’t processed first-come-first-serve). For these cases, we are planning a second test date on July 16th, to which you will be invited, should your documents pass.

bfe7f918-2696-4f7b-a139-8889b5da18c6.question: Are there any other allowed materials apart from a calculator during the online aptitude test?
bfe7f918-2696-4f7b-a139-8889b5da18c6.answer: A pen, a blank piece of paper, and a glass of water are also permitted during the online aptitude test.

fb31dd93-e42d-4d61-a168-ccd3407aab6f.question: Where can the information about the location of the on-site aptitude test be found?
fb31dd93-e42d-4d61-a168-ccd3407aab6f.answer: The information about the location of the on-site aptitude test can be found on the moodle exam page.

ebd3581c-3fa1-4a14-a7c3-55d7b8f82dc9.question: Can the aptitude test be taken at the university with human proctoring, without using the proctoring software and without incurring fees?
ebd3581c-3fa1-4a14-a7c3-55d7b8f82dc9.answer: Yes, the aptitude test can be taken at the university with human proctoring, without the need for the proctoring software and without any fees. This option can be chosen on the Moodle exam page.

c5e745eb-53d4-4322-ba43-73ac5146a368.question: Am I able to use any calculator?
c5e745eb-53d4-4322-ba43-73ac5146a368.answer: Yes, you are welcome to use your calculator during the test.

08e7308a-54a0-4965-af1e-8ad427aa008a.question: Can I use a texas instrument TI-Nspire CX CAS calculator during the test?
08e7308a-54a0-4965-af1e-8ad427aa008a.answer: Yes, you are welcome to use your calculator during the test.

7ebe87c8-653c-4be6-b2b9-7ae77ac01a35.question: Could you please provide an update on the status of the resubmission of the proof of successful participation in a practical project relevant to my course of study, including the module description worth at least 18 credits?
7ebe87c8-653c-4be6-b2b9-7ae77ac01a35.answer: We have received your resubmitted documents, but still need to check them.

552bf1fc-02bb-4034-860a-9961d6fdf0e4.question: Could you please confirm when I can expect to receive the aptitude assessment invitation email for the AI in Society program?
552bf1fc-02bb-4034-860a-9961d6fdf0e4.answer: For applicants we did not check until last week, we are offering a second test date option on July 16th from 10:45 – 12:15 (CEST). Should your resubmitted documents be accepted, you will receive an invitation for this test date.

62bc8bae-96c5-402b-b0cc-7e65e6929fb5.question: Does that imply that there are other possible ways to take the aptitude test?
62bc8bae-96c5-402b-b0cc-7e65e6929fb5.answer: Alternatively to the online test, we are offering you to take it in-person. This will require you to be physically present at TUM on the specified date and time. In this case, you will write the same exam on paper and be monitored by people instead of a software. Of course, there is no fee involved in this case.

cf42ac89-351a-46ec-8b4d-d2969cc74ff2.question: What does the online monitoring include?
cf42ac89-351a-46ec-8b4d-d2969cc74ff2.answer: The online monitoring includes the participant being blocked from opening other browser windows during the test, as well as being recorded through your webcam over the duration of the test. After the test, we will evaluate the recordings as to check for possible cheating, after which the videos will be deleted.

85534592-6bb4-479a-aaef-c084e2ea9cea.question: Where will the in-person aptitude test take place?
85534592-6bb4-479a-aaef-c084e2ea9cea.answer: The in-person variant will take place here: Marsstr. 20-22, 80335 München, Room 607 (6th floor).

7ba40891-b1f5-44c0-9d73-1b929c461103.question: What am I allowed to bring to the in-person aptitude test?
7ba40891-b1f5-44c0-9d73-1b929c461103.answer: You are allowed to use a calculator during the exam. Otherwise, please just bring a pen, as well as your ID card.

b07e33aa-c927-4346-9097-779b646f7880.question: Why haven't I received an invitation to the aptitude test on 26.06.24, even though my application hasn't been rejected and is currently under review for professional admission requirements?
b07e33aa-c927-4346-9097-779b646f7880.answer: Your application seems to have been overlooked in the system. You were actually already admitted to the exam, but your status was mistakenly not set to 'ok'.

4f2b86f5-137b-47c8-953a-829d52f64074.question: When can I expect to receive information on whether I can take the aptitude test?
4f2b86f5-137b-47c8-953a-829d52f64074.answer: You were originally scheduled for the exam and can participate in it as planned. Alternatively, due to the short notice, an additional option to participate in a second test on 16.07. from 10:45 – 12:15 is offered.

b1b6c1c9-ba67-4525-98e1-81ffdcc884fe.question: What happens if I prefer to take the aptitude test on the original date of 26.6.?
b1b6c1c9-ba67-4525-98e1-81ffdcc884fe.answer: If you still wish to take the exam on 26.6., that is also acceptable. You just need to notify the coordinator.

f185cfb9-d6d0-4878-9e68-ac2087ea54be.question: Where can I find more specific topics for the TUM entrance aptitude test for AI in Society?
f185cfb9-d6d0-4878-9e68-ac2087ea54be.answer: You can find more specific topics on the website under 'details about the test'. The link to the website is: https://www.sot.tum.de/sot/studium/ai-in-society/application/

362364a2-ee91-400a-9777-3c89125b9f02.question: Is there any way to get an idea of the final TUM entrance aptitude test for AI in Society?
362364a2-ee91-400a-9777-3c89125b9f02.answer: If you received a link for the moodle exam, you will find a few test questions that can give an idea of the final test.

1367f5cc-8919-448a-8443-3623a076a6c2.question: Is a blank paper and a pen allowed for the mathematics part of the moodle test for AI in Society at TUM?
1367f5cc-8919-448a-8443-3623a076a6c2.answer: Yes, you can use a blank piece of paper to do calculations on.

b0dfabd4-742c-43a2-a00f-de2c18b158da.question: Does an invitation to the AI in Society program's aptitude test mean that my other documents have been assessed and approved?
b0dfabd4-742c-43a2-a00f-de2c18b158da.answer: Yes, if you have been invited to take the aptitude test, this means that all your other documents have been assessed as okay by the aptitude commission.

0f03bea8-6b30-4379-b8bb-dad8414997f3.question: What materials are allowed during the aptitude test for the AI in Society program at TUM?
0f03bea8-6b30-4379-b8bb-dad8414997f3.answer: You will be allowed to use a calculator for this test. Other things will not be allowed.

90e15687-7401-4d68-b32f-147183912e7d.question: When will the aptitude test for the AI in Society program at TUM be held?
90e15687-7401-4d68-b32f-147183912e7d.answer: The test will be held from 11:00 – 12:30 German time (GMT+2) on June 26th.

705fc6ab-0e6c-4eac-b2a1-3771d673598d.question: What should I do if the AI Society Project document I submitted was rejected due to the courses not being named accordingly as the transcript?
705fc6ab-0e6c-4eac-b2a1-3771d673598d.answer: If you have a certificate over your participation in a project or competition, this is sufficient as proof. It should be translated to English, however and upload it in the field for practical projects.

d24b6826-569e-464c-af55-887c13ce35e7.question: Why does the student need to use a VPN to access Moodle?
d24b6826-569e-464c-af55-887c13ce35e7.answer: The student needs to use a VPN because they are taking the test from a location that cannot access Moodle without a VPN.

ac3c1e82-d3b8-4dc2-8d57-ef554be620a2.question: When is the second test date for the online assessment?
ac3c1e82-d3b8-4dc2-8d57-ef554be620a2.answer: The second test date is scheduled for the 16th of July from 10:45 - 12:15 AM.

11a65735-b0fe-4c64-ae10-27233381b543.question: If someone is unable to participate in the first online assessment, are there other opportunities to take it?
11a65735-b0fe-4c64-ae10-27233381b543.answer: Yes, there is currently a second test date being planned.

19df87d3-22f5-4c2b-add7-dc64eb5e7771.question: What do you need to do if you can't attend the first test date for the online test but want to attend the second one?
19df87d3-22f5-4c2b-add7-dc64eb5e7771.answer: You should inform the coordinator as soon as possible about the inability to attend the first test and the desire to attend the second one.

081ef0a7-3b2c-42c7-8b91-a79e69b5abd7.question: What should I do if I received an invitation for the online test for the MSc. AI in Society program at TUM, but I do not want to take the test?
081ef0a7-3b2c-42c7-8b91-a79e69b5abd7.answer: If you do not want to take the test and have received an invitation, you can just ignore the invitation.

98caa672-6473-43e4-8f99-42b301d0d642.question: What is the format of the online aptitude test for the MSc. AI in Society program?
98caa672-6473-43e4-8f99-42b301d0d642.answer: The aptitude test for the MSc. AI in Society program is held online.  It lasts 90 minutes, during which you'll answer multiple-choice questions out of multiple different answers, only one is correct. Topics covered include Politics, Economics and Law, Statistics and Mathematics, and Engineering.

0f469a53-693b-4d42-884d-249770e0397e.question: What requirements are there for taking the online test for admission in MSc. AI in Society?
0f469a53-693b-4d42-884d-249770e0397e.answer: During the online test, you will be monitored via an automated proctoring software, which will require a fee of 25$. The test will be conducted in English, and you are allowed to use a calculator. Additional information, such as the link for the test will be sent to you in the days leading to the test.

949ac016-4e5c-49a3-adc3-01d6e13a380e.question: What should I do if I do not agree to participate in the online test for MSc. AI in Society with automated monitoring?
949ac016-4e5c-49a3-adc3-01d6e13a380e.answer: If you do not agree to partake in the online test with automated monitoring, you should reach out to the admissions committee at the provided email by the specific date given.

e6157e0a-891b-45bd-bd66-93bdf8381785.question: How does the inability to make the $25 payment due to financial circumstances affect the status of my application?
e6157e0a-891b-45bd-bd66-93bdf8381785.answer: Every applicant needs to take the aptitude test to pass our selection procedure. If you are unable to take it online due to financial circumstances, the only other alternative is to take the test in-person (free of charge).

fc5d9e0d-ff24-4d29-90c8-a616e3476ace.question: When and where is the in-person aptitude test taking place?
fc5d9e0d-ff24-4d29-90c8-a616e3476ace.answer: The in-person test is taking place on the 26th of June from 11:00 – 12:30 at Marsstr. 20-22, 80335 München, Room 607 (6th floor).

f0f1ed1d-7806-424e-b27b-8750d861727d.question: Am I allowed to use a calculator during the aptitude test?
f0f1ed1d-7806-424e-b27b-8750d861727d.answer: Yes, you are allowed to use a calculator during the test.

7a3f2738-f3f1-4c8d-9a43-4259e208f91d.question: Where at TUM would the physical test take place?
7a3f2738-f3f1-4c8d-9a43-4259e208f91d.answer: The physical test would take place at Marsstr. 20-22, 80335 München, Room 607 (6th Floor).

ee39b19b-9554-4370-8dfa-4e1299e36b55.question: Would the physical test take place at the same time?
ee39b19b-9554-4370-8dfa-4e1299e36b55.answer: The physical test will take place on 26th June from 11:00 – 12:30.

12c9112b-5712-43bf-a1f5-ed0939f4897d.question: Could you please share more information on the types of aptitude test questions?
12c9112b-5712-43bf-a1f5-ed0939f4897d.answer: Test questions will cover politics, economics and law, statistics and mathematics, and engineering. Questions will include facts, thinking questions for example description of an economic situation with questions about the implications, and mathematical calculations. However, please note that there'll always be multiple-choice answers given for each question.

aca0446c-3d47-4433-aa30-09172000766c.question: What would be the alternative to an automated monitoring procedure for the aptitude test?
aca0446c-3d47-4433-aa30-09172000766c.answer: The alternative to an automated online test is to take the test in person at TUM. The test will then be written on paper, and you will be monitored by supervisory personnel.

fb74e706-cc19-4d87-b6be-2564121f7f71.question: Could you please share more information on the types of questions for the aptitude test for the Master's program in AI in Society?
fb74e706-cc19-4d87-b6be-2564121f7f71.answer: In the coming days, all invited participants will receive a link to the test, where there will be a section for you to familiarize yourself with the nature of the questions. The test will entail both factual and conceptual questions, as well as tests of mathematical reasoning where you may be required to perform calculations (however, note that there will always be multiple choice answers provided). A general level to guide your preparation is the Abitur level.

6041ed47-9f42-4ec7-85a9-32bda9736782.question: What can be an alternative to the automated online test method for the aptitude test for the Master’s program in AI in Society at TUM?
6041ed47-9f42-4ec7-85a9-32bda9736782.answer: As an alternative to the automated online process, you can take the test in person at TUM. For this, you would have to be present at the test venue on the scheduled date. The test will be written on paper and normal invigilation rules will apply. The fee for online proctoring will be waived in this case.

4f2a2767-09f6-45d2-bd7f-53eae43e98df.question: What topics will be covered in the aptitude test for the Master's program in AI in Society at TUM?
4f2a2767-09f6-45d2-bd7f-53eae43e98df.answer: The test will cover topics in Politics and [REDACTED], Economics and Law, Statistics and Mathematics, and Engineering and [REDACTED].

3ea8e8f5-8887-4beb-98bb-a6fac1b751fb.question: What will be the setup of the online aptitude test for the Master's program in AI in Society at TUM?
3ea8e8f5-8887-4beb-98bb-a6fac1b751fb.answer: The test for the winter semester 2024/25 will be held online. Participants will receive the link to the test a few days in advance to make themselves familiar with the setup. During the test, participants will be monitored via an automated proctoring software which will demand a fee of 25$.

25365f4e-57ca-4d2c-86c8-3c2d536b7ae5.question: What alternatives are available for an applicant unable to pay the $25 fee for the aptitude test?
25365f4e-57ca-4d2c-86c8-3c2d536b7ae5.answer: If an applicant is unable to take the online aptitude test due to financial constraints, they can opt to take the test in-person at TUM, free of charge.

31f1251e-8f99-44a8-bb43-b5a7d7b32896.question: Is the aptitude test mandatory for the selection procedure?
31f1251e-8f99-44a8-bb43-b5a7d7b32896.answer: Yes, every applicant needs to take the aptitude test to successfully pass the selection procedure.

264430d4-55b3-4e40-8fd7-35ea67bb02e3.question: Can I take the online test on a tablet, more specifically, can I install the monitoring software on it?
264430d4-55b3-4e40-8fd7-35ea67bb02e3.answer: Proctorio is used for the online test, which does not function on tablets.

0186fb40-255c-475a-801c-fd1707e5e774.question: Does that imply that there are other possible ways to take the aptitude test?
0186fb40-255c-475a-801c-fd1707e5e774.answer: Yes, you can take the test online or in-person. The in-person test will require you to be physically present at TUM on the specified date and time. You will write the same exam on paper and be monitored by people instead of a software. The online monitoring includes the participant being blocked from opening other browser windows during the test, as well as being recorded through the webcam over the duration of the test. After the test, they will evaluate the recordings to check for possible cheating, after which the videos will be deleted.

9ed0b8ae-ba96-43b7-be25-620355b43b6d.question: Is there a fee involved in taking the aptitude test in-person?
9ed0b8ae-ba96-43b7-be25-620355b43b6d.answer: No, there is no fee involved in taking the test in-person.

f4c798d6-c885-40df-9ca9-eb3c10dc7196.question: Is there a chance to take the exam on a different day and time than the specified one?
f4c798d6-c885-40df-9ca9-eb3c10dc7196.answer: Yes, an alternative test date is being offered for those who can't make it on the initial date. The second test date will be on the 16th of July between 10:45 and 12:15 AM, CEST.

039bee9d-b581-4484-ae13-3e4587893cbf.question: Is it possible to take the exam on a different date?
039bee9d-b581-4484-ae13-3e4587893cbf.answer: Yes, an alternative test date is being offered for those who can't make it on the initial date. The second test date will be on the 16th of July between 10:45 and 12:15 AM, CEST.

e7d131ba-292f-497e-9343-e5869819eb55.question: Do we have to pay 25 dollars for this exam? Is it possible to take the exam without paying this fee?
e7d131ba-292f-497e-9343-e5869819eb55.answer: You have the option to take the test in-person by coming to TUM. In this case, you will write the same exam on paper and be monitored by people instead of a software. There is no fee to pay in this case.

4608c81a-68a8-45d8-93c3-312a407f7bec.question: When can the applicants know if they will get the link to participate in the aptitude test for the M.Sc. AI in Society program for the upcoming winter semester?
4608c81a-68a8-45d8-93c3-312a407f7bec.answer: Due to the big volume of applications, a second test date is being set up in the week from 15.7. – 19.7., to which the remaining candidates will be invited. The remaining invitations will be sent out in the coming week.

20f888d1-f500-4d1c-9931-d2b5ef47d3ab.question: Is the aptitude assessment the last step in determining eligibility for the master's program in AI in Society, or are there other tests to follow?
20f888d1-f500-4d1c-9931-d2b5ef47d3ab.answer: After the aptitude test, you will either be directly accepted or directly rejected. If you fall within a specific score range, you'll be invited for an additional interview.

265d9867-f2f5-48e3-9b6f-1d4dfd47fbeb.question: What is the nature of the aptitude test for the AI in Society program, and what should applicants expect?
265d9867-f2f5-48e3-9b6f-1d4dfd47fbeb.answer: The test for the winter semester 2024/25 will be held online and you will be monitored via an automated proctoring software, which incurs a fee of 25$. It will be conducted in English language and spans 90 minutes. The test will consist of multiple-choice questions on topics such as Politics, Economics and Law, Statistics and Mathematics, and Engineering. During the test, you are allowed to use a calculator.

8b76db31-5ce5-4d24-85f4-71ad1f2210ee.question: Is there a specific time for the aptitude test for the AI in Society program at TUM?
8b76db31-5ce5-4d24-85f4-71ad1f2210ee.answer: Yes, the aptitude test is scheduled from 11:00 – 12:30 German time (GMT+2) on June 26th.

5f9ef96c-44e2-47e5-8205-1c01aed6431b.question: What tools are allowed for use during the aptitude test for the AI in Society program at TUM?
5f9ef96c-44e2-47e5-8205-1c01aed6431b.answer: You are permitted to use a calculator during the test.

84b0f8a8-9397-45fb-bb45-ea685aa2dea7.question: If the invitation to the aptitude test for the AI in Society program has been received, does that mean that my other documents have been received as acceptable?
84b0f8a8-9397-45fb-bb45-ea685aa2dea7.answer: Yes, if you have been invited to take the aptitude test, all your other documents have been assessed as “ok” by our aptitude commission.

7f7396f9-d763-4613-abe2-243b742225f3.question: If documents have been updated and re-uploaded, does a new application need to be started?
7f7396f9-d763-4613-abe2-243b742225f3.answer: No, you do not need to start a new application. If you uploaded new documents, your existing application will be checked again.

7bb505e9-57e7-4a1c-b878-29d59d4a73fb.question: Is it acceptable to submit your own English translations of project material for the AI in Society program at TUM?
7bb505e9-57e7-4a1c-b878-29d59d4a73fb.answer: Yes, it is acceptable to translate your project material into English yourself and submit for your application.

59165bec-32e5-4d63-94e3-79418e05de29.question: Could you please provide more details about the resources or references that would be useful for each section of the syllabus?
59165bec-32e5-4d63-94e3-79418e05de29.answer: Please refer to the section “Details about the test” on our website for further information: https://www.sot.tum.de/sot/studium/ai-in-society/application/

92f8aeab-9423-4fc8-8c54-ad535359efe9.question: Is the letter of motivation considered in the application for the TUM Master AI in Society program?
92f8aeab-9423-4fc8-8c54-ad535359efe9.answer: Yes, the letter of motivation is considered. It will form the basis of discussion should you be invited for an interview after passing the test.

cb25f3a5-2576-4c11-964d-060c15d09f58.question: Will all prospective students who have applied for the TUM Master AI in Society program receive the test link, or is there an additional selection process before that?
cb25f3a5-2576-4c11-964d-060c15d09f58.answer: Students are first checked for formal requirements by the admissions committee. This includes whether all necessary documents have been submitted and if the submitted practical projects are sufficient. Those who pass this stage will receive an email with an invitation to the test.

20ffc3d0-cfaa-4aba-8671-a5ddceb1885b.question: Is the test timing for the TUM Master AI in Society program in CET?
20ffc3d0-cfaa-4aba-8671-a5ddceb1885b.answer: Yes, the test time is in CEST (Central European Summer Time), which is equivalent to GMT+2. When in doubt, orient yourself for Berlin time.

57a2800e-ebc0-4bdb-a4f5-f826af7079a9.question: When do the applicants need to receive the invitation for the test?
57a2800e-ebc0-4bdb-a4f5-f826af7079a9.answer: The applicants must receive the invitation at least one week before the test.

c0f6332c-a1ee-4db8-9c17-3b1683d79ef6.question: What is the plan if the Moodletest cannot be finished in time?
c0f6332c-a1ee-4db8-9c17-3b1683d79ef6.answer: If the Moodletest cannot be completed in time, the decisions regarding the admissibility of applicants to the test will be sent out first, and the links to the test will be sent in the following days.

fd976965-1151-446c-a530-876003220849.question: What happens when the Moodle examination course is ready?
fd976965-1151-446c-a530-876003220849.answer: When the Moodle course is ready, a notification will be sent.

61dda505-1c8d-4490-9a9a-0b92c149e8ec.question: What were the next steps after the test was prepared?
61dda505-1c8d-4490-9a9a-0b92c149e8ec.answer: After the test was prepared, the next steps were to input the test questions.

f2718cd1-d3d1-48a8-a20a-3af6bcd33ddb.question: What is the purpose of the Moodle platform used at TUM?
f2718cd1-d3d1-48a8-a20a-3af6bcd33ddb.answer: The Moodle platform at TUM is used to conduct digital aptitude tests for at least the past 2 years.

a28542c1-d659-47a6-accf-010a6dd4ffee.question: Will all prospective students who have applied for the program receive the test link, or is there an additional selection process before that?
a28542c1-d659-47a6-accf-010a6dd4ffee.answer: The students are checked for formal requirements by our admissions committee, i.e. whether they have submitted all necessary documents, as well as whether the submitted practical projects are sufficient. Those students who have passed this stage will receive an email with an invitation to the test.

9a93dead-de16-44e9-bacd-6f3d22897857.question: Is the test timing given in CET?
9a93dead-de16-44e9-bacd-6f3d22897857.answer: Yes, the test timing is in CET. If there are any unclarities, please just orient yourself for Berlin time.

c7626a93-779b-4162-aaa1-f088706f766c.question: What tools are allowed to be used during the test for AI in Society program at TUM?
c7626a93-779b-4162-aaa1-f088706f766c.answer: You will be allowed to use a calculator for this test. Other things will not be allowed.

ceee176e-841f-4dd7-9fcc-6fb8c69ba2ba.question: What is the specific time for the test for the AI in Society program at TUM?
ceee176e-841f-4dd7-9fcc-6fb8c69ba2ba.answer: The test will be from 11:00 – 12:30 German time (GMT+2) on June 26th.

62073d24-1754-4986-ae22-d55bcea6e52d.question: If a correction is reuploaded on TUM Online, will the application be reviewed again or is there a need to start another application?
62073d24-1754-4986-ae22-d55bcea6e52d.answer: You do not need to start a new application – if you uploaded new documents, this application will be reviewed again.

6340bb6d-c590-4ebb-b132-80955003322c.question: Can a self-translated document be submitted as part of the application?
6340bb6d-c590-4ebb-b132-80955003322c.answer: Yes, a self-translated version of the document with a university signature would suffice.

8f90aa82-0f24-414d-953b-8d3216ff2d46.question: How should a certificate of participation in a university competition be included in the application?
8f90aa82-0f24-414d-953b-8d3216ff2d46.answer: If you have a certificate over your participation in the competition, this is sufficient as proof – please upload it in the field for practical projects as well (it should be translated to English, however).

b72c334d-91e4-4290-9780-99d3053a7674.question: Is there any announcement of the upcoming aptitude test details on the 25th?
b72c334d-91e4-4290-9780-99d3053a7674.answer: An invitation email with details about the aptitude test will be sent out in the next few days. Please note that the test has been moved to the 26th. For information about the test setup, please refer to the website.

2ea7bbac-ee44-4d1b-bbd9-2f59534a326c.question: If an interview is needed as part of the application process, will it be online or in person?
2ea7bbac-ee44-4d1b-bbd9-2f59534a326c.answer: If an interview is needed for the application process, there will be an option to do it online for those unable to come in person.

da81e37f-ad74-4a90-86bb-45b2b9d75d98.question: What kind of work certificates will be accepted for the practical project part of the application?
da81e37f-ad74-4a90-86bb-45b2b9d75d98.answer: Work certificates should summarize what the applicant did at their previous company, including their role, the type of work, the projects they participated in, and the duration of employment. It should be evident that the applicant did not write the letter themselves, meaning it could be signed by the employer or their HR department, include the company logo, or similar.

9e90f602-486b-44e9-87f2-d3a837a1f9ff.question: Is there any chance you might reconsider using my INSEAD MBA certificate and dean's letter as proof of my English skills?
9e90f602-486b-44e9-87f2-d3a837a1f9ff.answer: Unfortunately, a 2-semester MBA is not acceptable as proof of English proficiency. Submitting an alternate proof such as a TOEFL, IELTS, or other accepted test score is recommended.

2237fd1f-7440-4d55-ab42-09ffe90db445.question: Can I upload my own document to list my grades as the provided application form doesn't have enough space?
2237fd1f-7440-4d55-ab42-09ffe90db445.answer: In this case, it is recommended to duplicate the form, fill out as many rows as needed, and then merge the documents back into one for uploading. Duplicating and merging the standard form was suggested as the student-made document was not accepted.

068d5120-89ca-40df-b278-fed44589980c.question: If documents were reuploaded after receiving a notification, will the application be checked again or should a new application be started?
068d5120-89ca-40df-b278-fed44589980c.answer: You do not need to start a new application – if you uploaded new documents, this application will be checked again.

877192bf-2964-4f45-93b0-963e85284121.question: Will self-translated documents be accepted for the application to the AI in Society program at TUM?
877192bf-2964-4f45-93b0-963e85284121.answer: Yes, your own translation + university signature would suffice.

e410bbbc-ce3a-4e74-b035-9ad9b40b9412.question: How to prove completion of projects done during courses for the AI in Society program at TUM?
e410bbbc-ce3a-4e74-b035-9ad9b40b9412.answer: Submit Transcript of Records (this module should be listed in this Transcript), as well as fill out a form which states the name of the project module, and the module/project description. You don't necessarily have to submit project reports.

ef0b0f88-19cb-425e-8347-5766cf98608e.question: What topics will be covered in the aptitude test for the Master's program 'AI in Society' at TUM?
ef0b0f88-19cb-425e-8347-5766cf98608e.answer: The topics covered by the test can be found on the website: https://www.sot.tum.de/sot/studium/ai-in-society/application/

6498ee8f-966e-4609-868f-2153a80fb2a9.question: How can I apply for a tuition fees waiver?
6498ee8f-966e-4609-868f-2153a80fb2a9.answer: For this question, you are referred to TUM’s student information page: https://www.tum.de/en/studies/support-and-advice/support-during-studies/student-information.

b41cbb36-660b-449a-b3be-07d6aa353c42.question: Why has the decision been made to use automated proctoring with proctorio instead of zoom-based monitoring for the exam?
b41cbb36-660b-449a-b3be-07d6aa353c42.answer: This decision was due to the zoom-based version not being feasible.

9c253368-984c-417b-a809-36c94b99db03.question: Why is there a concern about the level of difficulty of the questions in the test now that proctorio will be used for proctoring?
9c253368-984c-417b-a809-36c94b99db03.answer: The test could be too difficult as it will be much harder for people to cheat.

8c8b4fdf-10be-4236-b33f-0aa14dc0cdc1.question: What is the proposed solution to the difficulty level of the questions?
8c8b4fdf-10be-4236-b33f-0aa14dc0cdc1.answer: It is suggested to revise the questions to make them easier.

7a27f40a-5054-43e3-b00b-7fda0c7e7ae0.question: What is the concern if the test remains too difficult?
7a27f40a-5054-43e3-b00b-7fda0c7e7ae0.answer: The concern is that the test will filter out too many people, particularly as there aren't detailed instructions on how to prepare for the questions.

3b585f6f-0bc4-4440-9c22-ebe697de27b5.question: Why was the option of using Zoom-based monitoring considered reasonable in the first place?
3b585f6f-0bc4-4440-9c22-ebe697de27b5.answer: Using Zoom-based monitoring did not add financial overhead to participants.

c6c09122-aae2-4d5c-93da-264261433f3a.question: What project information needs to be included in the application for the 'AI in Society' program?
c6c09122-aae2-4d5c-93da-264261433f3a.answer: The project descriptions should be clear and detailed, explaining the applicant's exact contributions. Specifically, the practical (technical) aspect and the interdisciplinary aspect must be highlighted. The information should be sufficient for the committee to make an informed decision.

9e708607-211d-47e5-84b2-9b82a8389999.question: Can recently started work experience be included in the application for the 'AI in Society' program?
9e708607-211d-47e5-84b2-9b82a8389999.answer: Recently started work experience, where there is no proof of employment, can't be counted towards the application.

530b175b-3062-4dbf-bffd-daab473ae1e7.question: Would my involvement in the positive psychology program, aimed at addressing the high depression rate among university students, count as a practical project for the Application at TUM School of [REDACTED] and Technology?
530b175b-3062-4dbf-bffd-daab473ae1e7.answer: Yes, your project can be considered a practical project, if it fulfils our requirements content-wise (i.e. it must have an interdisciplinary and practical aspect, please see the description on our website). From your short description, it sounds suitable.

bbc9f7be-c907-4ac1-a511-65dba3a198ad.question: How the duration and ECTS would be considered for this practical project?
bbc9f7be-c907-4ac1-a511-65dba3a198ad.answer: 1 ECTS corresponds to 30 hours of work. So, for example, if you tell us that you worked for one month, we would calculate a 40-hour work week (or 20-hour if part-time is stated), times 4 weeks. In this case, it would be 160 hours. 160 hours would correspond to 5,3 ECTS.

89e03c93-96c1-47b1-82e6-7937acc7d2a1.question: I uploaded the document of the 18 ETCS proof, when will I know whether the document would be examined?
89e03c93-96c1-47b1-82e6-7937acc7d2a1.answer: We are currently finishing reviewing the applicants’ documents. You can expect a result in around 1 week.

7aabff55-e542-4f87-9154-c7513bf1a577.question: The system said that we can only see the duration for one of your internships. Please also provide the duration for the other internship. Could the declaration of the second project satisfy the demand of the proof of the project?
7aabff55-e542-4f87-9154-c7513bf1a577.answer: The declaration for the second project doesn’t include the length for the internship. If you can’t get a declaration with duration in time, please just write the duration yourself inside the project description box, and reupload the form.

6d35afac-df0d-4def-8e95-acb67b81c7f9.question: Does the aptitude assessment test offer an online format or do I need to show up in person?
6d35afac-df0d-4def-8e95-acb67b81c7f9.answer: The test will be held online. You don’t need to come in person.

69163ebf-264d-4c39-a01c-52a26feeb994.question: When will the test invitation information for the 2024WS AI program be sent out?
69163ebf-264d-4c39-a01c-52a26feeb994.answer: The invitations to the online test will be sent out at the latest one week before the test date.

7890c897-c015-41df-914b-19182f00178b.question: What should I do if I am unable to re-upload the correct document for my application due to the page timing out or getting stuck on loading?
7890c897-c015-41df-914b-19182f00178b.answer: Reach out to the person or department overseeing the application process explaining your issue. They may need to liaise with colleagues handling the website for a solution.

ee60be84-988b-40c7-adc4-0518170c951b.question: What happens if I accidentally uploaded the wrong file for my application and I am unable to upload the correct one?
ee60be84-988b-40c7-adc4-0518170c951b.answer: The individual or team handling the application can potentially aid in opening up the upload option again for you or may be able to upload the correct document on your behalf.

ae4d472b-891d-48d3-9101-854034ccd79b.question: Why was my application rejected for the TUM Master AI in Society program?
ae4d472b-891d-48d3-9101-854034ccd79b.answer: Your application was rejected because the interdisciplinarity aspect was not fulfilled sufficiently. Projects should combine technical and social aspects, not deal with them separately.

1f8e21fb-2b8d-4799-acdd-f2bbe0e4c8eb.question: Do we have specific recommendations for online platforms to implement the aptitude test for the MSc. AI in Society program at TUM?
1f8e21fb-2b8d-4799-acdd-f2bbe0e4c8eb.answer: For tests, TUM has a specially designed Moodle platform where digital aptitude tests have been carried out for about 2 years. The url of the platform is https://exam.moodle.tum.de/.

66b286ff-1649-4d65-a40f-74dc9a64408a.question: If you are not the right person to discuss about the implementation of the aptitude test, could you refer me to the right person?
66b286ff-1649-4d65-a40f-74dc9a64408a.answer: Dr. [REDACTED] is the appropriate contact for consultation on this matter.

0e1cbb4b-1789-454f-bacc-3299d8383b40.question: When would it be possible to conduct a consultation meeting regarding the implementation of the aptitude test for the MSc. AI in Society program at TUM?
0e1cbb4b-1789-454f-bacc-3299d8383b40.answer: The available dates for a meeting are: Thursday, June 6 at 4:30 pm, Friday, June 7 in the morning, or Monday, June 10 in the afternoon, e.g. at 2:00 pm.

3aae3e5c-84e9-4798-9c30-1cfa3be17c00.question: Is it possible to schedule a meeting to discuss the process on June 10th after 2:00 PM?
3aae3e5c-84e9-4798-9c30-1cfa3be17c00.answer: Yes, meeting on June 10th after 2:00 PM is doable.

540cdfd7-af3e-4c02-b577-60167767bbda.question: Can the meeting occur without everyone present?
540cdfd7-af3e-4c02-b577-60167767bbda.answer: Yes, it should suffice to talk to him alone.

5a977462-f706-4342-b685-f25e6709866a.question: Does TUM have a specific platform for online tests?
5a977462-f706-4342-b685-f25e6709866a.answer: Yes, for examinations there is a specially set up Moodle platform at TUM, where digital aptitude tests have been carried out for about 2 years. The URL for this platform is https://exam.moodle.tum.de/

78af68b9-f7c9-407b-9aed-91523f3d7522.question: Can a consultation meeting be organized to discuss the process and planning of the aptitude tests?
78af68b9-f7c9-407b-9aed-91523f3d7522.answer: Yes, a consultation meeting can be organized for this purpose.

8478f035-da3e-4921-aad2-ba3f11f7e55d.question: What is the process for setting up an online test for our program?
8478f035-da3e-4921-aad2-ba3f11f7e55d.answer: There is a specific Moodle platform at TUM for exams where digital aptitude tests have been conducted for about 2 years. A counseling session to discuss this and planning could be arranged. The suitable time slots are Thursday, 06.06 at 4:30 PM, Friday, 07.06 in the morning, and Monday, 10.06 in the afternoon, for example, 2:00 PM.

00cbb36f-dabc-4b11-9a3f-b25f1f8e0e23.question: Do ProLehre have any recommendations about online platforms for implementing an online multiple-choice test for the AI in Society program?
00cbb36f-dabc-4b11-9a3f-b25f1f8e0e23.answer: TUM has a centrally equipped Moodle platform where digital aptitude exams have been conducted. A discussion is proposed for further planning and about any other essential details that need to be taken into consideration when conducting an online aptitude test.

2223a614-e852-4ddc-9158-0c6f854b915e.question: When will the applicants be notified if they are admitted for the aptitude test for the masters program Ai in Society?
2223a614-e852-4ddc-9158-0c6f854b915e.answer: The admitted applicants will be notified at the latest one week before the test date.

5b207b5e-f777-4ead-9c5f-d1433b935672.question: Is it possible to receive information about what will be assessed in the aptitude test for the masters program Ai in Society?
5b207b5e-f777-4ead-9c5f-d1433b935672.answer: Unfortunately, no specific information can be given out regarding what will be assessed in the test.

5b204945-6925-4bad-b078-e7a5c9a3508f.question: Is it possible to speak with the heads of the masters program Ai in Society?
5b204945-6925-4bad-b078-e7a5c9a3508f.answer: Yes, you can reach out to the aptitude committee head, Prof. Dr. [REDACTED] at [REDACTED]@tum.de.

f6031113-fafc-442b-a82e-f2d7d1fe2c97.question: Is it possible to receive some information about what will be assessed in the test? Are there any specific books or resources to study?
f6031113-fafc-442b-a82e-f2d7d1fe2c97.answer: Additional information about the test has been published on the website. However, since the test is conducted online and unsupervised, further details cannot be provided.

cb542a4b-d274-416a-999e-4c64f9523f44.question: When will you notify applicants whether they are admitted for the test on June 25?
cb542a4b-d274-416a-999e-4c64f9523f44.answer: Admitted applicants will be notified at the latest one week before the test date.

adc57462-d371-44bf-9399-e9f4ae9a7763.question: When will applicants be notified whether they are admitted for the aptitude test for the masters program Ai in Society?
adc57462-d371-44bf-9399-e9f4ae9a7763.answer: Applicants will be notified at the latest one week before the test date.

1a88932f-509e-4f93-bb8f-d227e08d73cc.question: What specifics will be assessed in the aptitude test?
1a88932f-509e-4f93-bb8f-d227e08d73cc.answer: The aptitude test will assess general knowledge of social science and technical subjects.

beb4d651-9bf5-451b-baef-e80bc47fce3a.question: Can additional information or resources for studying be provided for the aptitude test?
beb4d651-9bf5-451b-baef-e80bc47fce3a.answer: Unfortunately, no additional information or resources for studying can be provided.

8f82c450-c021-45b5-9269-9ac27bc7abfc.question: When will the applicants be notified about their admission for the aptitude test for the masters program Ai in Society?
8f82c450-c021-45b5-9269-9ac27bc7abfc.answer: The admitted applicants will be notified at the latest one week before the test date.

1fb106e4-1c34-40ba-a14f-51eff1faae10.question: Can any specific information about what will be assessed in the aptitude test for the masters program Ai in Society be provided?
1fb106e4-1c34-40ba-a14f-51eff1faae10.answer: This is an online unsupervised test, the details for which are published on the program's website. Further information related to the specific areas of assessment or study resources cannot be revealed.

c6a41b72-2edb-4809-9df9-c6fa6dc857b0.question: When will the applicants be notified whether they are admitted for the aptitude test for the Masters program AI in Society?
c6a41b72-2edb-4809-9df9-c6fa6dc857b0.answer: The admitted applicants will be notified at the latest one week before the test date.

c367378b-9c16-4612-9637-126c5dc85988.question: Could you provide me with an update on whether my application for the Masters's degree in 'AI in Society' has been accepted?
c367378b-9c16-4612-9637-126c5dc85988.answer: We received your application and everything is fine.

e9d7de7e-f43c-4069-b8e4-030091b25c4b.question: What to do when unable to re-upload a document on the TUM application website?
e9d7de7e-f43c-4069-b8e4-030091b25c4b.answer: Contact the handling staff of the TUM application website so they can aid in the re-upload process. It is also advised to email the correct document to them directly, in case further technical issues prevent successful upload on the website.

3a085754-388a-4abe-8804-58648201b7e4.question: What is the format of the online written test for the 'AI in Society' course?
3a085754-388a-4abe-8804-58648201b7e4.answer: The test is an online multiple-choice test.

219eaabf-413d-4aef-82af-22f7ad566e50.question: What language will the online written test for the 'AI in Society' course be conducted in?
219eaabf-413d-4aef-82af-22f7ad566e50.answer: The test will be conducted in English.

85bf28c0-a5bb-4bbb-954f-dfbd8c5e3951.question: Would the 'AI in Society' course test focus on basic concepts or more advanced ones?
85bf28c0-a5bb-4bbb-954f-dfbd8c5e3951.answer: The test will focus on more basic concepts as they do not expect applicants to be experts in law and mathematics at the same time. They will not be asking knowledge that will only be taught during the program itself.

b1b623e5-c955-41a1-8d18-72e4eacc293e.question: Is there more specific information regarding the contents of the aptitude test for the 'AI in Society' course?
b1b623e5-c955-41a1-8d18-72e4eacc293e.answer: Some information regarding the contents of the test has been published on the website.

1a5f10a3-3258-423a-8ab9-6f6af5c64e71.question: What is the deadline for submitting the VPD to TUM?
1a5f10a3-3258-423a-8ab9-6f6af5c64e71.answer: The deadline for submitting the VPD to TUM is extended to whenever uni-assist sends you the final document, provided you have verified that you have applied for a VPD with all necessary documents by May 31st.

830ab3e8-0273-4b3b-8527-e0653db040b3.question: What happens if I am unable to submit all required documents, including the VPD, before the May 31st deadline due to unexpected delays in processing?
830ab3e8-0273-4b3b-8527-e0653db040b3.answer: Although the official deadline is May 31st, as long as you have applied for the VPD and submitted all necessary documents by this date, TUM will extend your deadline for submission of the final VPD until whenever uni-assist sends it to you.

2c8916b5-12f4-45f6-b46b-4db5241434b0.question: What should I have in my application to TUM regarding the VPD?
2c8916b5-12f4-45f6-b46b-4db5241434b0.answer: In your application to TUM, you should verify that you have applied for the VPD with all necessary documents by May 31st.

a361d12e-9fb7-4569-8999-5e445a1e84a3.question: Could a personal module handbook listing the completed modules, including the language of instruction for each, be accepted as proof of English language proficiency for TUM applications?
a361d12e-9fb7-4569-8999-5e445a1e84a3.answer: Yes, but it needs to be clear that at least 15 ECTS were taught in English. Applicants should select English-taught modules from their degree that together make up 15 ECTS or more. They should list these modules in a document and append the respective pages from the module handbook, so it's immediately clear that the listed courses were taught in English.

15ab8d1d-9a07-4ece-8b4b-6bf9e14f8ed4.question: If the provided module handbook for proof of English language proficiency was deemed insufficient, what is the exact type of document required for this verification?
15ab8d1d-9a07-4ece-8b4b-6bf9e14f8ed4.answer: Students are expected to list English-taught modules from their degree that together make up 15 ECTS or more in a document. This document should be appended with specific pages from the module handbook that clearly show these courses were taught in English. They should also provide a short clarification detailing these courses.

c246339b-1ca1-43ec-907f-7b694c89c8b7.question: Can I submit the proof for modules taken in English, amounting to 15 ECTS, after the application deadline has passed?
c246339b-1ca1-43ec-907f-7b694c89c8b7.answer: No, English-taught modules amounting to 15 ECTS serve as proof of English proficiency only if they have been successfully completed by the end of the application deadline. You cannot provide this proof once the deadline has passed.

e4a29df5-05c5-4602-94a1-b48334cfb3f5.question: Do I need to have completed the modules by the application deadline if I am using them as proof of English proficiency?
e4a29df5-05c5-4602-94a1-b48334cfb3f5.answer: Yes, the modules should be completed before the application deadline.

64adcb0f-a827-44d0-81c2-679c8038e722.question: Can I submit proof of practical modules with my bachelor's certificate after the application deadline?
64adcb0f-a827-44d0-81c2-679c8038e722.answer: The email does not explicitly answer this question.

51091153-6479-4a16-bd4f-51f09792e6e3.question: Is it sufficient to just mention the practical modules in my application or do you need formal proof for them?
51091153-6479-4a16-bd4f-51f09792e6e3.answer: If the practical modules appear in your record, that should suffice as proof. However, you will be asked to describe the projects in a form, so that the contents can be assessed.

81c418fd-0cd1-451b-8e87-df941ba31546.question: I am currently taking some modules in English, can they contribute towards my total of 15 ECTS for English proficiency?
81c418fd-0cd1-451b-8e87-df941ba31546.answer: No, only the modules which have been successfully completed by the application deadline can be used to show English proficiency.

ea8e40b7-68eb-40fd-b5a2-73a55bfa9b86.question: Could you kindly provide me with a list of modules that are conducted as part of the Master of Science (M.Sc.) program in AI in Society at TUM?
ea8e40b7-68eb-40fd-b5a2-73a55bfa9b86.answer: Apart from the study plan you can find on our website (https://www.sot.tum.de/sot/studium/ai-in-society/), you can find more details about the modules in the excerpt of the study documentation that was provided.

6aa06630-0f0c-481f-bdc8-658dfb35c9c6.question: What are the tuition fees for the Master's program in AI in Society, specifically for EU students, at TUM?
6aa06630-0f0c-481f-bdc8-658dfb35c9c6.answer: Students from Germany and the EU study at TUM free of tuition. You can find this information here: https://www.tum.de/en/studies/fees/tuition.

09326b0b-8d86-4ccb-923d-a7f3138fa740.question: Can I apply for the AI in Society course if I already have a Master's in Informatics from TUM?
09326b0b-8d86-4ccb-923d-a7f3138fa740.answer: Yes, however your application for AI in Society course is still being assessed based on your Bachelor’s degree. When applying to a Master’s program, another Master’s program is technically irrelevant.

59d22145-2fa8-431c-870d-6b0e83d8e113.question: As an international student, will I be subject to the international tuition fee for the AI in Society course, considering I already have a degree from Germany?
59d22145-2fa8-431c-870d-6b0e83d8e113.answer: For this information, you need to contact TUM’s student information center: https://www.tum.de/en/studies/support-and-advice/support-during-studies/student-information

603c6f74-a8ff-4a32-8548-f215f9f0d39a.question: Do I need to start another application after uploading a correction in TUM Online?
603c6f74-a8ff-4a32-8548-f215f9f0d39a.answer: No, you do not need to start a new application. If you uploaded new documents, this application will be checked again.

47c2b955-dfe8-40a2-beb4-992863b35da9.question: Does the necessary document translation have to be translated by an official translator?
47c2b955-dfe8-40a2-beb4-992863b35da9.answer: No, your own translation along with the university signature would suffice.

c4738016-caaa-43b1-8005-8dc2b5c07cf4.question: Can I include a competition I participated in at university in the list of projects, even if it isn't listed in my transcript?
c4738016-caaa-43b1-8005-8dc2b5c07cf4.answer: If you have a certificate over your participation, this is acceptable proof and can be included in the field for practical projects, as long as it's translated to English.

5f0b8269-04c5-46b7-88aa-3bfb5020d84e.question: When will I be informed if I meet all formal requirements and about the final application decision? Is there a syllabus for the aptitude test?
5f0b8269-04c5-46b7-88aa-3bfb5020d84e.answer: The test will be held online on June 25th and applicants will be informed about their admission to the test one week prior at the latest. The content of the test will be published on the website, where you'll need to check for updates. In case you're unable to take the test on June 25th and can provide a valid explanation due to external factors, there will be a second test date in September. However, taking the test later may impact your visa processing time in case of admission.

aa9d191b-0ca1-49e0-b927-57e6dd9a54be.question: What should I write in the 'grade' section for pass/fail modules when filling out the application for 140 best credits?
aa9d191b-0ca1-49e0-b927-57e6dd9a54be.answer: For pass/fail modules, you should just write 'pass' in the 'grade' section.

411e20c3-95c8-446d-b722-3f484b84cdcc.question: Must the modules for the application deadline be completed beforehand or can I submit these afterwards with the bachelor's degree?
411e20c3-95c8-446d-b722-3f484b84cdcc.answer: For the application, these modules should be completed before the application deadline.

71b12a9a-1d2f-4501-8970-2b2336f48494.question: For the practical part, is it enough if I indicate these or do you need a 'proof' for this?
71b12a9a-1d2f-4501-8970-2b2336f48494.answer: If the practical modules appear in your credentials, that's enough as proof. However, you'll be asked in a form to describe the projects in detail for a better understanding of the content.

804597de-2ed5-4cc1-b4a6-8e59b27f4990.question: Can I submit my language certificate after the application deadline?
804597de-2ed5-4cc1-b4a6-8e59b27f4990.answer: Unfortunately, only certain documents can be accepted afterwards (for example the Bachelor's certificate). The language certificate is not one of them.

9f4da9b0-8397-48af-8b4b-dbd54df31f08.question: I have written the mentioned seminar papers. Does this suffice as the practical part or if I attach these?
9f4da9b0-8397-48af-8b4b-dbd54df31f08.answer: It depends on what exactly you have done in the seminar papers. If no practical part has been used in the form of, for example, data analysis or similar technical tools, and it is only literary research, it unfortunately does not meet our requirements.

892a81e6-47f4-4a3f-a8e9-367ae4ed652a.question: If I have completed modules held in English with a total scope of at least 15 ECTS, do these count as proof?
892a81e6-47f4-4a3f-a8e9-367ae4ed652a.answer: Yes, if you have completed modules held in English worth at least 15 ECTS, these can count as proof.

855f52b2-aadc-4090-a42d-78e93133ae34.question: Would my involvement in the positive psychology program, aimed at addressing the high depression rate among university students, count as a practical project?
855f52b2-aadc-4090-a42d-78e93133ae34.answer: Yes, your project can be considered a practical project, if it fulfils our requirements content-wise (i.e. it must have an interdisciplinary and practical aspect, see the description on our website).

a07dfeca-70cd-4ad7-9f47-232fa33dfb76.question: Could you please advise on how the duration and ECTS would be considered for this project?
a07dfeca-70cd-4ad7-9f47-232fa33dfb76.answer: If this project was part of your studies (i.e. it is listed on your Transcript of Records), this is sufficient as proof. We will refer to the credits given to the module (and convert to ECTS if your credit system is not based on ECTS). If you participated in this project outside of university, then we need another form of proof. For example, an internship or a work certificate issued by the place where you worked on this project. It should state exactly what you did there, and how long you were involved.

954c81cb-b0ac-44bd-8682-01bbebf3c226.question: How would the time that I invested be counted, if I participated in the program outside the university with a group of students?
954c81cb-b0ac-44bd-8682-01bbebf3c226.answer: 1 ECTS corresponds to 30 hours of work. For example, if you tell us that you worked for one month, we would calculate a 40-hour work week (or 20-hour if part-time is stated), times 4 weeks. In this case, it would be 160 hours. 160 hours would correspond to 5,3 ECTS.

0eba5444-83c6-48dd-8886-2360c7634820.question: The system said that we can only see the duration for one of your internships. Could the declaration of the second project satisfy the proof of the project?
0eba5444-83c6-48dd-8886-2360c7634820.answer: The declaration for the second project doesn’t include the length for the internship. If you can’t get a declaration with duration in time, please just write the duration yourself inside the project description box, and reupload the form.

7c88c40b-98b5-44d4-b3a2-e8e151f75c22.question: Does the practical project for the AI for Society program need to be recognized with credits, i.e. does it have to be part of my university course?
7c88c40b-98b5-44d4-b3a2-e8e151f75c22.answer: Technically, the program can count practical projects that were not part of a university module. However, you would then need to provide official documentation that those practical projects in total spanned at least 540 hours for completion (540h correspond to 18 ECTS).

6fd7c53e-5a52-4760-bb46-0089f59a629e.question: Can individual projects or volunteer experience contribute to the practical project requirement for the AI for Society program?
6fd7c53e-5a52-4760-bb46-0089f59a629e.answer: Yes, as long as you can provide official documentation that those practical projects in total spanned at least 540 hours for completion (540h correspond to 18 ECTS).

bfb4c5ad-5d0a-4067-86f4-94e1fb1dc1ce.question: What can be used as proof for my projects for the AI for Society program application?
bfb4c5ad-5d0a-4067-86f4-94e1fb1dc1ce.answer: You don't need to submit your project reports to prove your completion of the module. You submit your Transcript of Records as part of the application procedure, as well as fill out a form which states the name of the project module, as well as the module/project description. For this, it is sufficient if you translate into English yourself.

848b9993-7430-4926-86b9-152f7992cf12.question: Does the project documentation for AI for Society program application have to be translated by an official translator?
848b9993-7430-4926-86b9-152f7992cf12.answer: No, your own translation with the university's signature would be enough.

834b245b-a24e-41bb-8922-c600cbdae47c.question: When will the aptitude test for the AI for Society program be held and when will applicants be informed about their admission to the test?
834b245b-a24e-41bb-8922-c600cbdae47c.answer: The test will be held online on June 25th. Applicants will be informed about their admission to the test one week before the test at the latest.

d7f75349-6c0f-435c-8696-2125fe4d60a8.question: Do the modules I completed for my Bachelor's degree meet the application requirements for the AI in Society program at TUM?
d7f75349-6c0f-435c-8696-2125fe4d60a8.answer: The number of credits fits, however, without a brief description of each module completed, it is not possible to make an assessment on the content.

5561b3f7-b0e8-4468-a3b4-6034a3df2ce1.question: Does the practical project for AI in Society application need to be recognized with credits, i.e. does it have to be part of my university course?
5561b3f7-b0e8-4468-a3b4-6034a3df2ce1.answer: Technically, we can count practical projects that were not part of a university module. However, you would then need to provide us with an official documentation that those practical projects in total spanned at least 540 hours for completion.

6547b75f-1984-4980-895e-937a20741b13.question: Would individual projects or volunteer experience be able to contribute to the practical project requirement for AI in Society application?
6547b75f-1984-4980-895e-937a20741b13.answer: Yes, individual achievements like a competition or environmental education can be counted, but you will need official documentation that those practical projects in total spanned at least 540 hours for completion.

8521d8be-847d-42b7-97ed-4c3754ab8d79.question: Can the practical project be part of a course or does it have to stand indiviually?
8521d8be-847d-42b7-97ed-4c3754ab8d79.answer: Yes, a practical project can be a part of your course for your application to AI in Society. It does not have to stand alone.

eee7c004-4348-4d73-8cf3-f21b61f1e154.question: If from my university, I do not officially have 18 credits for a practical project in social science, is there an alternative to fulfil this requirement for the AI Society program?
eee7c004-4348-4d73-8cf3-f21b61f1e154.answer: The application can count practical projects that were not part of a university module. However, you would then need to provide an official documentation that those practical projects in total spanned at least 540 hours for completion.

e95c326b-b8c6-4442-bc86-b880b3744712.question: How can I prove the projects that I did in the courses for my application to the AI in Society program?
e95c326b-b8c6-4442-bc86-b880b3744712.answer: You don’t need to submit your project reports as proof of completion. Instead, you submit your Transcript of Records as part of the application procedure (this module should then of course be listed in this Transcript), as well as fill out a form which states the name of the project module, as well as the module/project description. For this, it is sufficient if you translate into English yourself.

a59034c4-8e57-4471-8f48-34690d44c145.question: Could I possibly take the language certificate examination on 29th May and submit it afterwards although it is still within the application deadline?
a59034c4-8e57-4471-8f48-34690d44c145.answer: Unfortunately, we can only accept certain documents afterwards (for example, the Bachelor's certificate) – the language certificate is unfortunately not one of them. If you have completed modules held in English to the extent of at least 15 ECTS in total, they also count as proof.

fa5dfab6-264a-40e4-aecc-11ef33a02bfd.question: For application, a practical part must be completed according to the requirement profile. I have written the mentioned [REDACTED]. Would this suffice as a practical part or if I attach it?
fa5dfab6-264a-40e4-aecc-11ef33a02bfd.answer: For practical projects, it depends on what exactly you did in the seminar papers. If no practical part in the form of data analyses or similar technical tools were used for the papers, and it is pure literature research, it unfortunately does not meet our requirements.

bd4984aa-82aa-4fd3-98fe-f06ad9a5f39a.question: Is it possible to submit the language certificate after the application deadline?
bd4984aa-82aa-4fd3-98fe-f06ad9a5f39a.answer: No, it's not possible to submit the language certificate after the application deadline.

de23d361-8f1c-4e11-8d88-e9e735e16102.question: What is the required documentation for the list of best 140 credits for the Master of Science AI in Society program?
