de23d361-8f1c-4e11-8d88-e9e735e16102.answer: There will be a form to fill out inside the application portal for the list of best 140 credits. You will also be asked to upload your transcript of records.

83c0cc23-cec3-4e3a-a39a-af922de94761.question: In case an interview is needed for the AI in Society application, will it be conducted online or in person?
83c0cc23-cec3-4e3a-a39a-af922de94761.answer: In case an interview is needed, there will be an option to conduct it online if the candidate is not able to come in person.

b3aed972-220c-4441-9b43-4a2d9ff1e170.question: What should a work certificate for demonstrating practical project experience for the AI in Society application include?
b3aed972-220c-4441-9b43-4a2d9ff1e170.answer: The work certificate should state the candidate's role at the company, the kind of work they did, which projects they participated in, and the duration of their employment with them. Evidence like the employer's signature, their logo on the letter, etc, should be present to verify that the candidate didn't write the letter themselves.

a29a0b87-5a61-40d6-889a-f7da8e2f446d.question: Can a certificate of completion of an MBA program be used as proof of English language skills for the AI in Society application?
a29a0b87-5a61-40d6-889a-f7da8e2f446d.answer: A 2 semester MBA program certificate cannot be used as a proof of English language skills.

ac9faab5-596f-4391-85de-9abc0126d0c0.question: The AI in Society application requires a list of best 140 credit hours. If the form provided does not have enough rows for listing all the credits, how should one proceed?
ac9faab5-596f-4391-85de-9abc0126d0c0.answer: The candidate should simply duplicate the form, fill out as many rows as they need, and then merge the documents back into one for uploading.

67dffcb6-4ad1-49e2-afc4-41c841dd62b1.question: Can work experience be used as demonstration of participation in practical project relevant to the AI in Society course of study?
67dffcb6-4ad1-49e2-afc4-41c841dd62b1.answer: Work experience can be used as a practical project. In this case, a work certificate should be submitted which states the duration and the content of the work. However, the specific details of how this is translated into credits is not specified in the email.

a1c86b22-ba8a-44d3-b958-b39c4b233318.question: When should the final VPD document for the 'AI in Society' Master Program at TUM be uploaded?
a1c86b22-ba8a-44d3-b958-b39c4b233318.answer: You don’t need to upload the final VPD by May 31st, but can upload it to us later, as soon as you receive it.

338b3d16-826f-44b2-ab8a-672920d1ebc2.question: What is the deadline for sending full documents to uni-assist for the 'AI in Society' Master Program at TUM?
338b3d16-826f-44b2-ab8a-672920d1ebc2.answer: You have to send your full documents to uni-assist by May 31st.

f73aa41d-9d11-4889-b110-4ea31dc0250a.question: What will happen if my documents are not received by the deadline for the 'AI in Society' Master Program at TUM?
f73aa41d-9d11-4889-b110-4ea31dc0250a.answer: If your documents have not been received in full by the deadline, you will be excluded from the application process.

0a9eb34c-246e-44a6-b27d-b6903bf40138.question: Do I need to submit any manuscripts or presentation files that prove the projects?
0a9eb34c-246e-44a6-b27d-b6903bf40138.answer: If your projects are all listed in your transcript of records, the transcript is enough for us as proof. Please provide the exact names of the project modules so we can refer to them in your transcript.

79564e86-c71f-4f0a-ba4a-205251ab5ee8.question: Which of the credits belonging to the [REDACTED] are counted for the 'practical project' requirement?
79564e86-c71f-4f0a-ba4a-205251ab5ee8.answer: The 12 ECTS of the actual thesis project would count.

a786f054-6f9b-4022-b3d0-162ac7c615f0.question: Do these short descriptions of the [REDACTED] and the projects accomplished for the [REDACTED] courses seem to be fitting the 18 ECTS requirement?
a786f054-6f9b-4022-b3d0-162ac7c615f0.answer: The projects sound fitting. However, it depends if they incorporated a practical aspect with technical tools like programming, statistical/data analysis, or similar. Applicants should make sure to highlight such aspects in the project descriptions during application.

55d2526e-8c6a-42d1-b6cb-a44691903604.question: Which of the credits belonging to the bachelor’s thesis are counted for the 'practical project' requirement?
55d2526e-8c6a-42d1-b6cb-a44691903604.answer: The 12 ECTS of the actual thesis project would count.

75996cac-ee33-4acf-8d59-8bef19bc93ac.question: Do the short descriptions of the bachelor’s thesis and the projects accomplished for the other courses seem to be fitting the 18 ECTS requirement?
75996cac-ee33-4acf-8d59-8bef19bc93ac.answer: The contents of the projects sound fitting. It depends, however, if they incorporated a practical aspect with technical tools such as programming, statistical/data analysis, or similar.

aa3faaac-209f-431e-9fff-a7c9a50ea45e.question: What should be highlighted in the project descriptions when applying for the Master degree program 'AI in Society'?
aa3faaac-209f-431e-9fff-a7c9a50ea45e.answer: Applicants should highlight the practical aspects in their project descriptions, especially if they incorporated technical tools such as programming, statistical/data analysis, or similar.

d40e5fb9-0754-4a07-9d1d-f375169646a5.question: What are the formal requirements for the study program at TUM?
d40e5fb9-0754-4a07-9d1d-f375169646a5.answer: The formal requirements can be found on the application page on their website. In particular, 140 passed ECTS (out of normally 180 ECTS for a full Bachelor’s degree) is the most important requirement to see whether a student is eligible at the current state of their studies.

3aff148c-1366-47ca-bbed-0868935d06cf.question: Can I begin the AI in society program in a summer semester?
3aff148c-1366-47ca-bbed-0868935d06cf.answer: No, students can only begin the AI in society program in a winter semester.

f543a07d-6629-4099-bb17-8b764f5ff682.question: If accepted, would it be possible to begin studies in summer semester 2025?
f543a07d-6629-4099-bb17-8b764f5ff682.answer: No, students can only begin the AI in society program in a winter semester. However, you can apply now, and accept the study place for winter semester 2025/26, in case you get admitted.

7011e0a1-ec00-4662-a533-5c886e2158a0.question: Is it possible to submit an improved IELTS score to the Master AI in Society program at a later date than the initial application?
7011e0a1-ec00-4662-a533-5c886e2158a0.answer: No, late submission of documents, including an improved score, is not accepted. The same deadline applies to all applicants.

22a5a943-e87f-44ee-ad3a-88de34cacc64.question: What is the deadline for submitting an improved IELTS score for the Master AI in Society program?
22a5a943-e87f-44ee-ad3a-88de34cacc64.answer: No specific deadline was given for submitting an improved IELTS score because it is not permissible to submit an updated IELTS score after the initial application deadline.

d696366e-0f9c-4368-a49f-16bff3f1f752.question: Can courses taught in English at a university be used as proof of English proficiency for the Master AI in Society program?
d696366e-0f9c-4368-a49f-16bff3f1f752.answer: Yes, if you have completed courses at university that were taught in English, it can be used as English proof.

2f5d2ec9-fe23-44a2-808b-e76dc19b13bc.question: Can modules currently being studied in English be used as a language proficiency proof when applying for the AI in Society Master's program?
2f5d2ec9-fe23-44a2-808b-e76dc19b13bc.answer: While typically only proved English modules are used as a language proficiency proof, you could try to get a certification that you are currently attending specific English-taught courses and their ECTS volume. However, whether this is accepted as evidence is not determined by the email responder.

94cfc4c6-13cb-49dd-9cff-7f5608013a18.question: If the IELTS examination was not completed due to a registration issue, is there an alternative way to provide proof of English language proficiency for application to the AI in Society Master's program?
94cfc4c6-13cb-49dd-9cff-7f5608013a18.answer: One alternative is to prove that you have passed 15 credits of English-taught modules.

99e1d1b1-47b4-44a5-a5a5-c470e719253a.question: Can a student apply for the Master's AI in Society program without the IELTS test due to a problem in the registration process and financial issues?
99e1d1b1-47b4-44a5-a5a5-c470e719253a.answer: Yes, in lieu of the IELTS test, proof of passing 15 credits of English-taught modules can be provided as an alternative.

bb4436cc-1dc4-4440-8b24-6485067adf56.question: When is the test for AI in Society held?
bb4436cc-1dc4-4440-8b24-6485067adf56.answer: The test will be held online on June 25th.

92363617-b186-4479-a946-95b74468f02e.question: When will the applicants be informed about their admission for the test?
92363617-b186-4479-a946-95b74468f02e.answer: The applicants will be informed about their admission to the test one week before the test at the latest.

09e15e29-78ec-4e0d-b5fc-da863de886f8.question: What is the procedure if someone is not able to take the test on June 25th?
09e15e29-78ec-4e0d-b5fc-da863de886f8.answer: If someone is unable to take the test on June 25th due to external factors and can provide a valid explanation, there will be a second test date in September.

a6f55aac-3c5d-4e07-abba-3382c855eb66.question: How should grades of pass/fail modules be listed for the application of AI in Society program?
a6f55aac-3c5d-4e07-abba-3382c855eb66.answer: For pass/fail modules, 'pass' should be written in the grade section.

e9af738e-3697-4446-873f-bb7312d68fba.question: Does the practical project for the AI in Society program have to be a part of my university course?
e9af738e-3697-4446-873f-bb7312d68fba.answer: Practical projects that were not part of a university module can technically be counted. However, you would then need to provide an official documentation that those practical projects in total spanned at least 540 hours for completion.

9540f287-8a5a-4dad-80cf-3109372a1542.question: Should we offer a replacement date for the aptitude test?
9540f287-8a5a-4dad-80cf-3109372a1542.answer: We must offer a replacement date because the people have a right to it (according to FPSO), if they are prevented from attending the first date for reasons not their own fault. We need it primarily because people will still join the process later.

ac7ea28a-38b1-4ed4-84f1-97d16d0d499e.question: What should candidates do to participate in the aptitude test?
ac7ea28a-38b1-4ed4-84f1-97d16d0d499e.answer: They must submit a VPD (preliminary examination documentation) via uni-assist.de. There, their documents are checked. TUM requires this for most courses. Many people will not receive it in time for the deadline of May 31st. However, TUM does accept evidence at this stage that the VPD has been requested. We can only further check the candidates (admit to the test) once the final VPD is available. And that can also be 4+ weeks after May 31st (and thus also after the first test date).

d169c200-83d9-45ac-a1cb-efcaf69d159f.question: Do we need to create a new set of questions for the replacement aptitude test?
d169c200-83d9-45ac-a1cb-efcaf69d159f.answer: We do not need to create a new question catalog for the replacement test, we can have them write the same test again.

dc50ba9b-d372-4b01-8b18-a0a5d6b52146.question: In the FPSO it says that the aptitude test is "offered in presence at TUM". But we have now only fixed it online. Is that problematic?
dc50ba9b-d372-4b01-8b18-a0a5d6b52146.answer: It is ok, according to Hedi, if we primarily offer the test as an online version (even though it says in the FPSO, it takes place in presence). They must offer people a presence test upon request, they have the right to this. For example, if someone is not able to technically participate in the online test, and only presence is possible.

f95e7079-e3b9-4832-a099-bc5f2d76bc4d.question: How to handle candidates who can't participate in the online test?
f95e7079-e3b9-4832-a099-bc5f2d76bc4d.answer: If candidates confirm they can't participate in the online test for any issues, we let them write the test on paper in the reserve room.

011fbd67-52e8-45ed-8654-e6d158be18fe.question: Why is the application of candidate 1-00865352 for the Praxisprojekt not accepted?
011fbd67-52e8-45ed-8654-e6d158be18fe.answer: For this candidate, even though they have provided additional practical experience, they are formally missing 1 ECTS. So, it is requested they upload an official document stating a) the content of their work and b) the duration, like a work certificate or similar. Without this, the experience cannot be counted.

2a65ce97-17b6-4b4a-a5d2-373ec78970e5.question: Why is the application of candidate 1-00862215 for the Praxisprojekt not accepted?
2a65ce97-17b6-4b4a-a5d2-373ec78970e5.answer: This candidate has provided 13 ECTS worth of modules, which does not meet the 18 ECTS requirement. They need to provide additional practical experience spanning at least 5 ECTS.

815187b8-fd9b-470b-b5af-2010dd14d1e9.question: Why is the application of candidate 1-00865541 for the Mathe/[REDACTED] not accepted?
815187b8-fd9b-470b-b5af-2010dd14d1e9.answer: For this candidate, the content of mathematics/statistics is unclear from the module titles alone. They need to provide some clarification, like official module descriptions, for these modules, to make apparent their relation to mathematics and/or statistics.

5ab5b7cc-0673-4031-8719-441a9bbe86d5.question: How rigorous are the application requirements for the AI in Society program at TUM, particularly regarding the ECTS requirements for a practical project?
5ab5b7cc-0673-4031-8719-441a9bbe86d5.answer: The AI in Society program at TUM adheres to their 18 ECTS requirement strictly. However, exceptions can be made if the applicant can supplement ECTS with relevant working experience.

decbf36a-466e-4b63-a700-7de17d9cf46d.question: Can work experience be used towards the ECTS requirement for the AI in Society program at TUM?
decbf36a-466e-4b63-a700-7de17d9cf46d.answer: Yes, work experience can be considered to reach the required ECTS for the application to the AI in Society program at TUM.

5f24b8f4-4717-4be3-9b02-346c8294de00.question: Is it already fixed, the aptitude test will take place online?
5f24b8f4-4717-4be3-9b02-346c8294de00.answer: Yes, we are planning to make the test online.

8a442508-4787-47c1-b351-53c86fe88753.question: Should or must we offer a replacement date?
8a442508-4787-47c1-b351-53c86fe88753.answer: We must offer a replacement date as people are entitled to it if they cannot attend the first date due to reasons not their fault (according to FPSO). We need it mainly because more people will join the process.

70f72e0a-84e7-4456-8345-c2e964c2d0b6.question: Do we really need a replacement date?
70f72e0a-84e7-4456-8345-c2e964c2d0b6.answer: Yes, we do need a replacement date, especially for those people who will join the process later.

e6caa0dd-7b15-41e7-a1d2-dd389f7aa45e.question: Is it problematic that the exams are offered on-site at TUM according to FPSO but we set online-only exams?
e6caa0dd-7b15-41e7-a1d2-dd389f7aa45e.answer: According to Hedi, it is okay if we primarily offer the test as an online version, even if the FPSO states that it takes place in presence. However, we must offer a presence test upon request.

ed3ee6c8-bbf6-4849-bd04-e37b16a30991.question: Can a student applying to TUM's MSC AI in Society program initially apply for a VPD without an APS certificate before the application deadline of May 31st and send the APS certificate later?
ed3ee6c8-bbf6-4849-bd04-e37b16a30991.answer: You will need to check this with uni-assist. I cannot give information on which documents are sufficient for them.

34ddfe17-0dc1-464f-8611-509659ac40ff.question: What if a student applying to MSC AI in Society at TUM doesn't have the APS verified transcripts for phase two of their practical project by the application deadline?
34ddfe17-0dc1-464f-8611-509659ac40ff.answer: Generally speaking, we need to have all of your documents by the application deadline (May 31st), we cannot make exceptions. If you will not have your Capstone project phase 2 listed in your transcript by May 31st, it could be a possibility to have your professor issue a letter, in which he verifies that you took the course, what you did in it, and how many ECTS the course spanned. The grade is not needed for us, we only need to know that you passed, and how many ECTS you earned from the course. This letter should then also have some type of university stamp on it.

b93fc16a-92f9-423c-bfb6-7afbc63b5f69.question: Are certain application documents required to be sent to uni-assist by the application deadline for the MSC AI in Society program at TUM?
b93fc16a-92f9-423c-bfb6-7afbc63b5f69.answer: All documents needed to issue a VPD need to be sent to uni-assist until our application deadline, May 31st. If you can send them all your documents (including the APS) by then, we can consider this as adhering to our deadline.

75d736fd-5107-49fd-b71a-8c4d343a68f5.question: Once I have my APS and all necessary documents, can I apply for MSC AI in Society directly using TUMonline, or is there any intermediary step?
75d736fd-5107-49fd-b71a-8c4d343a68f5.answer: As soon as you have all documents we are asking for, you are ready to apply. There is no additional step (other than taking care of the VPD, in case you haven’t already).

0a201b70-1c14-4ae0-82ca-b2f135294d87.question: Are academic transcripts until the 7th semester and a reference letter from the capstone supervisor stating that the student will pass the capstone phase 2 assessment sufficient for an application to the MSC AI in Society program at TUM?
0a201b70-1c14-4ae0-82ca-b2f135294d87.answer: Thank you for the documents, this should suffice for the application. Please make sure to upload this letter issued by your professor inside your application. Additionally, in the form for practical projects (you will see it inside the application portal), please write a clear and concise description of what exactly you accomplished in your capstone project. The letter is stating only an “integration of computer science and healthcare”, but we need to know more specifically what you did there. So, the letter is fine like this (as for verification), but in the form, please describe to us in your own words what you did exactly. Make sure to highlight the practical and interdisciplinary aspects.

091bbb20-d8c3-4534-a440-c1945464eea4.question: Do I need to obtain an official letter from the university confirming that the courses were taught in English, or is this information sufficient as proof of English proficiency for M.Sc. AI in Society program at TUM?
091bbb20-d8c3-4534-a440-c1945464eea4.answer: Yes, you need to obtain an official statement that most of your degree was taught in English to be formally correct.

d0c02a5f-16cd-4f88-9186-6980a82d2b8f.question: Will there be additional information provided regarding the content and structure of the written aptitude test?
d0c02a5f-16cd-4f88-9186-6980a82d2b8f.answer: There will be additional information regarding the aptitude test. Please check back on the website soon.

b926085d-6851-4ed7-8f20-8c2c61f7a22e.question: At which stage and in what manner does the motivational letter influence the outcome of the application for the M.Sc. AI in Society program at TUM?
b926085d-6851-4ed7-8f20-8c2c61f7a22e.answer: The motivation letter is an optional element of your application. In case you are invited to an interview, your motivation letter can serve as the basis for the interview. It will not be read unless you are invited to an interview.

899668a6-dbcb-4ff5-9a6f-14c2c6f32826.question: Has my employment verification letter been received yet?
899668a6-dbcb-4ff5-9a6f-14c2c6f32826.answer: Your documents probably have not been reviewed yet due to a high number of applications.

c899f21e-253b-4764-a552-fa7aae9a3824.question: When will the admission decisions be made and by when should applicants know if they are selected for an aptitude test?
c899f21e-253b-4764-a552-fa7aae9a3824.answer: You will be notified whether or not you are invited to take the aptitude test at the very latest one week before the actual test, which is currently scheduled for June 25.

740b3b59-7fd3-4e9b-b13d-27c3d76a3c52.question: Can the APS application form and payment receipt be enough proof to initiate my application?
740b3b59-7fd3-4e9b-b13d-27c3d76a3c52.answer: As soon as you have all documents we are asking for, you are ready to apply. There is no additional step (other than taking care of the VPD, in case you haven’t already: [link]).

65605fd2-20ac-4f2a-a5b9-9e7a540c8d61.question: Once I have my APS and all necessary documents can I apply for MSC AI in Society directly using TUMonline? Or is there any intermediary step?
65605fd2-20ac-4f2a-a5b9-9e7a540c8d61.answer: As soon as you have all documents we are asking for, you are ready to apply. There is no additional step (other than taking care of the VPD).

7b8bdc46-e003-401d-914d-4f9df75e05d7.question: Is the reference letter given by my capstone supervisor and my 7th sem transcript sufficient for the application?
7b8bdc46-e003-401d-914d-4f9df75e05d7.answer: This should suffice for the application. Please make sure to upload this letter issued by your professor inside your application. Additionally, in the form for practical projects, please write a clear and concise description of what exactly you accomplished in your capstone project. The letter is stating only an “integration of computer science and healthcare”, but we need to know more specifically what you did there. So, the letter is fine like this (as for verification), but in the form, please describe to us in your own words what you did exactly. Make sure to highlight the practical and interdisciplinary aspects.

f5ba1df0-2948-4d0d-b319-5b5356f3fb01.question: Considering that my capstone project phase 2 results that suffice the practical project requirement won't be available before the TUM application deadline ends, how could this issue be handled?
f5ba1df0-2948-4d0d-b319-5b5356f3fb01.answer: We need to have all of your documents by the application deadline, we cannot make exceptions. If you will not have your Capstone project phase 2 listed in your transcript by the deadline, it could be a possibility to have your professor issue a letter, in which he verifies that you took the course, what you did in it, and how many ECTS the course spanned. The grade is not needed for us, we only need to know that you passed, and how many ECTS you earned from the course. This letter should then also have some type of university stamp on it.

2aa92974-e40d-4020-b7a8-eacadb426188.question: Is a total of 12 ECTS, from a written bachelor's thesis in English, sufficient as an English proof for the AI in Society program?
2aa92974-e40d-4020-b7a8-eacadb426188.answer: No, the AI in Society program requires a proof of 15 ECTS, meaning the 12 ECTS from the bachelor's degree is not sufficient.

45909b4f-37e5-45c6-825e-1c95cd1716aa.question: Can other English lectures, such as the bachelor's colloquium and '[REDACTED] - Fundamentals (EN)', be used to meet the English proof requirement for the AI in Society program?
45909b4f-37e5-45c6-825e-1c95cd1716aa.answer: Yes, if additional English courses, like the bachelor's colloquium and '[REDACTED] - Fundamentals (EN)', add up to or exceed the required 15 ECTS, they should be sufficient for the English proof requirement.

5b8cb038-c04a-4918-9416-ee83cfc44be1.question: Can I change or reupload documents that have been submitted and not reviewed?
5b8cb038-c04a-4918-9416-ee83cfc44be1.answer: You should be able to upload a new document for that field now, try and give it a go.

a33924a4-b355-4276-8a2c-86e0094193ff.question: Does AI in Society program offer a course catalog for more in depth descriptions?
a33924a4-b355-4276-8a2c-86e0094193ff.answer: The degree program documentation, which contains information about the different modules, is being forwarded to you.

ceecc727-a8e2-4dea-b0a7-540627ed7dad.question: Is there an error in my application form for the Master's program in AI in Society at TUM where I've mistakenly entered my bachelor's grade in the section about my current master's program?
ceecc727-a8e2-4dea-b0a7-540627ed7dad.answer: Everything is fine with your grades now, no need to worry.

d26c6c10-10f9-47b8-8e88-8e36192ee7e1.question: Where can I find the form to fill in my best credits for the 'AI in Society' program application?
d26c6c10-10f9-47b8-8e88-8e36192ee7e1.answer: The form to fill in the best credits will be provided to you inside the application portal, as soon as you start filling out your application. There is no public Excel sheet.

8ff8802e-65e9-4327-9352-c86390f766fb.question: What should I do after completing this form: should I upload it directly in TUM Online or should it be approved firstly by my university and then to upload it?
8ff8802e-65e9-4327-9352-c86390f766fb.answer: The form doesn’t need to be additionally approved by your university. You should upload it directly on TUM Online along with your official transcript of records.

6cfc564a-6baf-4db0-aefe-11ba74ae1d22.question: Can a full-time job be managed alongside a full-time Master’s study program?
6cfc564a-6baf-4db0-aefe-11ba74ae1d22.answer: These kinds of situations are highly individual – it is up to you. However, based on experience, it is nearly impossible to combine full-time work with full-time studies, as a full-time Master’s program is very time intensive (we assume a 40 hour weekly work load here).

4c86e4f1-1510-471c-bf37-845fbd3c29b0.question: What is the maximum duration for finishing the Master’s degree?
4c86e4f1-1510-471c-bf37-845fbd3c29b0.answer: You can take up to 6 semesters max. for finishing the degree. You cannot stretch it out beyond this, with rare exceptions allowing for a 7th semester.

bad7915b-982a-4378-a154-0401a1d7ecc9.question: Is it recommended to combine working full-time with taking up a full-time Master’s degree?
bad7915b-982a-4378-a154-0401a1d7ecc9.answer: In general, it is not recommended to try to combine working full-time with taking up a full-time Master’s degree.

113135fa-d0b4-47cc-8726-c0502ad5a8ce.question: Has the submission of my employment verification letter been received yet?
113135fa-d0b4-47cc-8726-c0502ad5a8ce.answer: In this case, it has probably not been reviewed yet due to a high number of applications.

37fdde38-77ba-474c-8bd2-4d9fcbe303ca.question: When will the admission decisions be rendered and when should applicants know if they are selected for an aptitude test?
37fdde38-77ba-474c-8bd2-4d9fcbe303ca.answer: You will be notified whether or not you are invited to take the aptitude test at the very latest one week before the actual test (which is currently scheduled for June 25).

fd34fdb4-a352-463b-a4e0-06640246b17c.question: What is the rule regarding English language proof if the English BA is less than 15 ECTS?
fd34fdb4-a352-463b-a4e0-06640246b17c.answer: If the English BA is less than 15 ECTS, the requirement can be fulfilled using additional English modules.

58ef2777-63f6-4cbf-a133-8a6f87908395.question: Is the English proficiency evidence of an applicant who has 12 ECTS from Bachelor thesis and an additional 6 ECTS from a separate course taught in English accepted?
58ef2777-63f6-4cbf-a133-8a6f87908395.answer: Yes, the applicant's English proficiency evidence is accepted because additional English modules can be used to fulfill the requirement if the English BA is less than 15 ECTS.

cf3fe45e-d7ae-4419-aab7-ed7fa66bd943.question: Is it worthwhile to apply to the Masters in AI program at TUM if I have a professional experience of 1.5 years in the field of AI?
cf3fe45e-d7ae-4419-aab7-ed7fa66bd943.answer: Given your background and professional experience in the field of AI, you are welcomed to apply. However, make sure to fulfil the prerequisites listed on the website, such as credits from mathematics and/or statistics courses, and practical experience.

52f3e4bf-2218-4531-97c6-2d32c92ee131.question: Do I need to obtain an official letter from the university confirming that the courses were taught in English, or is this information sufficient as proof of English proficiency for application to M.Sc. AI in Society program at TUM?
52f3e4bf-2218-4531-97c6-2d32c92ee131.answer: To be formally correct, you should obtain an official statement that most of your degree was taught in English.

b3b65b91-346a-444c-81db-5908321610a6.question: What is the tuition fee for a semester, including everything, for the program 'AI in society'?
b3b65b91-346a-444c-81db-5908321610a6.answer: The tuition fee for international applicants amounts to 4000€ per semester.

53228aeb-252f-410a-b640-34f670093151.question: Can I apply as an international student to your program 'AI in society'?

0a6ef9c8-2da8-4751-ac67-f3b49de0c5e8.question: How would I give the aptitude test in person for the 'AI in society' program as I'm not in Germany right now? Are there any online options available?
0a6ef9c8-2da8-4751-ac67-f3b49de0c5e8.answer: We are not yet sure if we are offering an online option. If the test will only be conducted in person, we are requiring the applicants to take the test in person.

8d7178d6-1f4e-4da4-ac10-11671b6ae7b1.question: During the bachelor I had some courses that were called “Project”, so in total that makes 3 projects of 6 credits. Would it be possible to apply with 3 of them instead of 1 of 18 credits?

5851b6f2-adb3-4c92-8a2f-055139845f04.question: Are the course documents for AiS publicly available online?
5851b6f2-adb3-4c92-8a2f-055139845f04.answer: Yes, the documents are publicly available.

07c73359-3895-490f-a2d4-0b97a8fd8ba8.question: What contents will the aptitude test for the AI in Society course cover?
07c73359-3895-490f-a2d4-0b97a8fd8ba8.answer: The aptitude test will cover more basic concepts (as the program does not expect applicants to be experts in law and mathematics at the same time). It also won’t be asking knowledge that will only be taught during the program itself.

257dc395-9382-4805-8c20-1d373c548119.question: When will more definitive information about the aptitude test for the AI in Society course be released?
257dc395-9382-4805-8c20-1d373c548119.answer: More definitive information on the aptitude test will be released in the coming weeks.

a70400fb-8b32-4b4a-93af-8e4373d931b9.question: What is the cap for students in the AI in Society program?
a70400fb-8b32-4b4a-93af-8e4373d931b9.answer: The AI in Society program is aiming for a cap of 40-50 students.

7fccffb2-26e9-4da6-856f-ecedf0f1652e.question: How many applications have currently been received for the AI in Society program?

8e5c6d2d-e2f4-4206-b8e0-8526fa387a00.question: Can living in an English-speaking country serve as proof of English proficiency for the AI in Society application?
8e5c6d2d-e2f4-4206-b8e0-8526fa387a00.answer: Living in an English-speaking country cannot unfortunately serve as a formal proof of English proficiency. A formal proof is needed.

f29b052d-96df-47c1-bc34-075fb84f3e5f.question: What kind of proof is needed for the English language requirement in the AI in Society program?
f29b052d-96df-47c1-bc34-075fb84f3e5f.answer: The proof can be provided either with one of the listed tests mentioned on the TUM website or in the case of a thesis written in English (provided that it corresponds to a workload of at least 15 ECTS).

89cb1739-2d9d-4c6a-be6e-8af34b3eec26.question: Is a diploma degree acceptable for the AI in Society program application?
89cb1739-2d9d-4c6a-be6e-8af34b3eec26.answer: A diploma degree is acceptable. However, ECTS comparison must be carried out because a diploma is based on a different system.

873f978b-7b68-4fa7-afd7-a8992799df38.question: What is the issue with my TUM portal application and VPD application via Uni-assist?
873f978b-7b68-4fa7-afd7-a8992799df38.answer: You have indicated that you have applied for the VPD in full. Your proof of this has been received and provisionally OK. However, you need to upload the final VPD for TUM as soon as you receive it from Uni-assist. If your documents have not been received in full by the deadline, you will be excluded from the application process.

3e48612a-ece8-49f5-86f6-a0fb992dda7d.question: Where can I find rules regarding TUM application via Uni-Assist?
3e48612a-ece8-49f5-86f6-a0fb992dda7d.answer: You can refer to the official regulations on the TUM website at https://www.tum.de/studium/bewerbung/uni-assist/

b60281d8-e0ba-4d56-9ce6-8a24927ec153.question: What type of degree qualifications are necessary to apply to the AI in Society program?
b60281d8-e0ba-4d56-9ce6-8a24927ec153.answer: A qualified bachelor’s degree of at least 6 semesters obtained at a domestic or foreign university is necessary. For those with a diploma degree which didn't follow the Bachelor/Master system, it's necessary to provide the necessary documents for an ECTS comparison as diplomas are based on a different system. These documents may include, for example, a transcript of records, semester study plans, etc.

2e67987b-53e9-4d0c-98e8-5c38c4231449.question: How can applicants prove adequate knowledge of the English language for the AI in Society program?
2e67987b-53e9-4d0c-98e8-5c38c4231449.answer: TUM requires an official proof of adequate knowledge in English. This can be accomplished through the tests listed on TUM's website or through an English-language thesis which meets a volume of at least 15 ECTS.

599c04f2-87aa-4cc1-a980-64950777e6c8.question: What are the credit requirements in mathematics or statistics for the AI in Society program?
599c04f2-87aa-4cc1-a980-64950777e6c8.answer: Applicants must have at least 5 credits worth of modules from mathematics or statistics passed during the bachelor’s studies. However, official confirmation of the completed modules is required for verification.

c9e8dffe-5deb-4308-b67a-a1ea5381604c.question: What counts as acceptable practical experience for the AI in Society program?
c9e8dffe-5deb-4308-b67a-a1ea5381604c.answer: A practical project worth at least 18 credits completed during the bachelor’s studies is required. Work experience can be recognized if it matches the subject content expectations of the aptitude committee. Any necessary evidence such as job descriptions or timelines must be uploaded.

289fa399-72a4-40b0-a0eb-12d45aec4d18.question: What is the aptitude test for the AI in Society program?
289fa399-72a4-40b0-a0eb-12d45aec4d18.answer: The aptitude test is mandatory for all applicants who meet the formal requirements. More information about the contents of the test can be found on the TUM's website.

69121ee1-e861-4496-ba9f-cef3e5018b4c.question: Would my involvement in the positive psychology program, aimed at addressing the high depression rate among university students, count as a practical project?
69121ee1-e861-4496-ba9f-cef3e5018b4c.answer: Your project can be considered a practical project, if it fulfils the requirements content-wise, which includes having an interdisciplinary and practical aspect. From your short description, it seems suitable, but a more detailed description is required.

0a61662a-8892-44a5-bcb9-0c3ff4862d06.question: Could you please advise on how the duration and ECTS would be considered for this project?
0a61662a-8892-44a5-bcb9-0c3ff4862d06.answer: If this project was part of your studies and is listed on your Transcript of Records, this is sufficient as proof. The credits given to the module will be referred to (and converted to ECTS if your credit system is not based on ECTS). If you participated in this project outside of university and it is not listed on your Transcript, another form of proof is needed. For example, a work certificate issued by the place where you worked on this project should be uploaded, stating exactly what you did there and how long you were involved.

48f7379b-bfa8-423d-a891-486ae7f408b1.question: How would the practical project(for example the positive psychology program ) be counted as the ETCS? How would the time that I invested be counted? If I did it outside the university myself with the group of students?
48f7379b-bfa8-423d-a891-486ae7f408b1.answer: 1 ECTS corresponds to 30 hours of work. If you worked for one month, assuming a 40-hour work week, times 4 weeks, it would be 160 hours. 160 hours would correspond to 5,3 ECTS. However, you need to provide a statement from the positive psychology program you participated in.

fc1e0c0d-e682-4a49-8ea6-186cfbe52344.question: Once I have my APS and all necessary documents can I apply for MSC AI in Society directly using TUMonline?
fc1e0c0d-e682-4a49-8ea6-186cfbe52344.answer: As soon as you have all documents we are asking for, there is no additional step (other than taking care of the VPD, in case you haven’t already).

e421bd39-4b62-46f6-b57c-a0406becb615.question: Can't the APS application form and payment receipt be enough proof to initiate my application?
e421bd39-4b62-46f6-b57c-a0406becb615.answer: You will need to check this with uni-assist. I cannot give information on which documents are sufficient for them.

5cd90832-bc77-45d2-9889-913a44d5c525.question: Does the attached academic transcript and reference letter suffice the requirement for the application?
5cd90832-bc77-45d2-9889-913a44d5c525.answer: The documents should suffice for the application. Please make sure to upload the letter issued by your professor inside your application. Additionally, in the form for practical projects, please write a clear and concise description of what exactly you accomplished in your capstone project.

f45ff600-c028-4462-a7b9-e9fec486bdac.question: If my Capstone project phase 2 is not listed in my transcript by the application deadline, can a letter from my professor verifying that I took the course suffice?
f45ff600-c028-4462-a7b9-e9fec486bdac.answer: It could be a possibility to have your professor issue a letter, in which he verifies that you took the course, what you did in it, and how many ECTS the course spanned. The grade is not needed for us, we only need to know that you passed, and how many ECTS you earned from the course. This letter should also have some type of university stamp on it.

8dbb5c8b-46fe-4c74-b3d1-38539ebba561.question: Is there a specific form needed for the declaration in the motivational letter for the AI in Society M.Sc at TUM?
8dbb5c8b-46fe-4c74-b3d1-38539ebba561.answer: There is no specific form. Please simply state at the bottom of your motivational letter, in your own words, that you have written the letter yourself and without external help.

4cddda48-d1a6-4b29-88e0-9fcf0ec236ea.question: Once I have my APS and all necessary documents, can I apply for MSC AI in Society directly using TUMonline?
4cddda48-d1a6-4b29-88e0-9fcf0ec236ea.answer: As soon as you have all the documents required, you can apply. However, you must also take care of the VPD (Verification of academic qualifications for professional purposes) if you haven't already.

ab7e1b3e-3e26-44b3-8141-c44eabdd3a57.question: Can the APS application form and payment receipt be enough proof to initiate my application?
ab7e1b3e-3e26-44b3-8141-c44eabdd3a57.answer: TUM does not specifically ask for APS-approved documents for your application. The University's requirements include the VPD, which checks your university documents.

d4d5b20c-49eb-4d33-9583-9dddbaf937bb.question: Do I need an APS certification to apply for the MSC AI in Society program at TUM?
d4d5b20c-49eb-4d33-9583-9dddbaf937bb.answer: An APS certification is not required for the application. However, you do need the VPD.

d026c4f6-1dc7-497a-9b28-23959a2143d6.question: Can I submit the VPD confirmation later than the May 31st application deadline?
d026c4f6-1dc7-497a-9b28-23959a2143d6.answer: Yes, you can submit the final VPD certificate after May 31st. However, you need to have applied for the VPD by May 31st at the latest and be able to upload to the application portal the confirmation over your VPD application.

ae4980f3-0e5f-4b82-9f8b-2cc150085d0c.question: Can I submit a letter from my professor verifying my Capstone project phase 2 since it won't be listed on my transcript by the May 31st deadline?
ae4980f3-0e5f-4b82-9f8b-2cc150085d0c.answer: If your Capstone project phase 2 won't be listed in your transcript by May 31st, you can have your professor issue a letter verifying that you took the course, what you did in it, and how many ECTS the course spanned. This letter should have some type of university stamp on it.

dd32dea0-011b-4622-862b-3039789ad1b6.question: What are the eligibility requirements for the M.Sc. AI in Society program?
dd32dea0-011b-4622-862b-3039789ad1b6.answer: For details on the program requirements, please see here: https://www.sot.tum.de/sot/studium/ai-in-society/, https://www.sot.tum.de/sot/studium/ai-in-society/application/, https://www.tum.de/en/studies/degree-programs/detail/ai-in-society

532d40b5-fd33-4623-bdea-6aae154d8ae0.question: If the VPD application process may cause me to miss the application deadline, would the M.Sc. AI in Society program consider applications received after the deadline?
532d40b5-fd33-4623-bdea-6aae154d8ae0.answer: It is only important that you have applied for the VPD by the end of our application deadline (May 31st). Please upload the confirmation over your VPD application to us – the final VPD you can hand in to us later. This process is understood to take time.

5205a535-3f76-40a2-8677-b48eef40fc4a.question: Does the M.Sc. AI in Society program accepts the PTE academic test as proof of English language proficiency?
5205a535-3f76-40a2-8677-b48eef40fc4a.answer: Yes, TUM also accepts the PTE test. Please see here: https://www.tum.de/en/studies/application/application-info-portal/admission-requirements/language-certificates

8b10fe53-2e95-430f-b7fd-cf33bed8f498.question: Would my involvement in the positive psychology program, aimed at addressing the high depression rate among university students, count as a practical project?
8b10fe53-2e95-430f-b7fd-cf33bed8f498.answer: Yes, your project can be considered a practical project, if it fulfils our requirements content-wise. It must have an interdisciplinary and practical aspect. From your short description, it sounds suitable, but we would need a more detailed description of what you did there. You will be asked for a detailed description inside the application portal.

709a764e-af16-448e-8122-61d9d21293d7.question: How would the duration and ECTS be considered for this project if it was part of my studies and is listed on my Transcript of Records?
709a764e-af16-448e-8122-61d9d21293d7.answer: If this project was part of your studies (i.e. it is listed on your Transcript of Records), this is sufficient as proof. We will refer to the credits given to the module (and convert to ECTS if your credit system is not based on ECTS).

7c587fe2-1ea8-415d-b42f-fe7cf1dbcf4f.question: How would the duration and ECTS be considered for this project if I participated in it outside of university, and it is not listed on my Transcript of Records?
7c587fe2-1ea8-415d-b42f-fe7cf1dbcf4f.answer: If you participated in this project outside of university, i.e. it is not listed on your Transcript, then we need another form of proof. For example, if this was an internship or a work experience, we ask you to upload a work certificate issued by the place where you worked on this project. It should state exactly what you did there, and how long you were involved.

ff9b027f-f896-46c9-a104-1721ebcb9c01.question: Can the APS application form and payment receipt be enough proof to initiate my application?
ff9b027f-f896-46c9-a104-1721ebcb9c01.answer: TUM does not specifically ask for APS approved documents for your application. They ask for VPD, which checks your university documents. However, it was later clarified that APS is indeed necessary to apply for the VPD.

4b86802a-523b-496f-82b8-156e5282566d.question: Once I have my APS and all necessary documents, can I apply for MSC AI in Society directly using TUMonline?
4b86802a-523b-496f-82b8-156e5282566d.answer: As soon as you have all documents they are asking for, you are ready to apply.

d5a11fd0-731d-4590-9f67-d549602025d0.question: What additional steps are necessary other than taking care of the VPD?
d5a11fd0-731d-4590-9f67-d549602025d0.answer: No additional step is required other than taking care of the VPD.

60518382-a91e-4dde-a5ad-a5ab02912a37.question: When should all the documents be submitted by for the application to the MSC AI in Society program?
60518382-a91e-4dde-a5ad-a5ab02912a37.answer: All of your documents should be submitted by the application deadline, May 31st and there can be no exceptions.

c73f3530-e1a7-4547-ac30-0e1be35378ef.question: What if the capstone project phase 2 is not listed in the transcript by May 31st?
c73f3530-e1a7-4547-ac30-0e1be35378ef.answer: If the capstone project phase 2 is not listed in the transcript by May 31st, it could be possible to have your professor issue a letter, in which he verifies that you took the course, what you did in it, and how many ECTS the course spanned. The letter should then also have some type of university stamp on it.

3f8c9334-2223-4d5b-98ad-a8b0bd6bcdfb.question: Is APS and VPD basically the same?
3f8c9334-2223-4d5b-98ad-a8b0bd6bcdfb.answer: APS and VPD are fundamentally different topics. Applications with MZB (eligibility for Master's programs) from China and India must always also apply for a VPD. Without a valid APS (always digital, unless very old), no evaluation of HZB or MZB can take place.

51d970bc-61e7-437a-bb33-0f6675f5ad37.question: What happens if the APS is not in Berlin by the deadline of 31.05.24?
51d970bc-61e7-437a-bb33-0f6675f5ad37.answer: If this is not the case, a VPD can still be issued at some point, but it can then no longer be considered for the WiSe 24/25.

3e7584e7-520a-4b15-ac40-93fc129379b4.question: Do you know if I am able to change my documents / reupload documents that have been submitted and not reviewed?
3e7584e7-520a-4b15-ac40-93fc129379b4.answer: You can upload additional documents/swap them out if they still haven’t been reviewed.

7a7c6cea-68cb-4329-947f-bf83b6e6cb96.question: Can I upload a new document after having trouble with the initial upload?
7a7c6cea-68cb-4329-947f-bf83b6e6cb96.answer: You should be able to upload a new document for that field now.

30f0b830-d1d3-4267-aad5-e5996a366b4f.question: Is there a general time of day for the lectures in the Master’s Program AI in Society, as in mornings, afternoons, evenings or does that vary?
30f0b830-d1d3-4267-aad5-e5996a366b4f.answer: There is no general rule here. The time of each module depends on the professor who teaches the module. A definitive answer cannot be given.

5781f2d0-21b0-483e-99e2-cbab19f8ec13.question: Is it possible to complete the Master’s Program AI in Society while working (full time or reduced hours)?
5781f2d0-21b0-483e-99e2-cbab19f8ec13.answer: Formally, the program is only offered for full-time study. It might be possible for a student to work part-time if they can manage. Full-time work would not work in parallel, as the study load is quite high.

26220375-f3d9-484d-ad9d-c3838951b072.question: Since when does TUM offer the Master’s Program AI in Society?
26220375-f3d9-484d-ad9d-c3838951b072.answer: The first time the program will be offered is the coming winter semester 2024/25. Many of the courses taught as part of the program are established modules at TUM.

ee9f30ec-9972-4a08-b33f-b6576c2caa84.question: Can I use an old TOEFL certificate from 2018 as proof of my English knowledge for the AI in Society program at TUM?
ee9f30ec-9972-4a08-b33f-b6576c2caa84.answer: Yes, you can upload your old TOEFL certificate as proof for your English knowledge.

dce30980-ec1e-4a64-8348-a96b9cf88f9d.question: What should I do if the grade template provided in the application system doesn't have enough rows to list all my credits?
dce30980-ec1e-4a64-8348-a96b9cf88f9d.answer: In this case, duplicate the form, fill out as many rows as you need, and then merge the documents back into one for uploading.

15ee9b19-04b5-4865-8214-223b8e156e32.question: Is it possible to list internships or work experience as a practical project for the AI in Society program at TUM?
15ee9b19-04b5-4865-8214-223b8e156e32.answer: Yes, you can list your work experience as a practical project. In this case, please submit a work certificate which states the duration as well as the content of your work. Despite work certificates not being credit based, TUM will recalculate from work hours to credits (30 hours = 1 ECTS).

36849b7f-ede3-4c69-bed1-2fc779f19a51.question: What should a work certificate entail for the AI in Society program at TUM?
36849b7f-ede3-4c69-bed1-2fc779f19a51.answer: A work certificate should state your role at the company, which type of work you did, which projects you participated in, and the duration of your employment. It should be evident that you didn’t write the letter yourself, with verification such as employer/HR department signature, a company logo on the letter, etc.

626f02d0-1107-4ac0-869c-726e3a06cee0.question: Can I use my 2 semester MBA degree as a proof of English proficiency for the AI in Society program at TUM?
626f02d0-1107-4ac0-869c-726e3a06cee0.answer: No, a 2 semester MBA degree is not sufficient proof of language proficiency. Please submit a different proof of English language skills like a TOEFL, IELTS or other accepted test score.

88f03f7c-d3b3-4e3d-b917-6537eb4288ae.question: Can applicants from India get their documents verified through APS (https://aps-india.de)?
88f03f7c-d3b3-4e3d-b917-6537eb4288ae.answer: Applicants are advised to apply for VPD as the standard procedure.

5f1ffb5b-cf3c-4438-af8d-294944291a37.question: Is it necessary to submit the APS certification for the admission in TU Munich MSC AI in Society?
5f1ffb5b-cf3c-4438-af8d-294944291a37.answer: You do not need an APS certification for the admission in TU Munich MSC AI in Society. It has not been found necessary nor have other applicants been noted to submit it.

b4f67c65-5c25-4267-a172-7319489b2066.question: Can one apply in TUM AI in Society through TUMonline after getting the initial VPD verification done via uni assist and not waiting for the APS certification to arrive?
b4f67c65-5c25-4267-a172-7319489b2066.answer: Yes, one can apply for TUM AI in Society through TUMonline once they get their initial VPD verification done via uni assist. They do not need to wait for the APS certification.

83b9190f-d701-4878-968f-02f1f94a723d.question: Can the APS application form and payment receipt be enough proof to initiate one's application in TUM AI in Society?
83b9190f-d701-4878-968f-02f1f94a723d.answer: TUM does not specifically ask for APS approved documents for your application. Therefore, it is good to have the APS documents but they are not a requirement to initiate the application.

009e77a8-70ea-4266-bdf5-97d64be9689b.question: What other document verification does the TUM require for admission in MSC AI in Society?
009e77a8-70ea-4266-bdf5-97d64be9689b.answer: The TUM requires the VPD verification for your documents in the admission process, which checks your university documents.

713f9c76-e6ad-4c98-bae8-84bddbadee9d.question: Is the APS approved documents a requirement for the application at TUM?
713f9c76-e6ad-4c98-bae8-84bddbadee9d.answer: TUM does not specifically ask for APS approved documents for your application. It is good to have, but not actually a requirement.

23591dce-b20f-48e7-a4b1-9113951f628a.question: What is stated as a requirement for the application at TUM?
23591dce-b20f-48e7-a4b1-9113951f628a.answer: The VPD, which checks your university documents, is stated as a requirement for the application at TUM.

301998ce-0d89-4063-bc9d-acbf1b063df6.question: What to write in the "grade" section for pass/fail modules when filling in the grades for application documents?
301998ce-0d89-4063-bc9d-acbf1b063df6.answer: Please just write "pass" in the grade section for those modules.

1da58d7f-608b-4c55-86ef-91eb5b43ab25.question: Is an official translation needed for all project materials when applying for the AI in Society program?
1da58d7f-608b-4c55-86ef-91eb5b43ab25.answer: You don’t need to submit your project reports in order to prove your completion of the module. Instead, you submit your Transcript of Records as part of the application procedure (this module should then of course be listed in this Transcript). For module description, it is sufficient if you translate into English yourself.

db2d9f51-1279-4032-af2a-357555543b2f.question: Can a weekly research & review course be counted as a project in the application?
db2d9f51-1279-4032-af2a-357555543b2f.answer: It is up to the admission committee to decide. However, if the course is 5 ECTS, then the project would also be recognized with the weight of the 5 ECTS.

1ddef253-52a2-430d-98c9-7667aaa30b9e.question: Do the practical projects for the AI in Society program need to be part of a university course and be officially recognized with credits?
1ddef253-52a2-430d-98c9-7667aaa30b9e.answer: Your practical projects can potentially be non-university projects. However, you would then need to provide us with an official documentation that those practical projects in total spanned at least 540 hours for completion (which corresponds to 18 ECTS).

739bdc36-7216-4e3d-9248-68dad3ab1cfc.question: What to write in the 'grade' section for pass/fail modules when filling in the documents regarding 140 best credits for the AI in Society program at TUM?
739bdc36-7216-4e3d-9248-68dad3ab1cfc.answer: For pass/fail modules, you should just write 'pass' in the grade section.

1ee58549-d18e-4863-9afb-17b0ffef8b0d.question: How can I prove the projects that I did in the courses for the AI in Society program at TUM?
1ee58549-d18e-4863-9afb-17b0ffef8b0d.answer: It is sufficient to submit your Transcript of Records as part of the application procedure which includes the project module as well as fill out a form which states the name of the project module, along with the description of the module/project. For documents not in English, you can provide your own translation.

304b77cd-e777-4704-ab80-157d05f494e4.question: Can a weekly research & review work for a course count as a project for the AI in Society program at TUM?
304b77cd-e777-4704-ab80-157d05f494e4.answer: There isn't a definitive answer as to whether a weekly research & review course will be counted, this is decided by the admission committee. But you are highly encouraged to apply with these courses.

eac77e6e-9a8e-4c28-869b-0e4dbbfdc5d7.question: Does a project counted as course credit receive full weight of the course's ECTS?
eac77e6e-9a8e-4c28-869b-0e4dbbfdc5d7.answer: If a course is 5 ECTS, then the associated project would also be recognized with the weight of the 5 ECTS.

0ebe38b7-541d-4940-8b6e-f921e147205d.question: Can practical projects, not part of a university module, count towards the 18 ECTS requirement for the AI in Society program at TUM?
0ebe38b7-541d-4940-8b6e-f921e147205d.answer: Technically, practical projects that were not part of a university module can be counted but one would need to provide official documentation showing that these projects spanned at least 540 hours for completion (which corresponds to 18 ECTS).

5c168de9-c4a8-4a8b-953e-571c1cf6b869.question: Once I have my APS and all necessary documents, can I apply for MSC AI in Society directly using TUMonline? Or is there any intermediary step?
5c168de9-c4a8-4a8b-953e-571c1cf6b869.answer: As soon as you have all documents, including having taken care of the VPD if necessary, you are ready to apply for MSC AI in Society directly using TUMonline. There are no additional steps.

7f8fe14a-0f57-426f-a034-3303b206411c.question: What steps do I need to take if my Capstone project phase 2 results won't be available before the TUM application deadline ends?
7f8fe14a-0f57-426f-a034-3303b206411c.answer: If your Capstone project phase 2 won't be listed in your transcript by the application deadline, you can have your professor issue a letter verifying that you took the course, what you did in it, and how many ECTS the course spanned. The letter needs to confirm at least that you passed and should have a university stamp on it.

ec3f0b6a-d157-43e7-a2b3-35642b82a763.question: What should I provide if my academic transcript and a reference letter from the capstone supervisor are not sufficient?
ec3f0b6a-d157-43e7-a2b3-35642b82a763.answer: Please make sure to upload this letter issued by your professor inside your application. Additionally, you need to fill out a form for practical projects inside the application portal where you will write a clear and concise description of what you accomplished in your capstone project. Particularly, we need more than just the 'integration of computer science and healthcare'. It is important to describe what you did and to highlight the practical and interdisciplinary aspects of your work.

fbc3a00e-d260-4541-9d12-9759e4e1e4e2.question: What should I do with the bug in the pdf template 'best_credits_form_ais final'?
fbc3a00e-d260-4541-9d12-9759e4e1e4e2.answer: Don't use the form filling function in those fields, but instead just put the text on top.

5e18e7c1-648f-4ae7-91d9-a77b3f770eaf.question: Should I attach the document explaining the credit calculation from my bachelor university to 'best_credits_form_ais final'?
5e18e7c1-648f-4ae7-91d9-a77b3f770eaf.answer: Yes, please attach this to your application. You can attach it to the end or beginning of the form. This document will be referred to when converting your credits to ECTS.

4f26cc6c-d71a-47e3-bc78-00d5690bf0fa.question: In the application for AI in Society, should my current status be referred to as 'Consecutive masters courses' or 'Second degree'?
4f26cc6c-d71a-47e3-bc78-00d5690bf0fa.answer: In this case, you should choose 'Second degree', as it would be your second Master's degree.

e4cbed27-63e9-4dcb-adc6-f05cae18e5fe.question: In the application procedure, should I choose my ongoing master program or one of my bachelor degrees for the 'Entrance qualification for Master's program'?
e4cbed27-63e9-4dcb-adc6-f05cae18e5fe.answer: Please name your Bachelor’s degree here, as you can not apply to a Master’s program with another Master’s program.

d7ede527-f2e0-4b18-a5ad-eb69e46ccfda.question: For the 'Proof of successful participation in a practical project.. at leat 18 credits', can I use my bachelor praktikum + a TUM practical course, or my bachelor thesis, to fulfill this requirement?
d7ede527-f2e0-4b18-a5ad-eb69e46ccfda.answer: For all three of your options: yes. But please make sure their contents adhere to the program requirements and particularly highlight the interdisciplinary aspect of your projects.

1c36a772-94a9-4957-a81d-d873d0482b53.question: Do you know if I am able to change my documents / reupload documents that have been submitted and not reviewed?
1c36a772-94a9-4957-a81d-d873d0482b53.answer: I suppose you could upload additional documents/swap them out if they still haven’t been reviewed. Please give it a try.

7385d8a0-cc06-41b5-9ca1-6f21e024b90d.question: What documents are required by the application deadline?
7385d8a0-cc06-41b5-9ca1-6f21e024b90d.answer: All of your documents need to be submitted by the application deadline including your transcript and possibly a letter from your professor verifying that you took certain courses, what you did in them, and how many ECTS the courses spanned. The grade is not needed, only the pass status and the ECTS earned from the course. This verification letter should also have a university stamp on it.

4da7b6ae-88d3-402c-8f98-1a307706351d.question: What should be included in the description of the capstone project in the application form?
4da7b6ae-88d3-402c-8f98-1a307706351d.answer: The description of the capstone project should be clear and concise, describing exactly what was accomplished in the project, and it should highlight the practical and interdisciplinary aspects. Although the verification letter may only state an “integration of computer science and healthcare”, it is important to provide distinct details of your involvement and contributions in the form.

2ce2b221-58b2-41d8-b893-0929ebed5f7a.question: What does the verification letter from the professor need to include?
2ce2b221-58b2-41d8-b893-0929ebed5f7a.answer: The verification letter issued by the professor needs to confirm that you have taken the course, provide details about what was done in it, and mention the number of ECTS earned from the course. The letter does not need to include the grades, but it needs to verify that the course was passed. Additionally, the letter needs to have some type of university stamp on it.

c7800a49-32f5-49dc-9d06-a92a25994785.question: When applying for AI for Society, should the application form be completed as a 'Consecutive masters course' OR 'Second degree' for a student already studying Robotics, Cognition, Intelligence (M.Sc.) at TUM with two bachelors in Mechatronics?
c7800a49-32f5-49dc-9d06-a92a25994785.answer: You should choose 'Second degree' as it would be your second Master’s degree.

bb1c579c-0b6f-421b-9112-bdacc213b150.question: What should be referred to fill in the 'best 140 ECTS' in the application form?

97ffa6dc-58cf-43c9-aa16-ad2b3850c107.question: For the 'Entrance qualification for Master’s program' in the application procedure, should I choose my on-going master program RCI at TUM OR choose one of my bachelor degree?
97ffa6dc-58cf-43c9-aa16-ad2b3850c107.answer: You should name your Bachelor’s degree here, as you can not apply to a Master’s program with another Master’s program.

e5268ec2-697f-493c-9c85-1385fe4150f2.question: For the 'Proof of passing module in math or statistics', I would like to use the course [REDACTED] at TUM, Is it appropriate? Does this option strictly have to be pure math?
e5268ec2-697f-493c-9c85-1385fe4150f2.answer: As mathematics and statistics are inherently part of the course you mentioned, it would be acceptable and does not have to be pure math.

103c3d8a-1b36-48dc-a5c2-2cf7968cd90d.question: For the 'Proof of successful participation in a practical project.. at least 18 credits', can I use my bachelor praktikum (10 ECTS) + TUM practical course (10 ECTS) to fulfill this requirement? Is my bachelor thesis also recognized as a practical project?
103c3d8a-1b36-48dc-a5c2-2cf7968cd90d.answer: For all your options: yes. However, make sure their contents adhere to our requirements.

7c1f91ca-c3b2-4686-a97c-578f8a3a057c.question: For the 'Evidence of English', I have already been checked with IELTS when I apply for the RCI master program, how can I fulfill this requirement automatically?
7c1f91ca-c3b2-4686-a97c-578f8a3a057c.answer: In this case, please upload the same IELTS certificate again in your application to AI in Society.

eaee4756-67a7-4eda-8341-40daa16c0dfd.question: What is the application deadline for the MSC AI in Society at TUM?

4570a72e-8999-4df7-ad7f-5cc1fc32f862.question: If a component of my course won't be completed by the deadline, can an exception be made?
4570a72e-8999-4df7-ad7f-5cc1fc32f862.answer: No, exceptions cannot be made. All documents need to be submitted by the application deadline.

9373f882-769e-478e-ba50-0def921514d0.question: What can I do if my Capstone project phase 2 won't be listed in my transcript by the application deadline?
9373f882-769e-478e-ba50-0def921514d0.answer: It might be possible for your professor to issue a letter verifying that you took the course, what you did in it, and how many ECTS the course spanned. The grade is not needed, they only need to know that you passed, and how many ECTS you earned from the course. This letter should then also have some type of university stamp on it.

dd30bfe1-406d-4036-8501-640f70ae404f.question: What are the requirements for projects completed during bachelor’s studies?
dd30bfe1-406d-4036-8501-640f70ae404f.answer: A practical project worth at least 18 credits completed during the bachelor’s studies is required.

39204d74-7ff9-43ed-b2dc-f3a1f03e1f9e.question: What are the Language skills necessary for international applicants for the Master AI in Society program?
39204d74-7ff9-43ed-b2dc-f3a1f03e1f9e.answer: The entrance requirements include an IELTS score of at least 6.5.

d47015be-730a-4f11-a50f-7ac5aed37242.question: Does the university accept the result of the IELTS single subject having the 'retake' logo in one transcript or the result of the component of two tests?
d47015be-730a-4f11-a50f-7ac5aed37242.answer: This should be fine, but it's advised to also add an explanation when uploading these documents to clarify the situation.

bc4ae080-2636-4878-95eb-c1eeb6891928.question: Can I combine scores from two different IELTS transcripts to meet the requirement of 6.5 for the application to the Master AI in Society program?
bc4ae080-2636-4878-95eb-c1eeb6891928.answer: This should be fine, but candidates should provide an explanation when uploading these documents to ensure clarity.

ef5780da-abb8-48d6-abd4-f8324c6d7645.question: Can I provide my certificate from the MIT ADSP program for verification of my project at a later date?
ef5780da-abb8-48d6-abd4-f8324c6d7645.answer: You need to provide an official proof of this project, like your certificate from MIT ADSP. You can provide this until the application deadline which is May 31st.

9654c6a6-a7c5-47ac-97d7-88a3040d180e.question: Is my final submission document sufficient as proof for my MIT ADSP Capstone Project until I receive the certificate?
9654c6a6-a7c5-47ac-97d7-88a3040d180e.answer: If you don’t have the certificate yet, you don’t have to upload the same thing again. You need to provide official proof like the certificate.

35845904-babc-4b5d-b9b1-3a0c19e5dafd.question: Can my INSEAD MBA certificate and dean's letter be used as proof of my English skills for the AI in society master's program?
35845904-babc-4b5d-b9b1-3a0c19e5dafd.answer: You should upload your old TOEFL certificate, which you got in 2018. We will consider this as proof for your English knowledge.

2f9726d8-95e2-4282-bb54-ac1662fb7e6f.question: There isn't enough space in the application form to list all my grades from my 2 bachelor's degrees and MBA, how should I handle this?
2f9726d8-95e2-4282-bb54-ac1662fb7e6f.answer: You should duplicate the form, fill out as many rows as you need, and then merge the documents back into one for uploading.

708c4325-a1c3-435e-bf64-11509f00fde1.question: Can I use my INSEAD MBA certificate and dean's letter as proof of my English skills if it was a 2 semester program?
708c4325-a1c3-435e-bf64-11509f00fde1.answer: If you want to prove your English skills with a previous degree, it needs to be a degree conforming to EU standard durations (bachelor's: 6-8 semester, master's: 4 semesters minimum). With a 2 semester MBA, the requirement to prove English language skills cannot be met. Please submit a different proof of English language skills like a TOEFL, IELTS or other accepted test score as instructed.

cc98c33c-65fd-464a-8b17-d307073e4db3.question: What documents should be included to fulfill the list of credits for the application to the AI in society master's program?
cc98c33c-65fd-464a-8b17-d307073e4db3.answer: In the list of credits, you need to select the best 140 credits of the Bachelor you're applying with. This means the relevant subjects are only from the Bachelor of Economics.

a2921a00-1330-4862-8dab-32c1487fa9ae.question: Would a master’s degree taught entirely in English be sufficient proof of language proficiency for the MSc. AI in Society program at TUM?
a2921a00-1330-4862-8dab-32c1487fa9ae.answer: Yes, if your previous study program was taught entirely in English, this would be accepted as proof of English proficiency. The certificate to be uploaded should clearly state that the instruction language of the study program was English.

1b4838a7-234c-40e2-a50a-6e9aaca17fb3.question: Can a previous master's degree be used as an entrance qualification for a master's degree according to TUM's rules?
1b4838a7-234c-40e2-a50a-6e9aaca17fb3.answer: You can't apply to a Master's program with another Master's degree. Instead, you should apply with your Bachelor's degree, even if it was obtained from another country.

cd859682-0b01-47f2-b554-1694e06a30ee.question: Can I apply for the M.Sc. AI in Society program at TUM if I have an engineering background?
cd859682-0b01-47f2-b554-1694e06a30ee.answer: Yes, applicants with an engineering background are not sorted out. They are welcome to apply.

84716dd7-f48b-4b91-a0f7-4a3456e5730e.question: Is a practical project of at least 18 ECTS required at the time of application for the M.Sc. AI in Society program at TUM?
84716dd7-f48b-4b91-a0f7-4a3456e5730e.answer: Yes, a practical project of minimum 18 ECTS is required at the time of application. However, the e-mail sender is asked if he/she has completed a general practical project or has otherwise gained practical experience in the form of non-university internships or work experience.

4c868e41-7f1f-49f1-bb71-69c3d2b2677b.question: Is the M.Sc. AI in Society program at TUM not intended for engineering students as it requires a practical project?
4c868e41-7f1f-49f1-bb71-69c3d2b2677b.answer: No explicit answer given, but the sender suggests it's not the case and asks if the receiver has completed a practical project or gained practical experience in other ways.

9b3fcf77-aa7c-47eb-a8a0-3f42442717cf.question: Is the basic profile on MyGermanUniversity paid or free?
9b3fcf77-aa7c-47eb-a8a0-3f42442717cf.answer: The basic profile on MyGermanUniversity is a completely free service for both the courses and the students.

2b6c3e23-27a6-408f-93e4-bccb3c564628.question: Will there be additional costs if the M․Sc. AI in Society program is listed on MyGermanUniversity?
2b6c3e23-27a6-408f-93e4-bccb3c564628.answer: No, listing the M․Sc. AI in Society program on MyGermanUniversity doesn't incur additional costs.

71dfa373-15aa-41d4-a4bc-c7da4b7c6ab1.question: Why did the organization decline the offer to collaborate with MyGermanUniversity?
71dfa373-15aa-41d4-a4bc-c7da4b7c6ab1.answer: The organization declined the offer as they are already doing marketing elsewhere and find the basic entry on MyGermanUniversity comprehensive enough.

d8102a6c-905c-4ab2-a8b7-bf7ecefee749.question: How can I fill in more courses than the form allows for the 'best 140 credits' document needed in the application for the TUM Master program AI in Society?
d8102a6c-905c-4ab2-a8b7-bf7ecefee749.answer: You should duplicate the form, fill out however many fields you need, merge the documents back into one, and upload it like this.

0449dcdc-e8ae-46e4-89d5-93a125255359.question: Can one substitute the practical project requirement or fulfill it during the Master's in the AI in Society program if they were unable to earn 18 ECTS from a practical project during their Bachelor's studies?
0449dcdc-e8ae-46e4-89d5-93a125255359.answer: In case you were not able to gain enough practical experience within your Bachelor's studies, we also credit non-university experience in the form of internships or work experience. The interdisciplinary aspect is important to us: a societal issue should have been dealt with technically, such as through programming. If you have made similar experiences outside of your university studies, we would need employment references confirming the duration and content. It is unfortunately not possible to retrospectively fulfill this requirement.

4c4242c0-4ea3-4dff-9028-59b021b9ff32.question: Can I apply to the study program if I haven't finished my Bachelors degree?
4c4242c0-4ea3-4dff-9028-59b021b9ff32.answer: Yes, you can apply to the study program even if you still haven’t finished your Bachelors degree. Instead, you should submit your current Transcript of Records, which should span at least 140 ECTS credits.

8fb43764-7934-4da4-b673-8e2b54dc6437.question: Do I need to submit my Bachelors certificate during the application procedure for the Masters program?
8fb43764-7934-4da4-b673-8e2b54dc6437.answer: No, during the application procedure, the final Bachelors certificate is not required. However, you will need to submit your final Bachelors certificate if you get admitted to the study program.

3f949369-98a8-47b5-9c84-3d3962b06ff2.question: Do I only need to list the courses with the highest grades from top to low, or do I need to list the courses with the highest credits for the 'List of 140 best credits' document?
3f949369-98a8-47b5-9c84-3d3962b06ff2.answer: You should list your courses sorted from highest grade to lowest grade.

6ff99456-ddd7-40a5-bf40-2c1173cbc31a.question: Will the content of the 'List of 140 best credits' document affect the outcome of my application?
6ff99456-ddd7-40a5-bf40-2c1173cbc31a.answer: It will affect your application only in a good way: we're asking for this sorting, because we only consider your best grades for calculating your admission score. This form is essentially just some help for us to see right away, which of your modules are your best, without manually sorting through your Transcript of Records.

a8f56f9a-57db-4b59-a16b-26c8363201a1.question: If I filled all the tables of the document, but it didn't reach the requirement of 140 ECT in total, Can I duplicate the table and add courses to let the total number of credits of all courses listed reach 140 ECT?
a8f56f9a-57db-4b59-a16b-26c8363201a1.answer: Yes, if there is not enough space, you can duplicate the form.

ecd958ac-e58a-4069-9a0e-273feb39fdb4.question: Do I only need to list the courses with the highest grades from top to low, or do I need to list the courses with the highest credits for the 'List of 140 best credits' document?
ecd958ac-e58a-4069-9a0e-273feb39fdb4.answer: You should list your courses sorted from highest grade to lowest grade.

684f617f-c999-4634-a765-4b2d7528f31d.question: Will the content of the courses I list in the 'List of 140 best credits' document affect the outcome of my application?
684f617f-c999-4634-a765-4b2d7528f31d.answer: This sorting will affect your application only in a good way: the sorting is done so that only your best grades are considered for calculating your admission score. The form helps to immediately identify your best modules without manually sorting through your Transcript of Records.

59a1a331-6288-4660-90dc-7c31aed3880e.question: In the application for the Masterstudiengang AI and Society, is a Bachelor's thesis written in English sufficient as a language qualification instead of an official test?
59a1a331-6288-4660-90dc-7c31aed3880e.answer: An English written Bachelor's thesis is also sufficient as proof for the MSc. AI in Society.

bef2e0a6-f16e-4813-8742-4d56d67988a0.question: What explanation is needed if I want to submit my work experience, internships, or something similar to achieve the required ECTS for the practical project?
bef2e0a6-f16e-4813-8742-4d56d67988a0.answer: We would need a work certificate stating: a) what you did there in terms of content, and b) how long the relationship lasted.

82776389-0478-4511-8e6b-c61a8f07c03a.question: Does my application get considered if my ECTS for the practical project is only 12 instead of the required 18 ECTS?
82776389-0478-4511-8e6b-c61a8f07c03a.answer: We encourage applicants to apply even if they *do not exactly match the content examples* we suggest for orientation. However, this hint does not apply to things like the number of ECTS! Otherwise, this would be unfair to other applicants.

647f736b-bcde-4d8d-8f0f-89afc4ab8721.question: Is it necessary for the English proof (which must have at least 15 ECTS according to our degree program regulations) to be provided by a module conducted in English, if my Bachelor's thesis has less ECTS (for example 12 ECTS)?
647f736b-bcde-4d8d-8f0f-89afc4ab8721.answer: If your Bachelor's thesis has less ECTS (for example, 12 ECTS), you would have to formally provide 3 ECTS by attending a module conducted in English.

4c4abaa6-5998-4854-b0d9-280d48b69012.question: What is the requirement for an English proof in the form of a bachelor's thesis?
4c4abaa6-5998-4854-b0d9-280d48b69012.answer: The Bachelor's thesis must have already been submitted and graded. The English title must be marked in the transcript as a successful academic achievement, and it must be apparent from the transcript that the work was written in English; otherwise, a separate university certificate about the language of the bachelor's thesis must be submitted.

318cd509-be1a-4b20-a3d6-24e80f02073d.question: What is the required ECTS for the English language proof in AIS application?
318cd509-be1a-4b20-a3d6-24e80f02073d.answer: The English language proof for AIS application should comprise 15 ECTS.

d7d2a55e-2809-42b5-af48-e4f96fd40e8a.question: If a student's English Bachelor's thesis only covers 12 ECTS, is it sufficient to serve as English language proof for the AIS application?
d7d2a55e-2809-42b5-af48-e4f96fd40e8a.answer: No, it is not sufficient. The student would need to make up for the missing 3 ECTS with an additional module held in English.

27953b18-c51a-43b8-9965-13553fd2506c.question: Can an English Bachelor's thesis serve as a valid proof of English proficiency in the AIS application process?
27953b18-c51a-43b8-9965-13553fd2506c.answer: Yes, an English Bachelor's thesis can serve as a valid proof of English proficiency in the AIS application process.

f01492de-f271-442b-8050-d84130eb7cf5.question: Does the uploaded proof of a foreign semester count as a valid proof of English proficiency?
f01492de-f271-442b-8050-d84130eb7cf5.answer: No, a proof of a foreign semester does not count as a valid proof of English proficiency.

f49eeae6-7a7c-4d2c-960e-a9e25eb41682.question: In the application for the Master's program AI and Society, can an English-written Bachelor's thesis be sufficient for evidencing language proficiency?
f49eeae6-7a7c-4d2c-960e-a9e25eb41682.answer: Yes, an English-written Bachelor's thesis is sufficient as a proof for our AI and Society program.

018ba27f-8f7e-4298-a075-20e654aa5acf.question: What other details should I observe when using my Bachelor's thesis as proof of English proficiency for the AI in Society program?
018ba27f-8f7e-4298-a075-20e654aa5acf.answer: Please note that the Bachelor's thesis should already be submitted and graded. The English title must be noted in the transcript as a successful study performance and it must be apparent from the transcript that the work was written in English; otherwise, a separate certificate of the language of the Bachelor's thesis must be presented from the University.

60f911b3-0205-4a6a-9906-7c601b794a17.question: What is the required number of ECTS to qualify English proficiency via university coursework for the AI in Society program?
60f911b3-0205-4a6a-9906-7c601b794a17.answer: The proof of English proficiency through university events must include at least 15 ECTS. That means, if your Bachelor's thesis comprises less (e.g., 12 ECTS), you would formally have to provide evidence of an additional 3 ECTS through an English module that you have attended.

5b57620f-7277-4cc4-97c4-0bb74421452e.question: Do I fulfill the requirement of the practical project worth at least 18 ECTS for admission to the AI in Society program?
