5b57620f-7277-4cc4-97c4-0bb74421452e.answer: You bring along sufficient experience, since we also count practical experience outside of university (i.e., work experience, internships, etc). The way we make this ECTS-comparable is by calculating from hours to credits (1 ECTS credit = 30 hrs). So your in total 7 months of internships/jobs would cover the requirement.

6cfa1e1e-9137-4a61-b7c7-d763c27db674.question: What type of content are you looking for in the practical experiences for the AI in Society program?
6cfa1e1e-9137-4a61-b7c7-d763c27db674.answer: When we are screening applications, we are looking for interdisciplinarity in the applicant’s project(s) and strongly require a practical aspect in the form of implementation(programming), some kind of data analysis, or similar, applied to some sort of field in society.

cd985e87-6c99-443e-a0d4-4ce88917887b.question: Is there a chance to make up for the ECTS requirement of 18 ECTS in practical experience for the AI in Society program?
cd985e87-6c99-443e-a0d4-4ce88917887b.answer: Proof of 18 ECTS in practical experience needs to be provided at the time of application, i.e., before the 31st of May. Anything submitted after that cannot be considered. No provisions can be made for making up this requirement later.

605aac52-0be3-4d6e-a5c6-836cdd1fa9b5.question: Would my bachelor thesis, for which I received 10 ECTS, count towards the 18 ECTS requirement of practical experience for the AI in Society program?
605aac52-0be3-4d6e-a5c6-836cdd1fa9b5.answer: The bachelor thesis could potentially count, depending on what was done in relation to it. However, if it is considered, you would still be lacking 8 ECTS. If you have other modules that could be deemed suitable or any other practical experience, this could be credited towards the requirement.

8c42f190-edae-4711-b83e-f6b970aaed5d.question: What are the criteria required for admission to the Master's program AI in Society?
8c42f190-edae-4711-b83e-f6b970aaed5d.answer: The criteria required for admission to the Master's program AI in Society include a degree program scope of 180 ECTS. The scope should ideally be divided as 79 ECTS in the legal field and 101 ECTS in the business field. The academic degree should be Bachelor of Science. Practical experience through a mandatory internship, a working student job, or other types of internship are also needed. The internships should total at least 18 ECTS.

4bb50a76-7e94-4e11-bd21-0d57e8a300cc.question: Can the requirement of the practical project worth at least 18 ECTS be made up for during the course of my studies?
4bb50a76-7e94-4e11-bd21-0d57e8a300cc.answer: The practical project worth at least 18 ECTS should ideally be completed before you apply. However, if you have adequate months of internship/jobs, they could cover the requirement. The calculation is made from hours to credits (1 ECTS credit = 30 hrs).

8d3584d9-40ff-4189-800e-10eedc565ab6.question: What kind of practical experiences are countable towards the 18 ECTS credit requirement for the AI in Society program at the University of Augsburg?
8d3584d9-40ff-4189-800e-10eedc565ab6.answer: The program is looking for interdisciplinarity in an applicant’s project(s) and strongly requires a practical aspect in the form of implementation (programming), some kind of data analysis, or similar, applied to some field in society.

16aacc08-1a79-4182-85ff-c78de5cfb06f.question: Does a legal/tax area internship meets the required practical experience for AI in Society program?
16aacc08-1a79-4182-85ff-c78de5cfb06f.answer: The program requires integrated engineering or scientific knowledge with insights from political, economics, or social sciences. A mere legal/tax concept would not count unless it includes a significant engineering/scientific knowledge/tools.

92302a3b-ee0b-4703-96a3-ecac4995f9d5.question: Does the Masters program include counting of practical experience outside of university for the ECTS requirement?
92302a3b-ee0b-4703-96a3-ecac4995f9d5.answer: Yes, practical experience outside of university such as work experience, internships, etc. count for the ECTS requirement. They are calculated from hours to credits with 1 ECTS credit equivalent to 30 hours.

40b89f15-0f7a-4679-8cb5-daec9ddb41b4.question: What is the requirement for the content of the practical experiences for the program?
40b89f15-0f7a-4679-8cb5-daec9ddb41b4.answer: When screening applications for the program, they look for interdisciplinarity in the applicant’s project(s) and a practical aspect in the form of implementation (programming), some kind of data analysis, or similar, applied to some sort of field in society.

5b47ccd0-40c1-45a0-928f-216033e1d46c.question: I have 7 months of internships/jobs in total, does this cover the ECTS requirement?
5b47ccd0-40c1-45a0-928f-216033e1d46c.answer: Yes, 7 months of internships/jobs would cover the ECTS requirement for the Masters program.

b288b613-fb3c-420d-8841-3b159b507e85.question: Can a bachelor thesis written in English serve as a language proficiency proof for the AI and Society Master's program at TUM?
b288b613-fb3c-420d-8841-3b159b507e85.answer: Yes, for the AI and Society program, a bachelor thesis written in English is sufficient proof of language proficiency.

e74a9f53-65df-4435-ad4e-8b944de6b834.question: What conditions should an English bachelor's thesis meet to be accepted as language proficiency proof for the AI and Society program at TUM?
e74a9f53-65df-4435-ad4e-8b944de6b834.answer: The bachelor's thesis must already be submitted and graded. The English title must be noted in the transcript as a successful academic achievement and it must be clear from the transcript that it was written in English; otherwise, a separate certificate from the university confirming the language of the bachelor's thesis must be submitted.

c1a7d300-cf62-4f90-b9c9-bf1ef1f7d995.question: What if my current proficiency document uploaded in the application portal cannot be considered as English proof for the AI and Society program at TUM?
c1a7d300-cf62-4f90-b9c9-bf1ef1f7d995.answer: If your current proficiency document cannot be considered as English proof, please upload either a) an appropriate transcript (see above), or b) a separate language certificate from your university.

0f500483-46eb-48e7-b40f-f9aa53647a05.question: Does a bachelor's thesis written in English qualify as proof of English proficiency?
0f500483-46eb-48e7-b40f-f9aa53647a05.answer: Yes, a bachelor's thesis written in English can be used as proof of English proficiency.

65f5f605-2fb1-4bb9-842d-120cdc637b4e.question: Can a bachelor's thesis written in English be sufficient as a proof of English language proficiency for applying to the MSc. AI in Society?
65f5f605-2fb1-4bb9-842d-120cdc637b4e.answer: Yes, for the MSc. AI in Society program, a bachelor's thesis written in English can also suffice as proof of English proficiency.

d5629349-98ab-4433-8bc8-13039aab08bb.question: Is it possible for / would TUM consider my Masters degree which is quantitatively heavier than my Bachelors degree, in addition to my Bachelors degree and count it towards achieving the 48 points in Part 1 of the application process when I submit my application to this program?
d5629349-98ab-4433-8bc8-13039aab08bb.answer: For the requirements, the university can only consider the applicants’ Bachelors degrees. However, completed projects in your Masters that could count towards the 18 ECTS practical project requirement can be listed.

1e1708e6-6000-434b-a294-072fa9967fc2.question: I completed one internship during my bachelors studies. However, is it possible / would TUM consider my internship experience gained during my Masters degree and/or my six (6) plus years of professional experience working for the [REDACTED] Department of Transportation as a [REDACTED] in lieu of these 18 ECTS credit hours?
1e1708e6-6000-434b-a294-072fa9967fc2.answer: Yes, it is possible to provide evidence of practical experience that was not gained as part of your studies, but rather as working experience or similar. However, you need to provide documents (like a certificate of employment) indicating the content of your work, and the duration.

5577f26f-2c09-483c-8113-0f1a87056897.question: Once I submit my documents and if I am fortunate enough to be admitted, would I be able to defer enrollment by a year?
5577f26f-2c09-483c-8113-0f1a87056897.answer: Yes, you can apply for the study program, get an offer for a place, and accept it only a year later. In this case, you’d refuse the initial offer, re-apply to the program a year later and upload the basic documents again. Afterwards, you won’t have to go through the aptitude assessment process anymore, but will go straight to admission.

c85bdecf-1f5e-4108-b074-160aa9d1510a.question: If the decision rendered is admitted/accepted and I chose to defer, would I automatically be accepted for the following academic year?
c85bdecf-1f5e-4108-b074-160aa9d1510a.answer: You will not be automatically accepted into the next year’s cohort, since you will have declined the offer. However, if you then re-apply the following year, the system will still “remember” you passing the procedure the year prior, allowing you to be accepted right away.

e87f423c-2d6a-408f-a2ff-4ec5e82997e4.question: Regarding the Math and Statistics portion of submitting my documents, I received an email saying it was incorrect, however I am uncertain how to correct it.
e87f423c-2d6a-408f-a2ff-4ec5e82997e4.answer: You had listed modules such as economics in a section that required only academic achievements in mathematics. You should fix this issue and re-upload the form.

91554c4e-c298-453b-9c12-e85910b09316.question: Who, when and how exactly does the conversion of modules from non-ECTS systems take place?
91554c4e-c298-453b-9c12-e85910b09316.answer: The conversion of modules from non-ECTS systems is done by Sandra who can explain the process of how credits from non-ECTS areas are converted.

ede4e438-3406-485e-b61f-d1982217b400.question: Who is responsible for converting modules from non-ECTS systems for AIS applications at our institution?
ede4e438-3406-485e-b61f-d1982217b400.answer: Sandra, who's on Cc, is responsible for converting credits from the non-ECTS region into ECTS.

ea717152-404b-4215-896f-1a2f773a9d4e.question: Is it possible for / would TUM consider my Masters degree which is quantitively heavier than my Bachelors degree, in addition to my Bachelors degree and count it towards achieving the 48 points in Part 1 of the application process?
ea717152-404b-4215-896f-1a2f773a9d4e.answer: For this part, we can only consider the applicants’ Bachelors degrees. However, if you completed some projects in your Masters that could count towards the 18 ECTS practical project requirement, you are welcome to list them there (in this case, please provide your Masters degree transcript as well).

5786191e-c8be-4a9f-b1b3-1e222ddda92e.question: Is it possible / would TUM consider my internship experience gained during my Masters degree and/or my six (6) plus years of professional experience working for a Department of Transportation in lieu of the 18 ECTS credit hours?
5786191e-c8be-4a9f-b1b3-1e222ddda92e.answer: Yes, it is possible to provide evidence of practical experience that was not gained as part of your studies, but rather as working experience or similar. In this case, please provide us some documents (like a certificate of employment), which indicates the content of your work, and the duration of it.

05c5ed1d-c65d-4130-9d84-4654da7e17b7.question: Once I submit my documents and if I am fortunate enough to be admitted, would I be able to defer enrollment by a year?
05c5ed1d-c65d-4130-9d84-4654da7e17b7.answer: Yes, you can apply for the study program, get an offer for a place, and accept it only a year later. In this case, you’d refuse the offer. Re-apply to the program a year later. Afterwards, you won’t have to go through the aptitude assessment process anymore, but will go straight to admission.

b08af71d-f10d-4a19-92e1-7e6ca22a0761.question: If the decision rendered is admitted/accepted and I chose to defer would I automatically be accepted for the following academic year?
b08af71d-f10d-4a19-92e1-7e6ca22a0761.answer: If you then re-apply the following year, the system will still 'remember' you passing the procedure the year prior, allowing us to accept you right away. But please keep in mind that you also need to pass the written aptitude test in order to receive an offer.

3e850aa0-b548-4f06-b5d0-a764e5a0da1d.question: Can I include a practical project that will not be finalized by the application deadline for MSc. AI in Society?
3e850aa0-b548-4f06-b5d0-a764e5a0da1d.answer: No, practical projects that will not be finalized by the application deadline cannot be accepted.

889db408-9482-452e-ac28-ac24820a175b.question: How can I include my work experience in my application for the MSc. AI in Society program?
889db408-9482-452e-ac28-ac24820a175b.answer: You can include your work experience by submitting a work certificate from your company. The certificate needs to state what you have been working on and for how long. Make sure to also list this experience in the provided form.

7d119754-4c17-4ac3-adb5-8de7a0084a71.question: What is the relevance of the duration of my work experience in my application for the MSc. AI in Society program?
7d119754-4c17-4ac3-adb5-8de7a0084a71.answer: The duration of your work experience is relevant in order to compare to the program's ECTS requirement. For reference, 1 ECTS corresponds to 30 work hours.

29b7dc83-f3f8-4e65-b192-74c80875f916.question: What kind of work experience is the MSc. AI in Society program looking for?
29b7dc83-f3f8-4e65-b192-74c80875f916.answer: The AI in Society program is looking for interdisciplinary contributions in the applicants' work experiences. Pure computer science/programming work is not interdisciplinary. Work experience in social media trend analysis, data analytics, generating insights, building a program to help solve societal problems is preferable.

3243719d-8597-4019-974d-31fa7e661ee7.question: Can I include my research paper on meat production analysis as part of the proof of completed practical projects for the MSc. AI in Society application?
3243719d-8597-4019-974d-31fa7e661ee7.answer: It depends on what exactly you did. If there was some practical/implementation aspect included (that is, you actually ran some analysis yourself and didn't conduct just a literature review), then you should include this.

733f45ca-cfe8-4615-86a5-dfc9ddf65b4e.question: Can I apply for the master’s Degree in AI in Society if the sum of my completed modules meet the required 18 credit points, even though there isn't a single module that is worth more than 12 ECTS Credits?
733f45ca-cfe8-4615-86a5-dfc9ddf65b4e.answer: Yes, you are free to submit multiple practical modules which in sum make up 18 ECTS.

1875816f-9b8f-4f92-b7e4-231f760d0adc.question: What should I write as a declaration of authorship in my motivation letter?
1875816f-9b8f-4f92-b7e4-231f760d0adc.answer: You can write the following: “I hereby certify that this letter is solely my own work, developed without assistance, and any external sources are marked as such.”

27303a23-b223-4902-a37a-a2d541f6169b.question: Where can I upload my letter of recommendation to document my previous professional experience?
27303a23-b223-4902-a37a-a2d541f6169b.answer: Please attach it in the field for the proof of practical project.

69a9ce79-baa2-4db7-a2e2-0319e77fc7d8.question: Do you need proof of my self-employment, or are my examinations in the motivation letter and CV enough?
69a9ce79-baa2-4db7-a2e2-0319e77fc7d8.answer: Unfortunately, we cannot accept self-employment as evidence of practical experience, since no formal, objective, and independent certificate of employment can be issued. Please list evidence such as university modules, internships, or (“regular”) employment.

8afb44d8-e362-485c-b70c-b3301bd87bf0.question: Why do other study programs handle their admission process differently?
8afb44d8-e362-485c-b70c-b3301bd87bf0.answer: Different study programs have different requirements for their prospective students. In our case, for example, we put a high weight on the applicant’s ability to complete practical projects as well as bring along background knowledge in certain fields, which we are testing in the aptitude test. Other study programs might have different requirements.

66ade91e-972d-4d77-a9bc-ad3cb0902cbf.question: Is it possible to apply for the study program, get an offer for a place, and accept it only a year later?
66ade91e-972d-4d77-a9bc-ad3cb0902cbf.answer: Yes, you can apply for the study program, get an offer for a place, and accept it only a year later. In this case, you’d do the following: refuse the offer. Re-apply to the program a year later (please then upload the basic documents again, like an up-to-date CV, since a year will have passed). Afterwards, you won’t have to go through the aptitude assessment process anymore, but will go straight to admission.

c4306898-d14c-440b-a34c-9d8434a123bc.question: Can I submit proof over maths/statistics modules from my Master’s?
c4306898-d14c-440b-a34c-9d8434a123bc.answer: You can submit your proof over maths/statistics modules from your Master’s. In this case, please also attach the Transcript of Records from your Master’s, so we can verify.

0b1cd936-3aff-4a28-86e7-358f6430b79a.question: Would an offer letter suffice as a proof of employment?
0b1cd936-3aff-4a28-86e7-358f6430b79a.answer: It would be better if you could submit the certificates of employment to us, since an offer letter doesn’t indicate that you actually took the offer.

c36a2575-7347-463e-b3f2-90351d46522e.question: What is the purpose of the 'List of best credits' in the application form?
c36a2575-7347-463e-b3f2-90351d46522e.answer: Regarding the list of best credits: in the application form, there will be a separate form for you to fill in your list of best 140 ECTS credits. This is simply some help for us in order to calculate your aptitude score, where we only consider (a fraction of) your grades during your studies, i.e. the best ones.

2305ffc5-5cf2-4a53-b70b-247766dc6f79.question: Is it possible for TUM to consider my Masters degree, which is quantitatively heavier than my Bachelors degree, in addition to my Bachelors degree for the 48 points in Part 1 of the application process?
2305ffc5-5cf2-4a53-b70b-247766dc6f79.answer: We can only consider the applicants’ Bachelors degrees. However, if you completed some projects in your Masters that could count towards, for example, the 18 ECTS practical project requirement, you are welcome to list them and provide a Masters degree transcript as well.

9556db57-9fb4-4d6d-817f-e87e8c9f62fd.question: Can you help me propagate my VR study (with a €25 compensation) among your department students?
9556db57-9fb4-4d6d-817f-e87e8c9f62fd.answer: Unfortunately, I can't help as our program only starts in the next winter semester and currently, I do not have any students I could forward this request to.

a07a8d63-4f3b-4259-ba9c-1ad294923f98.question: What does the VR study involve and how do I participate?
a07a8d63-4f3b-4259-ba9c-1ad294923f98.answer: The study will be conducted between November 2023 and April 2024 at a location in Munich. It will take about two hours of your time, for which you will be compensated with €25. The study offers insight into the lab/research, an interesting activity with innovative VR technology, and an expense allowance. If you're interested, you should contact the study organizers at [REDACTED]@tum.de. Your ability to participate will be based on your availability.

f5e1f32f-3cf8-4820-bbfd-ec1682228f76.question: What are the benefits of participating in the VR study?
f5e1f32f-3cf8-4820-bbfd-ec1682228f76.answer: By participating in the VR study, you'll get to experience a VR-based learning environment firsthand, and have the freedom to experiment with VR applications after the study. You can also delve into the methodological background of the experiment if you find it interesting.

e53e0c8f-ceb3-4642-9a1e-ebd2a6df4c00.question: I submitted an incorrect application number in my application for the AI in [REDACTED] of Science program, can it be corrected?
e53e0c8f-ceb3-4642-9a1e-ebd2a6df4c00.answer: Everything is correct in the system (regarding the application and applicant numbers), there is no issue.

dd566faa-7a4a-4428-af1f-f2519b44b47e.question: Does a course titled 'Introduction to AI (5 ECTS)' and a Bachelor's thesis on AI chatbots (15 ECTS) meet the criteria for the practical project requirement for TUM M.Sc. AI in Society program?
dd566faa-7a4a-4428-af1f-f2519b44b47e.answer: The final decision rests with the aptitude committee. However, based on the given descriptions, the courses should be fine topic-wise.

e498192e-40b1-4365-8301-5c7d747ed6d4.question: Is the TUM's study programme accredited or registered for accreditation?
e498192e-40b1-4365-8301-5c7d747ed6d4.answer: All TUM's study programmes are accredited, with this process being achieved via system accreditation.

3c66698e-6816-4be2-af2d-f14dd052d885.question: How long is the AI in Society programme at TUM accredited for?
3c66698e-6816-4be2-af2d-f14dd052d885.answer: The AI in Society programme is currently accredited until 30th November 2028.

c2026734-0c63-456e-80fa-2c5f90f31889.question: According to the portal, does the 'accreditation' criterion need to be fulfilled
c2026734-0c63-456e-80fa-2c5f90f31889.answer: Yes, the 'accreditation' criterion needs to be fulfilled.

ae4358f4-2d6c-4f17-8ee4-012c41d830b0.question: Should 'yes' or 'no' be selected for the 'I want a collective invoice (Sammelrechnung)' option?
ae4358f4-2d6c-4f17-8ee4-012c41d830b0.answer: The 'no' option should be selected for the 'I want a collective invoice (Sammelrechnung)' option.

7baf86fb-e222-4df3-9dbf-de4580bf724d.question: Are entries possible after 03rd May 2024?
7baf86fb-e222-4df3-9dbf-de4580bf724d.answer: No, after 03rd May 2024 no changes or entries are possible.

c4c2f8ee-8d82-4e0c-b64b-a847b2c28373.question: Should I select 'Yes' for the option 'I want a collective invoice (Sammelrechnung)?
c4c2f8ee-8d82-4e0c-b64b-a847b2c28373.answer: No, please select 'No'. The option for collective invoice is not applicable as there are Base entries (paid by CST) and Premium entries (paid by the Schools)

9ddc64b0-6516-4bc2-ab0d-a40e86c9f4d8.question: What should be selected for 'Übertragungsweg der Rechnung'?
9ddc64b0-6516-4bc2-ab0d-a40e86c9f4d8.answer: You can leave these fields empty. The data for all Base entries will be filled in on May 3rd.

3f3b0453-1063-4819-9eea-a6c1cbc12eae.question: Is it possible for / would TUM consider my Masters degree which is quantitatively heavier than my Bachelors degree, in addition to my Bachelors degree and count it towards achieving the 48 points in Part 1 of the application process when I submit my application to this program?
3f3b0453-1063-4819-9eea-a6c1cbc12eae.answer: Only the applicants' Bachelors degrees can be considered. However, if you completed some projects in your Masters that could count towards e.g. the 18 ECTS practical project requirement, you are welcome to list them there. In this case, please provide your Masters degree transcript as well.

97a7d0f5-0c10-42aa-a3e8-96f5c8d3d921.question: I completed one internship during my bachelors studies. However, is it possible / would TUM consider my internship experience gained during my Masters degree and/or my six (6) plus years of professional experience working for the Department of Transportation as a in lieu of these 18 ECTS credit hours?
97a7d0f5-0c10-42aa-a3e8-96f5c8d3d921.answer: Yes, it is possible to provide evidence of practical experience that was not gained as part of your studies, but rather as working experience or similar. This includes your internship experience. Please provide documents (like a certificate of employment), which indicates to us: a) the content of your work, and b) the duration (18 ECTS are equivalent to 540 hours of work).

87cd838d-d8d3-4635-86ed-b3dbc83fe270.question: What is the concern about credit to ECTS conversion of the transcript in the application?
87cd838d-d8d3-4635-86ed-b3dbc83fe270.answer: The applicant, being a student from Tongji University, China, is concerned about the conversion of credits from their five-year Bachelor of Architecture degree to ECTS. They explain that according to 30 ECTS per semester, their program should include 300 ECTS in total. Given that their degree requires 204 credits in five years, the conversion rate should be approximately 1.5.

38f5db93-7ba2-4503-90be-cc8769bb9580.question: What is the applicant's proof of passing module in mathematics?
38f5db93-7ba2-4503-90be-cc8769bb9580.answer: The applicant has 4 credits in mathematics course, which the applicant argues is equal to 6 ECTS and surpasses the requirement.

b185fa7d-addd-4178-a9dd-5c9d80885397.question: What materials have been provided to support the applicant's credit to ECTS conversion claim?
b185fa7d-addd-4178-a9dd-5c9d80885397.answer: The applicant has attached the training program of their five-year architecture program. The document, originally in Chinese, has been translated into English by Google.

90cabcd6-66e5-4b3e-8c88-2f3dec0eaf4a.question: What feedback was given on the application's review?
90cabcd6-66e5-4b3e-8c88-2f3dec0eaf4a.answer: The documents for the application have been reviewed and everything seems to be fine. The admissions team will refer back to the extra information provided by the applicant if any questions or problems arise.

8ba10ba4-beee-45bb-ae35-406f4f24b3bc.question: Is it possible to submit an application for the AI in Society master’s program before completing the APS process and obtaining the VPD certificate and provide these documents at a later stage?
8ba10ba4-beee-45bb-ae35-406f4f24b3bc.answer: No, incomplete applications cannot be accepted, nor can certain documents be submitted after the deadline (May 31) has passed.

0ce3c9dd-cd10-418b-b422-fd8939dc9073.question: Does the AI in Society master's course at TUM focus on programming or coding, and will there be classes where coding is required?
0ce3c9dd-cd10-418b-b422-fd8939dc9073.answer: Yes, there will be opportunities to code in the AI in Society program at TUM, such as the modules “Intro to Programming”, amongst others. However, this course is not intended to produce AI engineers. If you wish to focus on the technical side, it is recommended that you apply to a more technically oriented Master's program at TUM.

a06f8c93-464e-4533-96dd-a2023d2d0cf4.question: Is the AI in Society program at TUM suitable for someone with a bachelor's degree in a non-technical field, such as business, and only some technical understanding?
a06f8c93-464e-4533-96dd-a2023d2d0cf4.answer: Yes, the AI in Society program at TUM is highly interdisciplinary, and thus a background in business and some technical understanding would be beneficial.

595f7846-5324-4061-9966-a9d1fcbfe803.question: Is it possible to work part-time while studying the AI in Society program at TUM, and what does the timetable look like?
595f7846-5324-4061-9966-a9d1fcbfe803.answer: It is possible to work part-time while studying the AI in Society program at TUM, but it largely depends on the student's ability to manage it. The timetable is not laid out specifically as much of the scheduling is up to the professors and many of the courses aren't fully set up yet due to the program being under active construction. However, the study load, especially in the first 1-2 semesters, is noted to be substantial.

29f9e256-2723-4cc1-9607-3ecd6a4e2385.question: Is the topic 'data-driven marketing strategy with a customer-centred approach' for a practical project valid for my application?
29f9e256-2723-4cc1-9607-3ecd6a4e2385.answer: Your topic sounds very suitable - this should work out well.

79935df4-a2a2-469d-88f8-699b35f68fd5.question: Is there any further information on how the admission test is structured and what questions can be expected?
79935df4-a2a2-469d-88f8-699b35f68fd5.answer: For now, only rough topics for the admission test can be found on our website (https://www.sot.tum.de/sot/studium/ai-in-society/application/). More in-depth information surrounding the test will be published as soon as possible.

f3acdea3-bb99-4919-8ead-8a044749f3e0.question: Where can I find information about scholarships at TUM?
f3acdea3-bb99-4919-8ead-8a044749f3e0.answer: You can find information about scholarships at TUM's scholarship office. You can contact them and find more details at: https://www.tum.de/en/studies/fees-and-financial-aid/scholarships.

44a852ee-edf8-40c4-968e-a5d74076bc62.question: Do I need to get an IELTS if I graduated from a university where the degree program was taught in English?
44a852ee-edf8-40c4-968e-a5d74076bc62.answer: If your degree program was taught in English, you do not need to provide an IELTS test or similar. Instead, you should get a confirmation about the language of instruction from your previous university.

6922b01c-3e74-44a7-83ec-662db94e0944.question: Where can I find more information about the application process for the M.Sc. AI in Society program?
6922b01c-3e74-44a7-83ec-662db94e0944.answer: More information about the application process for the M.Sc. AI in Society program can be found at these websites: https://www.sot.tum.de/sot/studium/ai-in-society/, https://www.sot.tum.de/sot/studium/ai-in-society/application/, and https://www.tum.de/studium/studienangebot/detail/ai-in-society.

6fe8aef3-b899-41e1-ada9-ff8ce60d3a4b.question: Is a GPA of 2.4 eligible for the application to Master's in AI Society program at TUM?
6fe8aef3-b899-41e1-ada9-ff8ce60d3a4b.answer: Eligibility is calculated based on the grades of the best modules, but it's not definite whether a GPA of 2.4 will pass.

a8eb54b1-ccb5-4345-8dd2-b258b3f5f94b.question: Will my age be an issue for application to the Master's in AI Society program at TUM?
a8eb54b1-ccb5-4345-8dd2-b258b3f5f94b.answer: Your age is definitely not a problem in any way for the application.

12d5ed8b-8b1b-4f38-86a8-4f1b2abb52f2.question: Can practical expertise be proven through work experience for the application to the Master's in AI Society at TUM?
12d5ed8b-8b1b-4f38-86a8-4f1b2abb52f2.answer: You can prove your practical expertise through work experience as well, it doesn't necessarily have to be a university course. The experience, however, must be relevant to the field of study and be substantiated with suitable proof, such as a certificate of employment.

3722a50e-83e4-400f-bca8-3ad74c44116f.question: What is required when submitting proof of practical experience for the Master's in AI Society program at TUM?
3722a50e-83e4-400f-bca8-3ad74c44116f.answer: If you submit such proof of practical experience (which was not part of your degree program), it needs to indicate how much time you spent on it, and have it correspond to the 18 ECTS requirement. It must be clear what exactly you were working on.

1e90433c-9dc6-4de5-ace6-8c13ce56a59a.question: Can I apply for the Master's in AI Society program at TUM even if I lack the thesis/project requirement from my Bachelor degree?
1e90433c-9dc6-4de5-ace6-8c13ce56a59a.answer: You can prove your practical expertise through work experience as well, it doesn’t necessarily have to be a university course.

a7439519-d3dd-4dae-ae7d-2c70f0eb98d9.question: Can I apply for the M.Sc. AI in Society at TUM if my bachelor's degree did not include a thesis or credit-bearing project, but I have relevant work experience?
a7439519-d3dd-4dae-ae7d-2c70f0eb98d9.answer: You can prove your practical expertise through work experience as well, it doesn’t necessarily have to be a university course. You might have, for example, worked at a company during your studies, where you were working on projects relevant to our study field. This experience also counts, but you will need to submit suitable proof for this (e.g. in the form of a certificate of employment). For reference, 18 ECTS credits correspond to a workload of 540 hours. If you submit such proof of practical experience (which was not part of your degree program), it needs to indicate how much time you spent on it, and have it correspond to our 18 ECTS requirement. It also has to be clear to us what exactly you were working on.

6a4e713b-83fb-4778-b3cd-150899fa973f.question: Can you provide further information about the application process for the M.Sc. AI in Society program?
6a4e713b-83fb-4778-b3cd-150899fa973f.answer: More information about the application process can be found on the website at https://www.sot.tum.de/sot/studium/ai-in-society/application/. For an extensive overview over the required application documents and procedure, please see https://www.tum.de/studium/studienangebot/detail/ai-in-society.

11ed524e-20f9-4940-936d-1bb6704a1c65.question: How to Prepare the [REDACTED] and [REDACTED] be Included
11ed524e-20f9-4940-936d-1bb6704a1c65.answer: [REDACTED] should be informative about the contents of the module.

60885850-471e-4bfc-a384-76d0a765ba8c.question: How should we study for the written exam?
60885850-471e-4bfc-a384-76d0a765ba8c.answer: We will publish some more information about the written aptitude test in due time on our website.

24600581-f651-4bcb-8fb0-f11ea89ddea0.question: Is there any scholarship opportunity available for the program?
24600581-f651-4bcb-8fb0-f11ea89ddea0.answer: Maybe this information can be helpful to you regarding scholarships and waivers: https://www.tum.de/en/studies/fees/tuition/scholarships-and-waivers

5db9f490-2197-47f3-82fd-e82b7dab30d2.question: [REDACTED] courses taken in bachelor degree studies replace IELTS or TOEFL? For example; Is it sufficient to have taken 21 ECTS credits in English for applying to this program?
5db9f490-2197-47f3-82fd-e82b7dab30d2.answer: Please find the relevant information here under “Verification of [REDACTED] by Language of Instruction”: https://www.tum.de/en/studies/application/application-info-portal/admission-requirements/language-certificates

a6a7b8c7-fd6f-4da5-9edc-4b881e1badee.question: Why was the request for 'Preliminary review documentation (VPD) or Confirmation that the application for a VPD by uni-assist has been submitted in due form and time' not there before?
a6a7b8c7-fd6f-4da5-9edc-4b881e1badee.answer: Applications are reviewed on a rolling basis. Meaning that if something is missing in your application, you will be contacted again.

aefac876-d4da-4ab2-b5c6-3ed419256ec3.question: What exactly is wrong with my CV?
aefac876-d4da-4ab2-b5c6-3ed419256ec3.answer: As far as I can see in the system, your CV is fine. There is no issue marked.

3ae67f3b-650b-4e32-97a4-0eb9cb3a2fee.question: I think I was not asked for a VPD in the application. If there is no place to insert the VPD in the application, do I have to upload it anyway?
3ae67f3b-650b-4e32-97a4-0eb9cb3a2fee.answer: If you were not asked for a VPD anywhere, it should be fine.

04803fa1-da86-46e9-9eea-7a21a58edcf6.question: What will happen if the final VPD is not received by the deadline?
04803fa1-da86-46e9-9eea-7a21a58edcf6.answer: If the final VPD and documents have not been received in full by the deadline, you will be excluded from the application process.

1fb08e9c-106f-406f-b58c-5ee55be003b3.question: How long does it take to get an answer in the application ?
1fb08e9c-106f-406f-b58c-5ee55be003b3.answer: Applications are reviewed and feedback is given over the next 2-3 weeks.

1961b0f0-77fb-48bf-a4bb-0778b5cffe18.question: What is the deadline for the application process?
1961b0f0-77fb-48bf-a4bb-0778b5cffe18.answer: According to Annex 2 2.2 of the FPSO, 31st May is the application deadline. This date is a cut-off date.

0c02b266-c6b3-4765-9855-47ea4b35a210.question: Can changes be made to an application once it has been submitted?
0c02b266-c6b3-4765-9855-47ea4b35a210.answer: As per Section 6(7) of the ImmatS, after an application has been completed, it may not be changed, even within the stipulated exclusion period.

2555dfb1-6bef-4b72-8332-4f04bafb92de.question: Are there provisions to submit bachelor's degree certificate and transcript of records after the application cut-off date?
2555dfb1-6bef-4b72-8332-4f04bafb92de.answer: According to Annex 2, Point 2.2 of the FPSO, only the certificate and the transcript of the bachelor's degree may be submitted until 5 weeks after the start of lectures at the latest. This applies to only submitting the certificate as a document. There is no provision for submitting examination performances from the bachelor's program that are completed after the application deadline.

8b895065-8c94-4772-a5cc-45a2394e45e6.question: Can certain proofs be submitted after the application deadline?
8b895065-8c94-4772-a5cc-45a2394e45e6.answer: No. The existing regulations do not provide for the submission of examination performances after the exclusion deadline.

bafdf053-a926-41bf-ab4f-189989dff85f.question: What is the application deadline for the M.Sc. AI in Society?

01605fba-763a-4829-9363-f31e32ba7803.question: Do all the required application documents need to be submitted by the deadline, or can they be submitted later?
01605fba-763a-4829-9363-f31e32ba7803.answer: All required documents, including the proof of practical experience worth at least 18 credits, need to be submitted by the end of the deadline. No documents can be submitted after the deadline has passed.

4febe725-5b81-4408-aaea-3487c8ba67fd.question: Can the practical experience required for applying to the M.Sc. AI in Society program come from multiple projects?
4febe725-5b81-4408-aaea-3487c8ba67fd.answer: Yes, the practical experience doesn't need to be from one single project. Applicants can submit evidence from several projects that will be summed up.

e5784313-725b-4129-8b39-9d9d62e4f5d5.question: Can practical experience outside of my degree program be considered for the M.Sc. AI in Society program's practical experience requirement?
e5784313-725b-4129-8b39-9d9d62e4f5d5.answer: Yes, practical experience outside of the degree program can be considered, for example, work at a company during studies on projects relevant to the field of study. This experience needs suitable proof such as a certificate of employment; it needs to indicate how much time was spent on it.

1b6c288f-038f-4eae-ba06-42fbde071d25.question: How many hours of work does 18 ECTS credits represent?
1b6c288f-038f-4eae-ba06-42fbde071d25.answer: 18 ECTS credits correspond to a workload of 540 hours.

8a56af83-56c4-46e1-bd4d-747231bd36fa.question: Why do different study programs have different admission processes?
8a56af83-56c4-46e1-bd4d-747231bd36fa.answer: Different study programs have different requirements for their prospective students. For example, some programs put a high weight on the applicant’s ability to complete practical projects and bring along background knowledge in certain fields, which they test in an aptitude test.

4d7cf2d8-e3b9-4f14-bf05-4a866daaad78.question: What are the requirements for the Master's program 'AI in Society'?
4d7cf2d8-e3b9-4f14-bf05-4a866daaad78.answer: The program requires applicants to demonstrate their abilities to complete practical projects and have background knowledge in certain fields. More details are available on the application process website: https://www.sot.tum.de/sot/studium/ai-in-society/application/

ebf237fc-8657-4e0c-b2e7-9e99505b6bca.question: Does the practical project need to be recognized with credits, i.e. does it have to be part of my university course? Would individual projects or volunteer experience be able to also contribute to the requirement?
ebf237fc-8657-4e0c-b2e7-9e99505b6bca.answer: Technically, we can count practical projects that were not part of a university module. However, you would then need to provide us with an official documentation that those practical projects in total spanned at least 540 hours for completion (540h correspond to 18 ECTS).

fe5db78e-0cb0-40f4-8d61-fb67d3db37c9.question: Can the project be part of a course or does it have to stand indiviually?
fe5db78e-0cb0-40f4-8d61-fb67d3db37c9.answer: The project can be part of a university module/course, and should be officially documented.

f2724082-ba40-46ec-8125-deaf8240b4e7.question: If from my university, I do not officially have 18 credits for a practical project in social science, is there a way to make up for this requirement? E.g. by compiling my own project, Kaggle, etc.
f2724082-ba40-46ec-8125-deaf8240b4e7.answer: Unfortunately, we can't just let you compile an own project without an official documentation about how much time was spent for it. Please understand that we need to compare students' achievements universally somehow; this we can do by setting a minimum of ECTS credits, or, hours invested.

b682a9dd-e929-4990-bd98-402994c7a42f.question: How can I prove the projects that I did in the courses? For example, there are courses where a project was done. However, the resulting report/pdf are mostly written in Korean, and I could probably not submit that as proof of my projects.
b682a9dd-e929-4990-bd98-402994c7a42f.answer: You don’t need to submit your project reports in order to prove your completion of the module. Instead, you submit your Transcript of Records as part of the application procedure (this module should then of course be listed in this Transcript), as well as fill out a form which states the name of the project module, as well as the module/project description. For this, it is sufficient if you translate into English yourself.

183d4030-7004-4c94-a62d-2d4f56b5b5fb.question: I have a course where we did a weekly research & review on social science topics. The course is "Stem cell biology, Ethics and Societal impact". Would this weekly research & review work also count as a project in the requirement? If the course is 5 ECTS, then does it mean the project will also be recognized as the full weight of the course (5 ECTS)?
183d4030-7004-4c94-a62d-2d4f56b5b5fb.answer: I cannot give you a definitive answer as to whether or not this will be counted. This is up for the admission committee to decide. However, I highly encourage you to apply with these courses. If the course is 5 ECTS, then the project would also be recognized with the weight of the 5 ECTS.

f62792b9-1f3a-4cbe-89ce-492991e24264.question: Do the 18 ECTS required for the practical project in the Master's program AI in Society need to come from a single module or can they be from multiple ones?
f62792b9-1f3a-4cbe-89ce-492991e24264.answer: The credits for the practical project do not need to come from a single module. They can also be summed up from several modules.

b1f8cac1-3f76-46ce-b12b-55db8a77adb5.question: Will the ECTS from the project study and the Bachelor's thesis be recognized for the AI in Society program?
b1f8cac1-3f76-46ce-b12b-55db8a77adb5.answer: It is possible to include ECTS from a project and bachelor's thesis, however, if by the time of application completion, the Bachelor's thesis is not finished and therefore does not have ECTS credits yet, it cannot be used as proof for the practical project requirement. Evidence for the practical project requirement must be present at the time of application.

b1120747-1452-4b0d-8210-2687a60daf13.question: Is it a problem for the application if the Bachelor's thesis is not finished by the time of the application, meaning no grade or ECTS credits are available for it?
b1120747-1452-4b0d-8210-2687a60daf13.answer: If you do not have the ECTS credits for the Bachelor's thesis by the time of application, it will be a problem in that you will not be able to use these credits as proof for the practical project requirement. It is unfortunately not possible to submit evidence for the 'practical project' requirement after the application deadline.

4e360514-e27a-41bd-815e-1899f0720e92.question: Can I prove the missing 6 ECTS for the AI in Society program's practical project requirement in any other way?
4e360514-e27a-41bd-815e-1899f0720e92.answer: You could potentially make up for the missing 6 ECTS by providing proof of professional experience or other relevant (extracurricular) activities.

450526b1-a57e-47f7-a21b-328334a57e1f.question: If I studied in the UK for the last year of my double degree bachelor program and obtained 60 ECTS in the transcript, including the bachelor's thesis, do I still need to submit an English proficiency certificate when applying for the master's program in “AI in Society”?
450526b1-a57e-47f7-a21b-328334a57e1f.answer: If your degree’s language of instruction was English, you do not have to submit additional proof of English proficiency.

b947638e-efb9-423f-9d0b-ff9883b073b6.question: What kind of issue does the candidate face when applying for the 'AI in Society' master's program with his Pre-diploma qualifications?
b947638e-efb9-423f-9d0b-ff9883b073b6.answer: The candidate is facing issues because the online application system doesn't accept traditional grades from the Pre-diploma and MBA degree program. It requires 'Credits', which didn't exist during his time, and the system doesn't acknowledge 'Vordiplom' or a MBA Degree as equivalent to a Bachelor's degree.

f30dbb0a-1417-4bd6-93c4-1487cd76850f.question: What was advised to the candidate to solve the issue related to the application for the 'AI in Society' master's program?
f30dbb0a-1417-4bd6-93c4-1487cd76850f.answer: The candidate was advised to inquire at his universities if they can issue the relevant ECTS or, if not possible, the respective SWS for his degree. If these documents can be obtained, he should upload or send them. He was also asked to submit evidence of his work, such as employment references.

12600255-5b3a-494c-927d-b4af820070ae.question: What suggestions were given for handling applicants with Pre-diploma qualifications?
12600255-5b3a-494c-927d-b4af820070ae.answer: The suggestion given was that such candidates should not be formally declined just because they have a Diplom degree and hence can't show credits. Their practical experiences should be evaluated based on submitted documents, if it proves that they have the skills required, they should be allowed into the aptitude procedure just like applicants with a Bachelor's degree.

4b659cef-9eb5-4993-aa45-5b47a4ef5fdb.question: How will the grades of an applicant with pre-diploma qualifications be evaluated for the AI in Society program at TUM?
4b659cef-9eb5-4993-aa45-5b47a4ef5fdb.answer: In case of doubt, the overall average grade should be used (Appendix 2, No. 5.1.1 a) sentence 10).

cda77024-b9fc-43a5-89b6-3446baa4d9c6.question: What kinds of documents can help prove the qualifications of an applicant applying to the AI in Society program with a prior diploma?
cda77024-b9fc-43a5-89b6-3446baa4d9c6.answer: Documents such as a grade transcript or semester study plans that further highlight the thematically covered contents of the studies can be helpful.

e7197c86-b6bb-4b2b-bc18-3654eae150bf.question: Is it possible to arrange a short phone call or visit the department at TU for some detailed questions about the master program Ai in Society?
e7197c86-b6bb-4b2b-bc18-3654eae150bf.answer: Could you tell me in advance roughly what you have questions about?

100d5c72-91ac-41c7-858b-e658ec7cd46b.question: Will the Aptitude test and interview be online?
100d5c72-91ac-41c7-858b-e658ec7cd46b.answer: It is not yet decided if the Aptitude test will be offered online, but it is currently planned. The interview can be conducted online if there is no way of conducting it in person.

c1594979-68a7-4c4d-9413-e5fb6e666252.question: Do you have the dates more or less when it will happen?
c1594979-68a7-4c4d-9413-e5fb6e666252.answer: Exact dates are not yet defined, but it will be some time mid-June. The exact date will be communicated at least one week in advance.

40133798-8c74-4164-bd17-707bb6f8172c.question: What should I do if the document provided for the application does not have enough space to list all my undergraduate modules?
40133798-8c74-4164-bd17-707bb6f8172c.answer: You should download the document twice, use the extra rows from the second copy. Then, fuse the two documents into one PDF before uploading.

4cd9d55a-1b44-4def-aee0-fe153fd7217d.question: Is it necessary to ask for the VPD when I already have a Master's degree from TUM?
4cd9d55a-1b44-4def-aee0-fe153fd7217d.answer: If you were not asked for a VPD anywhere, it should be fine.

24947541-0c05-4c4c-a0f6-af003191a6d2.question: When applying for AI & Society, is it possible to not upload the VPD?
24947541-0c05-4c4c-a0f6-af003191a6d2.answer: If the application doesn't ask for a place to insert the VPD and it already shows your previous Master as the Entrance qualification for Master's Program, you don't have to upload the VPD.

bb8e9617-50e3-4c77-8c1d-5c157c9a4ac7.question: How long does it take to get an answer on the application?
bb8e9617-50e3-4c77-8c1d-5c157c9a4ac7.answer: Applications are reviewed on a rolling basis. You'll be informed within the next 2-3 weeks whether something is missing in your application or if everything is fine.

15dcc9b9-55dc-458a-b781-cdb3bb97e3ae.question: Where can I find information regarding the application procedure for the M.Sc. 'AI in Society'?
15dcc9b9-55dc-458a-b781-cdb3bb97e3ae.answer: All relevant information can be found on the TUM website, specifically the following links: https://www.tum.de/en/studies/degree-programs/detail/ai-in-society and https://www.sot.tum.de/sot/studium/ai-in-society/

51199424-efcd-4c09-90df-c16c611d0272.question: Can you provide guidance on finding a partner company to connect with the course?
51199424-efcd-4c09-90df-c16c611d0272.answer: The correspondent is only responsible for matters concerning the study program itself and cannot help with matters regarding partner companies.

5d54e667-f93a-4ef1-ba6e-4e28c3b0ecce.question: Do I need to go through the college for one year to have access to the Applied artificial intelligence or computer sciences course, or do I have access directly to it from my current situation?
5d54e667-f93a-4ef1-ba6e-4e28c3b0ecce.answer: You need to apply with a Bachelor’s degree. If during the application period (until May 31st) you will not have finished your bachelor’s degree yet, 140 ECTS credits of your Bachelor’s studies are sufficient (assuming that you will finish your Bachelor’s degree still before the start of the Master’s).

d018ec4f-b0bf-4d26-a350-c1f750cb2743.question: What is the requirement for the Practical project for the M.Sc. AI in Society program if there are no projects worth 18 ECTS in the current curriculum?
d018ec4f-b0bf-4d26-a350-c1f750cb2743.answer: You should submit the entire modules as proof for the practical project requirement. The modules should contain the practical projects inside of them.

ed23f55d-b155-4b1f-aaab-f2f6e3356215.question: If all of the credits from projects in different courses are summed and they exceed 18 ECTS, does this fulfill the Practical project requirement for the M.Sc. AI in Society program?
ed23f55d-b155-4b1f-aaab-f2f6e3356215.answer: This could potentially fulfill the requirement, but the final decision would be made by the admission committee.

ba5d310a-ae56-4442-a608-e3cba2e0a6c4.question: Can a Bachelor thesis in the data analysis field, that counts for 12 ECTS, be recognized as an equivalent achievement to the practical project of 18 ECTS required for the AI in Society master program application?
ba5d310a-ae56-4442-a608-e3cba2e0a6c4.answer: Yes, the Bachelor thesis can be counted towards the practical project, but as it only covers 12 ECTS, it's not completely sufficient. Other practical-oriented modules completed during your studies that would cover the missing 6 ECTS can also be included. If there's no such modules, relevant experience outside of the studies is acknowledged, if it's properly documented. Since 6 ECTS are missing, and 1 ECTS corresponds to approximately 30h of work, proof is needed that this experience has covered at least 6x30h = 180h. A description of this project would also be required.

6cb290b1-81c2-47f9-b282-b7925e65d7e2.question: Where can I find the list of the admission requirements for the AI and Society master program at TUM?
6cb290b1-81c2-47f9-b282-b7925e65d7e2.answer: The following links should work and contain all relevant information. https://www.sot.tum.de/sot/studium/ai-in-society/ https://www.sot.tum.de/sot/studium/ai-in-society/application/ https://www.tum.de/en/studies/degree-programs/detail/ai-in-society

7dd7ea2f-220b-4abd-80e3-337d9dbb2c01.question: Does the website for the AI and Society master program at TUM load for me?
7dd7ea2f-220b-4abd-80e3-337d9dbb2c01.answer: Could you send me a link of the website that doesn’t work for you? Does it not load?

6129ee31-9f21-42c3-bfb9-f70ca7323df7.question: What does the website link for the AI and Society master program at TUM show?
6129ee31-9f21-42c3-bfb9-f70ca7323df7.answer: Here is the website link that doesn’t work. It just shows an error 404: https://www.sot.tum.de/en/sot/404-notfound-sot-en/

441347a4-f7b9-417d-8894-034d63f41bd7.question: Which website page showing the admission requirements for the AI and Society master isn't working?
441347a4-f7b9-417d-8894-034d63f41bd7.answer: The link that doesn't work is: https://www.sot.tum.de/en/sot/404-notfound-sot-en/.

c27be401-779b-443f-9323-d03342c6bbbb.question: Do my previous studies fulfill the minimum requirements of mathematics/statistics background for my application?
c27be401-779b-443f-9323-d03342c6bbbb.answer: No, your previous studies do not fulfil the minimum requirements of mathematics/statistics background. As per our examination regulation, 5 ECTS of mathematics and/or statistics should have been obtained as part of previous study programs.

9bf881ed-3a8d-4287-803d-460f1789782a.question: Can the requirement for 5 ECTS of mathematics and/or statistics be made up through participation in online courses?
9bf881ed-3a8d-4287-803d-460f1789782a.answer: No, this requirement cannot be made up for through participation in online courses.

fa1d6f39-905c-4bcc-8be8-3f699b899e7c.question: Is it possible to use several practical projects (each 4-8 ECTS) as a valid proof of practical experience if they together ≥ 18 ECTS?
fa1d6f39-905c-4bcc-8be8-3f699b899e7c.answer: Exactly, it doesn't have to be a single project with 18 ECTS, it can also be summed up from several projects.

f856c1c2-64e8-47e8-9d5d-d969e056a85e.question: How should applicants with pre-diploma qualifications proceed when struggling with the application through TUMonline for the Master's program AI in Society?
f856c1c2-64e8-47e8-9d5d-d969e056a85e.answer: Applicants should inquire with their universities if they can issue the relevant ECTS for their degree or, if that's not possible, the respective SWS (Semesterwochenstunden). If these documents can be obtained, they should be uploaded or sent to the admissions team.

90c0c050-b598-4f78-b735-4bcacdc1ff29.question: How should the application handle pre-diploma qualifications that cannot be uploaded?
90c0c050-b598-4f78-b735-4bcacdc1ff29.answer: If applicants are unable to upload their pre-diploma qualifications, they are advised to email them directly to the admissions team.

31fbd5f1-9d9e-499c-8479-f3691d045a96.question: How does the aptitude committee assess practical experience for the AI in Society program at TUM?
31fbd5f1-9d9e-499c-8479-f3691d045a96.answer: The aptitude committee decides if an applicant has suitable/sufficient practical experience. Applicants should submit evidence of their past work, such as employment references.

9d3be259-cea8-4f35-a946-f2a1edb25b31.question: How to apply to the AI in Society program at TUM if the application system doesn't recognise older degree formats, specifically Dipl. Ing. and MBA?
9d3be259-cea8-4f35-a946-f2a1edb25b31.answer: Candidates with older degree formats should inquire with their universities to see if they can issue the relevant ECTS or, if not possible, the respective SWS for their degree. If obtainable, they should upload these documents or send them to the admissions team. If they are unable to upload their qualifications, they should email them directly to the admissions team. This process also applies to candidates who have experience but lack a specific 'Practical project with XX credits'.

4717b815-455d-4fc2-8903-21af7d65e561.question: Does the practical project need to be recognized with credits, i.e. does it have to be part of my university course?
4717b815-455d-4fc2-8903-21af7d65e561.answer: Technically, practical projects that were not part of a university module can be counted. However, you would need to provide an official documentation that those practical projects in total spanned at least 540 hours for completion (540 hours correspond to 18 ECTS).

b08903eb-413c-4bf8-8cc5-45228fa62bc7.question: Would individual projects or volunteer experience be able to also contribute to the requirement?
b08903eb-413c-4bf8-8cc5-45228fa62bc7.answer: Yes, individual projects or volunteer experience can contribute to the requirement, given that you can provide an official documentation that those practical projects in total spanned at least 540 hours for completion (540 hours correspond to 18 ECTS).

a01f72f0-8279-439a-9e45-55657142fb01.question: Can the project be part of a course or does it have to stand indiviually?
a01f72f0-8279-439a-9e45-55657142fb01.answer: The project can be part of a course, it does not necessarily need to stand individually.

f52bfd63-d5c1-4399-8ada-3060cd2ab7e3.question: If from my university, I do not officially 18 credits for a practical project in social science, is there a way to make up for this requirement?
f52bfd63-d5c1-4399-8ada-3060cd2ab7e3.answer: You can make up for the requirement by providing official documentation of practical projects that spanned at least 540 hours for completion (540 hours correspond to 18 ECTS).

13434c61-b214-4c34-ad37-db0d1ca699b5.question: What should I do when the format of my transcript doesn't match with the application form provided by TUM for the master program 'AI in Society'?
13434c61-b214-4c34-ad37-db0d1ca699b5.answer: You could download the respective form twice to fill in all your courses, then mark which is the first, and which is the second (e.g. insert “1” and “2” somewhere on the PDF), and upload both of them. You may need to merge these two PDFs back into one.

ee053c22-6cd0-4c86-af90-508420ef6508.question: In my University, we follow a different credit system and not ECTS. I have more than 60 courses, whereas the form 'List of best 140 Credits' has only around 40 rows for modules. How to fill this ?
ee053c22-6cd0-4c86-af90-508420ef6508.answer: You could download the respective form twice to fill in all your courses, then mark which form is the first, and which is the second (e.g. insert “1” and “2” somewhere on the PDF). After filling, upload both of them by merging these two PDFs back into one.

ffa24622-3ebf-449f-8ffa-f98b28bd3e95.question: Until when are the applications open for the M.Sc. AI in Society?

f9a17c9d-bd4d-4733-869c-59770b72fa0c.question: When will the written aptitude test for M.Sc. AI in Society be conducted?
f9a17c9d-bd4d-4733-869c-59770b72fa0c.answer: The written aptitude test will be conducted after May 31st. However, the specific date is not yet determined.

67a953d3-0a63-4908-947f-aeb3d8e3818b.question: When will the reviews of application documents for M.Sc. AI in Society be taken, and when will the applicants will be informed about the examination and admission results?
67a953d3-0a63-4908-947f-aeb3d8e3818b.answer: Reviews of application documents will be taken after the applications are closed on May 31st. The applicants will be informed about the examination as soon as possible after that. The specific dates are not mentioned.

e1307c75-6fb3-4965-925a-7f38978c01c1.question: What format should the documentation of the completed project take for the M.Sc. AI in Society application?
e1307c75-6fb3-4965-925a-7f38978c01c1.answer: Inside the application process, you will find a form to fill out to provide details about your completed project. This includes inserting the module title and module description translated into English.

f088dd6f-d071-41c5-9dd6-9d037784414c.question: Would the original thesis document, accompanied by an English introduction summarizing it, suffice as proof of the project's completion for the M.Sc. AI in Society application?
f088dd6f-d071-41c5-9dd6-9d037784414c.answer: No, your thesis is not required to prove the completion of the practical project. Proof should be provided with your Transcript of Records when applying.

94761648-35d2-49f5-b5e2-1a898abb7c5c.question: Is there any additional material or information that I should provide with my M.Sc. AI in Society application?
94761648-35d2-49f5-b5e2-1a898abb7c5c.answer: It would be best if you could submit a Transcript of Records issued by your university in English. If your university does not provide this document in English automatically, you should ask them to issue it for you. Apart from this, no other additional material or information is mentioned.

fc1d8a1c-ffd2-47b0-b4e3-2a40fef02f26.question: What format should the documentation of the completed project for AI in Society application take?
fc1d8a1c-ffd2-47b0-b4e3-2a40fef02f26.answer: To prove your completion of a practical project, there is a form to fill out inside the application process. There you will be asked to enter the module title and module description. Please translate these into English and insert in the form.

bebebf84-ff6d-4363-b2cd-575ccc70b082.question: Since my thesis was not written in English, would the original thesis document, accompanied by an English introduction summarizing it, suffice as proof of the project's completion?
bebebf84-ff6d-4363-b2cd-575ccc70b082.answer: For proof, you will also have to provide your Transcript of Records when you’re applying. This module should also be listed there. It would be best if you could submit a Transcript of Records issued by your university in English. If your university does not provide this document in English automatically, please ask them to issue it for you. You do not need to submit your thesis for the application.

734497b7-3f59-4278-b52e-1ced0214cc11.question: Is the completion of a Master's program in an English-taught curriculum a valid exemption from submitting an English proficiency certificate when applying to the Master's program in AI in Society?
734497b7-3f59-4278-b52e-1ced0214cc11.answer: If your language of instruction was English, this is already sufficient.

c0e7c325-1eba-4151-af15-d1ee176cb318.question: Would it be necessary for a university to provide a document verifying that English was the language of instruction during my Master's studies?
c0e7c325-1eba-4151-af15-d1ee176cb318.answer: If you wish to submit a confirmation of your language of instruction as proof of your English language proficiency, the confirmation has to be issued by an administrative unit of the university on official university paper and has to bear a seal and an original signature.

cd4b628b-d6e1-42d2-8310-c1d86d1b4995.question: Does the practical project need to be recognized with credits, i.e. does it have to be part of my university course?
cd4b628b-d6e1-42d2-8310-c1d86d1b4995.answer: It's possible to recognize qualifications that were gained outside of a university. If the content requirement of engineering/science knowledge + political-social knowledge + practical application is fulfilled and a volume of at least 18 credits = 540 hours can be demonstrated, it could be recognized as a practical project.

6eb86cd2-2d9e-46f5-8432-3c13c5892d58.question: Would individual projects or volunteer experience be able to also contribute to the requirement?
6eb86cd2-2d9e-46f5-8432-3c13c5892d58.answer: Practises achieved outside of a university can be recognised (like professional training or another equivalent accomplishment). If the practises meet the contentual requirement (engineering or scientific understanding plus political-social knowledge plus practical application) and they can prove a structural input of at least 18 credits = 540 hours, then that can be accepted as the practical project.

f065d9f6-2614-4a0e-baf2-15067355c3a5.question: Can the project be part of a course or does it have to stand indiviually?
f065d9f6-2614-4a0e-baf2-15067355c3a5.answer: As long as the project meets the contentual requirement (engineering or scientific understanding plus political-social knowledge plus practical application) and the required credit hours, it can be recognized, regardless of whether it is part of a course or stands individually.

46259cf2-16d3-4026-a995-a76bbbf03fcb.question: If from my university, I do not officially 18 credits for a practical project in social science, is there a way to make up for this requirement?
46259cf2-16d3-4026-a995-a76bbbf03fcb.answer: If the practises meet the contentual requirement (engineering or scientific understanding plus political-social understanding plus practical application) and they can prove a structural input of at least 18 credits = 540 hours, then that can be accepted as the practical project. However, a credible documentation of the practical experience is required, meaning verifiable documents that confirm the content and structure.

f3ffce8e-c571-47e6-875e-46c2b4c9e339.question: What is acceptable proof for the 540 hours of practical experience required?
f3ffce8e-c571-47e6-875e-46c2b4c9e339.answer: In these cases, a credible documentation of the practical experience is required. Verifiable documents should be presented, affirming the content and scope of the experience.

5ea11616-0646-446d-9dac-2748a2a15df1.question: Are there any limitations on who can apply for the AI in Society program at TUM?
5ea11616-0646-446d-9dac-2748a2a15df1.answer: There are no limitations on who can apply, it does not matter which Bachelor's program you have studied specifically. It only matters that you fulfil the requirements outlined on the program website.

cec4b4f7-503f-47dd-93c5-43bcc23509b4.question: What are the key requirements for applying to the AI in Society program at TUM?
cec4b4f7-503f-47dd-93c5-43bcc23509b4.answer: The key requirements include having passed at least 5 ECTS from the fields of mathematics / statistics, as well as having completed a practical project worth at least 18 ECTS.

ae977aaf-09c6-4505-b342-52ba25f97bf3.question: What is meant by the requirement of submitting a 'List of [REDACTED]'?
ae977aaf-09c6-4505-b342-52ba25f97bf3.answer: Applicants are asked to submit their best 140 ECTS credits, by listing the modules where they got the best grades, overall worth 140 credits.

c0bcf307-eca9-4ab6-87a2-bb6d04738717.question: Does the requirement of submitting 'the best 140 ECTS credits' replace the information about having to list 90 credits found on the website?
c0bcf307-eca9-4ab6-87a2-bb6d04738717.answer: Yes, the information about 90 credits is referring to something different and is not relevant for this Master's program.

1b8eabd7-959f-4dfb-9d96-ace7a2e613f0.question: If I have completed at least 18 ECTS in a/multiple practical project(s), which involve technical tools and some societal aspect, should I apply to the M.Sc. AI in Society?
1b8eabd7-959f-4dfb-9d96-ace7a2e613f0.answer: If you have completed at least 18 ECTS in a/multiple practical project(s), which involve a) some sort of technical tools and b) some societal aspect, you are highly encouraged to apply. If you have the 18 ECTS, but aren't quite sure if the topics of your projects fit perfectly, you should apply regardless.

8291ed08-3d7a-4f0e-be7a-b3429f0cf236.question: Is it recommended to apply to the M.Sc. AI in Society even if I don't have a project in exact field?
8291ed08-3d7a-4f0e-be7a-b3429f0cf236.answer: If you have completed projects during your studies that are roughly in the field we describe (even if not matching perfectly), we highly encourage you to apply.

87e5ba55-cca4-4b72-a930-e4f5fe35d9a4.question: What is required for the 'Proof of successful participation in a practical project' for the application for M.Sc. AI in Society program?
87e5ba55-cca4-4b72-a930-e4f5fe35d9a4.answer: It should be a project you have completed as part of your studies and it must be worth at least 18 ECTS credits. If you additionally participated in a relevant project outside of your studies, you are welcome to incorporate it in an optional motivational letter.

aead33aa-fd7e-43db-983e-e8ad899a4798.question: Can I apply to the M.Sc. AI in Society program with my bachelor's degree documents reflecting the 86% of the total credits?
aead33aa-fd7e-43db-983e-e8ad899a4798.answer: If your 86% correspond to at least 140 ECTS credits and your completed modules include at least 5 ECTS from the fields of mathematics or statistics, then this is sufficient.

3a5a779f-7736-41e5-b7b7-e812d21bb819.question: Can I use a VPD from uni-assist that was obtained last year for the M.Sc. AI in Society application?
3a5a779f-7736-41e5-b7b7-e812d21bb819.answer: If you still have a valid VPD, there is no need to get a new one. Please submit the one you already have.

728a286a-12b2-4b2a-a1d6-4ab69c1b1d46.question: When will the forms for the application to the M.Sc. AI in Society be available?
728a286a-12b2-4b2a-a1d6-4ab69c1b1d46.answer: The forms are currently being prepared and will be available in the application system in a week or two.

f8bbacc4-2cf4-4a40-b1ab-91473f826507.question: As a registrant in FAU's program, should I go through a transfer process or directly use my Bachelor degree to apply to the AI in Society program?
f8bbacc4-2cf4-4a40-b1ab-91473f826507.answer: You do not need to go through any additional transfer processes, you can apply directly with your bachelor’s degree.

6bf39d08-b793-457a-b4d0-53515fa51302.question: Should the study experience from FAU's program be added to my resume when applying for the AI in Society program?
6bf39d08-b793-457a-b4d0-53515fa51302.answer: Should you complete relevant courses during your semester in FAU’s program, feel free to list them as well. Specifically, practical projects or modules in math and/or statistics can be included.

53d34b28-1c33-406f-8923-ff194fc3637d.question: Is the submission of the bachelor’s transcript of records mandatory for the application to the AI in Society program?
53d34b28-1c33-406f-8923-ff194fc3637d.answer: Yes, submitting your bachelor’s transcript of records is mandatory for the application.

441370ec-60ef-4612-a6ed-a52d2da95f27.question: How many ECTS credits will be counted from my bachelor’s degree for the application to the AI in Society program?
441370ec-60ef-4612-a6ed-a52d2da95f27.answer: The best 140 ECTS credits based on your bachelor’s degree will be counted for the application.

eefe1b2f-16fc-44cd-adea-bdcc37f568a2.question: Do I need to deregister from my old university when applying for the AI in Society program?
eefe1b2f-16fc-44cd-adea-bdcc37f568a2.answer: Yes, you will need to deregister from your old university.

0f1a32ac-a94a-4ce5-babf-26d68a799790.question: Can the theses from my previous studies be considered as practical projects for the AI in Society program at TUM?
0f1a32ac-a94a-4ce5-babf-26d68a799790.answer: You are asked to submit any relevant module that you have completed during your previous studies. Any practical project which you have received credits for will be counted if it is relevant content-wise.

cdc4ea00-6ece-4601-a260-e8261330d984.question: While I took a look at the admission requirements for AI in Society program, it says a practical project of at least 18 ECTS was required. Since the bachelor program of TUM Informatik only offers thesis of 15 credits, does this mean I will not be qualified, even if the content of the thesis project is qualified for the application?
cdc4ea00-6ece-4601-a260-e8261330d984.answer: If your thesis spans 15 ECTS and fits well into the field of technology applied to social sciences, then you're encouraged to apply anyway! You can also list any other practical courses from your bachelor's studies that could provide the missing credits. There will be separate forms to fill in this information in a more organized manner soon.

f035260f-d3bd-4223-9b31-537f0fcb922c.question: What is the format of the list of the best 140 ECTS and the proof of the practical project worth at least 18 ECTS credits needed to be submitted during the online application for the Master of Science - AI in Society program?
f035260f-d3bd-4223-9b31-537f0fcb922c.answer: The respective forms for the list of the best 140 ECTS and the proof of the practical project will be provided in the application platform. You are asked to wait about another week until they appear there.

e962ab95-2160-4353-82e3-be54bd8d0ba6.question: How can I prove my project has 18 ECTS for the 'AI in Society' MSc program application?
e962ab95-2160-4353-82e3-be54bd8d0ba6.answer: You will need to provide the module description of the project. Details about how to calculate if your project's credits correspond to at least 18 ECTS credits will be provided in a form that will appear inside the application process in a week or two.

b97f02e6-29e6-4e51-87d6-63521424d8fd.question: Do I need to obtain a document from my university to prove my project's credits for the 'AI in Society' MSc program?
b97f02e6-29e6-4e51-87d6-63521424d8fd.answer: You may need to reach out to the instructor of the module and ask for an official module description to provide as proof of the project's credits. Detailed instructions will be provided in a form that will appear inside the application process in a week or two.

48be57e2-650f-4103-8dab-fd62738766d4.question: Can projects that do not incorporate a social science perspective count toward the 'AI in Society' MSc program application requirements?
48be57e2-650f-4103-8dab-fd62738766d4.answer: No, projects that do not incorporate some sort of social science perspective cannot count toward the application requirements. However, you are very welcome to include them in the (optional) motivational letter.

e0f7f4c4-8260-4a79-ae03-a0cc877709cc.question: What kind of project can be used as 'Proof of successful participation in a practical project relevant to the course of study within at least 18 credits including module description'?
e0f7f4c4-8260-4a79-ae03-a0cc877709cc.answer: It should be a project you have completed as part of your studies, since it must be worth at least 18 ECTS credits. However, if you additionally participated in a relevant project outside of your studies, you are welcome to incorporate it in an optional motivational letter.

bee81b1f-8bdb-431f-a508-083af185c955.question: Can the academic documents already possessed from October of last year be used for application if they reflect 86% of the total credits from a Bachelor's degree?
bee81b1f-8bdb-431f-a508-083af185c955.answer: If your 86% correspond to at least 140 ECTS credits, then this is sufficient. However, please note that your completed modules also need to include at least 5 ECTS from the fields of mathematics or statistics.

18af2b94-f681-4386-a421-0b0e5a7a1b90.question: Can a VPD from uni-assist obtained last year and stated as valid for a year, be used for the application?
18af2b94-f681-4386-a421-0b0e5a7a1b90.answer: If you still have a valid VPD, there is no need to get a new one. Please submit the one you already have.

1af97f76-0835-4376-a970-c49c87dd0e23.question: Would my current MMT degree provide any exemptions or benefits during the application process for the MSc AI in Society?
1af97f76-0835-4376-a970-c49c87dd0e23.answer: Generally, an additional Master’s degree (e.g. in MMT) does not provide particular benefits for you regarding the application process, except for the (optional) motivational letter you can hand in. If you can incorporate your previous studies into a motivation of why you are particularly interested in the study program, please feel free to do so. Depending on your modules from the MMT program, you may hand in a request for recognition of those modules in case they are either the same lectures also taught in AIS or equivalent content-wise. For this, you have time until up to one year after admission to the AIS program.

53ace881-28bc-464d-bd77-ee370590d2b4.question: Would I still be required to pay the standard application fee, or are there any fee waivers or reductions available for current international students?
53ace881-28bc-464d-bd77-ee370590d2b4.answer: There are no particular exceptions regarding fees. For general information about fees for international students, it would be best to refer to the official website.

11cc8559-e626-471a-addd-1b9fcafe6c36.question: Would my current MMT degree provide any exemptions or benefits during the application process to MSc AI in Society?
11cc8559-e626-471a-addd-1b9fcafe6c36.answer: It largely depends on whether there were modules completed in the MMT course that also appear in the AIS study plan. These could potentially benefit the application process.
